T05TD4016.3E:18b-7: don rnam pa 'di bdun dang ldan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi yon tan ni bla na med pa zhes bya'o /
T05TD4016.3E:18b-9: // / bam po lnga bcu bdun pa /
T05TD4016.3E:18b-10: byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
T05TD4016.3E:18b-11: bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba ni srid par skye ba rnams kyi nang na rab mchog ces bgyi lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad lnga pa skye ba khyad par du 'phags pa las brtsams nas sa rnams rab tu dbye ba ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:18b-15: 'di ni dang po byang chub sems dpas zhu ba gsol pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:18b-16: 'di ltar sngar skye ba khyad par du 'phags pa zhes gsungs pas /
T05TD4016.3E:18b-17: de don gang la dgongs pa'i phyir khyad par du 'phags zhes bgyi lags zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T05TD4016.3E:18b-18: bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa /
T05TD4016.3E:18b-19: rigs kyi bu rgyu dang rkyen rnam pa bzhi'i phyir te zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni /
T05TD4016.3E:18b-20: gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par len du gsungs pa ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:18b-21: 'di yang rnam pa gnyis su dbye ste /
T05TD4016.3E:18b-22: grangs lan mdor gsungs pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:18b-23: rkyen rnam pa bzhi rnam par phye nas bstan pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:18b-25: dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu rnam par dag par bsags pa las byung ba'i phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:18b-26: ched du yid kyis so sor brtags pa'i stobs kyi sa len pa nyid kyi phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:18b-27: snying brtse bas sems can rnams yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:19a-0: bdag nyid kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa nyid kyi gzhan gyis kun nas nyon mongs pa rnam par sel ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa rkyen rnam pa bzhi @19a * //
T05TD4016.3E:19a-1: rnam par phye ste bstan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:19a-2: dang po ni byang chub chen po yongs su tshol ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu rnam par dag pa bsags pa las byung ba'i phyir te /
T05TD4016.3E:19a-3: 'di ni bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las shes pa'i stobs kyi skye ba len pa zhes bstan pa nyid do //
T05TD4016.3E:19a-4: gnyis pa phyed du yid gnyis kyis so sor brtags pa zhes bya ba ni smon lam gyi stobs kyis skye ba len pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:19a-5: de'i phyir bstan bcos mdo sde'i rgyan las /
T05TD4016.3E:19a-6: de la smon lam gyi stobs kyis skye ba len pa sa chen po la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa'o zhes bshad do /
T05TD4016.3E:19a-7: gang du bstan pa rnam pa 'di gnyis ni nye ba'i rkyen yin no //
T05TD4016.3E:19a-8: gsum pa snying brtse ba zhes bya ba 'dis ni sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dag sems can yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir skye ba yang dag par len pa yin par bstan te /
T05TD4016.3E:19a-9: de'i phyir 'phags pa dri ma med par grags pas bstan pa'i mdo las byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can gyi phyir 'khor bar 'jug go zhes gsungs pa yin no //
T05TD4016.3E:19a-10: bzhi pa ni bdag nyid kun nas nyon mongs pa nyid kyis gzhan kun nas nyon mongs pa sel ba'i phyir te /
T05TD4016.3E:19a-11: 'di ltar sa gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:19a-12: shes bya'i sgrib pa spang ba'i phyir gzhan gyi kun nas nyon mongs pa rnams sel bar byed de /
T05TD4016.3E:19a-13: gal te bdag nyid nyon mongs pa dang ldan par gyur na gzhan gyi bsal bar mi nus pas de'i phyir 'phags pa dri ma med par grags pas bstan pa'i mdo las /
T05TD4016.3E:19a-14: bdag nyid nad las bskyab par yang mi nus na gzhan rnams ji ltar yongs su bskyab par nus zhes gsungs pa yin no //
T05TD4016.3E:19a-15: gzhan yang de nyid las bdag nyid 'ching ba dang ldan pas gzhan dag gi 'ching ba las grol bar byed pa ni gnas med do //
T05TD4016.3E:19a-16: bdag nyid 'ching ba med pas gzhan 'ching ba las grol bar byed pa ni gnas yod do zhes gsungs so //
T05TD4016.3E:19a-17: 'phags pa sa bcu'i 'grel pa las kyang de skad du bshad do //
T05TD4016.3E:19a-18: 'di ltar khyad par du 'phags pa zhes gsungs pa de skye ba gang la dgongs nas gsungs she na /
T05TD4016.3E:19a-20: gong du bstan pa'i gnod pa yang dag par zhi bar byed pa'i skye ba la sogs pa'i rnam pa lnga la dgongs nas gsungs pa yin par bstan na yang don du 'gal ba med do //
T05TD4016.3E:19a-21: bstan bcos mdo sde'i rgyan las /
T05TD4016.3E:19b-0: byang chub @19b sems dpa'i skye ba len pa ni mdor bsdu na rnam pa bzhi'o zhes bshad de /
T05TD4016.3E:19b-2: byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba rnam pa bzhi rnam par dbye ba'i tshigs su bcad pa ni /
T05TD4016.3E:19b-3: las kyi stobs dang smon lam stobs //
T05TD4016.3E:19b-4: ting 'dzin stobs dang mngon shes stobs //
T05TD4016.3E:19b-5: stobs bzhi 'di la brten nas ni //
T05TD4016.3E:19b-6: byang chub sems dpa' skye ba len //
T05TD4016.3E:19b-9: de la skye ba rnam pa bzhi la yang las kyi stobs la dbang thob pa ni ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du skye ba len pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:19b-10: smon lam gyi stobs kyis skye ba ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:19b-11: sa chen por zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' smon lam gyi stobs kyi dbang gis gzhan yongs su smin par byed pa'i phyir byol song la sogs pa'i skye ba len pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:19b-12: ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyis skye ba len pa ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:19b-13: ting nge 'dzin la dbang thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyi dbang gis gong ma'i skye ba spangs nas 'og ma'i skye ba len pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:19b-14: mngon par shes pa'i skye ba ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:19b-15: mngon par shes pa thob pa'i byang chub sems dpas mngon par shes pa'i stobs kyi dbang gis dga' ldan gyi gnas la sogs par mtshan ma rnams bstan nas skye ba len pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:19b-16: mdo 'di las ni dang po las kyi stobs ma gtogs pa skye ba gzhan rnams las brtsams nas bstan pa yin no //
T05TD4016.3E:19b-17: byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
T05TD4016.3E:19b-18: bcom ldan 'das rgyu dang rkyen gang gi slad du byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni smon lam rgya chen po dang /
T05TD4016.3E:19b-19: smon lam gya nom pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:19b-20: smon lam mchog spyod pa zhes bka' stsal lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni drug pa smon lam rnam pa gsum las brtsams nas sa rnam par dbye ba bstan to //
T05TD4016.3E:19b-24: 'di ni dang po smon lam rnam pa gsum bskyed pa'i rgyu dang rkyen zhus pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:19b-25: smon lam rnam pa gsum po 'di yang so so nas bshad pa mi mthun te /
T05TD4016.3E:19b-26: kha cig na re sems can rnams la dmigs pa gang yin pa de ni /
T05TD4016.3E:19b-27: smon lam rgya chen po zhes bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:19b-28: dmigs pa rgya che ba'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:20a-0: gong du byang chub yongs su tshol ba @20a * //
T05TD4016.3E:20a-2: smon lam gya nom pa zhes bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:20a-3: gya nom par mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar smon pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:20a-4: rnam pa gnyis pa 'di nyid las smon lam mchog ces bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:20a-5: theg pa gnyis kyi smon lam dang /
T05TD4016.3E:20a-6: sa'i mdun rol pa'i smon lam las yang dag par 'das pa'i phyir ro zhe'o //
T05TD4016.3E:20a-7: kha cig na re smon lam rnam pa gsum po dag rkyen rnam pa bzhi las brtsams nas bstan pa yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:20a-8: rkyen dang po gnyis kyis ni smon lam rgya chen po bstan to //
T05TD4016.3E:20a-9: rkyen gsum pas ni smon lam gya nom pa bstan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:20a-10: rkyen bzhi pas ni smon lam rgya chen po bstan pa yin no zhe'o //
T05TD4016.3E:20a-11: kha cig na re smon lam gsum po dag ngo bo nyid gcig pa yin yang don gyi rjes su gsum du bstan pa yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:20a-12: dmigs pa rgya che ba'i phyir smon lam rgya chen po zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:20a-13: theg pa gnyis las khyad par du 'phags pa'i phyir gya nom pa dang mchog ces bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:20a-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa /
T05TD4016.3E:20a-15: rigs kyi bu rkyen rnam pa bzhi'i phyir te zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston te //
T05TD4016.3E:20a-16: 'di yang rnam pa gsum du dbye ste /
T05TD4016.3E:20a-17: grangs smos nas lan mdor gsungs pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:20a-18: rnam par phye ste bshad pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:20a-19: rkyen rnam pa bzhi bstan pa'i mjug bsdu ba ste /
T05TD4016.3E:20a-20: 'di ni dang po rkyen rnam pa bzhis lan mdor gsungs pa nyid kyi smon lam rnam pa gsum bskyed par bstan pa yin gyi /
T05TD4016.3E:20a-21: smon lam rnam pa gsum gyi bye brag gi mtshan nyid rnam par phye ste bstan pa ni ma yin no //
T05TD4016.3E:20a-22: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni mi ngas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba la gnas pa mkhas shing myur du thob par nus pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa rkyen rnam pa bzhi rnam par phye nas bshad pa ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:20a-23: 'di ni dang po mya ngan las 'das pa thob par nus pa bstan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:20a-24: myur du thob nas kyang bde bar gnas pa yang spong ba zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa bde bar gnas pa myur du spong bar bstan pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:20a-25: 'di ni rtag par snying rje chen po bskyed pa'i phyir yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' ba'o //
T05TD4016.3E:20a-26: rkyen med cing ltos pa med par yang smon lam chen po'i sems skye ba zhes bya ba ni rkyen gsum pa ston te /
T05TD4016.3E:20b-0: lan du @20b phan 'dogs pa la mi dmigs shing /
T05TD4016.3E:20b-1: lan du phan 'dogs pa la mi ltos par yang snying rje chen po'i sems skye ba ste /
T05TD4016.3E:20b-2: de'i phyir dgongs pa zab mo rnam par grol ba'i mdo las /
T05TD4016.3E:20b-3: lan du phan 'dogs pa'i phyir sems rgya chen po bskyed pa ma yin zhes gsungs so //
T05TD4016.3E:20b-4: mtshams rnam par grol ba'i mdo las ni dgos pa med cing bya ba med par yang zhes 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:20b-5: sems can rnams la phan 'dogs pa'i phyir sdug bsngal mang po sna tshogs yun ring du gnas pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:20b-6: zhes bya ba ni rkyen rnam pa bzhi bstan pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:20b-7: rkyen rnam pa lnga las ni 'dir ni 'dod pa yang dag par zhi bar byed pa'i skye ba'am /
T05TD4016.3E:20b-8: yang na skal ba mnyam par mthun par 'jug pa'i skye ba nyid do //
T05TD4016.3E:20b-9: de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' de dag smon lam rgya chen po dang /
T05TD4016.3E:20b-10: smon lam gya nom pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:20b-11: smon lam mchog spyod pa zhes bshad do zhes bya ba ni gsum pa spyi'i mjug bsdu ba yin par rig par bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:20b-12: byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
T05TD4016.3E:20b-13: bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bslab par bgyi ba'i gzhi du mchis lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa pha rol tu phyin pa rnams rgya cher bshad pa zhes bya ba ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:20b-14: 'di yang sgo rnam pa bco brgyad yod pa nyid las rnam pa bco brgyad du dbye ste /
T05TD4016.3E:20b-15: bslab par bya ba'i rnam grangs mang nyung bstan pa'i sgo dang /
T05TD4016.3E:20b-16: bslab pa gsum po dag bsdu ba rnam par dbye ba'i sgo dang /
T05TD4016.3E:20b-17: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs su bsdu ba rnam par dbye ba'i sgo dang /
T05TD4016.3E:20b-18: mtshan nyid rnam pa lngas pha rol tu phyin pa drug bslab par bstan pa'i sgo dang /
T05TD4016.3E:20b-19: pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi grangs 'phel 'grib med par bstan pa'i sgo dang /
T05TD4016.3E:20b-20: pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi go rims bstan pa'i sgo dang /
T05TD4016.3E:20b-21: pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi rnam pa rab tu dbye ba'i sgo dang /
T05TD4016.3E:20b-22: pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi ming thob pa bstan pa'i sgo dang /
T05TD4016.3E:20b-23: pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'i rnam pa'i grangs bstan pa'i sgo dang /
T05TD4016.3E:20b-24: mtshan nyid rnam pa lnga po dag gis las rnam pa lnga rab tu dbye ba'i sgo dang /
T05TD4016.3E:20b-25: shin tu rgya che ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid rnam pa lnga bstan pa'i sgo dang /
T05TD4016.3E:20b-26: pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi rgyu dang 'bras bu zad mi shes pa nyid du bstan pa'i sgo dang /
T05TD4016.3E:21a-1: la sred cing pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'bras bu la mi sred par bstan pa'i sgo dang /
T05TD4016.3E:21a-2: pha rol tu phyin pa'i mthu'i rnam par bstan pa'i sgo dang /
T05TD4016.3E:21a-3: pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi rgyu dang 'bras bu rab tu dbye ba'i sgo dang /
T05TD4016.3E:21a-4: sems can rang gi las kyi nyes pa yin par bstan pa'i sgo dang /
T05TD4016.3E:21a-5: shes rab kyi chos rnams kyi ngo bo nyid med par yongs su 'dzin par bstan pa'i sgo dang /
T05TD4016.3E:21a-6: pha rol tu phyin pa rnam pa gsum bstan pa'i sgo ste /
T05TD4016.3E:21a-7: 'di ni dang po bslab par bya ba'i rnam pa'i grangs mang nyung bstan pa'i sgo'o //
T05TD4016.3E:21a-8: 'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:21a-9: lan du gsungs pas bstan te /
T05TD4016.3E:21a-10: 'di ni zhu ba gsol ba'i sgo nyid do /
T05TD4016.3E:21a-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal ba /
T05TD4016.3E:21a-12: rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i bslab par bya ba'i gzhi ni mdor bsdu na rnam pa drug yod de zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:21a-14: grangs smos nas lan du mdor gsungs pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:21a-15: grangs smos pa bzhin du ming bkod pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:21a-16: 'di ni dang po grangs smos nas lan mdor gsungs pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:21a-17: 'di ltar bslab par bya ba'i gzhi ni mdor bsdu na rnam pa drug go zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T05TD4016.3E:21a-24: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa grangs smos pa bzhin du ming bkod pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:21a-25: pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di yang spyi dang bye brag gi ming gis bstan te /
T05TD4016.3E:21a-26: de la pha rol tu phyin pa drug ces bya ba ni spyi'i ming ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:21a-27: sbyin pa dang tshul khrims zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni bye brag gi ming ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:21a-28: pha rol tu phyin pa de yang bstan pa rnams la so so nas bshad pa mi mthun te /
T05TD4016.3E:21a-29: bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las ni don rnam pa gsum gyis na pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:21a-30: dus dang rang bzhin rnam par dag pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:21a-31: 'bras bu mchog thong par byed pas so zhes bshad do //
T05TD4016.3E:21a-32: de'i phyir bstan bcos 'di nyid las chos bcu po 'di dag ni shin tu yun ring po bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis yang dag par 'grub pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:21a-33: de ma yin pa 'jig rten pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:21b-0: rang sangs rgyas kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad pas rang bzhin rnam @21b par dag pa'i khyad par dang /
T05TD4016.3E:21b-1: byang chub mchog gi 'bras bu yongs su 'dzin pa'i phyir dus kyi mchog gis yang dag par 'grub pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:21b-2: rang bzhin rnam par dag pa'i mchog gis rnam par dag pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:21b-3: 'bras bu'i mchog sbyin par byed pas na de'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa zhes 'byung ba yin no //
T05TD4016.3E:21b-4: legs pa'i tshul khrims bstan pa'i mdo dang /
T05TD4016.3E:21b-5: bstan bcos sa yongs su 'dzin pa las kyang phal cher rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las bstan pa dang mthun par bshad do //
T05TD4016.3E:21b-6: bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ni mtshungs pa med pa gsum gyis pha rol tu phyin pa'o zhes bstan te /
T05TD4016.3E:21b-7: de'i phyir 'grel pa de nyid las /
T05TD4016.3E:21b-8: de la dus mtshungs pa med pa ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:21b-9: bskal ba grangs med pa gsum gang yin pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:21b-10: sbyor ba mtshungs pa med pa ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:21b-11: bsgom pa rnam pa bzhi la sogs pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:21b-12: 'bras bu mtshungs pa med pa ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:21b-14: byang chub sems dpa' ji tsam du pha rol tu phyin pa rnams bsgom pa dag ni don rnam pa 'di bzhi dang ldan pa'i phyir spyir pha rol tu phyin pa zhes brjod do zhes 'byung ste /
T05TD4016.3E:21b-15: zhib tu de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no //
T05TD4016.3E:21b-16: bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa las ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag ni phul du byung ba'i don gyi phyir pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o zhes bshad do //
T05TD4016.3E:21b-17: de'i phyir bstan bcos de nyid las pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag ni nges pa'i tshig ji ltar blta zhe na /
T05TD4016.3E:21b-20: rang sangs rgyas kyi sbyin pa la sogs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad las phul du byung bar pha rol 'gro bas de'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa zhes brjod do zhes 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:21b-21: slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las ni 'jig rten pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:21b-23: rang sangs rgyas kyi sbyin pa la sogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i las yang dag par 'das pas na de'i phyir spyod pa pha rol tu phyin pa zhes brjod do zhes bshad do //
T05TD4016.3E:21b-24: slob dpon ngo bo nyid kyi 'grel ba las kyang phal cher de skad du ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:21b-25: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel ba las ni rnam grangs rnam pa lngas pha rol tu phyin pa zhes ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:22a-0: dang po ni sbyin pa la sogs pa las rab tu ldog par gyur nas theg pa chung ngu la phyogs par @22a * //
T05TD4016.3E:22a-2: 'phags pa sh'a ri'i bu la sogs pa lta bu gang yin pa de ni tshu rol zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:22a-3: ldog pa med par sangs rgyas kyi lam bsgrub par nus pa gang yin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:22a-4: gnyis pa ni ser sna la sogs pa'i sgrib pa drug po gang yin pa de ni tshu rol zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:22a-5: sbyin pa la sogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag ni pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:22a-6: gsum pa ni yod pa dang med pa'i lta ba gnyis po dag ni tshu rol zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:22a-7: yod pa dang med par lta ba 'jig par byed pa'i shes pa gang yin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:22a-8: bzhi pa ni kun tu sbyor ba'i 'ching ba dang bcas pas sbyin pa gtong ba la sogs pa gang yin pa de ni tshu rol zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:22a-9: kun tu sbyor ba'i 'ching ba med pas sbyin pa gtong ba la sogs pa gang yin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:22a-10: lnga pa ni 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho chen po gang yin pa de ni tshu rol zhes bya'o//
T05TD4016.3E:22a-11: mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer chen po gang yin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bshad do zhib tu de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no //
T05TD4016.3E:22a-12: bstan bcos chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las ni khyad par du 'phags pa rnam pa gsum gyis pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o zhes ston te /
T05TD4016.3E:22a-13: de'i phyir de nyid las dang po ni rang bzhin gyis khyad par du 'phags pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:22a-15: gnyis pa ni thabs khyad par du 'phags pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:22a-16: gsum pa ni 'bras bu khyad par du 'phags pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:22a-17: de la brten pa zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:22a-19: don rnam pa gsum dang ldan pa'i phyir /
T05TD4016.3E:22a-20: pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o zhes bshad do //
T05TD4016.3E:22a-21: gzhan yang 'di las khyad par du 'phags par byas pa'i phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:22a-22: khyad par du 'phags par 'gro ba'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:22a-23: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi byon pa'i gnas su gyur pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:22a-24: gzhan yang shes bya'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:22a-25: sangs rgyas kyi rang bzhin la gnas pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:22a-26: gzhan yang bdag dang gzhan gyi shin tu gnon pa las yongs su skyob par byed pa'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:22b-0: bdag dang gzhan 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho chen po las yongs su zla bar byed pa'i phyir @22b ro zhes 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:22b-1: de la bye brag gi ming bstan pa ni bstan bcos mdo sde'i rgyan las dbul ba rnam par sel ba'i phyir sbyin pa zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:22b-2: bsil bar byed pa'i phyir tshul khrims zhes bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:22b-3: 'di ltar tshul khrims dang ldan pa ni spyod yul rnams las shin tu gdung ba'i nyon mongs pa rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:22b-4: khong khro 'dzoms pa'i phyir bzod pa zhes bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:22b-5: khong khro bcom nas zad par byed pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:22b-6: dge ba rnam par 'jog pa'i phyir brtson 'grus zhes bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:22b-7: dge ba rnam par 'jog pa ni 'di'i stobs kyis grub pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:22b-8: sems 'dzin par byed pa'i phyir bsam gtan zhes bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:22b-9: yid nang du sdud pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:22b-10: de kho na nyid kyi chos shes pa'i phyir shes rab ces bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:22b-11: don dam pa khong du chud pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:22b-12: bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa las ni ser sna dang dbul ba 'joms pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:22b-14: bsod nams kyi tshogs thob par byed pa'i phyir sbyin pa zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:22b-16: ngan 'gro zhi bar byed pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:22b-18: ting nge 'dzin thob par byed pa'i phyir tshul khrims zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:22b-20: kho na zad par byed pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:22b-21: bdag dang gzhan la bde ba la gnas par byed pa'i phyir bzod pa zhes bya'o//
T05TD4016.3E:22b-22: le lo dang sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams dang bral bar byed pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:22b-23: dge ba'i chos tshad med pa rnam par spel ba'i mthar phyin par byed pa'i phyir brtson 'grus zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:22b-24: rnam par g-yeng ba sel ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:22b-25: nang du sems gnas pa sgrub par byed pa'i phyir bsam gtan zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:22b-27: 'chal ba'i shes rab thams cad sel ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:22b-28: yang dag par rnam pa thams cad du chos rnams tha dad pa rab tu shes pa'i phyir shes rab ces bya'o zhes 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:22b-29: slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel ba las ni 'di ltar rgyu'i dus su ser sna bcom nas sbyin pa btang bas 'bras bu'i dus su dbul ba thams cad 'joms pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:22b-31: bsod nams kyi tshogs rgya cher sogs pa'i phyir sbyin pa zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:22b-32: 'di ltar rgyu'i dus su 'chal ba'i tshul khrims rnam par zhi bar byas pas 'bras bu'i dus su ngan 'gro zhi bar byed pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:23a-0: ma 'ongs pa na bde 'gro len pa @23a * //
T05TD4016.3E:23a-2: da ltar ting nge 'dzin thob par byed pa'i phyir tshul khrims zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:23a-3: de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad la nges pa'i tshig ci rigs par bshad par bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:23a-4: bdag dang gzhan de dag bde ba la gnas par byed ces bya ba ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:23a-5: bdag nyid kyi lus la 'khon pa'i nyes pa'i gnod pa med pa nyid kyis gzhan la sdug bsngal mi skye ba'i phyir bde ba thob par zhes bshad do //
T05TD4016.3E:23a-6: slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyi 'grel ba las 'di ltar rgyu'i dus su ser sna bcom pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:23a-7: bsod nams kyi tshogs rgya chen po bskyed pas 'bras bu'i dus su yang dbul ba 'joms pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:23a-8: longs spyod chen po thob pa'i phyir sbyin pa zhes bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:23a-9: nges pa'i tshig gzhan ni go sla'o zhes 'byung ste /
T05TD4016.3E:23a-10: slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las ni bsod nams kyi tshogs 'bras bu gtogs par bstan to //
T05TD4016.3E:23a-11: slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyi 'grel pa las ni bsod nams kyi tshogs rgyur gtogs par bstan te /
T05TD4016.3E:23a-12: gzhan ni mi mthun pa med pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:23a-13: bstan bcos lag na rin po che dang /
T05TD4016.3E:23a-14: 'phags pa phreng ldan ma'i mdo las /
T05TD4016.3E:23a-15: nges pa'i tshig bstan pa ni cung zad tha dad pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:23a-16: mangs kyi dogs nas 'dir ma brjod do //
T05TD4016.3E:23a-17: byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
T05TD4016.3E:23a-18: bcom ldan 'das bslab par bya ba'i gzhi rnam pa drug po de dag las /
T05TD4016.3E:23a-19: du ni lhag pa'i tshul khrims kyi bslab par bsdu lags /
T05TD4016.3E:23a-20: du ni lhag pa'i sems kyi bslab par bsdu lags /
T05TD4016.3E:23a-21: du ni lhag pa'i shes rab kyi bslab par bsdu lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa bslab pa gsum po dag bsdu ba rnam par dbye ba'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:23a-24: lan du gsungs pa bstan te /
T05TD4016.3E:23a-25: 'di ni dang po zhu ba gsol ba nyid do //
T05TD4016.3E:23a-26: bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal ba /
T05TD4016.3E:23a-27: rigs kyi bu dang po gsum ni lhag pa'i tshul khrims kyi bslab pas bsdus par rig par bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:23a-28: bsam gtan ni lhag pa'i sems kyi bslab pas bsdus pas so //
T05TD4016.3E:23a-29: shes rab ni lhag pa'i shes rab kyi bslab pas bsdus so //
T05TD4016.3E:23b-0: ngas brtson 'grus thams @23b cad du 'gro ba yin par bstan to zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa ni de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:23b-1: 'di ltar nus pa'i rjes su tshul khrims kyis snga ma gsum bsdus par gsungs te /
T05TD4016.3E:23b-2: tshul khrims kyi tshogs gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims kyi rang bzhin dang /
T05TD4016.3E:23b-3: tshul khrims kyi 'khor du gtogs pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:23b-4: shes rab ni lhag pa'i shes rab kyi bslab pa yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:23b-5: gsung rab kun las kyang de skad du gsungs pas mdo 'di nyid kyis brda phrad par zad do //
T05TD4016.3E:23b-6: brtson 'grus ni gsum char kun la khyab pa yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:23b-7: bslab pa gsum po dag slob bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:23b-8: mtshams rnam par grol ba'i mdo dang /
T05TD4016.3E:23b-9: dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las kyang /
T05TD4016.3E:23b-10: mdo 'di las gsungs pa dang mthun par 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:23b-11: legs pa'i tshul khrims bstan pa'i mdo las /
T05TD4016.3E:23b-12: lhag pa'i tshul khrims kyis ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsdus so //
T05TD4016.3E:23b-13: lhag pa'i sems kyis ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsdus so //
T05TD4016.3E:23b-14: lhag pa'i shes rab kyis ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsdus so zhes gsungs na /
T05TD4016.3E:23b-15: ci'i phyir mdo 'di dang tha dad par 'gyur zhe na /
T05TD4016.3E:23b-17: phan tshun bsdu ba la don mangs pa de'i phyir sngar ni bslab pa gsum bstan la /
T05TD4016.3E:23b-18: de'i 'og tu ni phan tshun bsdu ba'i bye brag bstan par bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:23b-19: de la bslab pa gsum zhes bya ba ni theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa las /
T05TD4016.3E:23b-20: ji skad du lhag pa'i tshul khrims ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:23b-21: sa bcu po dag gis bstan nas slob par byed pa'i phyir lhag pa'i tshul khrims zhes bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:23b-22: byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa ji snyed yod pa dag gis mi dge ba rnams mi byed pa'i sems gang yin pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:23b-23: lhag pa'i sems ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:23b-25: sems la brten nas slob pa'i phyir lhag pa'i sems zhes bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:23b-26: ting nge 'dzin rnams gang yin pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:23b-27: lhag pa'i shes rab ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:23b-28: mngon du byed par 'gro ba'i shes rab yin pa'i phyir te /
T05TD4016.3E:23b-29: lhag pa'i shes rab ces bya ba 'am /
T05TD4016.3E:23b-30: yang na shes rab la brten nas slob par byed pa'i phyir /
T05TD4016.3E:23b-31: lhag pa'i shes rab ces bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:24a-0: de ni rnam par mi rtog @24a * //
T05TD4016.3E:24a-1: pa'i ye shes so zhes bshad do //
T05TD4016.3E:24a-2: de la lhag pa zhes bya ba ni /
T05TD4016.3E:24a-3: mchog dang dam pa'i don yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:24a-4: de'i phyir bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las /
T05TD4016.3E:24a-5: sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa 'di kho na la bslab pa gsum po 'di yod kyi /
T05TD4016.3E:24a-6: 'di la phyi rol pa rnams dang thun mong ma yin pa'i phyir /
T05TD4016.3E:24a-8: dbang du bya ba'i don yin no zhes bshad de /
T05TD4016.3E:24a-9: zhib tu de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no //
T05TD4016.3E:24a-10: bslab pa gsum rgya cher rnam par bshad pa ni theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis byas pa dang lang gi tshe bsgyur ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:24a-11: bstan bcos rnam par bshad pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:24a-13: chos mngon pa kun las btus pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:24a-15: rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:24a-16: theg pa chen po bsdus pa las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:24a-17: de la phan tshun gcig gis gcig bsdu ba'i bye brag bstan pa yang legs pa'i tshul khrims bstan pa'i mdo las /
T05TD4016.3E:24a-18: tshul khrims kyis ni lhag pa'i tshul khrims kho na bsdus so //
T05TD4016.3E:24a-19: bsam gtan gyis ni lhag pa'i sems kho na bsdus so //
T05TD4016.3E:24a-20: shes rab kyis ni lhag pa'i shes rab kho na bsdus so zhes 'byung gi / pha rol tu phyin pa gzhan dang sbyar ba ni med de /
T05TD4016.3E:24a-22: pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag la tshul khrims rnam pa gsum yod de /
T05TD4016.3E:24a-23: tshul khrims kyi rjes su 'brangs pa'i tshul khrims dang /
T05TD4016.3E:24a-24: sems kyi rjes su 'brangs pa'i tshul khrims dang /
T05TD4016.3E:24a-25: shes rab kyi rjes su 'brangs pa'i tshul khrims so//
T05TD4016.3E:24a-26: de la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni tshul khrims kyi rjes su 'brangs pa'i tshul khrims zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:24a-27: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni /
T05TD4016.3E:24a-28: sems kyi rjes su 'brangs pa'i tshul khrims zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:24a-29: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shes rab kyi rjes su 'brangs pa'i tshul khrims zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:24a-31: 'di ni rang bzhin gyis gcig gis gcig bsdus pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:24a-32: mtshams rnam par grol ba'i mdo dang /
T05TD4016.3E:24a-33: dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las kyang dang po gsum gyis ni lhag pa'i tshul khrims bsdus te /
T05TD4016.3E:24b-0: tshul khrims kyi rang @24b bzhin dang /
T05TD4016.3E:24b-1: tshul khrims kyi 'khor yin pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:24b-2: bsam gtan gyis ni lhag pa'i sems bsdus so //
T05TD4016.3E:24b-3: shes rab kyis ni lhag pa'i shes rab bsdus so //
T05TD4016.3E:24b-4: brtson 'grus kyis ni gsum po kun tu 'gro ste /
T05TD4016.3E:24b-5: bslab pa gsum po dag ni slong ba'i phyir ro zhes gsungs te /
T05TD4016.3E:24b-6: 'di ni las kyis gcig gis gcig bsdus pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:24b-7: bstan bcos mdo sde'i rgyan las kyang don gyi mdo 'di las gsungs pa dang mthun par bshad de /
T05TD4016.3E:24b-8: de'i phyir de nyid kyi tshig le'ur byas pa las /
T05TD4016.3E:24b-10: rnam pa gnyis dang gcig dang gsum //
T05TD4016.3E:24b-13: de la dang po gsum zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:24b-14: pha rol tu phyin pa dang po gsum mo //
T05TD4016.3E:24b-15: rnam pa gnyis zhes bya ba ni 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa dang po gsum ni tshogs dang 'khor gnyis su 'gyur bas tshul khrims ni tshogs yin la /
T05TD4016.3E:24b-16: sbyin pa dang bzod pa ni 'khor yin pas so //
T05TD4016.3E:24b-17: dang po gcig ces bya ba ni 'di ltar dang po gsum dang /
T05TD4016.3E:24b-18: gnyis pa ni bslab pa gsum las dang po tshul khrims kyi bslab pa yin pas so //
T05TD4016.3E:24b-19: de la phyi ma gnyis zhes bya ba ni pha rol tu phyin pa phyi ma gnyis po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:24b-20: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:24b-21: yang gnyis zhes bya ba ni 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa phyi ma gnyis po dag ni go rims bzhin du lhag pa'i sems dang /
T05TD4016.3E:24b-22: shes rab kyi bslab pa gnyis yin pas so //
T05TD4016.3E:24b-23: de la gcig ces bya ba ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:24b-24: brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gcig kho na'o //
T05TD4016.3E:24b-25: gsum zhes bya ba ni 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa gcig po 'di ni bslab pa gsum po kun la khyab pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:24b-26: bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las snga ma bzhis ni lhag pa'i tshul khrims bsdus so //
T05TD4016.3E:24b-27: drug pas ni lhag pa'i shes rab bsdus so zhes bshad do //
T05TD4016.3E:24b-28: de'i phyir bstan bcos de nyid las /
T05TD4016.3E:24b-29: pha rol tu phyin pa bzhi'i tshogs dang /
T05TD4016.3E:24b-32: kun tu bsrung ba dang bcas pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lhag pa'i tshul khrims kyi bslab pa yongs su rdzogs par rig par bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:25a-0: bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni lhag pa'i sems kyi bslab pa yongs su rdzogs par @25a * //
T05TD4016.3E:25a-2: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni lhag pa'i shes rab kyi bslab pa yongs su rdzogs par rig par bya'o zhes 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:25a-3: zhib tu de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no //
T05TD4016.3E:25a-4: bstan bcos sa yongs su 'dzin pa las kyang rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las bstan pa dang mthun par bshad de /
T05TD4016.3E:25a-5: 'di ni rab tu phye ba'i rjes su gcig gis gcig bsdus par bstan pa yin no //
T05TD4016.3E:25a-6: bstan bcos dag las bstan pa dang sbyar na pha rol tu phyin pa drug las re res kyang phan tshun gcig gis gcig sdud par ston pas bslab pa gsum po dag las bslab pa re res kyang pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag sdud par byed de /
T05TD4016.3E:25a-7: bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa las /
T05TD4016.3E:25a-8: pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag gi phan tshun rnam par nges pas ji ltar blta zhe na /
T05TD4016.3E:25a-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis la lar ni pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad sbyin pa'i sgrar bstan pa nas //
T05TD4016.3E:25a-10: la lar ni shes rab kyi bar gyi sgrar bstan pa de la dgongs pa gang zhe na /
T05TD4016.3E:25a-11: pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad la sbyor ba ni 'di dag thams cad kyi spyod pa la 'gro ba la dgongs pa'o zhes 'byung ste /
T05TD4016.3E:25a-12: rgya cher de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no //
T05TD4016.3E:25a-13: 'di ni grogs kyi sgo nas gcig gis gcig bsdus pa bstan to //
T05TD4016.3E:25a-14: bstan pa rnams mdor bsdu ba mi mtshungs pas de'i phyir bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa las ni don rnam pa bzhi las brtsams nas /
T05TD4016.3E:25a-15: phan tshun bsdu ba ston te /
T05TD4016.3E:25a-16: rang bzhin gyis bsdu ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:25a-18: las kyi rjes su bsdu ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:25a-19: rab tu phye ba'i rjes su bsdu ba'o zhes bshad de /
T05TD4016.3E:25a-21: gal te rang bzhin gyis bsdu ba ni tshul khrims kyis ni tshul khrims kho na bsdus so //
T05TD4016.3E:25a-22: bsam gtan gyis ni bsam gtan kho na bsdus so //
T05TD4016.3E:25a-23: shes rab kyis ni phyi ma lnga bsdus te /
T05TD4016.3E:25a-24: 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa bcu las brtsams nas phan tshun bsdu ba bstan to //
T05TD4016.3E:25a-25: grogs dang bcas na yang phan tshun bsdu ba dang ldan no //
T05TD4016.3E:25a-26: gal te las kyi rjes su bsdu na tshul khrims kyis ni dang po gsum bsdus te /
T05TD4016.3E:25a-29: ting nge 'dzin gyis ni bsam gtan bsdus so //
T05TD4016.3E:25a-30: shes rab kyis ni phyi ma lnga bsdus so //
T05TD4016.3E:25b-0: pha rol tu phyin pa bcu'i sgo las brtsams nas @25b brtson 'grus ni gsum po dag gis bsdu bar bshad de /
T05TD4016.3E:25b-1: gsum po dag slong bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:25b-2: gal te rab tu phye ba'i rjes su bsdu na tshul khrims kyis ni snga ma bzhin du bsdus so //
T05TD4016.3E:25b-3: snga ma gsum ni sngar bstan pa bzhin te /
T05TD4016.3E:25b-4: kun tu bsrung ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:25b-5: ting nge 'dzin gyis ni bsam gtan bsdus so //
T05TD4016.3E:25b-6: shes rab kyis ni phyi ma lnga bsdus so zhes 'byung bas so //
T05TD4016.3E:25b-7: 'phags pa'i gsung rab dag ni so so nas don re re smos pa'i phyir phan tshun 'gal ba med do //
T05TD4016.3E:25b-8: byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
T05TD4016.3E:25b-9: bcom ldan 'das bslab par bya ba'i gzhi rnam pa drug po de dag las /
T05TD4016.3E:25b-10: du ni bsod nams kyi tshogs kyis bsdu ba lags /
T05TD4016.3E:25b-11: du ni ye shes kyi tshogs kyis bsdus lags zhes bya ba 'di man chod ni gsum pa bsod nams dang /
T05TD4016.3E:25b-12: ye shes kyi tshogs su bsdu ba rnam par dbye ba'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:25b-13: 'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:25b-14: lan du gsungs pa bstan pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:25b-15: 'di ni zhu ba gsol ba nyid do //
T05TD4016.3E:25b-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal ba /
T05TD4016.3E:25b-17: rigs kyi bu lhag pa'i tshul khrims kyi bslab pas bsdus ba gang yin pa de ni bsod nams kyi tshogs kyis bsdus pa zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:25b-18: lhag pa'i shes rab kyi bslab pas bsdus pa gang yin pa de ni ye shes kyi tshogs kyis bsdus pa zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:25b-19: ngas brtson 'grus dang bsam gtan rnam pa gnyis ni kun tu 'gro ba yin par bstan to zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:25b-20: 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug las /
T05TD4016.3E:25b-21: dang po gsum ni bsod nams kyis so //
T05TD4016.3E:25b-22: tha ma gcig ni ye shes kyi tshogs kyis so //
T05TD4016.3E:25b-23: lhag ma gnyis ni tshogs rnam pa gnyis kar gtogs so //
T05TD4016.3E:25b-24: mdo'i tshig rnam par bshad pa ni bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las ji skad bstan pa bzhin te /
T05TD4016.3E:25b-26: de la bsod nams ni gang yin /
T05TD4016.3E:25b-27: ye shes ni gang zhe na /
T05TD4016.3E:25b-28: bsod nams zhes bya ba ni mdor bsdu na pha rol tu phyin pa gsum ste /
T05TD4016.3E:25b-31: bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:26a-2: 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:26a-3: brtson 'grus dang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bsod nams kyi phyogs dang /
T05TD4016.3E:26a-4: ye shes kyi phyogs su rig par bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:26a-5: brtson 'grus la brten nas sbyin pa byin pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:26a-6: tshul khrims yang dag par len cing bsrung ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:26a-7: byams pa la sogs pa tshad med pa rnams bsgom pa'am /
T05TD4016.3E:26a-8: de lta bu dang mthun pa gang yin pa de ni bsod nams kyi phyogs kyi brtson 'grus so //
T05TD4016.3E:26a-9: brtson 'grus la brten nas thos pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:26a-11: bsgom pa'i shes rab la sbyar bar byed do //
T05TD4016.3E:26a-12: phung po la sogs pa la mkhas pa gang yin pa de ni /
T05TD4016.3E:26a-13: ye shes kyi phyogs kyi brtson 'grus zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:26a-14: bsam gtan la brten nas sbyin pa'am /
T05TD4016.3E:26a-15: tshul khrims yang dag par len cing bsrung ba 'am /
T05TD4016.3E:26a-16: byams pa la sogs pa tshad med pa rnams bsgom pa 'am /
T05TD4016.3E:26a-17: de lta bu dang mthun pa gang yin pa de ni bsod nams kyi phyogs kyi bsam gtan yin no //
T05TD4016.3E:26a-18: bsam gtan la brten nas thos pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:26a-20: bsgom pa'i shes rab la sbyor bar byed cing phung po la sogs pa rnams sna tshogs la mkhas pa gang yin pa de ni ye shes kyi phyogs kyi bsam gtan yin no zhes 'byung ba yin no //
T05TD4016.3E:26a-21: legs pa'i tshul khrims bstan pa'i mdo dang /
T05TD4016.3E:26a-22: bstan bcos sa yongs su 'dzin pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:26a-23: theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:26a-24: lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las kyang phal cher rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las bstan pa dang mthun par bshad do //
T05TD4016.3E:26a-25: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs rnam pa gnyis po 'di yang sngar mdo tsam du ming gi don bstan nas /
T05TD4016.3E:26a-26: de'i 'og tu phan tshun gcig gis gcig bsdu ba bstan par bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:26a-27: de la ming gi don ni bsod nams kyi 'bras bu bskyed cing bsod nams kyi rgyu byed pas /
T05TD4016.3E:26a-28: bsod nams kyi tshogs zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:26a-29: ye shes kyi 'bras bu bskyed cing ye shes kyi rgyu byed pas na /
T05TD4016.3E:26a-30: ye shes kyi tshogs zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:26a-31: de la tshogs zhes bya ba ni /
T05TD4016.3E:26a-32: bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las mngon par grub par byed pa'i don gyi phyir /
T05TD4016.3E:26a-33: tshogs zhes bya'o zhes bshad de /
T05TD4016.3E:26a-34: de'i phyir 'grel pa de nyid las /
T05TD4016.3E:26b-0: bsod @26b nams dang ye shes 'di gnyis la nus pa rnam pa gnyis yod de /
T05TD4016.3E:26b-1: byang chub kyi grogs su gyur pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:26b-2: byang chub kyi bdag nyid mngon par 'grub par byed de /
T05TD4016.3E:26b-3: rnam pa 'di gnyis kyi dbang gis mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba'i phyir /
T05TD4016.3E:26b-4: 'di gnyis la byang chub kyi tshogs zhes bshad do zhes 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:26b-5: bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis byas pa las ni bsags pa'i don gyi phyir tshogs zhes bya'o zhes bshad de /
T05TD4016.3E:26b-6: de'i phyir 'grel pa de nyid las /
T05TD4016.3E:26b-7: de la tshogs zhes bya ba ni bskal pa dpag tu med pa nas brtsams pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:26b-8: bstan bcos byang chub kyi tshogs bstan pa las ni don rnam pa lngas bstan te /
T05TD4016.3E:26b-9: yongs su rdzogs pa'i don dang /
T05TD4016.3E:26b-13: phun sum tshogs pa'i don te /
T05TD4016.3E:26b-14: de'i phyir bstan bcos de nyid las /
T05TD4016.3E:26b-15: tshogs zhes bya ba ni yongs su rdzogs pa'i don yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:26b-16: 'dis byang chub kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:26b-17: yongs su 'dzin pa'i don yang yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:26b-18: 'dis byang chub kyi chos yongs su 'dzin par byed pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:26b-19: gso ba'i don yang yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:26b-20: 'dis byang chub kyi chos yongs su gso bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:26b-22: 'dis byang chub kyi chos skyed par byed pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:26b-23: yan lag mang po phun sum tshogs pa'i don yang yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:26b-24: 'dis byang chub kyi chos phun sum tshogs par byed pa'i phyir tshogs zhes bya'o zhes 'byung ste /
T05TD4016.3E:26b-25: zhib tu de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no //
T05TD4016.3E:26b-26: de la phan tshun gcig gis gcig bsdu bar yang bstan pa rnams las so so nas bshad pa mi mthun pas mdor bsdus nas rnam pa brgyad du bstan te /
T05TD4016.3E:26b-27: dang po ni snga ma gsum ni bsod nams yin la /
T05TD4016.3E:26b-28: phyi ma gsum ni ye shes yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:26b-29: bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis byas pa las ji skad du /
T05TD4016.3E:26b-30: de la bsod nams kyi tshogs ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:26b-33: bzod pa sbyor ba rnam pa gsum gang yin pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:26b-34: ye shes kyi chogs ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:27a-2: thos pa'i shes rab la sogs pa'o zhes 'byung ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:27a-3: gzhan yang 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las /
T05TD4016.3E:27a-4: bla na med pa'i byang chub sgrub par 'dod pa sgo rnam pa gnyis yod de /
T05TD4016.3E:27a-5: bsod nams dang ye shes kyi sgo'o //
T05TD4016.3E:27a-8: bzod pa ni bsod nams kyi sgo'o //
T05TD4016.3E:27a-9: chos thams cad kyi de kho na nyid kyi mtshan nyid shes pa'i shes rab ni ye shes kyi sgo'o //
T05TD4016.3E:27a-10: shes rab kyang bsam gtan gyi rgyu la ltos dgos la /
T05TD4016.3E:27a-11: bsam gtan yang nges par brtson 'grus chen po'i stobs la ltos so zhes bstan pa lta bu'o //
T05TD4016.3E:27a-12: gnyis pa ni dang po gnyis dang bzhi pa ni bsod nams yin la /
T05TD4016.3E:27a-13: phyi ma gnyis dang gsum pa ni ye shes yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:27a-14: dge bsnyen gyi sgom pa bstan pa'i mdo'i nang nas bkod pa'i le'u las ji skad du /
T05TD4016.3E:27a-17: brtson 'grus ni bsod nams kyi bkod pa zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:27a-20: shes rab ni ye shes kyi bkod pa zhes bya'o zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o //
T05TD4016.3E:27a-21: gsum pa ni snga ma gnyis ni bsod nams yin no //
T05TD4016.3E:27a-22: phyi ma gcig ni ye shes yin no //
T05TD4016.3E:27a-23: gsum pa ni rnam pa gnyis kar gtogs pa yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:27a-24: bstan bcos mdo sde'i rgyan las ji skad du /
T05TD4016.3E:27a-25: tshogs pa gnyis kyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug bsdu ba ji lta bu zhe na /
T05TD4016.3E:27a-27: dang po gnyis ni bsod nams tshogs //
T05TD4016.3E:27a-28: drug pa de ni ye shes yin //
T05TD4016.3E:27a-29: gzhan gsum dag ni tshogs gnyis rgyu //
T05TD4016.3E:27a-30: lnga po yang ni ye shes tshogs //
T05TD4016.3E:27a-34: tshul khrims ni bsod nams kyi bdag nyid do //
T05TD4016.3E:27a-35: shes rab ni ye shes kyi bdag nyid do //
T05TD4016.3E:27a-38: bsam gtan gsum ni tshogs gnyi ga'i rgyu ste /
T05TD4016.3E:27a-39: 'di ltar gnyi ga'i byed pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:27a-40: lnga po de dag kyang ye shes kyi tshogs su 'gyur te /
T05TD4016.3E:27a-41: 'di ltar ye shes kyis bsdos pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ste /
T05TD4016.3E:27a-42: zhib tu de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no //
T05TD4016.3E:27a-43: bzhi pa ni dang po gsum ni bsod nams yin no //
T05TD4016.3E:27a-44: phyi ma gcig ni ye shes so /
T05TD4016.3E:27b-0: gzhan ni @27b rnam pa gnyi gar gtogs te /
T05TD4016.3E:27b-2: mtshams rnam par grol ba'i mdo dang /
T05TD4016.3E:27b-3: dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang /
T05TD4016.3E:27b-4: legs pa'i tshul khrims bstan pa'i mdo dang /
T05TD4016.3E:27b-5: bstan bcos sa yongs su 'dzin pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:27b-6: theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon dbyig gnyen dang ngo bo nyid med kyis mdzad pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:27b-7: lang gi tshe bsgyur ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:27b-8: rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las ji skad du bstan pa lta bu'o //
T05TD4016.3E:27b-9: lnga pa ni dang po lnga bsod nams yin la /
T05TD4016.3E:27b-10: phyi ma gcig ni ye shes yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:27b-11: g-ya'i mdo las ji skad du grogs su gyur pa'i lam ni pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po dag go / spong pa'i lam du gyur pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o zhes gsungs pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:27b-12: gzhan yang 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las /
T05TD4016.3E:27b-13: pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po dag ni bsod nams bskyed pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:27b-14: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sems kyi mngon par zhen pa rab tu sel ba'o zhes bstan pa lta bu'o //
T05TD4016.3E:27b-15: drug pa ni dang po lnga ni bsod nams yin la /
T05TD4016.3E:27b-16: phyi ma gcig ni bsod nams dang ye shes gnyi gar gtogs pa yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:27b-17: 'phags pa mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mdo'i nang nas /
T05TD4016.3E:27b-18: seng ge'i sgra bsgrags pa'i le'u las ji skad du /
T05TD4016.3E:27b-19: de la bsod nams kyis brgyan pa ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:27b-20: sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nas /
T05TD4016.3E:27b-21: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:27b-22: pha rol tu phyin pa dang shes rab kyis brgyan pa ma yin pa ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:27b-23: sa dang po nas sa bcu'i bar gyi gang yin pa'o zhes 'byung ba lta bu ste /
T05TD4016.3E:27b-24: de la sa zhes bya ba ni shes rab la bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:27b-25: de'i phyir theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis byas pa las /
T05TD4016.3E:27b-26: chos bdag med pa'i shes pa'i gnas skabs gang yin pa de ni sa zhes bya'o zhes bshad do //
T05TD4016.3E:27b-27: bdun pa ni snga ma lnga ni bsod nams yin la /
T05TD4016.3E:27b-28: drug pa ni ye shes yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:27b-29: bstan bcos mdo sde'i rgyan las /
T05TD4016.3E:27b-31: lnga po yang ni ye shes tshogs //
T05TD4016.3E:28a-0: zhes bya ba ni 'di ltar phyi ma shes rab kyi sa yongs su bsngos pa'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyang ye shes @28a * //
T05TD4016.3E:28a-1: kyi tshogs su 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa lta bu ste /
T05TD4016.3E:28a-2: pha rol tu phyin pa lnga po dag ni bsod nams kho na ma yin gyi /
T05TD4016.3E:28a-3: ye shes kyi tshogs su yang gtogs pa yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:28a-4: 'di ltar shes rab kyis yongs su bsngos pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:28a-5: brgyad pa ni sbyin pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:28a-7: bsam gtan ni bsod nams so //
T05TD4016.3E:28a-8: shes rab ni ye shes so //
T05TD4016.3E:28a-9: bzod pa dang brtson 'grus gnyis kar gtogs te /
T05TD4016.3E:28a-10: byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi mdo'i nang nas shes rab bstan pa'i le'u las ji skad du /
T05TD4016.3E:28a-11: ji ltar tshogs rnam pa gnyis la mkhas pa gang yin zhe na /
T05TD4016.3E:28a-12: bsod nams dang ye shes la mkhas pa gang yin pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:28a-13: bsod nams gang zhe na 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:28a-14: sbyin pa dang tshul khrims bsgoms pa gang yin pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:28a-15: ye shes gang zhe na 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:28a-16: shes rab yongs su bsgoms pas 'dus pa'i shes pa gang yin pa'o zhes gsungs pa lta bu ste /
T05TD4016.3E:28a-17: zhib tu de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no //
T05TD4016.3E:28a-18: yang na pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag kun kyang bsod nams dang ye shes su gtogs pa yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:28a-19: pha rol tu phyin pa re re yang phan tshun gcig gis gcig grogs byas pas so so nas drug po dag dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:28a-20: mdo sde dang bstan bcos rnams las dbang po'i rjes su rnam pa sna tshogs mi mthun par bstan pa yin la 'gal ba med do /
T05TD4016.3E:28a-22: // / bam po lnga bcu brgyad pa /
T05TD4016.3E:28a-23: byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
T05TD4016.3E:28a-24: bcom ldan 'das bslab pa'i gzhi drug po de dag la byang chub sems dpas ji ltar blta bar bgyi lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bzhi pa mtshan nyid rnam pa lngas pha rol tu phyin pa drug la bslab par bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:28a-25: 'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:28a-26: lan gsungs pas bstan te 'di ni mtshan nyid rnam pa lnga po dag gis bsgrub pa'i chos zhus pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:28a-27: bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa /
T05TD4016.3E:28b-0: rigs kyi bu mtshan nyid rnam pa lnga bslab par bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag @28b par lan du gsungs pa ston te /
T05TD4016.3E:28b-3: go rims bzhin du rnam par phye nas bstan pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:28b-5: dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni bsgom pa'i chos rnam pa lnga ste zhes 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:28b-6: thog ma kho nar byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa /
T05TD4016.3E:28b-7: dam pa'i chos bstan pa dag la shin tu mos pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa'i go rims bzhin du rnam par phye ste bshad pa ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:28b-8: 'di yang mtshan nyid rnam pa lnga bstan pa nyid kyis rnam pa lngar dbye ste /
T05TD4016.3E:28b-9: 'di ni dang po'i shin tu mos pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:28b-10: bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa las ni /
T05TD4016.3E:28b-11: pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa 'phags pa'i gsung rab shin tu zab pa dag la mos pa zhes 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:28b-12: de la pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i bstan pa shin tu zab pa zhes bya ba ni bstan bcos chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las ji skad du /
T05TD4016.3E:28b-13: shin tu rgyas pa'i phyogs gang yin pa de ni /
T05TD4016.3E:28b-14: byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod do zhes bstan pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:28b-15: mdo dag las ji tsam du theg pa chen po bstan pa de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i sde snod de zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o //
T05TD4016.3E:28b-16: gzhan yang de nyid las ci'i phyir shin tu rgyas pa la rgya che ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:28b-17: zab par bstan to zhes 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:28b-18: de'i 'og tu chos spyod pa rnam pa bcu dag las thos pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:28b-20: bsgoms pa las byung ba'i shes rab gya nom pas nan tan gyis bsgrubs pa zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa chos spyod pa rnam pa bcu bsgrub pa'i mtshan nyid ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:28b-21: chos spyod pa rnam pa bcu ni /
T05TD4016.3E:28b-22: gong du bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa rnam par bshad pa khungs su bzhag nas bstan pa las 'byung ba bzhin du rig par bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:28b-23: mdo'i tshig 'di la bshad pa mi mthun pa rnam pa gnyis yod de /
T05TD4016.3E:28b-24: kha cig na re chos spyod rnam pa bcu ni shes rab rnam pa gsum yin pa'i phyir shes rab gsum ni brtson 'grus kyi ngo bo nyid kyi chos spyod pa rnam pa bcu bsgrub pa'i phyir te /
T05TD4016.3E:28b-25: de'i phyir mtshams rnam par grol ba'i mdo las kyang /
T05TD4016.3E:29a-0: @29a * // chos spyod pa rnam pa bcu po de dag la thos pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:29a-2: bsgom pa'i shes rab kyis zhes gsungs so //
T05TD4016.3E:29a-3: gzhan yang dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las kyang /
T05TD4016.3E:29a-4: chos spyod pa rnam pa bcu po dag gis yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du /
T05TD4016.3E:29a-5: thos pa la sogs pa'i shes rab bsgrubs pa'i phyir ro zhes gsungs pa yin no zhe'o //
T05TD4016.3E:29a-6: kha cig na re shes rab rnam pa gsum gyis ni rnal 'byor yang dag par rab tu bstan la /
T05TD4016.3E:29a-7: chos spyod pa rnam pa bcus ni grogs su 'gyur bar bstan pa yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:29a-8: de'i phyir bstan bcos dbus dang mtha' rnam par 'byed pa'i tshig le'ur byas pa las /
T05TD4016.3E:29a-9: theg pa chen po ji lta bur //
T05TD4016.3E:29a-10: chos rnams bstan pa mdzad pa dag / byang chub sems dpa' rtag par yang //
T05TD4016.3E:29a-11: shes rab gsum gyis yid byed pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:29a-14: yid la byed pa'i yang dag par sgrub pa de la grogs ci yod ce na /
T05TD4016.3E:29a-16: de ni chos spyod rnam bcu dang //
T05TD4016.3E:29a-17: yang dag ldan par shes par bya //
T05TD4016.3E:29a-19: yi ge 'dri mchod sbyin pa dang //
T05TD4016.3E:29a-20: nyan dang klog dang len pa dang //
T05TD4016.3E:29a-21: 'chad dang kha ton byed pa dang //
T05TD4016.3E:29a-22: de sems pa dang bsgom pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:29a-25: theg pa chen po chos spyod pa rnam pa bcu yod de /
T05TD4016.3E:29a-28: gzhan dag la sbyin pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:29a-36: bsgom pa'o zhes 'byung ba yin no zhes zer te /
T05TD4016.3E:29a-37: bshad pa ni phyi ma bzang ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:29a-39: bstan bcos de las yid la byed pa yang dag par sgrub pa de yang chos spyod pa rnam pa bcus yongs su 'dzin pas so zhes 'byung bas so //
T05TD4016.3E:29a-40: byang chub sems kyi rjes su srung ba zhes bya ba ni gsum pa byang chub kyi sems srung ba'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:29a-41: yongs su mi nyams par srung ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub kyi sems srung ba zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:29b-0: byang chub tu sems bskyed pa rgya cher bshad pa ni byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i mdo las @29b bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:29b-1: byang chub sems kyi bsngags pa rgya cher brjod pa ni 'phags pa sangs rgyas phal po che'i mdo las bstan pa bzhin no //
T05TD4016.3E:29b-2: dge ba'i bshes gnyen yang dag pa la brten pa zhes bya ba ni bzhi pa dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten pa'i mtshan nyid ston te /
T05TD4016.3E:29b-3: bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las ji skad du /
T05TD4016.3E:29b-4: yan lag brgyad dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa yin par rig par bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:29b-5: byang chub sems dpa' sdom pa'i tshul khrims la gnas shing ma nyams pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:29b-6: skyon med par byed pas tshul khrims la gnas pa yin /
T05TD4016.3E:29b-7: blo ma byang ba ma yin pas mang du thos pa yin /
T05TD4016.3E:29b-8: bsgoms pa las byung ba'i dge ba gang yang rung ba thob cing /
T05TD4016.3E:29b-9: zhi gnas dang lhag mthong thob pas rtog pa dang ldan pa yin /
T05TD4016.3E:29b-10: snying rje dang ldan na snying brtse ba yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:29b-11: tshe 'di la rang gi bde bar gnas pa yal bar bor nas /
T05TD4016.3E:29b-12: gzhan dag la sbyor ba yin /
T05TD4016.3E:29b-13: gzhan dag la chos ston pa na bag tsha ba'i 'jigs pas dran pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:29b-14: spobs pa nyams pa med pas 'jigs pa med pa yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:29b-15: gzhan dag gis brnyas pa rnams dang /
T05TD4016.3E:29b-19: ngan pa 'ongs pa la sogs pa mi 'dod pa'i tshig gi lam rnams dang /
T05TD4016.3E:29b-20: sems can gyi log par zhugs pa rnam pa sna tshogs bzod pa yin /
T05TD4016.3E:29b-21: 'khor bzhi po dag la chos ston pa la stobs dang ldan zhing ngal ba med pas yongs su mi skyo ba yin /
T05TD4016.3E:29b-22: tshig gi chos nyid las ma nyams shing gsal ba tshig gi bya ba dang ldan pas dge ba'i tshig dang ldan pa yin no zhes 'byung ba lta bu ste /
T05TD4016.3E:29b-23: dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi bsngags pa rgya cher brjod pa ni 'phags pa'i chos kyi tshig gi mdo dang sangs rgyas phal po che'i mdo las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:29b-24: gzhan yang bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las /
T05TD4016.3E:29b-25: de la byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten pa ni rnam pa bzhis yongs su rdzogs par rig par bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:29b-26: dus dus su nad g-yog dang /
T05TD4016.3E:29b-27: tha mal pa'i g-yog bya ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:30a-2: dus dus su gus par smra ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:30a-8: chos dang mthun pa'i gos dang /
T05TD4016.3E:30a-13: yo byad sbyin pas mchod pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:30a-14: gnas bcas nas yang dag par gzud pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:30a-15: rnam par gzud pas chos dang mthun pas don la dbang byed la /
T05TD4016.3E:30a-16: rnam par mi g-yo zhing yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'chags pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:30a-17: dus dus su shes par bya ba'i bsam pas drung du 'gro ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:30a-19: dri ba dang nyan pa'o zhes 'byung ste /
T05TD4016.3E:30a-20: zhib tu de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no //
T05TD4016.3E:30a-21: rgyun mi 'chad par dge ba'i phyogs la sbyor bas bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba ni lnga pa rgyun mi 'chad par nan tan gyis sgrub pa'i mtshan nyid bstan te /
T05TD4016.3E:30a-22: bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa las ji skad du /
T05TD4016.3E:30a-23: rtag par rgyun du rgyun mi 'chad pa'i tshul du pha rol tu phyin pa drug bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa lta bu ste /
T05TD4016.3E:30a-27: lus med pa'i bsgom pa rnam pa bzhi las bar chad med pa'i bsgom pa nyid do //
T05TD4016.3E:30a-28: bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa las ni yang yan lag gi sems kyis bsnan te /
T05TD4016.3E:30a-29: bsgom pa rnam pa lngar byas nas /
T05TD4016.3E:30a-30: mdo 'di nyid kyi don ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:30a-31: de la mtshan nyid rnam pa lnga bstan pa yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug sgrub par 'dod pas mtshan nyid rnam pa lnga phun sum tshogs par bya dgos te /
T05TD4016.3E:30a-32: dang po ni gsung rab kyi yan lag la mos pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:30a-33: gal te bstan pa la ma brten na spyod pa ma yin pa nyid du 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:30a-34: gnyis pa ni 'phags pa'i gsung rab la mngon par yid ches par gyur nas chos spyod pa rnam pa bcus shes rab gsum skyed par byed de spyod pa'i bdag nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:30a-35: gsum pa ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rjes su bsrungs nas mi nyams par byed pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:30a-36: bzhi pa ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:30a-37: rkyen khyad par du 'phags pa la ltos pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:30a-38: lnga pa ni rgyun mi 'chad par bsgom pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:30a-39: myur du yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir ro zhes bshad do //
T05TD4016.3E:30b-0: bstan @30b bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa las bsgom pa rnam pa lnga zhes bshad de /
T05TD4016.3E:30b-1: kun tu spyod pa las sbyor bas bsgom pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:30b-3: yid la byed pas bsgom pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:30b-4: thabs la mkhas pas bsgom pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:30b-5: bya ba bsgrub pas bsgom pa'o zhes 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:30b-6: gzhan yang bstan bcos chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las bsgom pa ni mdor bsdu na rnam pa lnga po 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:30b-7: gnas pa yongs su 'dzin pa la brten pa la bsgom pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:30b-8: yid la brten pa la bsten pa'i bsgom pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:30b-9: yid kyi mos pa la brten pa'i bsgom pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:30b-10: thabs la brten pa'i bsgom pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:30b-11: dbang la brten pa'i bsgom pa'o zhes 'byung bas rgya cher de nyid las bstan pa bzhin te /
T05TD4016.3E:30b-12: mangs kyis dogs nas 'dir ma brjod do //
T05TD4016.3E:30b-13: byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
T05TD4016.3E:30b-14: bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du bslab par bgyi ba'i gzhi de dag grangs drug kho nar gdags pa mdzad lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni lnga pa pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi grangs 'phel 'grib med par bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:30b-15: pha rol tu phyin pa rnam pa bcu po yod pa de yang rnam pa gnyis su dbye ste /
T05TD4016.3E:30b-16: pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag gi grangs 'phel 'grib med par bstan pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:30b-17: pha rol tu phyin pa bzhi po dag gi grangs 'phel 'grib med par bstan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:30b-18: dang po la yang rnam pa gnyis te /
T05TD4016.3E:30b-21: 'di ni dang po drug kho na nyid du nges pa'i gtan tshigs zhus pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:30b-22: bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa /
T05TD4016.3E:30b-23: rigs kyi bu rgyu rkyen rnam pa gnyis kyi phyir te zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:30b-26: rgyan gnyis so sor bstan pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:30b-27: rkyen rnam pa gnyis so sor bsdu ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:30b-28: rnam par phye ste bshad pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:31a-0: 'di ni dang po grangs smos nas rgyu dang rkyen rnam pa gnyis kyi phyir grangs de ltar nges par 'gyur ro @31a * //
T05TD4016.3E:31a-2: mtshams rnam par grol ba'i ma do las ni dngos po gnyis te zhes 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:31a-3: sems can rnams la phan gdags pa'i phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:31a-4: nyon mongs pa rnams kyi gnyen por gyur pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa rkyen rnam pa gnyis so sor bstan pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:31a-5: mdo 'di nyid kyis brda phrad par zad do //
T05TD4016.3E:31a-6: de la dang po gsum ni sems can rnams la phan gdags pa yin la /
T05TD4016.3E:31a-7: phyi ma gsum ni nyon mongs pa rnams kyi gnyen po yin par rig par bya'o zhes bya bas ni gsum pa dang po dang phyi ma'i rnam pa gsum rkyen gnyis su so sor bsdu ba ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:31a-10: bzod pa gsum ni sems can la phan 'dogs par byed do //
T05TD4016.3E:31a-11: brtson 'grus la sogs pa gsum ni nyon mongs pa rnams kyi gnyen por gyur pas so //
T05TD4016.3E:31a-12: dang po gsum gyis sems can rnams la phan 'dogs pa ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams sbyin pas ni yo byad nye bar bsgrubs nas sems can rnams la phan 'dogs so //
T05TD4016.3E:31a-13: tshul khrims ni gnod pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:31a-15: rnam par tho 'tshams pa nye bar mi bsgrub pas sems can la phan 'dogs so //
T05TD4016.3E:31a-16: bzod pas ni gnod pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:31a-18: rnam par tho 'tshams pa de dag la ji mi snyam par bzod pas sems can la phan thogs so zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni bzhi pa go rims bzhin du rnam par phye ste bshad pa ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:31a-20: dang po phan 'dogs pa gsum bstan pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:31a-21: phyi ma gnyen por gyur pa gsum pa bstan pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:31a-22: 'di ni dang po sems can la phan 'dogs pa gsum bstan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:31a-23: dgongs pa zab mo rnam par 'grel pa'i mdo la sogs pa las /
T05TD4016.3E:31a-24: pha rol tu phyin pa dang po gsum ni go rims bzhin du phan 'dogs pa rnam pa gsum po yo byad nye bar bsgrubs nas phan 'dogs pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:31a-25: gnod pa mi byed pas phan 'dogs pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:31a-26: gnod pa byed pa la lan bya ba'i sems med pas phan 'dogs pa dang sbyar bar bya'o zhes bshad do //
T05TD4016.3E:31a-27: bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa las /
T05TD4016.3E:31b-0: @31b gzhan yang dang po gsum ni sems can la phan 'dogs pa dag yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:31b-1: de dag la yo byad sbyin zhing de dag la gnod par mi byed pa'i phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:31b-2: de dag gis gnod pa byas pa bzod cing phan 'dogs pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ste /
T05TD4016.3E:31b-3: rgya cher ni bstan bcos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa la sogs pa las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:31b-4: phyi ma gsum nyon mongs pa rnams kyi gnyen por gyur pa ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams brtson 'grus kyis ni nyon mongs pa thams cad rnam par ma bcil /
T05TD4016.3E:31b-5: bag la nyal ba thams cad ma bcom par yang nan tan gyis dge ba'i phyogs rnams sgom par byed pas nyon mongs pa de dag gis dge ba'i phyogs la sbyor ba'i las bskyed par mi nus so //
T05TD4016.3E:31b-6: bsam gtan gyis ni nyon mongs pa rnam par gnon to //
T05TD4016.3E:31b-7: shes rab kyis ni bag la nyal ba gtan du 'joms par byed do zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa ni phyi ma gnyen por gyur pa gsum bstan to //
T05TD4016.3E:31b-8: 'di ltar brtson 'grus de bsam gtan ltar kun tu spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa thams cad rnam par bcil ba yang ma yin /
T05TD4016.3E:31b-9: shes rab ltar sa bon bag la nyal ba thams cad gtan du bcom pa ma yin mod kyi /
T05TD4016.3E:31b-10: 'on kyang brtson 'grus kyis dge ba rnams sgom par byed pa des nyon mongs pa rnams kyis mi bskyed par dge ba'i phyogs la sbyor bar byed do //
T05TD4016.3E:31b-11: dge ba'i phyogs la sbyor bar byed pa gang yin pa de ni brtson 'grus yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:31b-12: bsam gtan dang shes rab kyi thabs su gyur pa'i phyir sbyor ba zhes bshad do //
T05TD4016.3E:31b-13: bsam gtan gyis ni nyon mongs pa kun tu spyod pa rnam par gnon par byed la /
T05TD4016.3E:31b-14: shes rab kyis ni sa bon gtan du 'joms pa'i phyir /
T05TD4016.3E:31b-15: phyi ma gsum ni nyon mongs pa'i gnyen por gyur pa'o zhes bshad do //
T05TD4016.3E:31b-16: bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa las kyang /
T05TD4016.3E:31b-17: brtson 'grus la sogs pa gsum ni nyon mongs pa'i gnyen por gyur pa yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:31b-18: rnam par bcil bar ma gyur kyang /
T05TD4016.3E:31b-19: nan tan gyis dge ba'i phyogs la sbyor zhing gnyen por bsgoms nas nyon mongs pa rnam par gnon cing nye bar byed pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ste /
T05TD4016.3E:32a-0: rgya cher ni bstan bcos chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus @32a * //
T05TD4016.3E:32a-1: pa la sogs pa las bstan pa bzhin no //
T05TD4016.3E:32a-2: pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag kyang /
T05TD4016.3E:32a-3: gtan tshigs rnam pa drug gis ni rnam pa lngar bstan te /
T05TD4016.3E:32a-4: kha cig las ni don gcig gis grangs drug tu bstan pa yang yod de /
T05TD4016.3E:32a-5: dge bsnyen gyi sdom pa bstan pa'i mdo las ji skad du /
T05TD4016.3E:32a-6: mu stegs can dag gis log par smra ba phyogs rnam pa drug rab tu bsal ba'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa drug bstan te /
T05TD4016.3E:32a-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis shar phyogs ni sbyin pa lta bu ste /
T05TD4016.3E:32a-8: thog ma kho nar byung ba'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:32a-9: lho phyogs ni tshul khrims lta bu ste /
T05TD4016.3E:32a-10: g-yas phyogs dang 'dra ba'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:32a-11: nub phyogs ni bzod pa lta bu ste /
T05TD4016.3E:32a-12: nyes pa la bzod pa de'i 'og tu 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:32a-13: byang phyogs ni brtson 'grus lta bu ste /
T05TD4016.3E:32a-14: ming mchog tu gyur pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:32a-15: 'og ma'i phyogs ni bsam gtan lta bu ste /
T05TD4016.3E:32a-16: ngan 'gro la so sor rtog pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:32a-17: steng gi phyogs ni shes rab lta bu ste /
T05TD4016.3E:32a-18: bla na med pa mi skye ba nyid kyi phyir ro zhes gsungs pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:32a-19: gzhan yang 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las /
T05TD4016.3E:32a-20: ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas pha rol tu phyin pa drug kho na nyid du yang dag par gsungs shing mi mang mi nyung zhe na /
T05TD4016.3E:32a-22: sangs rgyas ni chos kyi rgyal po'i mdzad pas sems can gyi dbang po'i rjes su res 'ga' ni mdo nas gcig dang /
T05TD4016.3E:32a-24: gsum la sogs pa gsungs so //
T05TD4016.3E:32a-25: res 'ga' ni rgya cher ston par yang mdzad de /
T05TD4016.3E:32a-26: bskal pa bzang po'i mdo las ji skad du /
T05TD4016.3E:32a-27: pha rol tu phyin pa brgyad khri bzhi stong zhes gsungs pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:32a-28: gzhan yang 'gro drug gi sems can rnams ni /
T05TD4016.3E:32a-29: lus dang sems kyi gnod pa nyams su myong bas byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying rje chen po'i sems bskyed nas sems can 'gro ba drug gi sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar bya ba'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa drug bskyed pa yin pas mi mang mi nyung ngo zhes 'byung ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:32a-30: gzhan yang bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las /
T05TD4016.3E:32a-31: bslab pa gsum po dag bsdu ba'i phyir drug kho nar bstan te /
T05TD4016.3E:32a-32: dang po bzhis ni lhag pa'i tshul khrims bsdus so //
T05TD4016.3E:32a-33: de'i 'og ma gcig gis ni lhag pa'i sems bsdus so //
T05TD4016.3E:32b-0: @32b tha ma gcig gis ni lhag pa'i shes rab bsdus pa des na pha rol tu phyin pa rnam pa drug kho nar rnam par gzhag ste /
T05TD4016.3E:32b-1: mi mang mi nyung zhes bshad pa lta bu kho na'o //
T05TD4016.3E:32b-2: kha cig la ni don rnam pa gnyis kyis mi mang mi nyung bar bstan pa yod de /
T05TD4016.3E:32b-4: mtshams rnams par grol ba'i mdo dang /
T05TD4016.3E:32b-5: dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang /
T05TD4016.3E:32b-6: bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ji skad du bstan pa lta bu'o //
T05TD4016.3E:32b-7: kha cig las ni don rnam pa gsum gyis mi mang mi nyung bar bstan pa yang yod de /
T05TD4016.3E:32b-8: bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa las ji skad du /
T05TD4016.3E:32b-9: ci'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa drug kho na zhe na /
T05TD4016.3E:32b-11: gnyen por rnam par gzhag pa'i phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:32b-12: sangs rgyas rnams kyi gnas su gyur pa'i phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:32b-13: sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:32b-14: mthun par gyur pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ba lta bu ste /
T05TD4016.3E:32b-15: rgya cher de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no //
T05TD4016.3E:32b-16: gzhan yang bstan bcos chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las /
T05TD4016.3E:32b-17: de la grangs ni rnam pa gnyis te /
T05TD4016.3E:32b-20: bgrang ba'i grangs ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:32b-21: pha rol tu phyin pa drug ces bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:32b-22: nges pa'i grangs ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:32b-23: pha rol tu phyin pa'i grangs ni drug kho na yod pas mi mang mi nyung ngo zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:32b-25: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam ni mdor bsdu na rnam pa gnyis te /
T05TD4016.3E:32b-26: dang po ni mngon par mtho ba'i lam ste /
T05TD4016.3E:32b-27: pha rol tu phyin pa snga ma gsum po dag go //
T05TD4016.3E:32b-28: gnyis pa ni nges par legs pa'i lam ste /
T05TD4016.3E:32b-29: pha rol tu phyin pa phyi ma gsum po dag go zhes 'byung ste /
T05TD4016.3E:32b-30: zhib tu de nyid las bstan pa bzhin te /
T05TD4016.3E:32b-32: gzhan yang de nyid las pha rol tu phyin pa ni mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i thabs yin pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:32b-33: de'i grangs su drug kho na'o //
T05TD4016.3E:32b-35: pha rol tu phyin pa dang po gsum gyi phyir ni /
T05TD4016.3E:32b-36: mya ngan las 'das pa la mi gnas so //
T05TD4016.3E:32b-37: pha rol tu phyin pa phyi ma gsum gyi phyir ni /
T05TD4016.3E:32b-38: 'khor ba la mi gnas so zhes 'byung ste /
T05TD4016.3E:32b-39: zhib tu de nyid las bstan pa bzhin te /
T05TD4016.3E:33a-2: gzhan yang de nyid las sems can sdud cing phan 'dogs pa'i phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:33a-3: nyon mongs pa'i gnyen por gyur pa'i phyir /
T05TD4016.3E:33a-4: grangs drug kho na'o zhes 'byung ste /
T05TD4016.3E:33a-5: 'di ni mdo 'di nyid las gsum pa dang mthun par don rnam pa gnyis kyi drug tu gsungs par bstan te 'di ni rkyen rnam pa gsum pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:33a-6: kha cig las ni don rnam pa bzhis mi mang mi nyung bar bstan pa yang yod de /
T05TD4016.3E:33a-7: bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa las ni ji skad du bstan pa bzhin te /
T05TD4016.3E:33a-8: bstan bcos de nyid las ni don rnam pa gsum gyis bstan to //
T05TD4016.3E:33a-9: dang po ni pha rol tu phyin pa bcu'i grangs mi mang mi nyung bar bstan pa la yang don rnam pa gnyis te /
T05TD4016.3E:33a-10: sgrib pa bcu rab tu sel ba'i phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:33a-11: de bzhin nyid bcu mngon du byed pa'i phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:33a-12: gnyis pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi grangs mi mang mi nyung bar bstan pa yang don rnam pa bzhi yod de /
T05TD4016.3E:33a-13: dang po ni rgyu rnam pa gsum la brten nas ni mi mthun pa'i sgrib pa rnam pa drug rab tu sel ba'i phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:33a-14: rim gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams sgrub pa'i phyir dang rim gyis sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i phyir te /
T05TD4016.3E:33a-15: zhib tu de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no //
T05TD4016.3E:33a-16: gnyis pa ni lam gnyis la brten pa ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:33a-17: mngon par mtho ba'i lam dang /
T05TD4016.3E:33a-18: nges par legs pa'i lam gang yin pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:33a-19: chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las rnam grangs dang po nas bstan pa dang mthun no //
T05TD4016.3E:33a-20: gsum pa ni sems can la phan 'dogs shing sgrib pa rab tu sel ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:33a-21: mdo 'di nyid las gsungs pa dang mthun no //
T05TD4016.3E:33a-22: bzhi pa ni mi gnas pa'i lam gyis mi mang mi nyung bar bstan pa ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:33a-23: dang po gsum gyi phyir ni mya ngan las 'das pa la mi gnas pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:33a-24: phyi ma gsum gyi phyir ni 'khor ba la mi gnas pa gang yin pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:33a-25: zhib tu de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no //
T05TD4016.3E:33a-26: bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa las ni /
T05TD4016.3E:33a-27: dang po gsum kho na ston te /
T05TD4016.3E:33a-28: rim gyis sgrib pa rab tu sel ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:33a-29: sangs rgyas kyi chos sgrub pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:33a-30: sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:33b-0: bstan bcos mngon pa sna tshogs kun @33b las btus pa las ni /
T05TD4016.3E:33b-1: phyi ma gsum kho na'i don dang /
T05TD4016.3E:33b-2: lam rnam pa gnyis la sogs pa ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:33b-3: bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa las ni bstan bcos gnyis kyi don ni spyir bsdus nas rnam pa drug tu bstan pa'i phyir rkyen bzhir gyur pa yin no //
T05TD4016.3E:33b-4: yang bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa las /
T05TD4016.3E:33b-5: rkyen rnam pa drug tu phye nas ston te /
T05TD4016.3E:33b-6: theg pa chen po bsdus pa las bstan pa'i rgyu rnam pa gsum logs shig tu phye ba'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:33b-7: mdo 'di las gsungs pa'i rkyen rnam pa gnyis ni bstan bcos chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:33b-8: rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa las ni ji skad du bstan pa bzhin te /
T05TD4016.3E:33b-9: de brtags na khong du chud par 'gyur ro //
T05TD4016.3E:33b-10: gsum pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa bzhi'i grangs mi mang mi nyung bar bstan pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:33b-11: mdo'i tshig thad kar bcas pa na bshad par bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:33b-12: bstan bcos mdo sde'i rgyan las ni tshigs su bcad pa drug gis drug tu rnam par gzhag pa'i gtan tshigs ston te /
T05TD4016.3E:33b-13: bdag la phan 'dogs pa'i gzhi rnam pa gsum bsdu ba'i phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:33b-14: bdag dang gzhan la phan 'dogs pa'i rnam pa drug bsdu ba'i phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:33b-15: bdag dang gzhan la phan 'dogs pa gzhi rnam pa drug bsdu ba'i phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:33b-16: theg pa chen po'i rgyu rnam pa bzhi bsdu ba'i phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:33b-17: theg pa chen po'i lam drug bsdu ba'i phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:33b-18: theg pa chen po'i bslab pa gsum bsdu ba'i phyir te /
T05TD4016.3E:33b-19: brtags na khong du chud par 'gyur bas zhib tu ma bshad do //
T05TD4016.3E:33b-20: byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
T05TD4016.3E:33b-21: bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du pha rol tu phyin pa gzhan dag grangs bzhi kho nar mdzad par gdags lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa pha rol tu phyin pa phyi ma bzhi'i grangs 'phel 'grib med par bstan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:33b-22: de bzhi bya ba ni pha rol tu phyin pa bcu las pha rol tu phyin pa phyi ma bzhi po 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:34a-2: 'di ni dang po grangs bzhi'i gtan tshigs zhus pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:34a-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa /
T05TD4016.3E:34a-4: rigs kyi bu snga ma'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag gi grogs su gyur pa'i phyir te zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni gnyis pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:34a-5: de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:34a-6: de yang rnam pa gnyis las grangs bzhi las mi mang mi nyung ba'i lan mdor bstan pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:34a-7: pha rol tu phyin pa bzhi'i grangs mi nyung mi mang bar gyur pa'i don rnam par phye ste bshad pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:34a-8: 'di ni dang por grangs bzhir nges pa'i gtan tshigs mdor bstan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:34a-9: 'di ltar rnam pa drug po dag gi grogs su gyur pa'i phyir rnam pa bzhi kho na ste /
T05TD4016.3E:34a-11: de'i phyir bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa las /
T05TD4016.3E:34a-12: phyi ma bzhi kho nar gyur pa yang snga ma'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag gi grogs su gyur cing yongs su rdzogs par byed pas mi nyung mi mang ba'i phyir /
T05TD4016.3E:34a-13: thabs la mkhas pa ni sbyin pa la sogs pa gsum gyi grogs su gyur pa yin no //
T05TD4016.3E:34a-14: smon lam ni brtson 'grus kyi grogs su gyur pa yin no //
T05TD4016.3E:34a-15: stobs ni bsam gtan gyi grogs su gyur pa yin no //
T05TD4016.3E:34a-16: ye shes ni shes rab kyi grogs su gyur pa yin te so so nas yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
T05TD4016.3E:34a-17: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams pha rol tu phyin pa snga ma gsum gyis yongs su bsdus pa'i sems can gang yin pa bsdu pa'i dngos por zin pa'i thabs la mkhas pas dge ba'i phyogs la 'jog par byed de zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni gnyis la go rims bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa bzhi po dag rnam par phye ste bshad pa ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:34a-18: 'di yang pha rol tu phyin pa bzhi rnam par phye ste bshad pa nyid kyis rnam pa bzhir dbye ste /
T05TD4016.3E:34a-19: 'di ni dang po thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa snga ma gsum gyi grogs su gyur par bstan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:34a-20: re re la yang rnam par bshad pa dang mjug bsdu ba bstan te /
T05TD4016.3E:34a-21: pha rol tu phyin pa phyi ma gsum la yang de bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:34b-0: 'di dang po thabs rnam pa gsum gyi @34b grogs su gyur pa nyid rnam par bshad pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:34b-1: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams pha rol tu phyin pa snga ma gsum gyis yongs su bsdus pa'i sems can gang yin pa de dag bsdu ba'i dngos po thabs la mkhas pas yongs su bzung nas dge ba'i phyogs la 'jog par byed do //
T05TD4016.3E:34b-2: bsdu ba'i dngos po de yang thabs rnam pa sna tshogs kyis spyir yongs su bzung ba la bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:34b-3: mtshams rnam par grol ba'i mdo dang /
T05TD4016.3E:34b-4: dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las kyang bsdu ba'i dngos po zhes 'byung gi bzhi zhes pa ni mi 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:34b-5: yang na bsdu ba'i dngos po zhes bya ba ni bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi yin pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:34b-6: bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ni pha rol tu phyin pa snga ma gsum gyis yongs su bsdus pa'i sems can gang yin pa bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis dge ba la 'jog par byed ces 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:34b-7: de'i phyir ngas thabs la mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni snga ma gsum po dag gi grogs su gyur pa yin par yongs su bstan to zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa mjug bsdu pa bstan te /
T05TD4016.3E:34b-9: gal te byang chub sems dpa' rnams mthong ba'i chos la nyon mongs pa mang ba'i phyir /
T05TD4016.3E:34b-10: rgyun mi 'chad par sgom mi nus pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:34b-11: lhag pa'i bsam pa'i stobs chung ba'i phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:34b-12: khams dang mos pa dman pa'i phyir sems nang du 'jog mi nus pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:34b-13: byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod thos pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:34b-15: legs par ma bsgoms pa'i phyir bsam gtan gyis 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab mngon par bsgrub par mi nus pas zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa smon lam la brtson 'grus kyi grogs su gyur pa ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:34b-19: 'di ni dang po rnam par bshad pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:34b-21: smon lam 'debs pa'i rgyu bstan pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:34b-22: smon lam brtson 'grus kyi grogs su 'gyur ba nyid du bstan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:34b-23: 'di ni dang po smon lam 'debs pa'i rgyu bstan pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:34b-24: mdo'i tshig 'di yang rkyen rnam pa gsum du dbye'o //
T05TD4016.3E:35a-0: dang po ni byang chub sems dpa' @35a * //
T05TD4016.3E:35a-1: rnams mthong ba'i chos la nyon mongs pa mang ba'i phyir /
T05TD4016.3E:35a-2: rgyun mi 'chad par dge ba'i phyogs kyi chos bsgom par mi nus te /
T05TD4016.3E:35a-3: dgongs pa zab mo rnam par 'grel ba'i mdo las ni lus kyi mngon sum du zhes 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:35a-5: lhag pa'i bsam pa'i stobs chung ba'i phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:35a-6: 'dod pa'i khams kyi rnam par g-yeng ba'i gnas skabs kyi mos pa yin pa'i phyir rkyen rnam pa 'di gnyis kyis sems kyi nang du ting nge 'dzin la 'jog par mi nus pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:35a-7: theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ni 'bras bu'i 'og mar skye ba smon pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:35a-8: sems dman pa rgyun du bsgom pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:35a-9: sems nang du 'jog par mi nus zhes 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:35a-10: gsum du ni theg pa chen po'i bstan pa nyan par mi nus pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:35a-11: bsam gtan la dmigs shing legs par bsgom par mi nus pa'i phyir bsam gtan gyi 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab mngon par bsgrub mi nus pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:35a-12: gong du bstan pa'i rkyen rnam pa gsum gyi phyir /
T05TD4016.3E:35a-13: smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bskyed pa yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
