T05TD4016.3E:35a-14: de bsod nams kyi tshogs cung zad yang dag par blangs te /
T05TD4016.3E:35a-15: phyi ma la nyon mongs pa yang zhing chung ba nyid du sems kyis yang dag par smon par byed pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa smon lam brtson 'grus kyi grogs su gyur pa ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:35a-17: smon lam 'debs pa yang dag par bstan pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:35a-18: smon lam brtson 'grus kyi grogs su gyur pa nyid du bstan pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:35a-19: 'di ni dang po smon lam 'debs pa yang dag par bstan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:35a-20: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' de sbyin pa la sogs pa'i bsod nams kyi tshogs cung zad yang dag par blangs nas 'di skad du smon lam 'debs te /
T05TD4016.3E:35a-21: bsod nams 'di'i mthus ma 'ongs pa na nyon mongs pa spangs shing chung ba nyid du gyur cig zer ba'o //
T05TD4016.3E:35a-22: theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tsha bsgyur ba las ni dge ba'i rtsa ba srab cing chung ba zhes 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:35a-23: de ni smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:35b-0: smon lam de nyid kyi phyir nyon mongs pa yang zhing srab @35b mor gyur nas brtson 'grus rtsom nus par 'gyur bas zhes bya bas ni gnyis pa smon lam brtson 'grus kyi grogs su gyur pa nyid du bstan pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:35b-1: mdo 'di nyid kyis brda phrad par zad do //
T05TD4016.3E:35b-2: de'i smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i grogs su gyur pa yin par yongs su bstan to zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa mjug bsdu ba yin par rig par bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:35b-3: gal te byang chub sems dpa' rnams skyes bu dam pa la yang dag par brten pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:35b-4: dam pa'i chos mnyan nas tshul bzhin yid la byed pas rgyu dang rkyen bya ba'i phyir lhag pa'i bsam pa stobs chung ba nyid bzlog nas lhag pa'i bsam pa khyad par can du gyur pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:35b-5: khams dang mos pa la gya nom pa yang thob par gyur pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni gsum pa stobs bsam gtan gyi grogs su gyur pa bstan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:35b-6: 'di yang rnam par bshad pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:35b-10: stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:35b-11: stobs bsam gtan gyi grogs su 'gyur ba nyid bstan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:35b-12: 'di ni dang po stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid bstan pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:35b-13: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams rgyu dang rkyen rnam pa gsum gyis lhag pa'i bsam pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:35b-14: mos pa khyad par du 'phags pa thob par 'gyur ba'o //
T05TD4016.3E:35b-15: de la rgyu dang rkyen rnam pa gsum ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:35b-16: yang dag pa'i chos mnyan pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:35b-17: tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o ;
T05TD4016.3E:35b-18: / rgyu dang rkyen rnam pa 'di gsum lhag pa'i bsam pa'i stobs chung ba las ldog nas lhag pa'i bsam pa khyad par can du gyur pa dang khams dang /
T05TD4016.3E:35b-19: mos pa gya nom pa yang thob par 'gyur bas chos gsum po 'di la stobs zhes bya ba'o //
T05TD4016.3E:35b-21: mos pa zhes bya ba la bye brag ci yod ce na /
T05TD4016.3E:35b-23: mtshams rnam par grol ba'i mdo las /
T05TD4016.3E:35b-24: stobs chung ba nyid ldog pa las ltos pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:35b-25: stobs thob pa las ltos pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:36a-0: khams khyad par 'phags pas nang du sems rtse gcig pa nyid ces gsungs pa dang sbyar na de la @36a * //
T05TD4016.3E:36a-1: stobs chung ba las ldog pa las ltos pa zhes bya ba ni khams dman pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:36a-2: mos pa zhan pa gang yin pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:36a-3: stobs thob pa la ltos pa zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'i khams kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa khyad par thob pa gang yin pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:36a-4: nang du sems rtse gcig pa nyid ces bya ba ni bsam gtan la bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:36a-5: dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las /
T05TD4016.3E:36a-6: sems chung ba de nyid ldog nas /
T05TD4016.3E:36a-9: chos kyi dbyings de la gnas pa zhes 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:36a-10: mdo 'di las lhag pa'i bsam pa stobs chung ba nyid ldog nas zhes gsungs pa ni dman pa'i bsam pa spangs nas khyad par du 'phags pa'i bsam pa thob par 'gyur ba'o //
T05TD4016.3E:36a-11: yang thob par 'gyur bzhes bya ba ni khams dman pa 'ba' zhig ma yin gyi khams gya nom pa yang thob par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T05TD4016.3E:36a-12: bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las /
T05TD4016.3E:36a-13: sems dman pa'i las spangs nas yul gyi gya nom pa las rgyal ba zhes 'byung ba ni lo ts'a ba dag gis nor ro //
T05TD4016.3E:36a-14: stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rjes la thob pa'i shes pa yin na /
T05TD4016.3E:36a-16: mos pa'i ngo bo nyid du bstan ce na /
T05TD4016.3E:36a-17: mdo dag las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes gsungs kyang /
T05TD4016.3E:36a-18: 'di ni grogs byed pa'i dbang du mdzad nas ngo bo nyid bstan pa yin pa'i phyir 'dun pa la sogs par bstan to //
T05TD4016.3E:36a-19: de ni stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:36a-20: stobs de nyid kyi phyir sems nang du 'jug nus pas zhes bya bas ni gnyis pa stobs bsam gtan gyi grogs su gyur pa nyid du bstan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:36a-21: 'di ltar gong du bstan pa lta bu'i phyir stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bshad de /
T05TD4016.3E:36a-22: stobs de nyid kyi phyir sems nang du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'jog nus par gyur pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:36b-0: de'i phyir ngas stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i grogs su gyur pa yin par yongs su bstan to zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa mjug bsdu ba ste mdo de nyid kyis brda @36b phrad par zad do //
T05TD4016.3E:36b-1: gal te byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod thos pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:36b-4: bsam gtan mngon par bsgrub nus pa gang yin pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni bzhi pa ye shes rang gi grogs byed pa nyid du bstan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:36b-5: 'di yang rnam par bshad pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:36b-7: rnam par bshad pa yang rnam pa gnyis te /
T05TD4016.3E:36b-8: ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid bstan pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:36b-9: ye shes shes rab kyi grogs su gyur pa nyid du bstan pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:36b-11: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod thos par nus pa ni thos pa'i shes rab bo //
T05TD4016.3E:36b-12: dmigs par nus pa ni bsam pa'i shes rab bo //
T05TD4016.3E:36b-13: legs par bsgoms pa ni bsgom pa'i shes rab ste /
T05TD4016.3E:36b-14: de dag gis bsam gtan mngon par bsgrub par nus par gyur pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:36b-15: yang na nang gi yid la byed pas bsam gtan bskyed pa bsam gtan gang yin pa de ni bsgom pa'i shes rab kyis bsdus pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:36b-16: rgya cher rnam par 'byed pa ni theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las bstan pa bzhin te /
T05TD4016.3E:36b-18: byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi tshig 'bru la dmigs pa las byung ba'i thos pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:36b-20: bsgoms pa las byung ba'i shes rab dang /
T05TD4016.3E:36b-21: pha rol po'i gnas lnga la dmigs pa'i shes pa de rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes kyi mdun rol na yod pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:36b-22: rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes kyi rjes la yod pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:36b-23: ye shes des ting nge 'dzin skyes pa'i phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:36b-24: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab rab tu 'dren par byed pa'i ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i grogs su gyur pa yin no zhes 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:36b-25: de ni ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:36b-26: ye shes de nyid kyi phyir 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab mngon par bsgrub par nus par 'gyur bas zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa ye shes shes rab kyi grogs yin par bstan pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:37a-0: @37a * // mdo nyid kyis brda phrad par zad do //
T05TD4016.3E:37a-1: de'i phyir ngas ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i grogs su gyur pa yin par yongs su bstan te zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa mjug bsdu ba ste /
T05TD4016.3E:37a-2: mdo nyid kyis brda phrad par zad do //
T05TD4016.3E:37a-3: mtshams rnam par grol ba'i mdo dang /
T05TD4016.3E:37a-4: dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las kyang phal cher mdo de nyid las gsungs pa dang mthun par bshad do //
T05TD4016.3E:37a-5: pha rol tu phyin pa bzhi rgya cher rnam par 'byed pa ni 'phags pa legs pa'i tshul khrims bstan pa'i mdo dang /
T05TD4016.3E:37a-6: bstan bcos sa yongs su 'dzin pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:37a-7: bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o /
T05TD4016.3E:37a-9: // / bam po lnga bcu dgu pa /
T05TD4016.3E:37a-10: byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
T05TD4016.3E:37a-11: bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gi go rims de ltar bstan par mdzad lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni drug pa pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi go rims bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:37a-12: 'di yang zhu ba gsol pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:37a-13: lan du gsungs pa bstan te /
T05TD4016.3E:37a-14: 'di ni dang po pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag gi ro rims kyi gtan tshigs zhus pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:37a-15: mdor bstan pa yin pas phyi ma bzhi'i go rims ni ma bstan to //
T05TD4016.3E:37a-16: yang na sngar gong du bstan pa nyid kyis don bstan zin pa'i phyir yang ma gsungs so //
T05TD4016.3E:37a-17: bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa /
T05TD4016.3E:37a-18: rigs kyi bu phyi ma phyi ma'i rab tu 'dren pa'i rten yin pa'i phyir te zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:37a-19: 'di yang rnam pa gsum du dbye ste /
T05TD4016.3E:37a-21: gzhung bzhin rgya cher rnam par bshad pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:37a-23: 'di ni dang po de bzhin gshegs pas lan mdor gsungs pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:37a-24: ngas rab tu 'dren par byed pa la dgongs pa'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag gi go rims de ltar bstan te /
T05TD4016.3E:37b-0: phyi ma phyi ma'i @37b don nyid du gyur pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T05TD4016.3E:37b-1: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams longs spyod la mi lta na tshul khrims yang dag par len par byed do //
T05TD4016.3E:37b-2: tshul khrims yang dag par bsrungs na bzod pa sgom par byed do //
T05TD4016.3E:37b-3: bzod pa bsgoms nas brtson 'grus rtsom par 'gyur ro //
T05TD4016.3E:37b-4: brtson 'grus brtsams nas bsam gtan sgrub par 'gyur ro //
T05TD4016.3E:37b-5: bsam gtan dang ldan na 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa gzhung bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi snga phyir go rims rgya cher bshad pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:37b-6: 'di ni bstan bcos mdo sde'i rgyan las rab tu 'dren pa'i go rims zhes bstan pa nyid de /
T05TD4016.3E:37b-7: de'i phyir bstan bcos de la snga ma la phyi ma zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:37b-8: snga ma la brten nas phyi ma 'byung ba'o //
T05TD4016.3E:37b-10: longs spyod la mi lta na tshul khrims yang dag par len to //
T05TD4016.3E:37b-11: tshul khrims dang ldan pas bzod pa skyed do //
T05TD4016.3E:37b-12: bzod pa bskyed nas brtson 'grus brtsams pas ting nge 'dzin skyed par byed do //
T05TD4016.3E:37b-13: ting nge 'dzin bskyed nas de kho na nyid kyi chos rab tu shes par 'gyur ro zhes bshad do //
T05TD4016.3E:37b-14: gzhan yang bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa las /
T05TD4016.3E:37b-15: ci'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag gi go rims bstan ce na 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa snga ma rnams pha rol tu phyin pa phyi ma 'byung ba dang rjes su mthun pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:37b-16: slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis 'grel pa las pha rol tu phyin pa phyi ma 'byung ba dang rjes su mthun pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni longs spyod la ma chags na tshul khrims bsrung nus so //
T05TD4016.3E:37b-17: tshul khrims dang ldan na bzod do //
T05TD4016.3E:37b-18: bzod na gnyen po la mi brjed do //
T05TD4016.3E:37b-19: gnyen po la mi brjed pas brtson 'grus rtsom mo //
T05TD4016.3E:37b-20: brtson 'grus brtsams nas sems mnyam par 'jog go //
T05TD4016.3E:37b-21: sems mnyam par gzhag na yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes pa'i phyir /
T05TD4016.3E:37b-22: rnam pa drug po dag go rims de ltar bstan to zhes 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:37b-23: slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las /
T05TD4016.3E:38a-0: pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag ni snga ma la brten nas phyi ma 'byung ba la dgongs nas go rims de ltar bstan pa yin no @38a * //
T05TD4016.3E:38a-2: de'i phyir ngas go rims de ltar bstan to zhes bya ba gsum pa mjug bsdu ba yin par rig par bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:38a-3: pha rol tu phyin pa de dag gi go rims kyang bstan pa rnams las so so nas bshad pa mi mthun pas kha cig nas ni don rnam pa gcig gis go rims bstan pa yod de mdo de nyid dang /
T05TD4016.3E:38a-4: mtshams rnam par grol ba'i mdo dang /
T05TD4016.3E:38a-5: dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang /
T05TD4016.3E:38a-6: bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:38a-7: theg pa chen po bsdu ba'i 'grel pa rnam pa gnyis las rab tu 'dren pa las snga phyir /
T05TD4016.3E:38a-9: kha cig las ni don rnam pa gnyis kyis ston pa yang yod de /
T05TD4016.3E:38a-10: bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel ba lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ji skad du /
T05TD4016.3E:38a-11: dang po ni rab tu 'dren pa'i go rims so zhes 'byung ste /
T05TD4016.3E:38a-12: mdo 'di nyid las gsungs pa dang mthun no //
T05TD4016.3E:38a-14: / gnyis pa ni rnam par dag pa yongs su 'dzin pa'i phyir go rims te /
T05TD4016.3E:38a-15: pha rol tu phyin pa snga ma snga ma rnams pha rol tu phyin pa phyi mas rnam par dag par byed pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa lta bu'o //
T05TD4016.3E:38a-16: kha cig las ni don rnam pa gsum gyis ston pa yang yod de /
T05TD4016.3E:38a-17: 'phags pa legs pa'i tshul khrims bstan pa'i mdo dang /
T05TD4016.3E:38a-18: bstan bcos yongs su 'dzin pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:38a-19: rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las ji skad du gnyen po'i phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:38a-21: 'bras bu thob pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa lta bu ste /
T05TD4016.3E:38a-22: zhib tu de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no //
T05TD4016.3E:38a-23: gzhan yang don rnam pa gsum gyis bstan pa yang yod de /
T05TD4016.3E:38a-24: chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las ji skad du /
T05TD4016.3E:38a-25: rab tu 'dren pa dang rnam par dag pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:38a-27: phra ba zhes bstan pa lta bu ste /
T05TD4016.3E:38a-28: rab tu 'dren pa dang rnam par dag pa ni snga ma bzhin no //
T05TD4016.3E:38a-29: de la rags pa dang phra ba zhes bya ba'i spyod pa rnams kyi nang na sbyin pa ni mchog tu rags pa'i phyir thog mar rnam par gzhag go //
T05TD4016.3E:38a-30: bzod pa la sogs pa'i spyod pas tshul khrims rags pa'i phyir de'i 'og tu rnam par gzhag go //
T05TD4016.3E:38a-31: de bzhin du shes rab las bsam gtan rags pa'i bar du ste /
T05TD4016.3E:38b-0: shes @38b rab ni thams cad pas phra ba'i phyir tha mar rnam par gzhag go zhes 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:38b-1: bstan bcos mdo sde'i rgyan las kyang don rnam pa gsum gyis ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:38b-2: dang po snga mas phyi ma 'dren par byed pa ni sngar bshad pa dang 'dra'o //
T05TD4016.3E:38b-3: gnyis pa ni rab dang 'bring dang tha ma ste /
T05TD4016.3E:38b-4: snga ma ni tha ma yin la /
T05TD4016.3E:38b-5: phyi ma ni rab yin no //
T05TD4016.3E:38b-6: gsum pa ni rags pa dang phra ba ste /
T05TD4016.3E:38b-7: chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las ba tus pa las bstan pa dang mthun te /
T05TD4016.3E:38b-8: de'i phyir de de nyid kyi tshig le'ur byas pa las /
T05TD4016.3E:38b-9: snga ma la brten phyi ma skye //
T05TD4016.3E:38b-10: tha ma la ni rab kyi gnas //
T05TD4016.3E:38b-11: rags pa dang ni phra ba'i phyir /
T05TD4016.3E:38b-12: pha rol phyin drug go rims bstan //
T05TD4016.3E:38b-13: mi 'khrugs pa la rgyu gsum yod //
T05TD4016.3E:38b-15: kha cig las ni don rnam pa bzhis bstan pa yod de /
T05TD4016.3E:38b-16: bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pas ji skad du rab tu 'dren pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:38b-17: rnam par dag pa yongs su 'dzin pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:38b-22: dka' bas gong ma'i rags pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:38b-23: phra ba bstan pa yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:38b-24: de'i phyir bstan bcos de nyid las go rims ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:38b-25: snga ma snga mas phyi ma phyi ma rab tu 'dren pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:38b-26: phyi ma phyi mas snga ma snga ma rnam par dag par byed pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:38b-27: snga ma snga ma ni rags pa yin la /
T05TD4016.3E:38b-28: phyi ma phyi ma ni phra ba yin pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:38b-30: dka' bas go rims de ltar bstan to zhes 'byung ba lta bu'o //
T05TD4016.3E:38b-31: byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
T05TD4016.3E:38b-32: bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag re re la yang rnam pa rab tu dbye ba du mchis lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi rnam pa rab tu dbye ba'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:38b-33: 'di yang zhu ba gsol pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:38b-35: 'di ni dang po pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi rnam pa rab tu dbye ba zhus pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:38b-36: bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa /
T05TD4016.3E:39a-0: rigs kyi bu re re la yang rnam pa gsum gsum yod de zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs @39a * //
T05TD4016.3E:39a-1: pas yang dag par lan gsungs pa ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:39a-3: rnam pa drug bco brgyad du gyur par mdor bstan pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:39a-4: go rims bzhin du rnam pa drug po re re la yang rnam pa gsum gsum yod par ston te /
T05TD4016.3E:39a-5: 'di ni dang po 'di dag gi rab tu rnam par dbye ba'i yang bstan pa rnams las so so nas bshad pa mi mthun pas mdo 'di nyid dang /
T05TD4016.3E:39a-6: mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang /
T05TD4016.3E:39a-7: dgongs ba zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang /
T05TD4016.3E:39a-8: bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:39a-9: rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug po snga ma las brtsams nas /
T05TD4016.3E:39a-10: re re la yang rnam pa gsum gsum du zad kyi /
T05TD4016.3E:39a-11: rnam par bshad pa ni med do //
T05TD4016.3E:39a-13: byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:39a-15: ngo bo nyid med kyis mdzad pa'i theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:39a-16: theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba dang chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las ni rnam pa drug po dag la re re yang rnam pa gsum du yang dbye la /
T05TD4016.3E:39a-17: rnam par bshad pa yang mdzad do //
T05TD4016.3E:39a-18: bstan bcos rnam par rig ba tsam du grub pa las ni pha rol tu phyin pa bcu las brtsams nas pha rol tu phyin pa snga ma drug la ni re re la yang rnam pa gsum du dbye'o //
T05TD4016.3E:39a-19: pha rol tu phyin pa phyi ma bzhi la ni re re la yang rnam pa gnyis su 'byed kyi /
T05TD4016.3E:39a-20: rnam par bshad pa ni med do //
T05TD4016.3E:39a-21: bzhi po dag la gnyis gnyis su 'byed pa yang thabs rnam pa gnyis ni yongs su bsngo pa la mkhas pa'i thabs dang /
T05TD4016.3E:39a-22: yongs su bskya ba ba la mkhas pa'i thabs so //
T05TD4016.3E:39a-23: smon lam yang rnam pa gnyis te /
T05TD4016.3E:39a-24: byang chub yongs su tshol ba'i smon lam dang /
T05TD4016.3E:39a-25: gzhan la phan 'dogs pa'i smon lam mo //
T05TD4016.3E:39a-26: stobs kyang rnam pa gnyis te /
T05TD4016.3E:39a-29: ye shes kyang rnam pa gnyis te /
T05TD4016.3E:39a-30: chos kyi bden pa la longs spyod pa'i ye shes dang /
T05TD4016.3E:39a-31: sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i ye shes so zhes bshad de /
T05TD4016.3E:39b-0: 'di ni mdo las gsungs pa bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa snga ma drug bstan @39b te ;
T05TD4016.3E:39b-1: de la bye brag ci yod pa ni mdo'i thad kar bab pa na bshad par bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:39b-2: spyin pa rnam pa gsum ni /
T05TD4016.3E:39b-5: mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'o zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa go rims bzhin du rnam pa drug po dag re re la yang rnam pa gsum gsum yod par ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:39b-6: 'di yang rnam pa drug bstan pa nyid kyis rnam pa drug tu dbye ste /
T05TD4016.3E:39b-7: 'di ni dang po sbyin ba rnam pa gsum bstan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:39b-8: bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las ni /
T05TD4016.3E:39b-9: mtshan nyid rnam pa dgus sbyin pa rnam pa gsum ston te /
T05TD4016.3E:39b-11: zang zing sbyin pa ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:39b-13: sog 'jog gi dri ma bsal nas bzang po dang /
T05TD4016.3E:39b-15: rung ba sbyin par byed pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:39b-16: rgya cher de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no //
T05TD4016.3E:39b-17: mi 'jigs pa'i sbyin pa ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:39b-23: chu la sogs pa'i 'jigs pa las yongs su skyob pa yin par rig par bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:39b-24: chos kyi sbyin pa ni phyin ci ma log par chos ston pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:39b-26: bslab pa'i gzhi yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:39b-27: byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa rnam pa dgu po de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus pa ni zang zing dang /
T05TD4016.3E:39b-29: mi 'jigs pa'i sbyin pa zhes bya'o zhes bshad do //
T05TD4016.3E:39b-30: slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las ni chos dang /
T05TD4016.3E:39b-32: mi 'jigs pa gsum ni go rims bzhin du gzhan gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:39b-34: sems la phan 'dogs pas rgyu dang rkyen de'i phyir rnam pa gsum du bstan to zhes 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:39b-35: slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis 'grel pa las ni rnam grangs gnyis kyis ston te /
T05TD4016.3E:39b-36: dang po ni rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las bstan pa dang rjes su mthun no //
T05TD4016.3E:39b-37: gnyis pa ni slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis bstan pa dang mthun pas de'i phyir 'dir ma brjod do //
T05TD4016.3E:39b-38: bstan bcos chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las ni ston pa rnam pa bco brgyad kyis drug po dag gis rnam pa gsum ston te /
T05TD4016.3E:40a-3: dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su rtogs par bya'o zhes slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis lus dang /
T05TD4016.3E:40a-4: sems la sogs pa la phan 'dogs pa zhes bstan pa dang mthun par bshad do //
T05TD4016.3E:40a-5: theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel ba lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las /
T05TD4016.3E:40a-6: rnam grangs gnyis kyis bstan te /
T05TD4016.3E:40a-7: chos kyi sbyin pa ni gzhan gyi sems la phan 'dogs so //
T05TD4016.3E:40a-8: zang zing gi sbyin pa ni gzhan gyi lus la phan 'dogs so //
T05TD4016.3E:40a-9: mi 'jigs pa'i sbyin pa ni lus dang sems la phan 'dogs so //
T05TD4016.3E:40a-11: / gzhan la phan 'dogs pa'i sbyin pas ni nyes par spyod pa dge ba la phyogs par byed do //
T05TD4016.3E:40a-12: mi 'jigs pa'i sbyin pas ni de dag 'khor sdud par byed do //
T05TD4016.3E:40a-13: chos kyi sbyin pas ni dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:40a-14: rnam par grol ba de dag yongs su smin par byed do //
T05TD4016.3E:40a-15: don de dag dang ldan pa'i phyir sbyin pa la rnam pa gsum bshad do zhes 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:40a-16: tshul khrims rnam pa gsum ni /
T05TD4016.3E:40a-17: mi dge ba las ldog pa'i tshul khrims dang /
T05TD4016.3E:40a-18: dge ba la 'jug pa'i tshul khrims dang /
T05TD4016.3E:40a-19: sems can gyi don la 'jug pa'i tshul khrims so zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa tshul khrims rnam pa gsum bstan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:40a-20: ming cung zad mi mthun pa yang don ni bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa las bstan pa dang mthun no //
T05TD4016.3E:40a-21: bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa la sogs pa las ni tshul khrims rnam pa gsum ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:40a-23: dge ba'i chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims dang /
T05TD4016.3E:40a-24: sems can la phan 'dogs pa'i tshul khrims so zhes 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:40a-25: bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las ni khyim pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:40a-26: rab tu byung ba'i phyogs la brten pa'i tshul khrims rnam par gzhag pa ni /
T05TD4016.3E:40a-27: mdor bsdu na rnam pa gsum ste /
T05TD4016.3E:40a-28: sdom pa'i tshul khrims ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:40a-29: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ris bdun po dag gi so sor thar ba'i sdom pa yang dag par blangs pa gang yin pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:40a-30: dge ba'i chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:40b-0: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi so so thar pa'i sdom pa yang @40b dag par blangs pa'i 'og tu byang chub chen po'i phyir /
T05TD4016.3E:40b-1: lus dang ngag gis dge ba bsags pa gang ci yang rung ba de dag thams cad ni mdor bsdu na dge ba'i chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims su shes par bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:40b-2: sems can la phan 'dogs pa'i tshul khrims ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:40b-3: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis sems can la phan 'dogs pa gang yin pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:40b-4: zhib tu de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no //
T05TD4016.3E:40b-5: slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa las /
T05TD4016.3E:40b-6: dang po ni rten du gyur pa yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:40b-7: tshul khrims gzhan rnam pa gnyis rnam par gzhag pa'i phyir /
T05TD4016.3E:40b-8: de'i dbang gis sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad bsgrubs nas byang chub la 'jug pa thob par byed pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:40b-9: gzhan yang sems can la phan 'dogs pa'i tshul khrims rnam par 'jog par byed pas so zhes bshad do //
T05TD4016.3E:40b-10: slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis 'grel pa las /
T05TD4016.3E:40b-11: sdom pa'i tshul khrims ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:40b-12: mi dge ba las sdom pa yang dag par blangs shing 'dis lus dang ngag la sogs pa'i las rnams bsgom pa'i phyir sdom ba zhes bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:40b-13: de nyid tshul khrims yin pas gnyis kyi rten to zhes 'byung ste /
T05TD4016.3E:40b-14: 'grel pa de la sogs pa zhes smos pas ni yid kyis bsams pa'i tshul khrims bzung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:40b-15: tshul khrims phyi ma gnyis kyi bshad pa ni /
T05TD4016.3E:40b-16: slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las bstan pa dang mthun no //
T05TD4016.3E:40b-17: gzhan yang 'grel pa de nyid las /
T05TD4016.3E:40b-18: tshul khrims rnam pa gsum po 'di dag ni mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i rgyu'o //
T05TD4016.3E:40b-20: tshul khrims dang po de ni spangs pa'i yon tan no //
T05TD4016.3E:40b-21: tshul khrims gnyis pa ni shes rab kyi yon tan no //
T05TD4016.3E:40b-22: tshul khrims gsum pa ni drin gyi yon tan no //
T05TD4016.3E:40b-23: mi 'jigs pa bzhi ni yon tan 'di gsum las gud na med pa'i phyir /
T05TD4016.3E:40b-24: mi 'jigs pa bzhi'i rgyu bstan zhes 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:40b-25: chos mngon pa kun las btus pa'i 'grel ba las sdom pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:40b-27: sems can la phan 'dogs pa'i tshul khrims ni go rims bzhin du dge ba byang chub dang /
T05TD4016.3E:41a-1: gyis yongs su bzung ba yin no zhes bshad do //
T05TD4016.3E:41a-2: bzod pa rnam pa gsum ni /
T05TD4016.3E:41a-3: gnod pa la mi mjed pa'i bzod pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:41a-4: sdug bsngal la ji mi snyam pa'i bzod pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:41a-5: chos la nges par rtog pa'i bzod pa'o zhes bya bas ni gsum pa bzod pa rnam pa gsum bstan to //
T05TD4016.3E:41a-6: bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las bzod pa'i le'u las bzod pa ni rnam pa gsum yod de /
T05TD4016.3E:41a-7: gnod pa byed pa la ji mi snyam pa'i bzod pa ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:41a-8: byang chub sems dpa' ni gzhan la gnod pa byed pa las byung ba'i sdug bsngal mi bzad pa rgyun mi 'chad pa sna tshogs yun ring ba mngon du 'byung ba na 'di ltar yang dag par slob par byed de /
T05TD4016.3E:41a-9: 'di ni rang gi las kyi le lan yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:41a-10: des na bdag rang gis byas pa'i mi dge ba'i las kyi sdug bsngal gyi 'bras bu 'di 'dra ba nyams su myong ngo zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgya cher de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no //
T05TD4016.3E:41a-11: gzhan yang de nyid las de la byang chub sems dpa' sdug bsngal dang du len pa'i bzod pa ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:41a-12: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste /
T05TD4016.3E:41a-13: bdag sngon 'dod pa spyod pa dag la gnas shing 'dod pa rnams yongs su tshol ba na /
T05TD4016.3E:41a-14: sdug bsngal gyi rgyu yin par tshor bzhin du 'dod pa sdug bsngal gyi rang bzhin can rnams kyi phyir zhing las dang /
T05TD4016.3E:41a-16: rgyal po la zho shas 'tsho ba la zhugs nas sdug bsngal mang po mi bzod pa dag nyams su blangs shing /
T05TD4016.3E:41a-17: dang du blangs pa la nyams su myong ba de de ltar don med de /
T05TD4016.3E:41a-18: sdug bsngal kho na'i phyir tshor bzhin du mi shes pa'i nyes pas bdag gis sdug bsngal chen po nyams su blangs na /
T05TD4016.3E:41a-19: da ni bdag bde ba bsgrub pa'i dge ba la zhugs par tshor bzhin du /
T05TD4016.3E:41a-20: de las bye brag 'bum 'gyur sdug bsngal dang du blang zhing nyams su blang ba ni cha yin na /
T05TD4016.3E:41a-21: de bas chung du lta ci smos snyam ste /
T05TD4016.3E:41a-22: byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub la zhugs pa de ltar tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing /
T05TD4016.3E:41a-23: gzhi thams cad byung ba'i sdug bsngal dang du len par byed do //
T05TD4016.3E:41a-24: de la byang chub sems dpa'i chos nges par sems pa la mos pa'i bzod pa ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:41b-0: 'di la byang chub sems @41b dpa' ni /
T05TD4016.3E:41b-1: yang dag par chos thams cad rab tu rnam par 'byed pa shin tu brtan pa'i blos mos pa'i zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgya cher de nyid las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:41b-2: slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa las /
T05TD4016.3E:41b-3: gnod pa byed pa la ji mi snyam pa'i bzod pa ni /
T05TD4016.3E:41b-4: gzhan gyis gnod pa byas pa las bzod pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:41b-5: sdug bsngal la ji mi snyam pa'i bzod pa ni sdug bsngal mang po nyams su myong ba yang dag par bzod pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:41b-6: chos la nges par rtog pa'i bzod pa ni chos rnams la nges par so sor rtog par nus pa'o zhes bshad de /
T05TD4016.3E:41b-7: zhib tu de nyid las bshad pa bzhin no //
T05TD4016.3E:41b-8: slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis 'grel pa las /
T05TD4016.3E:41b-9: de la gnod pa byed pa la ji mi snyam pa'i bzod pa ni sems can yongs su smin par bya ba las mi ldog pa'i rgyu'o //
T05TD4016.3E:41b-10: gnyis pa ni sangs rgyas nyid las mi ldog pa'i rgyu ste /
T05TD4016.3E:41b-14: skom pa la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal rnams kyis mi ldog pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:41b-15: chos la nges par rtog pa'i bzod pa ni /
T05TD4016.3E:41b-16: bzod pa snga ma gnyis kyi rten te /
T05TD4016.3E:41b-18: rgya che ba'i chos la bzod pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ste /
T05TD4016.3E:41b-19: theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las kyang /
T05TD4016.3E:41b-20: phal cher de dang mthun par ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:41b-21: slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:41b-22: chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las kyang /
T05TD4016.3E:41b-23: bzod pa gsum gyi ming ni mdo 'di las gsungs pa dang mthun par 'byung ste /
T05TD4016.3E:41b-24: go rims bzhin du sems can mi spong ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:41b-25: dman pa'i sems spangs pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:41b-26: mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:41b-27: gsum gyis yongs su bzung ba yin par rab tu ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:41b-28: brtson 'grus rnam pa gsum ni go cha'i brtson 'grus dang /
T05TD4016.3E:41b-29: dge ba'i chos sdud pa'i sbyor ba'i brtson 'grus dang /
T05TD4016.3E:41b-30: sems can gyi don la sbyor ba'i brtson 'grus so zhes bya ba ni bzhi pa brtson 'grus rnam pa gsum bstan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:41b-31: mtshams rnam par grol ba'i mdo las ni yi dam rgya che ba'i brtson 'grus dang /
T05TD4016.3E:42a-2: sems can la phan 'dogs pa'i brtson 'grus zhes 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:42a-3: dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni sems bskyed pa'i brtson 'grus dang /
T05TD4016.3E:42a-4: dge ba'i chos bsgom pa'i brtson 'grus dang /
T05TD4016.3E:42a-5: sems can la phan 'dogs pa'i brtson 'grus so zhes 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:42a-6: bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa'i nang nas /
T05TD4016.3E:42a-7: brtson 'grus kyi le'u las brtson 'grus ni rnam pa gsum yod de /
T05TD4016.3E:42a-8: go cha'i brtson 'grus ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:42a-9: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni brtson 'grus rtsom pa la sbyor ba'i dngos po la gnas nas sems mngon par spro ba'i sngon du 'gro ba'i go cha 'di ltar gyon par byed de /
T05TD4016.3E:42a-10: bdag ni gal te sems can gcig sdug bsngal las thar bar bya ba'i phyir yang nyin mtshan bskal pa chen po dang mnyam pa dag gi 'gro ba gzhan du mi gnas pas sems can dmyal ba kho nar gnas pas dus ji srid cig gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i dus de nyid bye brag 'bum 'gyur gyis srid kyis /
T05TD4016.3E:42a-11: bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur ba lta na yang bdag spro bar byed de /
T05TD4016.3E:42a-12: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi phyir mi brtson par yang mi byed la /
T05TD4016.3E:42a-13: brtson 'grus la zhugs pa yang dor bar mi byed na /
T05TD4016.3E:42a-14: dus kyi yun ches thung ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:42a-15: sdug bsngal ches chung bas lta ci smos snyam ba de lta bu ni byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'i brtson 'grus zhes bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgya cher de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no //
T05TD4016.3E:42a-17: de la dge ba'i chos sdud pa'i tshul khrims ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:42a-18: byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims gang pha rol tu phyin pa drug la sbyor bar byed cing ;
T05TD4016.3E:42a-19: yang dag par grub par byed pa'o zhes bshad de /
T05TD4016.3E:42a-20: zhib tu de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no //
T05TD4016.3E:42a-21: gzhan yang de nyid las sems can gyi don bya ba'i brtson 'grus ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:42a-22: tshul khrims kyi le'u las 'byung ba bzhin du rnam pa bcu gcig tu rig par bya'o zhes 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:42b-0: bstan @42b bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa las mdo las gsungs pa'i tshig lnga po dag mdor bsdu na rnam pa gsum du bstan te /
T05TD4016.3E:42b-4: mi zhum zhing mi 'khrugs la chog par mi 'dzin pa'i brtson 'grus so zhes 'chad do //
T05TD4016.3E:42b-5: slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las ni brtson 'grus gsum po dag gi ngo bo tha dad pas mdo las mthu dang ldan pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:42b-7: spro ba dang ldan pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:42b-8: brtul ba dang ldan pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:42b-9: brtson pa mi gtong ba zhes gsungs te /
T05TD4016.3E:42b-10: mdo 'di nyid las tshig lnga gsungs pa gang yin pa de ni 'dir brtson 'grus gsum po dag gi ngo bo nyid du bsdu'o zhes bshad de /
T05TD4016.3E:42b-11: 'di nyid kyi 'grel ba las cho ga dgos pa'i phyir thog ma kho nar mthu dang ldan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:42b-12: ji lta ba bzhin du spyod pa'i phyir brtson 'grus dang ldan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:42b-13: zhum pa med pa pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:42b-15: chog pa med pa'i phyir go rims bzhin du spro ba dang ldan pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:42b-17: brtson pa mi gtong ba zhes bya ba nas /
T05TD4016.3E:42b-18: rgya cher bshad pa'i bar du bstan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:42b-19: theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis byas pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:42b-20: lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las kyang /
T05TD4016.3E:42b-21: slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las bstan pa dang mthun par bshad de mangs kyis dogs nas 'dir ma brjod do //
T05TD4016.3E:42b-22: chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las ni go cha dang /
T05TD4016.3E:42b-24: phan 'dogs pa ni go rims bzhin du gzhan dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:42b-25: sbyor ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:42b-26: yongs su rdzogs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam pa gsum yongs su 'dzin pa'o zhes bshad do //
T05TD4016.3E:42b-27: bsam gtan rnam pa gsum ni rnam par mi rtog cing zhi la rab tu zhi bas kha na ma tho ba med pa'i phyir nyon mongs pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:42b-28: sdug bsngal gyi gnyen por gyur pa bde bar gnas pa'i bsam gtan dang /
T05TD4016.3E:42b-29: yon tan mngon par grub pa'i bsam gtan dang /
T05TD4016.3E:42b-30: sems can gyi don mngon par grub pa'i bsam gtan no zhes bya ba ni snga ma bsam gtan rnam pa gsum bstan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:43a-1: dang po las tshig bzhi yod kyang de dag gi mtshan nyid khong du chud par dka' bas de'i phyir 'dir mdo sde dang bstan bcos rnams la brten nas tshig bzhi po de dag bshad par bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:43a-2: de la dang po rnam par mi rtog cing zhi la zhes bya ba ni yang dag pa ma yin pa kun tu rtog pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:43a-3: gnas ngan len thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir rnam par mi rtog cing zhi ba zhes bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:43a-4: de'i phyir mtshams rnam par grol ba'i mdo las kyang yang dag pa ma yin pa dang bral ba'i zhi ba zhes gsungs pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:43a-5: gzhan yang bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las /
T05TD4016.3E:43a-6: rnam par rtog pa thams cad spangs pa'i phyir /
T05TD4016.3E:43a-7: lus dang sems shin tu sbyangs pa skyed par byed do zhes bstan pa yin no //
T05TD4016.3E:43a-8: gnyis pa rab tu zhi ba zhes bya ba ni bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las srid pa'i ro myong ba rnams yongs su spangs pas mtshan ma thams cad nye bar zhi ba zhes bshad do ;
T05TD4016.3E:43a-9: / gsum pa kha na ma tho ba med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis byas pa'i 'grel pa las /
T05TD4016.3E:43a-12: sred pa dang bral nas rnam par dag pa thob pa'i phyir ro zhes bshad do //
T05TD4016.3E:43a-13: bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las /
T05TD4016.3E:43a-14: kha na ma tho ba med pa'i yul drug dang /
T05TD4016.3E:43a-15: nye ba'i nyon mongs pa yongs su spangs pa'o zhes bshad do //
T05TD4016.3E:43a-16: bzhi pa nyon mongs pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:43a-17: sdug bsngal gyi gnyen por gyur pa bde bar gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin nyon mongs pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:43a-18: sdug bsngal gyi gnyen por gyur cing mngon par shes pa la dbang thob pas /
T05TD4016.3E:43a-19: mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas so //
T05TD4016.3E:43a-20: theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel ba lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ni ting nge 'dzin 'dis kun nas nyon mongs pa rnam par spangs pa'i phyir /
T05TD4016.3E:43a-21: tshe 'di la bde bar gnas pa thob ces bshad do //
T05TD4016.3E:43a-22: slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel ba las /
T05TD4016.3E:43a-23: 'di'i dbang gis mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas pa'o zhes bshad de /
T05TD4016.3E:43a-24: gzhan rnam pa gnyis ni mdo nyid kyis brda phrad par zad do //
T05TD4016.3E:43a-25: bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa'i nang nas bsam gtan gyi le'u las /
T05TD4016.3E:43b-0: bsam gtan ni rnam pa gsum @43b yod de /
T05TD4016.3E:43b-1: tshe 'di la bde bar gnas pa'i bsam gtan ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:43b-2: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba /
T05TD4016.3E:43b-3: lus dang sems shin tu sbyangs pa bskyed pa dang mchog tu rab tu zhi ba /
T05TD4016.3E:43b-6: mtshan ma thams cad dang bral ba gang yin pa de ni /
T05TD4016.3E:43b-7: de dag gi tshe 'di la bde bar gnas pa'i bsam gtan yin par rig par bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:43b-8: de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi yon tan mngon par bsgrubs pa'i bsam gtan ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:43b-9: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan stobs bcu'i rigs kyis bsdus pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnam pa sna tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab cing tshad med par sgrub par byed pa gang yin pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:43b-10: ting nge 'dzin gang dag nyan thos dang /
T05TD4016.3E:43b-11: rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang ming yang mi shes na snyoms par 'jug par lta ga la 'gyur zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgya cher bshad pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:43b-12: sems can gyi don bya ba'i bsam gtan ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:43b-13: byang chub sems dpa' rnams bsam gtan la brten nas sems can gyi bya ba dang ldan pa dag la grogs su 'gro ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:43b-14: sems can sdug bsngal ba rnams kyi sdug bsngal sel ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:43b-16: byas pa gzo zhing byas pa tshor te phan 'dogs pa rnams la lan du phan 'dogs pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:43b-17: 'jigs pa rnams las byung ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:43b-18: yo byad med pa rnams la yo byad stobs pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:43b-19: yang dag pa'i 'khor legs par sdud pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:43b-20: sems dang mthun par 'jug pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:43b-21: yang dag pa'i yon tan rnams kyis dga' bar byed pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:43b-22: legs par tshar gcod pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:43b-23: rdzu 'phrul gyis skrag par byed pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:43b-25: zhib tu de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no //
T05TD4016.3E:43b-26: slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzod pa'i 'grel pa las /
T05TD4016.3E:43b-27: bde bar gnas pa'i bsam gtan zhes bya ba 'di ni mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas par byed do //
T05TD4016.3E:43b-28: mngon par sgrub pa'i bsam gtan zhes bya ba 'di ni mngon par shes pa drug mngon par sgrub par byed do //
T05TD4016.3E:44a-0: bya ba sgrub pa'i bsam gtan zhes bya ba 'di ni sems can la phan @44a * //
T05TD4016.3E:44a-1: 'dogs pa'i bya ba dag mngon par sgrub par byed do zhes bshad do //
T05TD4016.3E:44a-2: slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis 'grel pa las /
T05TD4016.3E:44a-3: gnas pa'i bsam gtan ni mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas pa'i phyir te /
T05TD4016.3E:44a-6: sred pa la sogs pa spangs nas rnam par dag pa thob pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:44a-7: mngon par sgrub pa'i bsam gtan ni mngon par shes pa drug la sogs pa yon tan khyad par du 'phags pa mngon par sgrub pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:44a-8: bya ba sgrub pa'i bsam gtan ni sems can rnams la phan 'dogs pa'i phyir mu ge dang nad kyi 'jigs pa la sogs pa zhi bar byed pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:44a-9: bstan bcos chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las /
T05TD4016.3E:44a-10: mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:44a-11: mngon par shes pa mngon par sgrub pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:44a-12: sems can la phan 'dogs pa ni go rims bzhin du yongs su 'dzin pa gsum po yongs su ngal ba med pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:44a-13: bsam pa rnams yongs su rdzogs pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:44a-14: 'khor 'dul ba'i las dang sbyar ro zhes bshad do //
T05TD4016.3E:44a-15: theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las kyang /
T05TD4016.3E:44a-16: phal cher slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las bstan pa dang mthun par bshad do //
T05TD4016.3E:44a-17: mangs kyis dogs nas 'dir ma brjod do //
T05TD4016.3E:44a-18: bstan bcos mdo sde'i rgyan las ni rnam par rtog pa dang bcas pa la sogs pa rnam pa gsum du bstan to //
T05TD4016.3E:44a-19: shes rab rnam pa gsum ni kun rdzob kyi bden pa la dmigs pa'i shes rab dang ;
T05TD4016.3E:44a-20: don dam pa'i bden pa la dmigs pa'i shes rab dang /
T05TD4016.3E:44a-21: sems can gyi don la dmigs pa'i shes rab po zhes bya ba ni drug pa shes rab rnam pa gsum bstan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:44a-22: bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las /
T05TD4016.3E:44a-23: shes rab rnam pa gnyis so zhes bshad do //
T05TD4016.3E:44a-24: dang po shes rab gsum ni shes bya la de kho na nyid du khong du chud cing rtogs par bya ba'i shes rab rig pa'i gnas lnga po rnams dang /
T05TD4016.3E:44a-25: tshogs gsum la mkhas pa'i shes rab dang /
T05TD4016.3E:44a-26: sems can thams cad la phan 'dogs pa'i shes rab po zhes 'byung ste /
T05TD4016.3E:44b-0: dang po ni de kho na nyid la @44b dmigs pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:44b-1: bar ma ni rang gi don la dmigs pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:44b-2: tha ma ni kun rdzob la dmigs shing gzhan la phan 'dogs pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:44b-3: de la rig pa'i gnas lnga ni nang gi rig pa la sogs te lnga po dag go //
T05TD4016.3E:44b-4: tshogs gsum ni don dang ldan pa'i chos rnams kyi tshogs dang /
T05TD4016.3E:44b-5: don dang mi ldan pa'i chos rnams kyi tshogs dang /
T05TD4016.3E:44b-6: don dang ldan pa yang ma yin /
T05TD4016.3E:44b-7: don dang mi ldan pa yang ma yin pa'i chos rnams kyi tshogs so //
T05TD4016.3E:44b-8: de la shes rab kyi phyi ma gsum ni chos bdag med pa zab mo shes pa'i shes rab po //
T05TD4016.3E:44b-9: sems can rnams 'dul ba'i thabs shes pa'i shes rab dang /
T05TD4016.3E:44b-10: shes bya thams cad la sgrib pa med pa shes pa'i shes rab po zhes 'byung ste /
T05TD4016.3E:44b-11: dang po ni chos stong pa nyid shes pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:44b-12: bar ma ni gang zag stong pa nyid du shes pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:44b-13: tha ma ni stong pa nyid gnyis mngon du byas pa'i shes pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:44b-14: bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa las ni sems can stong pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:44b-16: gnyi ga stong pa'i shes rab ces bshad do //
T05TD4016.3E:44b-17: bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa las ni sbyor ba'i shes pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:44b-18: rjes thob pa'i shes pa zhes bshad do //
T05TD4016.3E:44b-19: bstan bcos ngo bo nyid med pa gsum bstan pa las /
T05TD4016.3E:44b-20: rnam par mi rtog pa'i sbyor ba'i shes rab ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:44b-21: de kho na nyid bsgom pa mdun rol gyi thabs khyad par du 'phags pa'i shes rab po //
T05TD4016.3E:44b-22: rnam par mi rtog pa'i shes rab ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:44b-23: de kho na nyid du bsgom pa'i shes rab po //
T05TD4016.3E:44b-24: rnam par mi rtog pa phyis thob pa'i shes rab ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:44b-25: mngon par rtogs pa'i mtha' kun rdzob rnams shes pa chos ston pa la sogs pa dngos po sna tshogs ston pa yin no zhes 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:44b-26: bstan bcos kun las btus pa las ni kun rdzob la dmigs pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:44b-27: sems can la dmigs pa'i shes rab dag ni rim bzhin du sa la 'jug pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:44b-28: sangs rgyas kyi chos mngon par bsgrub pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:44b-29: sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa sgrub pa'i ston pa gsum dang sbyar ro zhes bshad do //
T05TD4016.3E:44b-30: pha rol tu phyin pa drug po re re la yang rab tu dbye ba rnam pa gsum yod pa rgya cher rnam par 'byed pa ni bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:45a-2: mangs kyis dogs nas ma brjod do //
T05TD4016.3E:45a-3: de phyir bstan pa rnams de ltar tha dad par gyur ce na /
T05TD4016.3E:45a-4: don rnam pa gcig kho na ma yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:45a-5: so so nas don re re smos pa'i phyir /
T05TD4016.3E:45a-7: pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag gi ngo bo nyid kyi bye brag mdo tsam du bstan pa yang /
T05TD4016.3E:45a-8: bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa las ji skad du /
T05TD4016.3E:45a-9: pha rol tu phyin pa bcu po dag gi ngo bo nyid kyang /
T05TD4016.3E:45a-10: sbyin pa ni ma chags pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:45a-11: des bskyed pa'i las gsum po dag gi ngo bo nyid do //
T05TD4016.3E:45a-12: tshul khrims ni byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims yang dag par len pa'i las gsum po dag gi ngo bo nyid do //
T05TD4016.3E:45a-13: bzod pa ni zhe sdang med pa dang brtson 'grus dang nges pa'i shes rab dang de dag gis bskyed pa'i las gsum po dag gi ngo bo nyid do //
T05TD4016.3E:45a-15: des bskyed pa'i las gsum po dag gi ngo bo nyid do //
T05TD4016.3E:45a-16: bsam gtan ni ting nge 'dzin gyi ngo bo nyid do //
T05TD4016.3E:45a-17: phyi ma lnga ni chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa'i ngo bo nyid do //
T05TD4016.3E:45a-19: phyis thob pa'i yi shes so zhes 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:45a-20: zhib tu de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no //
T05TD4016.3E:45a-21: rgya cher rnam par 'byed pa ni mtshan nyid bstan pa dag las byung ba bzhin du rig par bya'o /
T05TD4016.3E:45a-24: byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
T05TD4016.3E:45a-25: bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du pha rol tu phyin pa de dag pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni brgyad pa pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming thob pa bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:45a-26: 'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:45a-27: lan du gsungs pa bstan te /
T05TD4016.3E:45a-28: de ni dang po ci'i slad du pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi ba lags zhes zhu ba'o //
T05TD4016.3E:45a-29: spyi dang bye brag gi ming ni gong du bstan pa bzhin te /
T05TD4016.3E:45a-30: 'di ni rgyu dang rkyen gang gi phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:45a-31: don gang gi phyir pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba'i ming thob par 'gyur zhes bya ba'o //
T05TD4016.3E:45a-32: bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa /
T05TD4016.3E:45b-0: rigs kyi bu rgyu dang rkyen rnam pa lnga'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa de bzhin @45b gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston te /
T05TD4016.3E:45b-4: go rims bzhin du rnam par dbye ste bshad pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:45b-5: rgol ba'i rten du bzlas te bshad pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:45b-6: 'di ni dang po grangs mdor smos pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:45b-7: rgyu rnam pa lnga'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T05TD4016.3E:45b-8: mtshams rnam par grol ba'i mdo las ni rnam pa lnga zhes 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:45b-9: dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni don rnam pa lnga zhes 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:45b-10: chags pa med pa nyid kyi phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:45b-11: mi lta ba nyid kyi phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:45b-12: kha na ma tho ba med pa nyid kyi phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:45b-13: rnam par rtog pa med pa nyid kyi phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:45b-14: yang dag par yongs su bsngo ba nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bya ba gnyis pa grangs bzhin du ming bkod pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:45b-15: mtshams rnam par grol ba'i mdo las ni thog ma med pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:45b-17: rnam par rtog pa med pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:45b-18: yongs su bsngo ba'o zhes 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:45b-19: dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni ma chags pa dang re ba med pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:45b-21: rnam par rtog pa med pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:45b-22: yongs su bsngo ba'o zhes 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:45b-23: bstan bcos rnam par bshad pa las ni ming bkod par zad kyi /
T05TD4016.3E:45b-24: rnam par bshad pa ni med do //
T05TD4016.3E:45b-25: de'i phyir bstan bcos de nyid las sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yon tan lnga dang ldan pas na pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:45b-26: mngon par zhe na pa med pa'i phyir gtong ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:45b-27: mi lta ba'i phyir gtong ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:45b-28: skyon med pa'i phyir gtong ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:45b-29: rnam par mi rtog pa'i phyir gtong ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:45b-30: yongs su bsngo ba'i phyir gtong ba'o //
T05TD4016.3E:45b-31: sbyin pa ji lta ba bzhin du tshul khrims nas shes rab kyi bar du de bzhin du rig par bya'o zhes 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:45b-32: de la chags pa med pa nyid ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:45b-33: pha rol tu phyin pa dang mi mthun pa'i dngos po la mngon par zhen pa gang yin pa'o zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gsum pa go rims bzhin du rnam par phye ste bshad pa ston pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:45b-34: 'di yang rkyen rnam pa lnga bstan pa nyid kyis rnam pa lngar dbye ste /
T05TD4016.3E:45b-35: 'di ni dang po chags pa med pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:46a-1: phyin pa drug dang mi mthun pa'i sgrib pa gang yin pa de ni mi mthun pa'i dngos po zhes bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:46a-2: mi mthun pa'i dngos po de dag la mngon par zhen pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:46a-3: sgrib ba drug rgya cher bshad ba ni 'og nas mdo las gsungs pa bzhin du rig par bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:46a-4: bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las kyang mdo 'di las gsungs pa dang mthun par 'byung ste /
T05TD4016.3E:46a-5: de'i phyir bstan bcos de nyid las /
T05TD4016.3E:46a-6: de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sbyin pa ni mdor bsdu na yon tan lnga dang ldan na sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i grangs su 'gro ste /
T05TD4016.3E:46a-8: chags pa med pa nyid dang /
T05TD4016.3E:46a-10: kha na ma tho ba med pa nyid dang /
T05TD4016.3E:46a-11: rnam par mi rtog pa nyid dang /
T05TD4016.3E:46a-12: yongs su bsngo ba nyid kyis so //
T05TD4016.3E:46a-13: sbyin pa la ji lta ba bzhin du tshul khrims la sogs pa la yang de bzhin du rig par bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:46a-14: de la chags pa med pa nyid ni sbyin ba la sogs pa'i gnas su gyur pa'i chos rnam pa thams cad la chags pa med pa gang yin pa'o zhes 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:46a-15: mtshams rnam par grol ba'i mdo las ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:46a-16: pha rol tu phyin pa dang mi mthun pa'i dngos po la mngon par zhen pa gang yin pa'o zhes 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:46a-17: dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las kyang chags pa med pa nyid ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:46a-18: pha rol tu phyin pa dang mi mthun pa'i dngos po la mngon par zhen pa gang yin pa'o zhes 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:46a-19: bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las /
T05TD4016.3E:46a-20: chags pa med cing rnam par dag ba ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:46a-21: pha rol tu phyin pa dang mi mthun pa'i chos mi skye'o zhes bshad do //
T05TD4016.3E:46a-22: de la mi lta ba nyid ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:46a-23: pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:46a-24: lan du phan 'dogs pa la sems 'brel pa med pa gang yin pa'o zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa mi lta ba gnyis kyi mtshan nyid bstan pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:46a-25: 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag gi 'bras bu dang /
T05TD4016.3E:46a-26: lan du phan 'dogs pa la mi re bar sbyin pa la sogs pa gtong ba gang yin pa de ni mi lta ba nyid ces bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:46b-0: pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag gi 'bras bu ni 'og nas mdo las bstan pa @46b bzhin du rig par bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:46b-1: bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las kyang /
T05TD4016.3E:46b-2: de la mi lta ba nyid ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:46b-4: de'i 'bras bu la sems 'brel ba med pa nyid gang yin pa'o zhes 'byung ste /
T05TD4016.3E:46b-5: de la zang zing la sems 'brel pa med pa zhes bya ba ni mdo las /
T05TD4016.3E:46b-6: lan du phan 'dogs pa la sems 'brel pa med pa zhes gang gsungs pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:46b-7: mtshams rnam par grol ba'i mdo las mi lta ba nyid ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:46b-8: pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:46b-9: da ltar gyi rnyed pa la sems 'brel pa med ba gang yin pa'o zhes 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:46b-10: dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las /
T05TD4016.3E:46b-11: mi re ba nyid ni pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:46b-13: lan du phan 'dogs pa'i sems kyi tshol ba med pa gang yin pa'o zhes 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:46b-14: bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa las /
T05TD4016.3E:46b-15: mi lta ba rnam par dag pa ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:46b-16: rang gi lus dang pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi 'bras bu rnam par smin pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:46b-17: lan du phan 'dogs pa la sems kyis rtag tu mi lta ba gang yin pa'o zhes 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:46b-18: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rdo rje gcod pa'i 'grel pa las ni rang gi lus dang /
T05TD4016.3E:46b-20: rnam par smin pa la mngon par zhen pa med pa gang yin pa'o zhes 'byung ste /
T05TD4016.3E:46b-21: 'di ni bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las /
T05TD4016.3E:46b-22: sbyin pa gnyis zhes bstan pa nyid de /
T05TD4016.3E:46b-23: de'i phyir sbyin pa'i le'u las /
T05TD4016.3E:46b-24: lan la mi lta ba'i sbyin pa gang zhe na /
T05TD4016.3E:46b-25: byang chub sems dpa' snying rje'i sems dang /
T05TD4016.3E:46b-26: snying brtse ba dang ldan pa ni sbyin pa sbyin pa na pha rol nas phan 'dogs su re ba med de /
T05TD4016.3E:46b-28: sred pa'i mes tshig pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:46b-30: rang bzhin gyis sdug bsngal dag mthong ba'i phyir sbyin pa gtong ba'o //
T05TD4016.3E:46b-31: rnam par smin pa la mi lta ba'i sbyin pa gang zhe na /
T05TD4016.3E:46b-32: byang chub sems dpa' ni sbyin pa byin nas phyi ma la longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa 'am /
T05TD4016.3E:46b-33: lus phun sum tshogs par 'gyur bar sbyin pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa la re ba med de /
T05TD4016.3E:47a-0: 'du byed thams cad ni snying po med par @47a * //
T05TD4016.3E:47a-2: byang chub mchog la ni phan yon du lta ba'i phyir sbyin pa gtong ngo zhes 'byung ste /
T05TD4016.3E:47a-3: 'di dag gi mtshan nyid rgya cher bshad pa ni slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:47a-4: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rdo rje gcod pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon yon tan byin gyis mdzad pa bzhin du rig par bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:47a-5: de la kha na ma tho ba med pa nyid ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:47a-6: pha rol tu phyin pa de dag kun nas nyon mongs pa'i chos dang ma 'dres shing /
T05TD4016.3E:47a-7: thabs ma yin pa'i spyod pa rnam par spangs pa gang yin pa'o zhes bya ba ni gsum pa kha na ma tho ba med pa'i mtshan nyid bstan to //
T05TD4016.3E:47a-8: de la kha na ma tho ba rnam pa gnyis te /
T05TD4016.3E:47a-9: dang po ni kun nas nyon mongs pa'i chos 'dres pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:47a-10: 'og nas mdo las snying rje med pa'i sbyor ba la sogs ba skyon rnam pa bzhi bstan pa lta bu'o //
T05TD4016.3E:47a-11: gnyis pa ni thabs ma yin pa'i spyod pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:47a-12: 'og nas mdo las zang zing gi phan 'dogs pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa zhib tu ji skad bstan pa lta bu'o //
T05TD4016.3E:47a-13: rnam pa 'di gnyis spangs nas sbyin pa byin pa gang yin pa de ni /
T05TD4016.3E:47a-14: kha na ma tho ba med pa zhes bya'o /
T05TD4016.3E:47a-15: bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las de la kha na ma thob med pa nyid ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:47a-16: rnam pa thams cad kyi sbyin pa la sogs pa nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i rnam pa thams cad rnam par spangs pa gang yin pa'o zhes 'byung ste /
T05TD4016.3E:47a-17: de la nye ba'i nyon mongs pa zhes bya ba yang bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa de nyid las ji skad du /
T05TD4016.3E:47a-18: sbyin ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i nye ba'i nyon mongs pa nang dang phyi rol la brten pa rnam pa bcu yod de /
T05TD4016.3E:47a-19: de dag gi gnyen por byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam par dag pa bcu bstan pa'i rnam pa gcig las 'phros pa'i rigs bzhin du rig bar bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:47a-20: de la phyi rol la brten pa'i nye ba'i nyon mongs pa ni rnam pa lnga ste /
T05TD4016.3E:47a-21: yongs su nyon mongs pa nyid dang spong ba nyid dang /
T05TD4016.3E:47a-22: byams pas zhen pa med pa nyid dang /
T05TD4016.3E:47a-23: yid la bsams pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa nyid dang /
T05TD4016.3E:47a-24: yongs su ma smin pa nyid do //
T05TD4016.3E:47a-25: nang la brten pa'i nye ba'i nyon mongs pa yang rnam pa lnga ste /
T05TD4016.3E:47a-26: nges par 'byin pa ma yin pa nyid dang /
T05TD4016.3E:47b-0: kun nas nyon mongs pa can @47b nyid dang /
T05TD4016.3E:47b-1: stobs dang mi ldan pa nyid dang /
T05TD4016.3E:47b-2: phyogs su ltung ba dang bcas pa nyid dang /
T05TD4016.3E:47b-3: zad pa'i chos nyid do zhes 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:47b-4: dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:47b-5: mtshams rnam par grol ba'i mdo las kyang /
T05TD4016.3E:47b-6: mdo 'di nyid las gsungs pa dang mthun no //
T05TD4016.3E:47b-7: bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las gsum pa kha na ma tho ba med pa ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:47b-8: pha rol tu phyin pa kun nas nyon mongs pa'i chos dang 'dres pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:47b-9: thabs ma yin pa'i spyod pa rnam par spangs pa gang yin pa'o zhes 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:47b-10: de la rnam par rtog pa med pa nyid ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:47b-11: pha rol tu phyin pa de dag nyid kyi rang gi mtshan nyid la sgra ji bzhin du mngon par zhen pa med pa gang yin pa'o zhes bya ba ni bzhi pa rnam par rtog pa med pa'i mtshan nyid bstan to //
T05TD4016.3E:47b-12: 'di ltar sgra ji bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa drug dag gi mtshan nyid rab tu 'dzin pa dang bral ba gang yin pa de ni rnam par rtog pa med pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T05TD4016.3E:47b-13: bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las /
T05TD4016.3E:47b-14: de la rnam par rtog pa med pa nyid ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:47b-15: sbyin pa la sogs pa la kun brtags pa'i ngo bo nyid du lta ba gang yin pa'o zhes 'byung ste /
T05TD4016.3E:47b-16: yang na rnam par rtog pa med pa nyid ces bya ba ni 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:47b-17: pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag gi 'khor gsum kas yongs su dag pa rgya cher rnam par bshad pa las ni theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:47b-18: mtshams rnam par grol ba'i mdo las /
T05TD4016.3E:47b-19: rnam par rtog pa med pa ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:47b-20: pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la sgra ji bzhin du rang gi mtshan nyid du mngon par zhen pa med pa'o zhes gang yin pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:47b-21: dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las kyang rnam par mi rtog pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa las sgra ji bzhin du rang gi mtshan nyid du mngon bar zhen ba med ba'o zhes 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:47b-22: theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel ba lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las /
T05TD4016.3E:47b-23: bzhi pa rnam par rtog pa med pas rnam par dag pa ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:48a-0: sgra ji bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid du 'dzin pa rnam par spangs pa'o zhes @48a * //
T05TD4016.3E:48a-2: de la yang dag par yongs su bsngo ba nyid ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:48a-3: de ltar byas shing bsags pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dag bla na med pa'i byang chub chen po'i 'bras bur smon pa gang yin pa'o zhes bya ba ni lnga pa yang dag par yongs su bsngo ba'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:48a-4: de la dang por byas pa gang yin pa de ni byas pa zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:48a-5: 'phel bar gyur pa'i dus gang yin pa de ni bsags pa zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:48a-6: bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las /
T05TD4016.3E:48a-7: de la yongs su bsngo ba nyid ni sbyin pa la sogs pa thams cad kyi 'bras bu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bar smon lam 'debs pa gang yin pa de zhes 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:48a-8: yongs su bsngo pa rgya cher bshad pa ni byang chub tu sems bskyed ba'i mdo dang /
T05TD4016.3E:48a-9: sangs rgyas phal po che'i mdo'i nang nas yongs su bsngo ba'i le'u las bstan pa bzhin no //
T05TD4016.3E:48a-10: mtshams rnam par grol ba'i mdo las /
T05TD4016.3E:48a-11: yongs su bsngo ba ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:48a-12: pha rol tu phyin pa rnams byas nas 'phel bar 'gyur ba dag byang chub chen po'i 'bras bu gnyer ba gang yin pa'o zhes 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:48a-13: dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las kyang yongs su bsngo ba ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:48a-14: pha rol tu phyin pa dag byas shing /
T05TD4016.3E:48a-15: bsags pa dag las kyang byang chub chen po'i 'bras bur smon pa gang yin pa'o zhes 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:48a-16: theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las kyang /
T05TD4016.3E:48a-17: lnga pa yongs su bsngo ba rnam par dag pa ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:48a-18: pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag skyes shing 'phel bar 'gyur ba 'am /
T05TD4016.3E:48a-19: ma skyes shing 'phel bar ma gyur pa yang rung ste /
T05TD4016.3E:48a-20: rtag par byang chub thob par smon pa gang yin pa'o zhes 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:48a-21: mtshan nyid rnam pa lnga rgya cher bshad ba ni slob dpon yang dag bden pas theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba'i brjed byang byas pa las bstan pa bzhin du bstan par bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:48a-22: pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid de yang bstan pa rnams las so so nas bshad pa mi mthun bas kha cig las mtshan nyid rnam ba bzhis pha rol tu phyin pa'i don bstan pa yod de /
T05TD4016.3E:48b-0: bstan bcos mdo sde'i rgyan las pha rol tu phyin pa drug po re re la yang mtshan @48b nyid bzhi bzhi yod par bstan pa lta bu ste /
T05TD4016.3E:48b-1: dang po ni sgrib pa'i gnyen por gyur pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:48b-2: ser sna la sogs pa'i gnyen por gyur pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:48b-3: gnyis pa ni shes par byed pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:48b-4: rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes dang lhan cig 'grogs pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:48b-5: gsum pa ni ra ba yongs su rdzogs par byed pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:48b-6: sbyin pas slong ba dag ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du sbyin par byed ba nas /
T05TD4016.3E:48b-7: de bzhin du ni shes rab kyis ni the tshom can dag gis ji ltar 'dod ba bzhin du the tshom gcod pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:48b-8: sbyin pa ni sems can yongs su smin par byed pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:48b-9: sngar sbyin pas yongs su bsdus nas de'i 'og tu theg pa gsum po dag gis ci rigs par smin par byed pa nas /
T05TD4016.3E:48b-10: de bzhin du sngar shes rab kyis yongs su bsdus nas de'i 'og tu theg pa gsum gyis ci rigs par yongs su smin par byed pa'i bar du'o //
T05TD4016.3E:48b-11: chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las ba tus pa las kyang mtshan nyid bzhis ston to /
T05TD4016.3E:48b-13: de la pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma chan nyid gang zhen /
T05TD4016.3E:48b-14: rtsol ba nyid kyi phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:48b-16: bdag nyid kyi lus kyi phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:48b-17: rgyu mthun pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:48b-18: de ru brtags na khong du chud par 'gyur ro //
T05TD4016.3E:48b-19: kha cig las ni mtshan nyid rnam pa lngas bstan pa yang yod de /
T05TD4016.3E:48b-21: mtshams rnam par grol ba'i mdo dang /
T05TD4016.3E:48b-22: dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang /
T05TD4016.3E:48b-23: bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:48b-25: theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las ji skad bstan pa lta bu'o //
T05TD4016.3E:48b-26: gzhan yang chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las kyang mtshan nyid lngas ston te /
T05TD4016.3E:48b-28: pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid gang zhe na 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:48b-33: ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro zhes 'byung ste /
T05TD4016.3E:48b-34: de nyid brtags na khong du chud par 'gyur ro //
T05TD4016.3E:48b-35: kha cig las ni mtshan nyid rnam pa drug gis bstan pa yang yod de /
T05TD4016.3E:48b-36: bstan bcos theg ba chen po bsdus pa las /
T05TD4016.3E:49a-0: drug po 'di dag gi mtshan nyid ji ltar blta @49a * //
T05TD4016.3E:49a-2: dam pa drug gis blta bar bya ste zhes ji skad du bstan pa lta bu'o //
T05TD4016.3E:49a-3: mtshan nyid rnam pa drug ni bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa las bstan pa dang 'dra ba'i phyir 'dir ma bstan to //
T05TD4016.3E:49a-4: kha cig las ni mtshan nyid rnam pa bdun gyis bstan pa yang yod de /
T05TD4016.3E:49a-5: bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa las ji skad du mtshan nyid bdun po 'di dag ni dam pa bdun gyis yongs su sdud pas gdod pha rol tu phyin pa zhes rnam par gzhag pa yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:49a-6: de la gnas pa dam pa ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:49a-7: byang chub sems dpa'i rigs la gnas pa gang yin pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:49a-8: rten dam pa ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:49a-9: byang chub chen po'i sems la brten pa gang yin pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:49a-10: bsam pa dam pa ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:49a-11: sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba gang yin pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:49a-12: ched du bya ba dam pa ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:49a-13: bya ba thams cad phun sum tshogs par spyod pa gang yin pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:49a-14: thabs la mkhas pa dam pa ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:49a-15: rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes kyis bsdus pa gang yin pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:49a-16: yongs su bsngo ba dam pa ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:49a-17: bla na med pa'i byang chub tu bsngo ba gang yin pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:49a-18: rnam par dag ba dam pa ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:49a-19: sgrib pa gnyis dang 'dres par ma gyur pa gang yin pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:49a-20: bdun po de dag gis yongs su ma bsdus pa'i sbyin pa la sogs pa ni /
T05TD4016.3E:49a-21: pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no zhes bstan pa lta bu'o //
T05TD4016.3E:49a-22: kha cig las mtshan nyid rnam pa brgyad kyis bstan pa yod de /
T05TD4016.3E:49a-23: bstan bcos rnam par bshad pa las ji skad bshad pa lta bu'o//
T05TD4016.3E:49a-24: mtshan nyid rnam pa bcu gnyis kyis bstan pa yang yod de /
T05TD4016.3E:49a-25: bstan bcos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:49a-26: dbus dang mtha' rnam par 'byed pa las ji skad bstan pa lta bu'o //
T05TD4016.3E:49a-27: bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa de dag dang mi mthun pa'i dngos po gang lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bzhi pa gzhan dag gis rgol ba'i rjes su bzlas te bshad pa zhes bya ba'am /
T05TD4016.3E:49a-29: lan dag gis rgya cher bshad pa zhes bya ba ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:49a-30: 'di yang rnam pa bzhir dbye ste /
T05TD4016.3E:49b-0: zhus pa dang lan dag gis pha rol tu phyin pa dang mi mthun pa'i dngos po rnams rnam @49b par 'byed pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:49b-1: zhus pa dang lan dag gis rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu rnam bar 'byed pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:49b-2: zhus pa dang lan dag gis pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'dres pa'i chos rnam par 'byed pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:49b-3: gang du bstan pa'i thabs ma yin pa'i spyod pa bstan pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:49b-4: mdor bsdus pa'i phyir rnam par rtog pa med pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:49b-5: yang dag par yongs su bsngo ba ni ma bstan te /
T05TD4016.3E:49b-6: khong du chud bar sla ba'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:49b-7: 'di ni dang po pha rol tu phyin pa dang mi mthun pa'i dngos po bstan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:49b-8: 'di yang zhu ba gsol pa dang lan du gsungs pa bstan te /
T05TD4016.3E:49b-9: 'di ni dang po pha rol tu phyin pa dang mi mthun pa'i dngos po zhus pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:49b-10: rigs kyi bu dngos po de ni mdor bsdu na rnam pa drug tu rig bar bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pa sa yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:49b-13: go rims bzhin du rnam par phye nas bshad pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:49b-14: 'di ni dang po mi mthun pa'i dngos po drug mdor bstan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:49b-18: 'dod pa'i bsod nams las shin tu yon tan gyi phan yon du lta pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa go rims bzhin du rnam par phye ste bshad pa ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:49b-19: 'di yang mthun pa'i dngos po rnam pa drug bstan pa nyid kyis rnam pa drug tu dbye bar bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:49b-20: mi mthun pa'i dngos po de yang rnam pa gnyis te /
T05TD4016.3E:49b-21: dang po'i bye brag gis mi mthun pa'i sgrib pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:49b-22: theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis mdzad pa las ji skad du /
T05TD4016.3E:49b-23: mi mthun pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:49b-29: 'chal pa'i shes rab po zhes bstan pa lta bu'o //
T05TD4016.3E:49b-30: gnyis pa spyi dang bye brag bsdus pa'i sgrib ba ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:49b-31: longs spyod la sogs pa la mngon par zhen pa gang yin pa de ni bye brag gi sgrib pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:49b-32: re re la yang yon tan gyi phan yon du lta ba gang yin pa de ni /
T05TD4016.3E:49b-34: mdo 'di las kyang spyi dang bye brag gi sgrib pa ston pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:50a-0: mdzad pas 'di ni dang po sbyin pa dang mi mthun pa'i dngos @50a * //
T05TD4016.3E:50a-2: de 'dod pa'i dga' ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa la bshad pa rnam pa gsum yod de /
T05TD4016.3E:50a-3: kha cig na re 'dod pa'i dga' ba zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'i dga' ba'i ming gi rnam grangs so //
T05TD4016.3E:50a-4: longs spyod la dbang phyug ces bya ba ni dga' bar bya ba'i yul lo //
T05TD4016.3E:50a-5: 'dod ba'i bsod nams la zhes bya ba ni gong ma'i yul gsum po dag gi dga' ba la'o zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:50a-7: 'dod pa'i dga' ba zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa la dga' ba'i don te /
T05TD4016.3E:50a-9: de la 'dod pa la lnga ste /
T05TD4016.3E:50a-11: longs spyod ces bya ba ni nor bu rin po che la sogs pa mang du bdog pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:50a-12: dbang phyug ces bya ba ni gong ma'i dngos po gnyis la longs spyong pa'i dbang thob pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:50a-13: 'dod pa'i bsod nams zhes bya ba ni /
T05TD4016.3E:50a-14: 'dod pa la dga' ba'i yul bstan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:50a-17: yid bde ba la dbang ba 'dod pa'i dga' ba rnam pa gsum ni 'dod pa'i bsod nams zhes bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:50a-18: 'dod pa'i dga' ba rnam pa gsum po de dag la shin tu yon tan gyi phan yon du lta ba'o //
T05TD4016.3E:50a-20: 'dod pa'i dga' ba rnam pa gsum po dag la dga' zhing yon tan gyi phan yon du lta ba gang yin pa des ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sgrib par byed do zhes bstan par 'gyur ro zhe'o //
T05TD4016.3E:50a-21: kha cig na re 'dod pa'i dga' ba zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'i dga' ba'i tshor ba'o //
T05TD4016.3E:50a-22: gzhan ni snga ma bzhin no zhe'o //
T05TD4016.3E:50a-23: mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni /
T05TD4016.3E:50a-27: dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni /
T05TD4016.3E:50a-28: 'dod pa lnga'i longs spyod la dbang ba zhes 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:50a-29: theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel ba lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las /
T05TD4016.3E:50a-30: pha rol tu phyin pa la sgrib pa rnam pa drug yod de /
T05TD4016.3E:50a-31: dang po'i sgrib pa ni 'dod pa'i yul la dga' ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:50a-32: longs spyod dang bdag nyid kyi bsod nams la yon tan khyad par du 'phags par lta ba ste /
T05TD4016.3E:50a-33: sbyin pas ni rab tu sel bar byed do zhes 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:50b-0: yid 'dod dgur kun tu spyod pa dag la shin tu yon tan gyi phan yon du lta ba zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa @50b tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mi mthun pa'i dngos po bstan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:50b-1: ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du srog gcod pa la sogs pa'i las rnams la yon tan gyi phan yon du lta ba ste /
T05TD4016.3E:50b-2: dper na lug bsad na ma tho ris su skye bar 'gyur ro zhes zer ba la sogs pa lta bu ste /
T05TD4016.3E:50b-3: theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las /
T05TD4016.3E:50b-4: gnyis pa sgrib pa'i the tshom dang bcas pa'i sems kyis lus dang /
T05TD4016.3E:50b-6: yid kyi las slong ba ste /
T05TD4016.3E:50b-7: tshul khrims kyis 'di rab tu sel bar 'gyur ro zhes 'byung ste /
T05TD4016.3E:50b-8: gzhan gyis brnyas pa mi bzod pa dag shin tu yon tan gyi phan yon du lta ba zhes bya ba ni gsum pa bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang mi mthun pa'i dngos po bstan te /
T05TD4016.3E:50b-9: mdo 'di nyid kyis brda phrad bar zad do //
T05TD4016.3E:50b-10: theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las /
T05TD4016.3E:50b-11: gsum pa'i sgrib pa ni brnyas pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:50b-14: tsha ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal la ji mi nus pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:50b-15: bzod pas rab tu sel bar byed do zhes bshad do //
T05TD4016.3E:50b-16: nan tan gyis mi brtson pas 'dod pa la dga' ba la mngon par zhen pa dag yon tan gyi phan yon du lta ba zhes bya ba ni bzhi pa brtson 'grus dang mi mthun pa'i dngos po bstan pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:50b-18: bag med pa la sogs pa la yon tan du lta ba gang yin pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:50b-19: theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel ba lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las /
T05TD4016.3E:50b-20: bzhi pa'i sgrib pa ni nan tan du sgrib par byed pa las bde pa nyid du 'dzin cing /
T05TD4016.3E:50b-21: ma thob par thob bo snyam du sems pas yon tan du lta ba ste /
T05TD4016.3E:50b-22: brtson 'grus kyis 'di sel bar byed do zhes bshad do //
T05TD4016.3E:50b-23: 'du 'dzi la gnas shing 'jig rten gyi sna tshogs dang /
T05TD4016.3E:50b-24: rnam par g-yeng ba dag la shin tu yon tan gyi phan yon zhes bya ba ni lnga pa bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mi mthun pa'i dngos po bstan pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:50b-25: 'di ltar rnam par g-yeng ba rnam pa lnga po dag la 'am /
T05TD4016.3E:50b-26: rnam par g-yeng ba rnam pa drug po dag la yon tan khyad par du 'phags par lta ba la'o //
T05TD4016.3E:50b-27: mtshams rnam par grol ba'i mdo las ni 'jig rten gyi 'du 'dzi mang po dngos po la brten pa zhes 'byung ste /
T05TD4016.3E:50b-28: dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las kyang de skad du bstan to //
T05TD4016.3E:51a-1: chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur pa las /
T05TD4016.3E:51a-2: lnga pa sgrib pa ni 'dre bar gnas par mos pa las /
T05TD4016.3E:51a-3: 'jig rten pa'i ya mtshan gyi dngos po dang /
T05TD4016.3E:51a-4: rnam par g-yeng pa'i rgyu dang /
T05TD4016.3E:51a-5: rkyen dag la yon tan nyid du lta ba ste /
T05TD4016.3E:51a-6: bsam gtan gyis 'di rab tu sel bar byed do zhes 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:51a-7: mthong ba dang bye brag phyed pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:51a-8: rnam par shes pa'i tha snyad kyi spyod pa dag la yon tan gyi phan yon du lta ba zhes bya ba ni drug pa shes rab gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang mi mthun pa'i dngos po bstan pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:51a-9: mdo 'di nyid kyis brda phrad par zad do //
T05TD4016.3E:51a-10: dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las lnga pa ni 'jig rten pa'i 'du 'dzi mang po'i dngos po bstan pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:51a-14: rnam par shes pa'i rnam par rig pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:51a-15: drug pa ni 'jig rten pa'i spros pa dag la bsod nams byas pa bzhin du mthong ba zhes bya ba ni lo ts'a ba dag gis nor te /
T05TD4016.3E:51a-16: mthong ba dang thos pa la sogs pas dngos po ni drug pas rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:51a-17: bstan pa bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa las ni lta bar song ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:51a-18: 'chal ba'i shes rab thams cad sel ba zhes 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:51a-19: theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur pa las /
T05TD4016.3E:51a-20: drug pa'i sgrib pa ni mthong ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:51a-23: rnam par shes pa dag la yang dag pa nyid du 'dzin pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:51a-24: 'jig rten gyi spros pa dag la sems kyis brtson par byed pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:51a-25: don ma nges pa'i don gyis mdo dag las /
T05TD4016.3E:51a-26: sgra ji bzhin du don du 'dzin pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:51a-27: shes rab kyis 'di rab tu sel bar byed do zhes bshad do //
T05TD4016.3E:51a-28: rgya cher ni slob dpon yang dag bden pas theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel par bshad pa las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:51a-29: bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa de dag gi rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu gang lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa zhus pa dang lan dag gis pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag gi rnam par smin pa 'bras bu rnam par 'byed pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:51a-30: 'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang lan du gsungs pa bstan te /
T05TD4016.3E:51b-0: 'di ni dang po pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag so so'i rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu ji lta ba @51b zhig lags zhes zhus pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:51b-1: rigs kyi bu de yang mdor bsdu na rnam pa gsum du rig par bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan gsungs pa ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:51b-4: go rims bzhin du rnam par phye nas bshad pa ste 'di ni dang po'o //
T05TD4016.3E:51b-5: sgrub pa'i rgyu rnam pa drug yod pa'i bye brag gis mngon par sgrub pa'i rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu yang rnam pa drug go zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T05TD4016.3E:51b-6: longs spyod chen po nyid dang /
T05TD4016.3E:51b-8: khon med cing dbyen med la bde ba dang yid bde ba mang ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:51b-9: sems can gyi bdag po byed pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:51b-10: lus la gnod pa med pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:51b-11: dbang che bar grags pa'o zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa go rims bzhin du rnam par phye nas bstan pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:51b-12: go rims bzhin du sbyin pa'i stobs kyis longs spyod chen po thob par 'gyur ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:51b-13: tshul khrims bsrung ba'i phyir de bde 'gror skye ba ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:51b-14: bzod pa bsgoms pa'i phyir khon med cing dbyen med la /
T05TD4016.3E:51b-15: bde ba dang yid bde ba mang bar 'gyur ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:51b-16: brtson 'grus brtsams pa'i phyir mang po kun gyis bskor bas sems can gyi bdag po byed par 'gyur ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:51b-17: bsam gtan gyis nyon mongs pa rab tu bsal ba'i lus la gnod pa med pa thob par 'gyur ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:51b-18: shes rab kyis rig pa'i gnas lnga la shin tu mkhas pas dbang che bar grags pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:51b-19: mtshams rnam par grol ba'i mdo las /
T05TD4016.3E:51b-22: kho na med pa gsum ni mdo 'di las gsungs pa dang mthun no //
T05TD4016.3E:51b-23: bzhi pa ni 'phel ba med pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:51b-24: lnga pa ni bde ba mang zhing sems can gyi bdag po byed pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:51b-25: drug pa ni rang gi lus la gnod pa byed pa med cing las su rung ba chen po dang ldan pa'o zhes 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:51b-26: dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni bsod nams can gyi longs spyod thob pa'i phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:51b-29: dbyen med cing bde ba med pa'i phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:51b-30: rtag par sems can gyi bdag po byed pa'i phyir bdag nyid kyi lus la gnod pa med pa'i phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:51b-31: mthu chen po'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ste /
T05TD4016.3E:52a-0: @52a * // mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni go rims nor ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:52a-1: dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las 'bras bu bdun bstan pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:52a-2: mi gsal bar 'gyur ba ni lo ts'a ba dag gi bsam pa tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:52a-3: bstan bcos chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag so so nas 'bras bu lnga lnga thob par ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:52a-4: mdo 'di las ni 'bras bu re re thob par bstan te /
T05TD4016.3E:52a-5: de'i phyir bstan bcos la phan yon ni rnam pa lnga'i skabs su dpag tu med pa'i bsngags pa brjod pa gang yin pa de ni phan yon zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:52a-7: pha rol tu phyin pa de dag gi mi mthun pa'i phyogs spangs pa ni bral ba'i 'bras bu'o //
T05TD4016.3E:52a-8: mthong ba'i chos la sbyin pa la sogs pas bdag dang gzhan rjes su 'dzin pa ni skyes bu byed pa'i 'bras bu'o //
T05TD4016.3E:52a-9: phyi ma la gong nas gong du khyad par du 'phags pa mchog dam pa 'byung ba ni rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu'o //
T05TD4016.3E:52a-10: byang chub chen po thob par 'gyur ba ni dbang gi 'bras bu'o //
T05TD4016.3E:52a-16: yid bde ba mang ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:52a-17: sems can la dbang ba dang /
