T05TD4016.3E:52a-18: lus la gnod pa med pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:52a-19: dbang che bar grags pa ni go rims bzhin du sbyin pa la sogs pa pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bur rig par bya'o zhes 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:52a-20: gzhan yang bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa las /
T05TD4016.3E:52a-21: zag pa dang bcas pa ni rnam pa bzhi ste /
T05TD4016.3E:52a-22: bral ba'i 'bras bu ma gtogs pas so //
T05TD4016.3E:52a-23: zag pa med pa la yang rnam pa bzhi ste /
T05TD4016.3E:52a-24: rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu ma gtogs pas so ;
T05TD4016.3E:52a-25: / gang 'bras bu lnga tshang bar bstan pa de ni phan tshun gcig gis gcig la phan 'dogs pa 'am /
T05TD4016.3E:52a-26: gnyi ga bsdus pa'i bstan pa yin no zhes 'byung ste /
T05TD4016.3E:52a-27: 'di ni bstan bcos chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las de dag brda sprod pa yin no /
T05TD4016.3E:52a-29: // / bam po drug cu gcig pa /
T05TD4016.3E:52a-30: bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'dres pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa'i chos gang lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gsum pa zhus pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:52a-31: lan dag gis pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'dres pa'i chos rnam par 'byed pa ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:52a-32: 'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:52a-33: lan du gsungs pa bstan te /
T05TD4016.3E:52b-0: 'di ni @52b dang po gong du kha na ma tho ba med pa bstan pa'i skabs su kun nas nyon mongs pa dang ma 'dres pa zhes gsungs pa de zhu ba'o //
T05TD4016.3E:52b-1: rigs kyi bu mdor bsdu na rnam pa bzhir rig par bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:52b-3: grangs smos nas lan mdor gsungs pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:52b-4: rnam par phye ste bstan pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:52b-5: gzhan dag gis rgol ba'i rjes su bzlas te bstan pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:52b-6: 'di ni dang po grangs smos nas lan mdor gsungs pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:52b-7: snying rje med pa'i sbyor ba'i phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:52b-8: tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i sbyor ba'i phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:52b-9: rtag tu mi byed pa'i sbyor ba'i phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:52b-10: ma gus pa'i sbyor ba'i phyir dang zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa go rims bzhin du rnam par phye ste bstan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:52b-11: 'di ltar bsgom pa rnam pa bzhi la sgrib pa'i phyir rnam pa bzhi zhes gsungs pa yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:52b-12: de la bsgom pa rnam pa bzhi ni /
T05TD4016.3E:52b-13: mdzod kyi bstan bcos las ji skad du /
T05TD4016.3E:52b-14: bsgom pa ni rnam pa bzhi yod de /
T05TD4016.3E:52b-15: dang po lus pa med par bsgom pa ni bsod nams dang /
T05TD4016.3E:52b-16: ye shes rnam pa gnyis kyi tshogs lus pa med par bsgom pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:52b-17: gnyis pa yun ring por bsgom pa ni bskal pa chen po grangs med pa gsum du sgom par byed kyang ngal ba med pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:52b-18: gsum pa rgyun chad pa med par bsgom pa ni nan tan brtson 'grus kyis skad cig gcig la bsgom zhing yongs su skyo ba med pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:52b-19: bzhi pa gus par bsgom pa ni bslab par bya ba dag la gus pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:52b-20: nga rgyal med pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa lta bu ste /
T05TD4016.3E:52b-21: bstan bcos rnam par bshad pa las kyang de skad du bshad do //
T05TD4016.3E:52b-22: bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa las ni /
T05TD4016.3E:52b-23: bsgom pa rnam pa lnga zhes bshad de de'i phyir de nyid las /
T05TD4016.3E:52b-24: dang po sems bskyed pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:52b-26: rgyun chad pa med pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:52b-28: lus pa med par bsgom pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ba yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:52b-29: rnam par bshad pa ni med do //
T05TD4016.3E:52b-30: 'dir ni dang po sems bskyed pa bkol ba'i phyir rnam pa bzhir gsungs pa yin no //
T05TD4016.3E:52b-31: de la snying rje med pa'i sbyor bas ni yun ring por bsgom pa la sgrib par byed de /
T05TD4016.3E:52b-32: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams bskal ba chen po grangs med pa gsum du bsgrub par nus pa yang snying rje chen po'i stobs kyis yin gyi /
T05TD4016.3E:53a-0: @53a * // snying rje'i stobs med pa'i phyir yun ring po bas ni ma yin pas so //
T05TD4016.3E:53a-1: de la tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i sbyor bas ni lus med par bsgom pa la sgrib par byed do //
T05TD4016.3E:53a-2: spyod pa gcig bsgrub pa'i tshe /
T05TD4016.3E:53a-3: pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi spyod pa khyad par bsgom mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:53a-4: rtag tu mi byed pa'i sbyor bas ni rgyun chad pa med par bsgom pa la sgrib par byed de de la rtag tu zhes bya ba ni rgyun du bya ba la bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:53a-5: 'di ltar le lo'i dbang gis rgyun chad pa med par rgyun du spyod pa rnams bsgrub par mi nus pas so //
T05TD4016.3E:53a-6: ma gus pas ni gus par bsgom pa la sgrib par byed de /
T05TD4016.3E:53a-7: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi chos la spyod pa na spyod pa re re la gus pa bskyed nas sbyin pa la sogs pa spyod pas so //
T05TD4016.3E:53a-8: rnam pa bzhi po 'di dag gis pha rol tu phyin pa spyod pa'i tshe 'dren mar 'byung bas 'dres pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:53a-9: de la tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i sbyor ba ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:53a-10: pha rol tu phyin pa gzhan bsgom pa'i tshe /
T05TD4016.3E:53a-11: pha rol tu phyin pa gzhan yongs su spong zhing nyams pa gang yin pa'o zhes bya ba ni gsum pa rgol ba'i rjes su bzlas te bstan pa ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:53a-12: 'di yang gang gi tshul bzhin ma yin pa zhes gsungs pas kyang nyes pa bsdus pa yin mod kyi /
T05TD4016.3E:53a-13: yang dag pa'i rigs pa dang yang 'gal bas 'dir mdo 'di las rnal 'byor pas 'gal te /
T05TD4016.3E:53a-14: pha rol tu phyin pa gcig kho na las spyod par 'gyur na pha rol tu phyin pa gzhan rnams kyi spyod pa yongs su spong bar 'gyur bas tshul bzhin ma yin pa zhes bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:53a-15: de'i phyir dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ;
T05TD4016.3E:53a-16: pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la spyod pa na gal te spyod pa gzhan dang bral bar gyur na tshul bzhin ma yin pa zhes bya'o zhes gsungs pa yin no //
T05TD4016.3E:53a-17: bcom ldan 'das thams cad ma lags pa'i spyod pa gang lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bzhi pa zhus pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:53a-18: lan dag gis gong du bstan pa'i thabs ma yin pa'i spyod pa rnam par 'byed pa ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:53a-25: dpe dang don du sbyar ba ste /
T05TD4016.3E:53a-26: 'di ni dang po gong du bstan pa'i thabs ma yin pa'i spyod pa zhus pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:53b-0: @53b rigs kyi bu gal te byang chub sems dpa' rnams pha rol tu phyin pa dag gis sems can la phan 'dogs pa na zang zing gi bsdu pas phan 'dogs pa nye bar bsgrub pa tsam gyis chog par 'dzin cing mi dge ba'i gnas nas bslangs te /
T05TD4016.3E:53b-1: dge ba'i gnas su 'jog par mi byed pa gang yin pa de ni thabs yin pa'i spyod pa zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:53b-2: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi las /
T05TD4016.3E:53b-3: zang zing gi bsdu ba kho nas phan 'dogs pas chog par 'dzin cing /
T05TD4016.3E:53b-4: gzhan dag mi dge ba'i gnas nas slong bar mi byed pa gang yin pa 'di ni thabs ma yin pa'i spyod pa zhes bya'o zhes bya ba'i don to //
T05TD4016.3E:53b-5: de ci'i phyir zhe na zhes bya ba ni thabs ma yin pa'i spyod par gyur pa'i gtan tshigs brtag pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:53b-6: zang zing btang bas kyang pha rol dga' bar 'gyur bas phan 'dogs pa yin na /
T05TD4016.3E:53b-7: don gang gi phyir thabs ma yin zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T05TD4016.3E:53b-8: rigs kyi bu sems can la dngos po de tsam zhig byas pas yang dag par phan btags pa zhes bya ba ma yin te zhes bya ba ni bzhi pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par rnam par bshad pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:53b-9: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams sems can la zang zing gis bsdus nas 'jig rten pa 'di dga' ba tsam byas pa yang phan btags pa zhes bya ba ma yin gyi /
T05TD4016.3E:53b-10: chos kyi sbyin pa btang nas /
T05TD4016.3E:53b-11: sems can rnams mi dge ba'i gnas nas bslang ba gang yin pa de ni gdod phan btags pa zhes bya bas so //
T05TD4016.3E:53b-12: dper na mi gtsang ba ni che yang rung chung yang rung rnam grangs gang gis kyang dri zhim por bya bar mi nus so zhes bya ba ni lnga pa dpes nye bar mtshon pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:53b-13: dper na 'jig rten na mi gtsang ba ni che yang rung chung yang rung nams kyang dri zhim po'i dngos por mi 'gyur ba bzhin no //
T05TD4016.3E:53b-14: de la mi gtsang ba ni 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal gyi dper bstan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:53b-15: dri zhim po ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i dper bstan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:53b-16: de bzhin du sems can rnams kyang 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal nyid kyi phyir /
T05TD4016.3E:53b-17: de'i ngo bo nyid kyang sdug bsngal yin pas thabs med pa gang gis zang zing kho nas re zhig tsam du phan btags kyang bde ba nye bar bsgrub par mi nus kyi /
T05TD4016.3E:54a-1: pa gang yin pa de ni gdod phan 'dogs pa'i mchog ces bya ba'i ming 'thob bo zhes bya ba ni drug pa dpe dang don sbyor ba ste /
T05TD4016.3E:54a-2: 'di ltar sems can rnams 'du byed sdug bsngal nyid kyi phyir /
T05TD4016.3E:54a-3: de'i ngo bo nyid kyang sdug bsngal yin pas /
T05TD4016.3E:54a-6: skom tsam gyis phan btags pas bde ba nyid du mi 'gyur gyi byang chub kyi mya ngan las 'das pa dge ba'i chos gya nom pa la 'jog pa gang yin pa de 'ba' zhig ni phan 'dogs pa'i mchog ces bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T05TD4016.3E:54a-7: byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
T05TD4016.3E:54a-8: bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa de dag gi rnam pa du mchis pa lags zhes bya ba ni 'di man chad ni dgu pa pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'i grangs bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:54a-9: 'di yang rnam pa gnyis po zhu ba gsol ba dang lan du gsungs pas bstan te /
T05TD4016.3E:54a-10: 'di ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag la rnam par dag pa'i phyir zhes zhus pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:54a-11: bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa /
T05TD4016.3E:54a-12: rigs kyi bu nga ni nams kyang pha rol tu phyin pa rnams gong du bstan pa bzhi mtshan nyid lnga po ma gtogs par rnam par dag pa gzhan yod par mi smra mod kyi zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:54a-14: snga ma lnga las rnam par dag pa gud na med par bstan pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:54a-15: lnga po dag la brten nas bsdus pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:54a-16: so so ba bdun gyi mtshan bstan pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:54a-18: 'di ltar nga ni gong du chags pa med pa nyid kyi phyir zhes bya ba nas yang dag par yongs su bsngo ba nyid kyi phyir zhes bya ba'i bar gyi mtshan nyid lnga po dag ma gtogs par gud na rnam par dag pa'i mtshan nyid yod par mi gsung ngo zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T05TD4016.3E:54a-19: 'on kyang yang dngos po de dag gis bsdus pa dang ;
T05TD4016.3E:54a-20: so so ba la brten nas pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi ni rnam par dag pa'i mtshan nyid bshad par bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa lnga'i mtshan nyid snga ma la brten nas bsdus pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:54a-21: so so ba bdun bstan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:54b-0: snga ma'i mtshan nyid rnam pa @54b lnga la brten nas bsdus pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:54b-1: so so ba bdun gyi lan mdor gsungs pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:54b-2: go rims bzhin du bsdus pa so so ba bdun mtshan nyid bstan pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:54b-4: de la dngos po de dag gi zhes bya ba ni pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la dngos po de dag ces bya bar bstan te /
T05TD4016.3E:54b-5: 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa de dag re re dag la yang so so nas bsdus pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:54b-6: so so ba rnam pa bdun yod pas so //
T05TD4016.3E:54b-7: de la pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi rnam par dag pa'i mtshan nyid bsdus pa yang rnam pa bdun du rig par bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pas gnyis pa go rims bzhin du rnam par phye ste bshad pa ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:54b-8: 'di yang rnam pa gnyis su dbye ste /
T05TD4016.3E:54b-9: bsdus pa'i mtshan nyid bdun bstan pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:54b-10: so so'i mtshan nyid bdun bstan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:54b-11: dang po la yang rnam pa gnyis te /
T05TD4016.3E:54b-14: lan dag gis rnam par phye nas bstan pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:54b-15: 'di ni dang po mtshan nyid rnam pa bdun smos pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:54b-17: byang chub sems dpa' chos de dag gis gzhan las shes kyi khe yongs su mi tshol ba zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa zhus pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:54b-18: lan dag gi mtshan nyid rnam pa bdun rnam par phye nas bshad pa ston te /
T05TD4016.3E:54b-19: 'di ni mtshan nyid dang po bstan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:54b-20: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' ni gsang ste /
T05TD4016.3E:54b-21: pha rol tu phyin pa drug spyod pas gzhan shes par byas nas grags pa dang rnyed pa mi tshol ba'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:54b-22: chos de dag la lta bas mngon par zhen par mi byed pa zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa mngon par zhen par mi byed pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa ste 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:54b-23: pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag re re dag la yang gsum yongs su dag pa chen po ni theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las rgya cher bstan to //
T05TD4016.3E:54b-24: chos 'di dag byang chub chen po thob par gyur pa yin nam ma yin snyam du yid gnyis dang the tshom skyed par mi byed pa zhes bya ba ni gsum pa the tshom mi skyed pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:54b-25: mos pa bstan pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:54b-26: bdag la mi bstod gzhan la mi smod cing gzhan dag la phrag dog mi byed pa yin no zhes bya ba ni bdag la bstod cing gzhan la mi smod pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:55a-2: dregs par mi byed cing bag med par mi byed pa zhes 'byung ba ni /
T05TD4016.3E:55a-3: lnga pa bag med par mi byed pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:55a-4: le lo dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:55a-5: cung zad tsam dang ngan don tsam gyis chog par mi 'dzin pa zhes bya ba ni drug pa cho ga par mi 'dzin pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:55a-6: spyod pa rgya che ba rnams spyod cing yongs su skyo ba med pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:55a-7: chos de dag gis ser sna mi byed pa gzhan dag la phrag dog mi byed pa yin no zhes bya ba ni bdun pa phrag dog dang ser sna mi byed pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:55a-8: byang chub sems dpa' ni bdag nyid chos spyod pa'i phyir gzhan dag kyang spyod pa mthong na ser sna dang phrag dog gis zang zing dang chos la ser sna mi byed pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:55a-9: pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'i mtshan nyid so so tha dad par bstan pa yang rnam pa bdun yod do zhes bya ba ni 'di man chad gnyis pa so so tha dad pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:55a-12: zhus pa dang lan dag gis pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi mtshan nyid bdun bstan pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:55a-13: 'di ni dang po grangs mdor smos pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:55a-16: byang chub sems dpa' rnams pas rnam par dag pa'i mtshan nyid rnam pa bdun ji ltar bstan pa bzhin du yang dag par rjes su bsgrub cing spyod pa gang yin pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa zhus pa dang lan dag gis pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi mtshan nyid rnam pa bdun bstan to //
T05TD4016.3E:55a-17: 'di yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug bstan pa nyid kyis rnam pa drug tu dbye ste /
T05TD4016.3E:55a-18: 'di ni dang po sbyin pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:55a-20: byang chub sems dpa' rnam par dag pa'i mtshan nyid rnam pa bdun bskyed pa mdor bstan pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:55a-21: mtshan nyid rnam pa bdun rnam par phye ste bstan pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:55a-22: mtshan nyid bdun bshad pa'i mjug bsdu ba ste /
T05TD4016.3E:55a-23: 'di ni dang po sbyin pa'i mtshan nyid bdun bskyed pa mdor bstan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:55a-24: sbyin par bya ba'i dngos po rnam par dag pas sbyin pa rnam par dag pa spyod pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:55a-25: tshul khrims rnam par dag pas sbyin pa rnam par dag pa spyod pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:55a-26: lta ba rnam par dag pas sbyin pa rnam par dag pa spyod pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:55b-0: sems rnam par dag pas sbyin pa rnam par @55b dag pa spyod pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:55b-1: ngag rnam par dag pas sbyin pa rnam par dag pa spyod pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:55b-2: shes pa rnam par dag pas sbyin pa rnam par dag pa spyod pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:55b-3: dri ma rnam par dag pas sbyin pa rnam par dag pa spyod pa zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa sbyin pa'i rnam par dag pa'i mtshan nyid rnam pa bdun rnam par phye ste bstan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:55b-4: de la dngos po ma brtags pa la sogs pa ma yin pas sbyin par byed pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin par bya ba'i dngos po rnam par dag pa zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:55b-5: nyes pa rnams rab tu bsal te /
T05TD4016.3E:55b-6: sbyin pa gtong ba gang yin pa de ni tshul khrims rnam par dag pa zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:55b-7: bdag ni sbyin par byed pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:55b-8: sbyin par bya ba ni bdag gi'o zhes bya ba la sogs par mi 'dzin pa gang yin pa de ni /
T05TD4016.3E:55b-9: lta ba rnam par dag pa zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:55b-10: snying brtse ba'i sems la sogs pas sbyin pa gtong ba gang yin pa de ni sems rnam par dag pa zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:55b-11: mdog mdangs bzang zhing sngar gsong por smra ba la sogs pas sbyin pa gtong ba gang yin pa de ni ngag rnam par dag pa zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:55b-12: sbyin pa'i ming dang ngo bo nyid la sogs pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin la sogs pas sbyin pa gtong ba gang yin pa de ni shes pa rnam par dag pa zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:55b-16: gti mug la sogs pa'i dri ma yongs su spangs nas sbyin pa gtong ba gang yin pa de ni dri ma rnam par dag pa zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:55b-17: byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa gtong ba ni rnam par dag pa'i mtshan nyid bdun po 'di dag dang ldan na /
T05TD4016.3E:55b-18: gdod sbyin pa rnam par dag pa yongs su grub par gyur te /
T05TD4016.3E:55b-19: zhib tu ni bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:55b-20: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sdom pa bcas pa las zhes bya ba ni gsum pa mjug bsdu ba yin par rig par bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:55b-21: mtshan nyid bdun po 'di dag re re zhing yang mtshan nyid rnam pa bcu bcur dbye bar bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:55b-22: bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las ji skad du /
T05TD4016.3E:55b-23: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpas ji ltar sbyin pa sbyin par byed pa de la brten nas sbyin pa yongs su dag pa rnam pa bdun du rig par bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:55b-24: 'di ltar sbyin pa bya ba'i dngos po yongs su dag pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:55b-25: tshul khrims yongs su dag pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:55b-26: lta ba yongs su dag pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:56a-2: ngag yongs su dag pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:56a-3: shes pa yongs su dag pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:56a-4: dri ma yongs su dag pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:56a-5: yongs su dag pa de dag thams cad kyang rnam pa bcur rig par bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:56a-6: de la sbyin par bya ba'i dngos po yongs su dag pa rnam pa bcu gang zhe na /
T05TD4016.3E:56a-7: de rgya chen po sbyin par byed pa ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:56a-8: mang po sna tshogs bye brag gi phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:56a-9: mtshungs par sbyin pa ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:56a-10: mi mang mi nyung ba nyid kyi phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:56a-11: dus su sbyin pa ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:56a-12: de 'dod pa'i dus dang 'tsham pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:56a-13: gya nom par sbyin par byed pa ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:56a-14: kha dogs sogs pa phun sum tshogs pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:56a-15: yongs su gtsang ba sbyin par byed pa ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:56a-16: mi gtsang pa'i dngos po dag dang ma 'dres pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:56a-17: chos bzhin du sbyin par byed pa ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:56a-18: kha na ma tho ba med pa dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:56a-19: ci 'dod pa sbyin par byed pa ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:56a-20: slong bdag gi 'dod pa bzhin du gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:56a-21: phan po sbyin par byed pa ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:56a-22: de dang phrad par gyur pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:56a-23: gcig dang rim gyis sbyin par byed pa ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:56a-24: slong mo ba de la rtog pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:56a-25: rgyun chad pa med par sbyin par byed pa ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:56a-26: rgyun mi 'chad pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes 'byung ba lta bu ste /
T05TD4016.3E:56a-27: tshul khrims dang lta ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:56a-31: dri ma drug po re re la yang mtshan nyid rnam pa bcu bcur rnam par dbye ba yang zhib tu de nyid las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:56a-32: gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sdom pa bcas pa la bslab pa'i gzhi thams cad la mkhas pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:56a-33: ltung ba las bslang ba la mkhas pa zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa tshul khrims kyi mtshan nyid rnam pa bdun ston te /
T05TD4016.3E:56a-34: 'di yang rnam par bshad pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:56a-35: mjug bsdu bas bstan pa yang dang po mtshan nyid bdun bshad pa yang rnam pa gnyis su dbye ste /
T05TD4016.3E:56a-36: mtshan nyid rnam pa gnyis la mkhas par bstan pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:56a-37: mtshan nyid kyi rnam pa lnga la yang dag par slob par bstan pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:56a-39: dang po ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims kyi bslab pa'i gzhi thams cad la mkhas pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:56a-40: de'i phyir mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las /
T05TD4016.3E:56a-41: sdom pa sdom pa'i tshul khrims thams cad legs par bcas pa zhes gsungs pa yin no //
T05TD4016.3E:56b-0: @56b gnyis pa ni ltung ba las bslang ba la mkhas pa de ni nyes pa las 'byin cing bshags par bya ba'i chos yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:56b-1: de'i phyir mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las /
T05TD4016.3E:56b-2: ltung ba las bslang ba la mkhas pa zhes gsungs pa yin no //
T05TD4016.3E:56b-3: dgongs pa zab mo des par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni skyon gyi chos dang bral ba zhes 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:56b-4: rtag pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:56b-6: rtag tu 'byed pa'i tshul khrims can dang /
T05TD4016.3E:56b-7: rtag tu 'jug pa'i tshul khrims can bslab pa'i gzhi thams cad yang dag par blangs te slob par byed pa zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa mtshan nyid rnam pa lnga la yang dag par slob par byed pa zhes bya ba ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:56b-8: de la mtshan nyid lnga ni rtag pa'i tshul khrims can dang /
T05TD4016.3E:56b-9: brtan pa'i tshul khrims can dang /
T05TD4016.3E:56b-10: rtag tu 'byed pa'i tshul khrims can dang /
T05TD4016.3E:56b-11: rtag tu 'jug pa'i tshul khrims can dang /
T05TD4016.3E:56b-12: bslab pa'i gzhi yang dag par blangs te slob par byed pa dag yin no //
T05TD4016.3E:56b-13: mtshan nyid lnga po 'di dag ni rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las go rims bzhin du ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:56b-14: de'i phyir rnam par bshad pa bsdus pa las /
T05TD4016.3E:56b-15: de la ji ltar nges pa'i tshul khrims can yin zhe na /
T05TD4016.3E:56b-16: 'di lta ste bslab pa'i gzhi rnams mi dbul ba'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ba yin no //
T05TD4016.3E:56b-17: gzhan yang tshul khrims kyi le'u las /
T05TD4016.3E:56b-18: nges pa'i tshul khrims can ni ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du bslab pa 'bul bar mi byed pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:56b-21: 'jig rten na brtan pa'i tshul khrims can yin zhe na /
T05TD4016.3E:56b-22: bslab pa'i gzhi nyams par mi byed pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ngo ;
T05TD4016.3E:56b-23: / tshul khrims kyi le'u bstan pa ni /
T05TD4016.3E:56b-24: tshul khrims can ni rnyed pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:56b-28: nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams kyi sa zil gyis mi gnon pa'i phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:56b-29: 'phrog par mi nus pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:56b-30: rnam par bshad pa bsdus pa las ni ji ltar na rtag tu 'byed pa'i tshul khrims can yin zhe na /
T05TD4016.3E:56b-31: bslab pa'i tshul khrims 'dral bar mi byed pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:56b-32: ji ltar du 'jug pa'i tshul khrims can yin zhe na /
T05TD4016.3E:56b-33: ral na yang phyir gso bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:57a-0: ji ltar na bslab pa'i gzhi rnam pa drug yang dag par blangs te slob pa @57a * //
T05TD4016.3E:57a-2: bslab pa mtha' dag rjes su bsrung ba'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:57a-3: mtshan nyid 'di dag rgya cher bshad pa ni /
T05TD4016.3E:57a-4: bstan bcos rnam par bshad pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:57a-5: rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:57a-6: 'di ltar rtag pa'i tshul khrims dang ldan pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:57a-7: brtan pa'i tshul khrims can gnyis kyis ni bslab pa mi dbul zhing /
T05TD4016.3E:57a-8: ral bar mi byed pas gnyis su ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:57a-10: rtag tu 'jug pa'i tshul khrims rnam pa gnyis kyis ni /
T05TD4016.3E:57a-11: nan tan gyis 'dral bar mi byed cing /
T05TD4016.3E:57a-12: ral na yang bshags par byed pas gnyis su bstan to //
T05TD4016.3E:57a-13: bslab pa'i gzhi rnams yang dag par blangs te slob pa ni /
T05TD4016.3E:57a-14: bslab pa mtha' dag rjes su srung bar byed pas so //
T05TD4016.3E:57a-15: kha cig na re rnam pa bdun las dang po gnyis ni sdom pa'i tshul khrims so //
T05TD4016.3E:57a-16: de'i 'og ma gnyis ni dge ba ba sdud pa'i tshul khrims so //
T05TD4016.3E:57a-17: de'i 'og ma gnyis ni sems can la phan 'dogs pa'i tshul khrims so //
T05TD4016.3E:57a-18: tha ma gcig ni snga ma gsum spyir bsdus pa yin no zhe'o //
T05TD4016.3E:57a-19: de'i tshul khrims rnam par dag pa'i mtshan nyid bdun zhes bya'o zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa mjug bsdu ba yin par rig par bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:57a-20: byang chub sems dpa' gang gis bdag nyid kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu la shin tu mngon par yid ches pa la brten pas gnod pa thams cad nye bar gnas pa nang 'khrug pa mi bskyed pa zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gsum pa bzod pa'i mtshan nyid rnam pa bdun bstan to //
T05TD4016.3E:57a-22: rnam par bshad pa dang mjug bsdu ba'o //
T05TD4016.3E:57a-23: rnam par bshad pa yang mtshan nyid rnam pa bdun bstan pa nyid las bdun du phye ste /
T05TD4016.3E:57a-24: 'di ni mtshan nyid dang po bstan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:57a-25: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams rgyu dang 'bras bu la shin tu mngon par yid ches pas bdag nyid kyi las kyis mi mthun pa'i yul mngon du gyur pa na 'khrug pa skyed par mi byed de de la las mngon par yid ches pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i rgyu'o /
T05TD4016.3E:57a-26: gnod pa'i dngos po gang yin pa de ni bzod par bya ba'i yul lo //
T05TD4016.3E:57a-27: 'khrug pa mi skyed pa gang yin pa de ni bzod pa'i ngo bo nyid de /
T05TD4016.3E:57a-28: rgyu dang rkyen 'di gsum gyi mtshan nyid dang po bstan to //
T05TD4016.3E:57b-0: gzhan yang bstan bcos @57b rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:57b-1: 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni gzhan gnod pa byed pa las byung ba'i sdug bsngal mi bzad pa rgyun mi 'chad pa sna tshogs yun ring ba mngon du byed pa la 'di ltar yang dag par slob ste /
T05TD4016.3E:57b-2: 'di ni rang gi las kyi le lan yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:57b-3: des na bdag rang gis byas pa'i mi dge ba'i las kyi sdug bsngal gyi 'bras bu nyams su myong la /
T05TD4016.3E:57b-4: bdag ni sdug bsngal mi 'dod de /
T05TD4016.3E:57b-5: mi bzod pa de phyi ma la yang sdug bsngal gyi rgyu'i gnas su 'gyur la /
T05TD4016.3E:57b-6: bdag gi sdug bsngal gyi rgyur gyur ba'i chos de yang dag par blangs te /
T05TD4016.3E:57b-7: 'dug na ni bdag nyid mi sdug pa gang yin pa de la bdag nyid kyis bdag nyid sbyor bar byed par nges so zhes bya ba la sogs ba rgya cher de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no //
T05TD4016.3E:57b-8: lan bya ba'i phyir slar yang spyo pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:57b-12: mtshang 'bru ba'i gnod pa sna tshogs sbyor bar mi byed pa zhes bya bas ni mtshan nyid gnyis pa bstan to //
T05TD4016.3E:57b-13: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams stong pa nyid rnam pa gnyis rab tu rtogs par spyod ba mi dmigs pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:57b-14: gzhan yang bzod pa myur du 'grub pa'i phyir /
T05TD4016.3E:57b-15: lan mi bzod par byed de /
T05TD4016.3E:57b-16: gal te lan bya bar gyur na /
T05TD4016.3E:57b-17: phan yon chen po las rab tu nyams par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:57b-18: gzhan yang bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las /
T05TD4016.3E:57b-19: 'di la gshe bar byed pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:57b-25: brdeg par bya ba 'ga' yang med do //
T05TD4016.3E:57b-26: 'di dag ni yi ge dag gis brjod par bya ba kho nar zad pas /
T05TD4016.3E:57b-27: de dag gi sgra tsam dang skad tsam du zad pa'i phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:57b-28: gzhan yang bdag gang la gnas pa'i lus 'di la 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:57b-30: lag pa dang bong ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:57b-32: mtshon cha'i reg pa'i reg pa de lta bu dag 'ong bar 'gyur ba'i lus 'di ni gzugs can rags pa /
T05TD4016.3E:57b-33: 'byung ba chen po bzhi las gyur ba de lta bu yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:57b-34: bdag gi lus 'di yang mi rtag pa yin pa la reg pa de dang de dag dang /
T05TD4016.3E:57b-35: gnod par byed pa de dag kyang mi rtag pa yin pa'i phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:57b-36: gzhan yang sems can thams cad ni /
T05TD4016.3E:58a-1: de dag ni rang bzhin gyis sdug bsngal ba yin pas /
T05TD4016.3E:58a-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis yun ring po 'das pa nas /
T05TD4016.3E:58a-3: gang dag khyed kyi pha ma dang /
T05TD4016.3E:58a-9: bla ma lta bur gyur ba'i sems can de lta bu ni 'ga' yang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo zhes gsungs pa'i phyir te /
T05TD4016.3E:58a-10: de'i phyir rnam grangs des kyang mdza' bshes kyi phyogs nyid kyang dgra bo'i phyogs yin la dgra bo'i phyogs nyid kyang mdza' bshes kyi phyogs yin pas 'di la mdza' bshes dang /
T05TD4016.3E:58a-11: dgra bo'i dngos po 'ga' yang yongs su grub pa med de /
T05TD4016.3E:58a-12: mdza' bshes la la dgra bor 'gyur la /
T05TD4016.3E:58a-13: dgra bo yang mdza' bshes su 'gyur bas /
T05TD4016.3E:58a-14: de'i phyir bdag gis sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa nyid dang /
T05TD4016.3E:58a-15: lta ba mnyam pa nyid dang /
T05TD4016.3E:58a-18: bde ba nye bar sgrub pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:58a-19: bde ba nye bar sgrub par smos pa nyid du bya'o snyam du sems pa ste zhes 'byung ste /
T05TD4016.3E:58a-20: de lta bu'i bsam gtan gyi bzod pa sgom par byed do //
T05TD4016.3E:58a-21: khon gyi bsam pa mi mdzad pa zhes bya bas ni mtshan nyid gsum bstan pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:58a-22: bzod pa'i phan yon khong du chud par gyur na 'dod pa gdon mi za bar khon du 'dzin pa med de /
T05TD4016.3E:58a-23: de'i phyir bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las gzhan dag gis gnod pa byas pa na phyir gnod pa yang mi byed pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:58a-24: yid 'khrugs par yang mi 'gyur ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:58a-25: dgrar bsam par yang mi 'dzin la /
T05TD4016.3E:58a-26: sngar ji lta ba bzhin du phyis kyang phan 'dogs pa'i phyir brtson par byed ces bstan pa yin no //
T05TD4016.3E:58a-27: shad kyis chags pa na yongs su nyon mongs par mi byed pa zhes bya ba ni mtshan nyid bzhi pa bstan pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:58a-28: dgra bo dag gis shad kyis 'chags su 'ong ba'i tshe bshags pa dang du len cing nyon mongs pa skyed par mi byed pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:58a-29: de'i phyir bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las /
T05TD4016.3E:58a-30: pha rol yongs su ngal bar byas pa'i 'og tu chags pa mi len gyi /
T05TD4016.3E:58a-31: de yongs su skyo zhing ngal bar 'gyur bar dogs nas 'ongs ma thag tu 'chags pa len par byed do zhes bshad do //
T05TD4016.3E:58b-0: dgongs @58b pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni /
T05TD4016.3E:58b-1: gal te bshags par gsol ba 'debs na dus bzhin du len par byed pas gzhan la gnod pa mi skyed pa zhes 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:58b-2: shad kyis 'chags pa sdod pa zhes bya bas ni mtshan nyid lnga pa bstan te /
T05TD4016.3E:58b-3: byang chub sems dpa' ni dgra bos byang chub sems dpa' nyid la gnod pa byed du dogs pas /
T05TD4016.3E:58b-4: byang chub sems dpa' nyid myur du dgra bo de nyid du 'gro zhing bshags par byed gyi /
T05TD4016.3E:58b-5: pha rol 'ongs pa la bsdad nas bshags pa ni ma yin no //
T05TD4016.3E:58b-6: bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las kyang /
T05TD4016.3E:58b-7: khon yod pa dag la bdag nyid 'gro zhing bshags par byed do zhes bshad do //
T05TD4016.3E:58b-8: mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni /
T05TD4016.3E:58b-9: gal te gzhan gyis gnod par byas na yang mi brjed par 'chags par byed pa zhes 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:58b-10: 'jigs pa dang zang zing gi sems kyis bzod par byed pa ma yin pa zhes bya bas ni mtshan nyid drug pa bstan te /
T05TD4016.3E:58b-11: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni 'jigs pa'i phyir bzod par byed pa ma yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:58b-12: dper na rgyal po la sogs pa la 'jigs pa lta bu ni ma yin pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:58b-13: zang zing gi sems kyis yongs su tshol bar byed pa yang ma yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:58b-14: zas dang skom la sogs pa tshol ba'i phyir ma yin gyi /
T05TD4016.3E:58b-15: gzhan dogs pa'i phyir bzod pa bsgom pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:58b-16: mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni 'jig rten med pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:58b-17: tshol ba med pas bzod par byed pa zhes 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:58b-18: dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni /
T05TD4016.3E:58b-20: zas dang skom gyi phyir dang bzod par byed pa ma yin pa zhes 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:58b-21: phan gdags par bya ba la yal bar mi dor ba zhes bya ba ni mtshan nyid bdun bstan te /
T05TD4016.3E:58b-22: byang chub sems dpa' ni rtag par sems can la phan 'dogs par byed kyi /
T05TD4016.3E:58b-23: lan cig sems can la phan btags pas chog go zhes yal bar dor nas bya ba gzhan mi byed pas phan 'dogs pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:58b-24: bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las kyang /
T05TD4016.3E:58b-25: lan cig tsam phan btags nas yal bar bor te /
T05TD4016.3E:58b-26: phan 'dogs pa ma yin no zhes 'chad do //
T05TD4016.3E:58b-27: mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni /
T05TD4016.3E:59a-0: rtag par phan btags pa'i sems @59a * //
T05TD4016.3E:59a-1: kyis yal bar mi dor bar zhes 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:59a-2: de ni bzod pa rnam par dag pa'i mtshan nyid bdun pa zhes bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
T05TD4016.3E:59a-3: gnyis pa bzod pa'i mtshan nyid rnam pa bdun bshad pa'i mjug bsdu ba'o //
T05TD4016.3E:59a-4: byang chub sems dpa' gang gis brtson 'grus mnyam pa nyid rang tu shes pa zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bzhi pa brtson 'grus kyi mtshan nyid rnam pa bdun bstan to //
T05TD4016.3E:59a-8: rnam par bshad pa yang mtshan nyid rnam pa bdun bstan pa nyid kyis rnam pa bdun du dbye ste /
T05TD4016.3E:59a-9: 'di ni dang po brtson 'grus mnyam pa nyid bstan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:59a-10: de la dam lhod ran par gyur ba'i phyir mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba ste /
T05TD4016.3E:59a-11: de'i phyir bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las /
T05TD4016.3E:59a-12: yang byang chub sems dpa' ha cang mi zhum pa /
T05TD4016.3E:59a-13: ha cang brtun mi ngas pas brtson 'grus rtsom ste /
T05TD4016.3E:59a-14: sbyor ba snyoms par byed cing /
T05TD4016.3E:59a-15: brtson 'grus bya ba thams cad snyoms par gus par byed pa ni 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i snyoms pa'i brtson 'grus zhes bstan pa yin no //
T05TD4016.3E:59a-16: 'dul ba dum bu lnga pa las kyang /
T05TD4016.3E:59a-17: rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las bstan pa dang mthun par 'byung ste /
T05TD4016.3E:59a-19: de'i tshe nyan thos rna ba bye ba nyi shu pas bcom ldan 'das la bdag rab tu dbyung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs par byed par ci gnang zhes gsol ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:59a-20: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang rab tu phyung zhing bsnyen par rdzogs par gnang ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:59a-21: des ring por ma lon par sgo khang dang tshal dang /
T05TD4016.3E:59a-22: 'chag sa dag tu brtson 'grus spyod pas rkang ba las khrag 'dzag pas nyan thos rnab bye ba nyi shu pa 'di snyam du sems te /
T05TD4016.3E:59a-23: bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos kyi nang na brtson 'grus ni bdag las lhag pa med na yang /
T05TD4016.3E:59a-24: da dung sdug bsngal rnams kyi rtsa ba zad par ma gyur to //
T05TD4016.3E:59a-25: bdag gi khyim na nor dang rin po che mang du yod pas slar khyim par babs te /
T05TD4016.3E:59a-26: bsod nams yid la ma gcags par byas kyang ci ma rung snyam du sems pa bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs su chud par gyur nas de'i thad du gshegs te /
T05TD4016.3E:59b-0: nyan thos rna ba bye ba nyi shu pa la khyod 'di lta bu'i sems bskyed pa bden nam zhes bkas @59b smras pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:59b-1: des med do zhes gsol to //
T05TD4016.3E:59b-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba /
T05TD4016.3E:59b-3: ngas khyod la dri ba dris /
T05TD4016.3E:59b-4: khyod kyis kyang ngas dri ba dris pa'i rjes su lan thob cig /
T05TD4016.3E:59b-5: khyod sngon khyim na gnas pa'i tshe pi wang la mkhas sam /
T05TD4016.3E:59b-9: pi wang gi rgyud thang chad pa'i tshe sgra ran cing snyan par 'gyur ram /
T05TD4016.3E:59b-13: pi wang gi rgyud lhod pa'i tshe sgra snyan cing ran par 'gyur ram /
T05TD4016.3E:59b-16: 'o na ji ltar byas na snyan par 'gyur /
T05TD4016.3E:59b-18: ha cang dam pa yang ma lags /
T05TD4016.3E:59b-19: ha cang lhod par yang ma gyur na /
T05TD4016.3E:59b-21: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T05TD4016.3E:59b-22: nga'i chos la yang de bzhin te /
T05TD4016.3E:59b-24: ha cang brtun pas lam thob par mi 'gyur gyi /
T05TD4016.3E:59b-25: brtson 'grus ran pa la gnas na gdod sdug bsngal zad par 'gyur ro //
T05TD4016.3E:59b-26: nyan thos rna ba bye ba nyi shu pas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T05TD4016.3E:59b-27: thos nas 'chags de nyid du zag pa rnams ma lus par 'byang bar gyur to zhes gsungs pa yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:59b-28: zhib tu de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no //
T05TD4016.3E:59b-31: 'dul ba dum bu bzhi pa las kyang phal cher de skad du ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:59b-32: brtson 'grus brtsams pa nyid kyis bdag la mi bstod cing gzhan la mi smod pa zhes bya bas ni gnyis pa nga rgyal dang bral ba'i brtson 'grus bstan te /
T05TD4016.3E:59b-33: byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus ni gzhan la phan 'dogs pa sngon du 'gro bas gzhan dag la phyir nga rgyal skyed par lta ga la byed ces bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T05TD4016.3E:59b-34: bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las kyang /
T05TD4016.3E:59b-35: brtson 'grus brtsams pa'i nga rgyal dang bral ba'i phyir /
T05TD4016.3E:59b-36: nga rgyal dang bral ba'i brtson 'grus zhes bya'o zhes 'byung ngo ;
T05TD4016.3E:59b-38: brtson 'grus chen po dang ldan pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:59b-39: spro ba dang ldan pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:59b-41: dge ba'i chos rnams la brtson pa mi gtong ba zhes bya ba 'di ni brtson 'grus phyi ma lnga po mthu dang ldan pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:59b-42: brtson 'grus chen po dang ldan pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:60a-3: dge ba'i chos rnams brtson pa mi gtong ba bstan pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:60a-4: tshig lnga po 'di yang bstan pa rnams las so so nas bshad pa mi mthun pas /
T05TD4016.3E:60a-5: bstan bcos rnam par bshad pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:60a-6: rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las ni /
T05TD4016.3E:60a-7: mdo'i tshig lnga po 'di ming smos par zad kyi rnam par bshad pa ni med do //
T05TD4016.3E:60a-8: bstan bcos chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las ni /
T05TD4016.3E:60a-9: don gyis rnam pa lnga'i ming rnam par gzhag par zad kyi rnam par bshad pa ni med do //
T05TD4016.3E:60a-10: bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:60a-11: chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:60a-12: rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las kyang /
T05TD4016.3E:60a-13: don gyis rnam pa lnga'i ming bzhag nas mdo'i chig dang sbyar bar zad kyi /
T05TD4016.3E:60a-14: rnam par phye ste bshad pa ni med do //
T05TD4016.3E:60a-15: bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa mdo sde'i gzhi bsdu ba'i skabs ni don gyis rnam pa lnga'i ming bzhag nas rnam par bshad pa ni yod kyi /
T05TD4016.3E:60a-16: mdo'i tshig dang sbyar ba ni med do //
T05TD4016.3E:60a-17: theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon dbyig gnyen dang /
T05TD4016.3E:60a-18: ngo bo nyid med kyis mdzad pa las ni /
T05TD4016.3E:60a-19: don gyis rnam pa lnga'i ming yang bzhag nas mdo'i tshig dang sbyar te bshad pa yang yod de ;
T05TD4016.3E:60a-20: de'i phyir 'dir re zhig bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:60a-21: ngo bo nyid kyi 'grel pa dang rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa mdo sde'i gzhi bsdu ba las bshad pa dang sbyar nas mdo 'di bshad par bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:60a-22: de'i phyir bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:60a-27: chog bar mi 'dzin pa zhes bya ba ni mdo las mthu dang ldan pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:60a-29: spro ba dang ldan pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:60a-31: dge ba la brtson pa mi gtong ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:60a-32: go rims bzhin du sbyar bar rig par bya'o zhes 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:60a-33: slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis 'grel pa las /
T05TD4016.3E:60a-34: go cha'i brtson 'grus ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:60a-35: thog ma kho nar bdag gis 'di 'ang bya'o zhes brtson pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:60a-36: 'di ni mthu dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i tshig bstan to //
T05TD4016.3E:60a-37: sbyor ba'i brtson 'grus ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:60b-0: sbyor ba ni bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du nan @60b tan gyis sbyor bar byed pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:60b-1: 'di ni mdo las brtson 'grus dang ldan pa'i zhes bya ba'i tshig gis bstan to //
T05TD4016.3E:60b-2: bdag nyid ngal zhing sdug bsngal ba las sems ldog cing ma nyams par byed pa ni zhum pa med pa zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:60b-3: gzhan gyi gnod pa byas pa rnams kyis sems mi g-yos pa ni mi 'khrugs pa zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:60b-4: byang chub la thug gi bar du dge ba'i phyogs la brtson zhing bar ma dor yongs su mi gtong ba ni chog par mi 'dzin pa zhes bya'o zhes 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:60b-5: bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las /
T05TD4016.3E:60b-6: brtson 'grus brtsams pa de yang rnam pa lngar rig par bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:60b-10: zhum pa med pa'i brtson 'grus dang /
T05TD4016.3E:60b-12: chog mi shes pa'i brtson 'grus dang /
T05TD4016.3E:60b-13: de la thog ma kho nar ni 'dun pa drag po bskyed do //
T05TD4016.3E:60b-14: de'i 'og tu ni ji ltar mos pa bzhin du /
T05TD4016.3E:60b-15: mngon par spro ba brtan po'i sbyor bar byed do //
T05TD4016.3E:60b-16: de'i 'og tu ni chos rgya chen po rnams rgya chen po thob par bya ba'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:60b-17: bdag nyid la yang khyad du mi gsod de /
T05TD4016.3E:60b-19: de'i 'og tu ni grang ba la sogs pa'i gnod pa rnams kyang bzod do //
T05TD4016.3E:60b-20: ngan ngon gyis chog par mi 'dzin pas yon tan gong ma bas kyang ches gong ma gya nom pa 'dod pa'i tshul gyis gnas so zhes 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:60b-21: de ni brtson 'grus rnam par dag pa'i mtshan nyid rnam pa bdun zhes bya'o zhes pa ni gnyis pa'i mtshan nyid rnam pa bdun bshad pa'i mjug bsdu ba'o /
T05TD4016.3E:60b-23: // / bam po drug cu gnyis pa /
T05TD4016.3E:60b-24: byang chub sems dpa' gang gis mtshan ma legs par rtogs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin la bsam gtan dang /
T05TD4016.3E:60b-25: yongs su rdzogs pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin la bsam gtan dang /
T05TD4016.3E:60b-26: gnyi ga'i cha dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin la bsam gtan pa zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni lnga pa bsam gtan gyi mtshan nyid rnam pa bdun ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:60b-27: 'di yang rnam pa gnyis po rnam par bshad pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:60b-29: 'di ni bsam gtan dang po gsum bstan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:61a-0: kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i mtshan nyid legs par rtogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa de ni mtshan ma legs par @61a * //
T05TD4016.3E:61a-2: yongs su rdzogs pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi yul la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa de ni yul las yul mi thob pa yin pas yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:61a-4: don dam pa'i yul gnyi ga la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa de ni gnyi ga'i cha zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:61a-5: shugs kyis 'jug pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin la bsam gtan pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:61a-6: mi gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin la bsam gtan pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:61a-7: shin tu sbyangs pa byas pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin la bsam gtan pa dang zhes bya bas ni mtshan nyid bzhi pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:61a-10: go rims bzhin du sbyor ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:61a-11: yang dag pa'i ye shes dang /
T05TD4016.3E:61a-12: rjes la thob pa'i ye shes gsum dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang sbyar bar bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:61a-13: de la sbyor ba'i shes pa de ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i yid la byed pa shugs kyis 'jug pa'i gnas su gyur ba'i ting nge 'dzin kho na yin pas shugs kyis 'jug pa zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:61a-14: rtsa ba'i ye shes de ni tha dad pa'i spyod yul gyi gnas su med par brten pa'i ting nge 'dzin yin pas mi gnas pa zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:61a-15: rjes la thob pa'i ye shes ni spyod pa rnam pa sna tshogs 'grub pa'i rten du gyur ba'i ting nge 'dzin pas shin tu sbyang ba byas pa zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:61a-16: byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod thos pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:61a-18: yongs su bsgom pa dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin la bsam gtan pa gang yin pa dang zhes bya bas ni mtshan nyid bdun bstan pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:61a-19: 'dis ni sbyor ba'i dus kyi shes rab bstan to//
T05TD4016.3E:61a-20: de la byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod ces bya ba ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:61a-21: theg pa chen po'i gsung rab yin pas gsung rab 'di thos par nus pa'i ting nge 'dzin la don gyis thos pa'i shes rab ces bstan te /
T05TD4016.3E:61a-22: ting nge 'dzin gyi gnas skabs su yang gsung rab thos par 'gyur bas so //
T05TD4016.3E:61a-23: dmigs pa'i zhes bya ba ni ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa la don gyis bsam pa'i shes rab ces bstan to //
T05TD4016.3E:61a-24: yongs su bsgom pa'i dpag tu med pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya ba ni bsgom pa'i shes rab yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:61b-0: ting nge 'dzin gyi gnas skabs su yang ting nge 'dzin dpag tu med pa rnam pa sna tshogs bsgom par nus @61b pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:61b-1: bshad pa'i rnam pa bzhin du ni shes rab dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
T05TD4016.3E:61b-2: shes rab dbang du gyur ba'i phyir chos kyi mtshan ma rab tu rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni chos kyi mtshan ma legs par rtogs pa zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:61b-3: nang gi so so yang dag par rig pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin shes rab dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa de ni shugs kyis 'jug pa dang ldan pa zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:61b-4: rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa de ni mi gnas pa zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:61b-5: rjes la thob pa'i ye shes dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang yin pa de ni shin tu sbyangs pa zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:61b-6: byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod la sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin bstan pa 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:61b-7: theg pa chen po'i byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi bstan pa thos pa'i shes rab kyis dmigs pa byas nas dpag tu med pa'i bsam gtan rnams bsgom pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:61b-8: brgyud de bshad pa dag las dang po gcig ni ting nge 'dzin gyi cha lhan cig ma snyoms pa'i bsam gtan pa rgyu mtshan gyi rnam pa la rtog pa yin pas mtshan ma legs par rtogs pa zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:61b-9: gnyis pa ni shes rab kyi cha lhag cing ma snyoms pa'i bsam gtan pa lta ba'i rnam pa la rtog cing rang gi ngo bo nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin pas yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:61b-11: shes rab cha mnyam pa'i bsam gtan pa gang yin pa de ni gnyi ga'i cha zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:61b-12: tshul bzhin yid la byed pa'i shes pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:61b-13: mtshungs par ldan pa mthong ba'i lam gyi bsam gtan pa gang yin pa de ni mi gnas pa zhes bya'o /
T05TD4016.3E:61b-14: tshul bzhin yid la byed pa'i shes pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:61b-15: mtshungs par ldan pa'i bsgom pa'i lam gyi bsam gtan pa gang yin pa de ni shin tu sbyangs pa zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:61b-16: byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod las bstan pa'i sbyor ba'i bsam gtan thob pa gang yin pa de ni thos pa'i shes rab po //
T05TD4016.3E:61b-17: dmigs par byed pa gang yin pa de ni bsam pa'i shes rab bo //
T05TD4016.3E:61b-18: bsgom pa gang yin pa de ni bsgom pa'i shes rab yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:62a-0: shes rab gsum po 'di dag la brten nas @62a * //
T05TD4016.3E:62a-1: ting nge 'dzin dpag tu med pa rgya cher bsgom pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:62a-2: de la ting nge 'dzin dang bsam gtan dang zhes gsungs pa yang /
T05TD4016.3E:62a-3: ting nge 'dzin ting nge 'dzin gyi ngo bo yin la /
T05TD4016.3E:62a-4: bsam gtan ni ting nge 'dzin gyi rtsal yin pas so //
T05TD4016.3E:62a-5: de ni bsam gtan rnam par dag pa'i mtshan nyid rnam pa bdun zhes bya'o zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa mjug bsdu ba yin par rig par bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:62a-6: byang chub sems dpa' gang gis sgro 'dogs pa dad /
T05TD4016.3E:62a-7: skur ba 'debs pa'i mtha' rnam par spangs te /
T05TD4016.3E:62a-8: dbu ma'i lam gyis nges par 'byung ba ni shes rab ces bya'o zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni drug pa shes rab kyi mtshan nyid rnam pa bdun ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:62a-9: 'di yang rnam par bshad pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:62a-11: rnam par bshad pa yang mtshan nyid rnam pa bdun bstan pa gnyis kyis rnam pa bdun du dbye ba 'di ni mtshan nyid dang po bstan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:62a-13: skur ba 'debs pa'i mtha' rnam par spangs te /
T05TD4016.3E:62a-14: dbu ma'i lam gyis nges par 'byung ba zhes bya ba ni theg pa chen bo bsdus pa'i 'grel ba slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis byas pa las /
T05TD4016.3E:62a-15: med pa dang rgyu med pa la nan tan gyis yod pa nyid du rnam par 'jog pa'i phyir sgro 'dogs pa zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:62a-16: yod pa dang med pa'i rgyu la nan tan gyis med do zhes skur ba'i phyir skur ba 'debs pa zhes bya ba ste /
T05TD4016.3E:62a-17: de ltar sgro 'dogs ma dang skur ba 'debs pa de dag ni gnyi ga yang mtha' zhes bshad do //
T05TD4016.3E:62a-18: de la mtha' ni ltung bar byed pa'i don yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:62a-19: 'di gnyis 'byung bar gyur ba dbu ma'i lam las nyams par gyur bas so //
T05TD4016.3E:62a-20: kun du brtags pa ni sgro 'dogs pa kho na yod kyi /
T05TD4016.3E:62a-22: ci yang med pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:62a-23: de ltar yod pa la ltos nas gdod skur pa 'byung bas so //
T05TD4016.3E:62a-24: gzhan gyi dbang la ni sgro 'dogs par mi byed de /
T05TD4016.3E:62a-25: bdag nyid yod pa'i phyir ro /
T05TD4016.3E:62a-26: 'di ltar yod pa ma yin pa las /
T05TD4016.3E:62a-29: yang dag pa ma yin par rnam par rtog pa tsam du yod pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:62a-30: yongs su grub pa ni sgro 'dogs par mi byed de /
T05TD4016.3E:62a-31: yang dag pa nyid du yod pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:62a-32: skur ba kho na yod do zhes bshad de /
T05TD4016.3E:62b-0: @62b zhib tu de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no //
T05TD4016.3E:62b-1: gzhan yang bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa las /
T05TD4016.3E:62b-2: bdag dang chos ni yod pa ma yin la stong ba nyid kyi rnam par rig pa ni med pa ma yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:62b-3: yod pa dang med pa dang bral ba'i phyir dbu ma'i lam dang mthun pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:62b-4: 'di la bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa gnyis gsungs pa ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:62b-5: yang dag ma yin kun rtog yod //
T05TD4016.3E:62b-6: de la gnyis po yod ma yin //
T05TD4016.3E:62b-7: stong ba nyid ni 'di la yod //
T05TD4016.3E:62b-8: 'di la yang ni de yod do //
T05TD4016.3E:62b-9: stong pa ma yin mi stong min //
T05TD4016.3E:62b-10: de lta bas na thams cad bshad //
T05TD4016.3E:62b-11: yod pas med pas yod pas na //
T05TD4016.3E:62b-12: 'di ni dbu ma'i lam yin no //
T05TD4016.3E:62b-13: zhes gsungs pa yin no zhes 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:62b-14: dbu ma'i lam rgya cher bstan pa ni /
T05TD4016.3E:62b-15: dbu ma'i lam gyi mtshan nyid bstan pa dag las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:62b-16: shes rab des rnam par thar ba'i sgo 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:62b-17: stong ba nyid dang mtshan ma med pa'i sgo rnam par thar ba'i sgo gsum po dag yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa zhes bya bas ni mtshan nyid gnyis pa rnam par thar ba'i sgo gsum gyi shes rab bstan to //
T05TD4016.3E:62b-18: rnam par thar ba'i sgo gsum gyi don ni bstan bcos rnam par bshad pa las ji skad bstan pa bzhin te /
T05TD4016.3E:62b-19: de'i phyir de nyid las rnam par thar ba'i sgo ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:62b-20: rnam par thar pa gsum pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:62b-21: stong pa nyid rnam par thar pa'i sgo dang /
T05TD4016.3E:62b-22: mtshan ma med pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo dang /
T05TD4016.3E:62b-23: smon pa med pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo gang yin pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:62b-24: de la stong pa nyid ni rnam pa gnyis te /
T05TD4016.3E:62b-27: sems can rnams kyi kun brtags pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis brtags pa'i chos dag la kun brtags pa'i ngo bo nyid gnyis po de dag ngo bo nyid med pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:62b-28: de las gzhan pa bdag med pa nyid yod pa gnyis ka dang bral ba gang yin pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:62b-29: de la chos rnams la kun brtags pa'i ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa de ni bdag med pa nyid yod pa yin la /
T05TD4016.3E:62b-30: chos rnams la bdag med pa nyid yod pa gang yin pa de ni kun brtags pa'i ngo bo nyid yin no //
T05TD4016.3E:62b-31: de yod pa dang yod pa ma yin pa gnyis su med pa'i ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de ni /
T05TD4016.3E:63a-0: rnam par mi rtog pa'i spyod yul lo zhes bya ba @63a * //
T05TD4016.3E:63a-2: yul de la dmigs shing yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa gang yin pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:63a-3: mtshan ma med pa rnam pa gnyis te /
T05TD4016.3E:63a-5: de la shes bya ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:63a-6: yongs su shes par bya ba stong ba nyid kyi yul te /
T05TD4016.3E:63a-7: des yul gyi mtshan ma la mi 'jug pa gang yin pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:63a-9: sngar bstan pa lta bu med pa gang yin pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:63a-10: smon pa med pa yang rnam pa gnyis te /
T05TD4016.3E:63a-12: de la shes bya ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:63a-13: shes pa med pa'i phyir phyin ci log gi 'du byed rnams kyi mtshan ma bskyed pa gang yin pa'o /
T05TD4016.3E:63a-15: yul la dmigs shing yongs su skyo ba'i khong du chud pa gang yin pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:63a-16: de la stong pa nyid du bsgom pa ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:63a-17: 'du byed rnams la bdag mi dmigs pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:63a-18: mtshan ma rnams la kun rdzob kyi rnam par rtog pa'i chos mi dmigs pa gang yin pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:63a-19: mtshan ma med par bsgom pa ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:63a-20: 'du byed rnams la sems can dang /
T05TD4016.3E:63a-21: bdag med pa nyid dmigs pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:63a-22: mtshan ma rnams la kun rdzob kyi rnam par rtog pa'i chos dang bdag med pa nyid dmigs shing 'gog pa la 'gog pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:63a-23: zhi ba dang gya nom pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:63a-24: nges par 'byung ba nyid du bsgom pa gang yin pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:63a-25: smon pa med pa bsgom pa ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:63a-31: zug rngu lta bur bsgom pa gang yin pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:63a-35: rkyen du bsgom pa la dmigs pa'i shes pa gang gis stong ba nyid kyi lam la lam dang /
T05TD4016.3E:63a-38: nges par 'byin pa nyid du bsgom pa 'di yang stong ba nyid du bsgom pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:63a-39: dmigs pa'i shes pa gang gis mtshan ma med pa'i lam la lam dang /
T05TD4016.3E:63a-42: nges par 'byin pa nyid du bsgom pa 'di yang mtshan ma med par bsgom pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:63a-43: dmigs pa'i shes pa gang gis smon pa med pa'i lam la lam dang /
T05TD4016.3E:63b-0: nges par 'byin pa nyid du bsgom pa 'di yang smon pa @63b med par bsgom pa yin no //
T05TD4016.3E:63b-1: gal te bye brag med par kun la yang stong ba nyid dang /
T05TD4016.3E:63b-3: smon pa med pa zhes brjod na ni //
T05TD4016.3E:63b-6: bsgom pa las byung ba'i shes rab 'jig rten pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:63b-7: 'jig rten las 'das pa yin par rig par bya'o ;
T05TD4016.3E:63b-8: / gal te stong ba dang mtshan ma med pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:63b-9: smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces brjod na ni bsgom pa las byung ba kho na'i shes rab 'jig rten pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:63b-10: 'jig rten las 'das par gtogs par rig par bya'o /
T05TD4016.3E:63b-13: smon pa med pa rnam par thar ba'i sgo zhes brjod na /
T05TD4016.3E:63b-14: de ni 'jig rten pa las 'das pa kho na yin par rig par bya'o zhes 'byung ste /
T05TD4016.3E:63b-15: rgya cher rnam par 'byed pa ni /
T05TD4016.3E:63b-16: mtshan nyid bstan pa dag las 'byung ba bzhin du rig par bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:63b-17: ngo bo nyid dang bsam pa'i don ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:63b-20: yongs su grub pa'i ngo bo nyid dang /
T05TD4016.3E:63b-21: gsum po dag yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes par zhes bya bas ni mtshan nyid gsum bstan te /
T05TD4016.3E:63b-22: 'di ltar mtha' gnyis su lta ba'i shes rab dang bral ba'i phyir ngo bo nyid gsum gyi don yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes so //
T05TD4016.3E:63b-23: ngo bo nyid rnam pa gsum gyi don ni sngar gong du ngo bo nyid rnam pa gsum bstan pa'i skabs su bshad pa bzhin no //
T05TD4016.3E:63b-24: ngo bo nyid med pa'i don ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:63b-27: don dam pa'i ngo bo nyid med pa gsum po dag yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa zhes bya ba ni mtshan nyid bzhi pa bstan te /
T05TD4016.3E:63b-28: ngo bo nyid med pa'i don rnam pa gsum yang sngar bstan pa bzhin no //
T05TD4016.3E:63b-29: kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i don ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:63b-30: rig pa'i gnas lnga bo dag la ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa zhes bya bas ni mtshan nyid lnga ba bstan te /
T05TD4016.3E:63b-31: 'di ltar rig pa'i gnas lnga dag khong du chud pa'i shes pa la kun rdzob kyi shes pa zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:63b-32: bstan bcos shin tu rgyas pa brgya pa las /
T05TD4016.3E:63b-33: de la kun rdzob gyi [*kyi] bden pa ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:64a-0: btags pa tsam du grub pa sgyu ma rnams kyi dngos po ltar rnam par rtog pa las @64a * //
T05TD4016.3E:64a-1: byung ba rmi lam lta bur mtshan ma las tshig tu brjod du yod pa gang yin pa de ni kun rdzob kyi bden pa zhes bya'o zhes 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:64a-2: gzhan yang bstan bcos rnam par bshad pa las kun rdzob kyi bden pa ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:64a-3: ming dang tshig dang yi ge'i tshogs dang /
T05TD4016.3E:64a-4: de dag gi don la brten pa'i brjod pa thams cad dang /
T05TD4016.3E:64a-5: brjod pa la brten nas khong du chud pa'i don dang /
T05TD4016.3E:64a-6: gzhan yang sngar 'jig rten pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos dang /
T05TD4016.3E:64a-7: de la brten pa'i don thob pa'o zhes bshad do //
T05TD4016.3E:64a-8: gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las /
T05TD4016.3E:64a-9: 'di ltar ji tsam du tshig gi lam gyis brjod par bya ba thams cad ni kun rdzob kyi bden pa zhes bshad do //
T05TD4016.3E:64a-10: de la rig pa'i gnas lnga yang nang rig pa ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:64a-11: yang dag pa'i rgyu dang 'bras bu la sogs pa rab tu bstan pa gang yin pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:64a-12: gtan tshigs kyi rig pa ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:64a-13: gzhan yang 'god par byed pa la sogs pa ston pa gang yin pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:64a-14: sgra rig pa ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:64a-15: ngag la mkhas pa'i mtshan nyid la sogs pa rab tu ston pa gang yin pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:64a-16: gso ba rig pa ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:64a-17: nad kyi ngo bo nyid dang /
T05TD4016.3E:64a-18: nad kyi rgyu la sogs pa rab tu stong pa gang yin pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:64a-19: bzo dang las kyi gnas kyi rig pa ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:64a-20: las bya ba la sogs pa rab tu ston pa gang yin pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:64a-21: rgya cher ni bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las bstan pa bzhin no //
T05TD4016.3E:64a-22: byang chub sems dpas rig pa'i gnas lnga yongs su tshol ba'i dgongs pa ni bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las ji skad du bstan pa bzhin te /
T05TD4016.3E:64a-24: de la byang chub sems dpa' ci'i phyir thos pa tshol bar byed ce na /
T05TD4016.3E:64a-25: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' nang gi rig pa tshol ba ni chos kyi rjes su mthun pa'i chos kyi nan tan gyis yang dag par bsgrub par bya ba'i phyir dang gzhan dag la yang rgya cher bstan par bya ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi bka' yongs su tshol bar byed do //
T05TD4016.3E:64a-26: gtan tshigs kyi rig pa yongs su tshol ba ni /
T05TD4016.3E:64a-27: bstan bcos de nyid las nyes par bshad pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:64a-28: nyes par brjod pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su shes pa'i phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:64b-0: phas kyi rgol ba tshar gcad pa'i @64b phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:64b-1: bstan pa 'di la ma dad pa rnams dad par bya ba'i phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:64b-2: dad pa rnams phyir zhing 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir ro /
T05TD4016.3E:64b-3: sgra'i rig pa tshol ba ni tshig dang yi ge nges pa'i tshig bzang po spyod pas legs par sbyar te /
T05TD4016.3E:64b-4: brjod pa la mos pa rnams bdag la yid ches pa skyed pa'i phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:64b-5: don gcig pa la nges pa'i tshig rnam pa sna tshogs kyis rjes su tha snyad gdags pa la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:64b-6: gso ba rig pa tshol ba ni sems can rnams kyi nad sna tshogs rnam par zhi bar bya ba'i phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:64b-7: skye bo'i tshogs chen po la phan gdags pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:64b-8: 'jig rten pa'i bzo dang las kyi gnas shes pa rnams tshol ba ni /
T05TD4016.3E:64b-9: sems can rnams kyi don tshegs chung dus sgrub pa'i phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:64b-10: sems can rnams kyis gces par bya ba bskyed pa'i phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:64b-11: bzo dang las kyi gnas shes par bya ba'i sbyin pa'i phan 'dogs pas bsdus pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:64b-12: byang chub sems dpas rig pa'i gnas lnga bo 'di dag thams cad tshol ba yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi ye shes kyi tshogs chen po yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir te /
T05TD4016.3E:64b-13: thams cad la de ltar ma bslabs na /
T05TD4016.3E:64b-14: rim gyis thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes sgrib pa med pa thob par mi 'gyur ro zhes 'byung ste /
T05TD4016.3E:64b-15: zhib tu de nyid las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:64b-16: legs pa'i tshul khrims bstan pa'i mdo dang /
T05TD4016.3E:64b-17: bstan bcos yongs su 'dzin pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:64b-18: mdo sde'i rgyan las kyang don gyis de skad du ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:64b-19: don dam pa'i don 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:64b-20: de bzhin nyid rnam pa bdun yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni mtshan nyid drug pa ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:64b-22: yul mos nas shes pa bstan pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:64b-23: rgyu rnam pa gsum gyis sgrub pa bstan pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:64b-25: de la dam pa ni ye shes dam pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:64b-26: don ni yul gyi don to //
T05TD4016.3E:64b-27: de bzhin nyid rnam pa bdun ni ye shes dam pa'i yul gyi don yin pa'i phyir /
T05TD4016.3E:64b-28: don dam pa'i bden pa zhes bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:64b-29: 'di ni bdag po'i dbang du bya ba'i rnam par bshad pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:65a-0: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mdo @65a * //
T05TD4016.3E:65a-1: las kyang lha'i rgyal po ji tsam du tshig gi brjod pa dang bcas pa gang yin pa de ni kun rdzob kyi bden pa zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:65a-2: tshig las dben pa 'phags pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul gang yin pa de ni don dam pa'i bden pa zhes bya'o zhes gsungs so //
T05TD4016.3E:65a-3: bstan bcos shin tu rgyas pa brgya pa las kyang ;
T05TD4016.3E:65a-4: don dam pa'i bden pa ni 'phags pa dag gis shes par bya ba rnam par rtog par bya ba'i ming dang tshig gis thog tu mi phebs pa rang gi nang gi rig pa gzhan dag gi rkyen la mi ltos pa mtshan ma med pa /
T05TD4016.3E:65a-5: tha snyad chad pa gang yin pa de ni don dam pa'i bden pa zhes bya'o zhes bshad do ;
T05TD4016.3E:65a-6: / gzhan yang rnam par rtog pa med cing spros pa med la tshul gcig tu de la mang du gnas pa'i phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:65a-7: 'dres pa'i chos tshad med pa la dmigs pa'i phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:65a-8: lhag mthong gi phyir zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa rgyu rnam pa gsum gyis bsgrubs pa ston te /
T05TD4016.3E:65a-9: 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la dmigs pa'i ye shes so //
T05TD4016.3E:65a-10: gzhan yang rnam par rtog pa med ces bya ba la sogs pas ni yang dag pa'i ye shes kyi bdag nyid bstan te /
T05TD4016.3E:65a-11: rnam par rtog pa sna tshogs dang /
T05TD4016.3E:65a-12: spros pa med cing de bzhin nyid kyi tshul gcig 'ba' zhig yod pa la mang du gnas pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:65a-13: ye shes ni rgya cher bshad pa ni bstan bcos mngon pa kun las btus pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:65a-14: theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel ba las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:65a-15: 'dres pa'i chos tshad med pa la dmigs pa zhes bya ba ni 'dres pa'i chos de bzhin nyid yang dag pa'i ye shes 'di'i dmigs pa byed pas so //
T05TD4016.3E:65a-16: gzhan yang 'dres pa'i chos tshad med pa la dmigs pa zhes bya bas ni /
T05TD4016.3E:65a-17: rjes la thob pa'i ye shes bstan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:65a-18: 'di ltar 'dres pa'i chos ni rnam pa gsum ste /
T05TD4016.3E:65a-19: dang po ni 'dres pa chung du'i chos te /
T05TD4016.3E:65a-20: gsung rab yan lag bcu gnyis so so tha dad pa la dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:65a-21: gnyis pa ni 'dres pa chen po'i chos te /
T05TD4016.3E:65a-22: gsung rab yan lag bcu gnyis bsdus pa la dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:65a-23: gsum pa ni 'dres pa tshad med pa'i chos te /
T05TD4016.3E:65b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa tshad med pa'i gsung rab yan lag bcu gnyis po dag gcig tu bsdus pa @65b la dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:65b-1: ye shes 'di ni gsum gsum la dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:65b-2: de la lhag mthong gi phyir zhes bya ba ni ye shes 'di bsgom pa'i shes rab yin par bstan pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:65b-3: chos kyi rjes su mthun pa'i chos legs par sgrub par byed pa zhes bya bas ni bdun pa chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba bstan to //
T05TD4016.3E:65b-4: chos kyi rjes su mthun pa'i chos de yang bstan pa rnams las so so nas bshad pa mi mthun pas /
T05TD4016.3E:65b-5: bstan bcos bye brag bshad pa chen po las /
T05TD4016.3E:65b-6: de la chos ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:65b-8: rjes su mthun pa'i chos ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:65b-9: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:65b-10: 'dir don gyi sgor zhugs pa ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:65b-11: mya ngan las 'das pa yongs su nye ba'i phyir ro /
T05TD4016.3E:65b-12: 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gang yin pa de ni chos kyi rjes su mthun pa'i chos zhes bya ba'o //
T05TD4016.3E:65b-13: 'di la gnas par nus pa gang yin pa de ni chos kyi rjes su mthun pa zhes bya'o zhes gsungs te /
T05TD4016.3E:65b-14: zhib tu de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no //
T05TD4016.3E:65b-15: bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel ba slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis byas pa la chos kyi rjes su mthun pa'i chos zhes bya ba la thob par bya ba gang yin pa de ni chos zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:65b-16: lam gang yin pa de ni rjes su mthun pa'i chos zhes bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:65b-17: de'i rjes su 'brang ba'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:65b-18: gzhan yang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam gang yin pa de ni chos zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:65b-19: 'jig rten pa'i lam gang yin pa de ni rjes su mthun pa'i chos zhes bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:65b-20: rang gi sems kyi rgyun mi 'chad par bya ba'i phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:65b-21: de mngon sum du dbang thob par byed pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ste /
T05TD4016.3E:65b-22: 'di ni bsgom pa las byung ba'i shes rab bstan to //
T05TD4016.3E:65b-23: de la rang gi sems rgyun mi 'chad pa zhes bya ba ni /
T05TD4016.3E:65b-24: bsgom pa las byung ba'i shes rab de ting nge 'dzin gyi sems kyi rgyud la spyod pa'i phyir ro//
T05TD4016.3E:65b-25: 'phel bar byed pa'i phyir zhes bya bas ni /
T05TD4016.3E:65b-26: de la spyod pa'i don bstan te /
T05TD4016.3E:65b-27: rnam par 'jog pa 'debs pa'i don to //
T05TD4016.3E:65b-28: ting nge 'dzin gyi sems der bsgom pa las byung ba'i shes rab de 'phel bar byed pa'i phyir spyod pa zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:66a-0: de mngon sum du dbang thob par byed pa'i phyir zhes bya @66a * //
T05TD4016.3E:66a-1: bas ni 'phal bar byed pa'i don bsnan nas bshad pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:66a-2: 'di ltar bsgom pa'i shes rab kyi dbang gis sems kyi kun tu spyod pa la dbang thob par byed cing de kho na nyid kyi don rtogs pas nyon mongs pa spangs nas 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba'o //
T05TD4016.3E:66a-3: slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel pa las /
T05TD4016.3E:66a-4: chos kyi rjes su mthun pa'i chos zhes bya ba ni bstan pa bzhin du spyod pa'i phyir ro zhes bshad do //
T05TD4016.3E:66a-5: de ni shes rab rnam par dag pa'i mtshan nyid rnam pa bdun zhes bya'o zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa mjug bsdu ba ste /
T05TD4016.3E:66a-6: mdo nyid kyis brda phrad par zad do //
T05TD4016.3E:66a-7: byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
T05TD4016.3E:66a-8: bcom ldan 'das mtshan nyid rnam pa lnga po de dag gi so so'i las gang lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bcu pa mtshan nyid rnam pa lnga dag gi las rnam pa rab tu dbye ba'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:66a-9: 'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:66a-10: lan du gsungs pa ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:66a-11: 'di ni gong du bstan pa'i chags pa med pa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid rnam pa lnga dag gi las kyi nus pa zhu ba ste /
T05TD4016.3E:66a-12: 'di ltar mtshan nyid rnam pa lnga po dag re re la yang mos rnam pa du mchis zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T05TD4016.3E:66a-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa /
T05TD4016.3E:66a-14: rigs kyi bu mtshan nyid de dag gi las ni rnam pa lngar rig par bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa las ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:66a-17: rnam par phye ste bstan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:66a-18: 'di ni dang po mdor bstan te /
T05TD4016.3E:66a-19: re re la yang las re re yod pa'i phyir /
T05TD4016.3E:66a-20: dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las /
T05TD4016.3E:66a-21: bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa /
T05TD4016.3E:66a-22: rnam pa lnga po de dag re re la yang las re re yod par rig par bya'o zhes gsungs so //
T05TD4016.3E:66a-23: 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa' rnams chags pa med pa'i phyir /
T05TD4016.3E:66b-0: tshe 'di la pha rol tu phyin pa rnams @66b rtag tu byed pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:66b-1: gus par byed pa'i sbyor bas bag yod par byed do zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa rnam par dbye ste bshad pa ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:66b-2: 'di yang las rnam pa lnga pa bstan pa nyid kyis rnam pa lngar dbye ste /
T05TD4016.3E:66b-3: 'di ni dang po chags pa med pa'i mtshan nyid kyi las bstan pa ste ;
T05TD4016.3E:66b-4: 'di ni nan tan gyi sbyor ba bag med pa'i las so //
T05TD4016.3E:66b-5: chags pa med pa'i mtshan nyid ni gong du rgya cher bstan pa bzhin du shes par bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:66b-6: 'di ltar chags pa med pa'i phyir ni /
T05TD4016.3E:66b-7: tshe 'di la las rgyun chad med par gus par byed pa'i nan tan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag bsgom pas bag yod pa dang bcas par gyur pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:66b-8: mi lta ba nyid kyi phyir ni phyi ma la bag yod pa'i rgyu yongs su 'dzin par byed do zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa mi lta ba nyid kyi las bstan to //
T05TD4016.3E:66b-9: ji ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu dang /
T05TD4016.3E:66b-12: phyi ma la bag yod pa'i rgyu yongs su 'dzin par byed de /
T05TD4016.3E:66b-13: ma 'ongs pa na bag yod pa dang bcas pa'i phyir pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag khad kyis 'phel bar 'gyur ba'o //
T05TD4016.3E:66b-14: kha na ma tho ba med pa'i phyir ni pha rol tu phyin pa rnams yang dag par bsgom pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:66b-17: yongs su byang bar byed pa'o zhes bya ba ni gsum pa kha na ma thob med pa'i mtshan nyid kyi las bstan to //
T05TD4016.3E:66b-18: 'di yang kha na ma thob med pa'i phyir ni las kyi tshig bzhi yod par 'gyur te /
T05TD4016.3E:66b-20: yang dag par bsgom pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:66b-23: yongs su byang bar byed pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:66b-24: gong du bstan pa'i 'dres pa'i chos bzhi po 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:66b-25: snying rje med pa'i phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:66b-26: tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i sbyor ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:66b-27: rtag tu mi 'byed pa'i sbyor ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:66b-28: ma gus pa'i sbyor ba dag dang bral ba'i phyir tshig bzhi po 'di dag gsungs pa yin no /
T05TD4016.3E:66b-29: kha cig na re yang dag par bsgom pa zhes bya ba ni mdor bstan pa'i tshig go //
T05TD4016.3E:66b-30: tshig 'og ma gsum po dag ni yon tan gsum gyi rgyu rnam par phye nas bstan pa yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:66b-31: de la yongs su rdzogs zhes bya bas ni spangs pa'i yon tan gyi rgyu bstan to //
T05TD4016.3E:67a-1: su dag pa zhes bya bas ni ye shes kyi yon tan gyi rgyu bstan to //
T05TD4016.3E:67a-2: yongs su byang ba zhes bya bas ni lan du phan 'dogs pa'i yon tan gyi rgyu bstan to zhe'o //
T05TD4016.3E:67a-3: rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir ni thabs la mkhas pa pha rol tu phyin pa myur du yongs su rdzogs par byed do zhes bya bas ni bzhi pa rnam par rtog pa med pa'i mtshan nyid kyi las bstan te /
T05TD4016.3E:67a-4: 'di ltar ji bzhin du mtshan ma rnams yongs su 'dzin par mi byed pa'i phyir /
T05TD4016.3E:67a-5: thabs la mkhas pas pha rol tu phyin pa rnams myur du yongs su rdzogs par byed pa la bya'o /
T05TD4016.3E:67a-6: pha rol tu phyin pa bcu'i thabs la bya ba ni ma yin no ;
T05TD4016.3E:67a-7: / yang dag par yongs su bsngo ba nyid kyi phyir ni tshe rabs thams cad du pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:67a-8: de dag gi 'dod pa'i rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du mi zad pa nyid thob par byed do zhes bya ba las lnga pa yongs su bsngo ba'i mtshan nyid kyi las bstan te /
T05TD4016.3E:67a-9: mdo nyid kyis brda phrad par zad do //
T05TD4016.3E:67a-10: byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
T05TD4016.3E:67a-11: bcom ldan 'das pha rol tu phyin pa gang gsungs pa 'di dag shin tu rgya che ba nyid ni gang lags /
T05TD4016.3E:67a-12: kun nas nyon mongs pa mchis pa nyid ni gang lags /
T05TD4016.3E:67a-13: rab tu sbyangs pa nyid ni gang lags /
T05TD4016.3E:67a-14: mi g-yo ba nyid ni gang lags /
T05TD4016.3E:67a-15: shin tu rnam par dag pa ni gang lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bcu gcig pa shin tu rgya che ba la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid rnam pa lnga bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to ;
T05TD4016.3E:67a-16: /'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:67a-17: lan du gsungs pa bstan te /
T05TD4016.3E:67a-18: 'di ni dang po zhu ba gsol ba nyid do //
T05TD4016.3E:67a-19: 'di ni byang chub sems dpas sngon don gzhan dag las mtshan nyid rnam pa lnga po 'di dag thos pa'i phyir /
T05TD4016.3E:67a-20: zhu ba 'di gsol ba yin no //
T05TD4016.3E:67a-21: yang na de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir /
T05TD4016.3E:67a-22: zhu ba 'di gsol ba yin no //
T05TD4016.3E:67a-23: bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa /
T05TD4016.3E:67a-24: rigs kyi bu chags pa med pa nyid dang /
T05TD4016.3E:67b-0: yang dag par yongs su bsngo ba nyid gang yin pa de ni shin tu @67b rgya che ba zhes bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs bas ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:67b-1: 'di yang rnam pa gnyis su dbye ste /
T05TD4016.3E:67b-2: mtshan nyid rnam pa lnga las brtsams nas rnam pa gnyis su dbye ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:67b-3: sa'i gnas skabs las brtsams nas mtshan nyid phyi ma gsum bstan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:67b-5: mtshan nyid rnam pa lnga las chags pa med pa nyid dang /
T05TD4016.3E:67b-7: yang dag par yongs su bsngo ba nyid rnam pa gsum dag la shin tu rgya che ba'i spyod pa zhes bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:67b-8: gnas skabs rnams su mi mthun pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:67b-9: kha na ma tho ba med pa nyid dang /
T05TD4016.3E:67b-10: rnam par rtog pa med pa nyid gang yin pa de ni kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa zhes bya'o zhes bya bas ni mtshan nyid gnyis pa bstan te /
T05TD4016.3E:67b-11: mtshan nyid rnam pa lnga las kha na ma tho ba med pa nyid dang /
T05TD4016.3E:67b-12: rnam par rtog pa med pa nyid la kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa zhes bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:67b-13: 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa spyod pa na rang bzhin gyis kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:67b-14: rnam par rtog pa'i ye shes kyis kun nas nyon mongs pa ni rab tu sbyangs pa'i phyir kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa 'di yang gnas skabs rnams dang sbyar ro //
T05TD4016.3E:67b-15: so sor brtag cing bya ba nyid gang yin pa de ni rab tu sbyangs pa zhes bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa sa'i gnas skabs las brtsams nas mtshan nyid phyi ma gsum bstan pa ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:67b-16: 'di ni rab tu sbyangs pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa ste ;
T05TD4016.3E:67b-17: 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag la so sor brtag pa khyad par du 'phags pa brgyad kyis bya ba byed pa'i phyir rab tu sbyangs pa zhes bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:67b-18: 'di ni sa bdun pa man chad kyi gnas skabs su gtogs pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:67b-19: yongs su mi nyams pa'i chos sar zhugs pa gang yin pa de ni mi g-yo ba zhes bya'o zhes bya bas ni bzhi pa mi g-yo ba'i mtshan nyid bstan to //
T05TD4016.3E:67b-21: dgu pa nas te mi g-yo ba'i don ni gong du bstan pa bzhin no //
T05TD4016.3E:67b-22: dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las //
T05TD4016.3E:68a-0: sa dang po yan chad la mi g-yo ba zhes bya ba zhes 'byung @68a * //
T05TD4016.3E:68a-1: ba ni lo ts'a ba dag gi bsam pa tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:68a-2: sa bcu par gtogs pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:68a-3: sangs rgyas kyi sar gtogs pa nyid gang yin pa de ni shin tu rnam par rtog pa zhes bya'o zhes bya ba ni lnga pa rnam par dag pa'i mtshan nyid bstan to //
T05TD4016.3E:68a-4: 'di ltar sa bcu pa'i tshe ni rgyus khyad par du 'phags pa yin la /
T05TD4016.3E:68a-5: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sar ni 'bras bus khyad par du 'phags shing mthar thug pa'i rnam par dag pa yin pa'i phyir /
T05TD4016.3E:68a-6: bstan bcos mngon pa kun las btus pa las /
T05TD4016.3E:68a-7: yongs su rdzogs pa'i khyad par du 'phags pa ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:68a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa la mnga' ba'i sbyin pa la sogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnams go rims bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir ro zhes bshad pa yin no //
T05TD4016.3E:68a-10: ming 'di gsum la bye brag yod pa ni /
T05TD4016.3E:68a-11: bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las /
T05TD4016.3E:68a-12: de la rang bzhin gyis brling ba'i phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:68a-13: rab tu gsal ba'i phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:68a-14: 'bras bu che ba rnam pa lnga dang ldan pa'i phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:68a-16: rab tu sbyangs pa zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:68a-17: yongs su mi nyams pa'i phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:68a-18: khyad par du 'gro ba'i phyir mi g-yo ba zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:68a-19: byang chub sems dpa' sa'i nang na mchog tu bla na med pa'i phyir shin tu rnam par dag pa zhes bya bar rig par bya'o zhes 'byung ngo /
T05TD4016.3E:68a-21: // / bam po drug cu gsum pa /
T05TD4016.3E:68a-22: byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to ;
T05TD4016.3E:68a-23: / bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'bras bu dang /
T05TD4016.3E:68a-24: rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu yad du mchi bas ma 'tshal ba 'thob cing pha rol tu phyin pa yang ma 'tshal ba dang ldan lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bcu gnyis pa pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi rgyu dang 'bras bu zad mi shes pa nyid du bstan pa'i sgo zhes bya ba ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:68a-25: 'di yang zhu ba gsol pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:68a-26: lan du gsungs par ston te /
T05TD4016.3E:68a-28: 'bras bu dang rnam par smin pa lnga po dag ni mdor bsdu na 'bras bu zhes bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:68b-0: 'bras @68b bu rnam pa lnga rgya cher bshad pa ni sngar gong du bstan bcos chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa khungs su bzhag nas bstan pa las byung ba bzhin no //
T05TD4016.3E:68b-1: bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal ba /
T05TD4016.3E:68b-2: rigs kyi bu gcig la gcig brten nas bsgom pa bskyed pa rgyun mi 'chad pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:68b-3: 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug la brten nas 'bras bu rnams thob par 'gyur la /
T05TD4016.3E:68b-4: 'bras bu lam brten pa'i phyir ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug bsgom nus par 'gyur bas /
T05TD4016.3E:68b-5: gcig la gcig brten nas bsgom pa bskyed pa rgyun 'chad pa med pa'i phyir /
T05TD4016.3E:68b-6: zad mi shes pa nyid du 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
T05TD4016.3E:68b-7: bstan bcos chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las /
T05TD4016.3E:68b-8: ma 'ongs pa na gong nas gong du khyad par du 'phel zhing gcig gis gcig bskyed pa gang yin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyu mthun pa'i 'bras bu'o zhes bshad do //
T05TD4016.3E:68b-9: mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las /
T05TD4016.3E:68b-10: ci'i slad du rtag par pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu yid du mchi bas ma 'tshal ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:68b-11: pha rol tu phyin pas 'tshal ba thob lags /
T05TD4016.3E:68b-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa /
T05TD4016.3E:68b-13: gcig la gcig brten nas bsgom pa spang ba'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:68b-14: lo ts'a ba dag gis nor to //
T05TD4016.3E:68b-15: dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las /
T05TD4016.3E:68b-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T05TD4016.3E:68b-18: gcig la gcig brten pa'i rgyus 'bras bu gya nom pa bskyed par rig par bya'o zhes 'byung ba ni lo ts'a ba dag gi bsam pa tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:68b-19: byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
