T05TD4016.3E:85a-12: gnas ngan len gyi don bstan pa'i skabs su shes bya'i sgrib pa kho na yin par bstan pa yang gcig gis gcig bstan pa yin pas nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa la yang rnam pa gsum yod par bstan to //
T05TD4016.3E:85a-13: sgrib pa gnyis po de dag re re la yang gnas ngan len rnam pa gsum yod par bstan pa ni bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las bshad pa bzhin du rig par bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:85a-14: der brtags nas khong du chud par bya'o /
T05TD4016.3E:85a-16: // / bam po drug cu lnga pa /
T05TD4016.3E:85a-17: byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
T05TD4016.3E:85a-18: bcom ldan 'das bskal pa grangs ma mchis pa du dag gis gnas ngan len de dag yongs su spong bar 'gyur lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gsum pa gnas ngan len spong ba'i dus rab tu dbye ba ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:85a-19: 'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:85a-20: lan du gsungs pa bstan te ;
T05TD4016.3E:85a-21: 'di ni zhu ba la gsol ba nyid do //
T05TD4016.3E:85a-22: bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal ba /
T05TD4016.3E:85a-23: rigs kyi bu bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis sam /
T05TD4016.3E:85a-24: yang na bskal pa dpag tu med pa 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:85b-5: skad cig gi tshad kyis bskal pa grangs med bar mi nus pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba 'di gnyis pa gnas ngan len spong ba'i dus ston te /
T05TD4016.3E:85b-6: 'dir bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis sam /
T05TD4016.3E:85b-7: yang na bskal pa dpag tu med pa dag gis so zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T05TD4016.3E:85b-8: mdo 'di nyid kyi dpe gsum char las kyang mi mthun par bstan pa med do //
T05TD4016.3E:85b-9: mdo'i tshig 'di yang bshad pa rnam pa gnyis yod de /
T05TD4016.3E:85b-10: kha cig na re bskal pa grangs med pa dang po la ni lpags shun la yod pa lta bu spong ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:85b-11: gnyis pa la ni spri la yod pa lta bu'o ;
T05TD4016.3E:85b-13: rus pa la yod pa lta bu ste /
T05TD4016.3E:85b-14: de'i phyir bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las /
T05TD4016.3E:85b-17: snying po la yod pa lta bu'i nyon mongs pa rnam pa gsum bsal ba'i dbang du mdzad pa'i phyir bskal pa grangs med pa gsum rnam par gzhag pa'i yin no zhes bshad do //
T05TD4016.3E:85b-18: gzhan yang bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las /
T05TD4016.3E:85b-19: theg pa tha mas ni gnas ngan len gsum gyi dbang du byas nas /
T05TD4016.3E:85b-20: bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyi dus kyis thob par 'gyur ro zhes 'byung ste /
T05TD4016.3E:85b-21: gnas ngan len rnam pa gsum yongs su spang ba las spangs pa'i bye brag gi phyir ro zhes zer ro //
T05TD4016.3E:85b-22: kha cig na re bskal pa grangs med pa snga ma gnyis pa ni lpags shun la yod pa lta bu'i gnas ngan len spong ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:85b-23: gsum pa ni spri la yod pa lta bu spong ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:85b-24: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa la zhugs nas ni rus pa la yod pa lta bu'i gnas ngan len spong ngo zhes zer te /
T05TD4016.3E:85b-25: de ltar rnam pa gnyis su bshad pa yod kyang /
T05TD4016.3E:85b-26: bshad pa phyi ma ni mdo'i tshig dang rjes su mthun te yang bsam par bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:85b-27: de la dpag tu med pa zhes bya ba ni lo dang zla ba la sogs pa la brten nas bgrang bar mi nus pa'i phyir bskal pa dpag tu med pa zhes bya'o//
T05TD4016.3E:85b-28: 'di ltar grangs rnam pa dgu yod de /
T05TD4016.3E:85b-38: skad cig ni dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis sam /
T05TD4016.3E:86a-3: zla ba tshad med pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:86a-4: nyi ma tshad med pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:86a-5: thang cig tshad med pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:86a-6: skad cig tshad med pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:86a-7: yud tsam tshad med pa zhes 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:86a-8: don gyis ni skad cig la sogs pa'i tshad bstan nas /
T05TD4016.3E:86a-9: de'i 'og tu bskal pa chen po bshad pa yin na ci'i phyir skad cig la sogs pa phyis bstan ce na /
T05TD4016.3E:86a-11: bstan bcos bye brag tu bshad pa chen po las ji skad du bstan pa bzhin te /
T05TD4016.3E:86a-12: de'i phyir de nyid las skad cig la sogs pa'i 'og tu nyin zhag mngon par 'grub bo //
T05TD4016.3E:86a-13: nyin zhag bsags pa las ni zla ba phyed dang /
T05TD4016.3E:86a-14: zla ba la sogs pa mngon par 'grub bo //
T05TD4016.3E:86a-16: zla ba la sogs pa bsags pa las ni bskal pa chen po mngon par 'grub pa yin na /
T05TD4016.3E:86a-17: ci'i phyir sngar rags pa bstan la phyis phra ba bstan ce na /
T05TD4016.3E:86a-19: bstan bcos byed pa dag gis rab tu bstan par 'dod pa'i phyir /
T05TD4016.3E:86a-20: kha cig 'di skad du chos mngon pa dag gi ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyi chos tshol bar byed kyi /
T05TD4016.3E:86a-21: snga ma ni ma yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:86a-22: chos kyi mtshan nyid dang mi 'gal na /
T05TD4016.3E:86a-23: ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du bshad kyang nyes pa med do zhes zer ro //
T05TD4016.3E:86a-24: slob dpon gzhan kha cig ni 'di skad du bstan bcos byed pas sngar rags pa bstan la phyis phra ba bstan par 'dod ba rnams rim gyis 'jug pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:86a-25: mdo 'di yang de dang 'dra bas nyes pa med do //
T05TD4016.3E:86a-26: mdo'i tshig 'di yang mas yar bshad par bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:86a-27: de la skad cig ces bya ba ni skad cig dang de'i skad cig ces pa la bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:86a-28: de la skad cig ces bya ba ni /
T05TD4016.3E:86a-29: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las /
T05TD4016.3E:86a-30: dus kyi nang nas mchog tu thung ba ste /
T05TD4016.3E:86a-31: thang cig drug cu'i cha gcig go zhes bshad do //
T05TD4016.3E:86a-32: bstan bcos sems sna tshogs bstan pa las /
T05TD4016.3E:86a-33: skad cig ces bya ba ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:86a-34: skad cig ma gcig gi nang na mchog tu thung ba'i skad cig yin pa'i phyir skad cig la dus kyi tshad du bstan pa yin no //
T05TD4016.3E:86a-35: de la skad cig gi tshad kyi dngos po ni kha cig na re dper na skyes bu stobs dang ldan pas shin tu myur bar lus bsgyur nas skar ma mang po lta ba ji ltar skar ma gcig kho na la lta ba'i tshad de ni skad cig go zhes 'byung ste /
T05TD4016.3E:86a-36: rgya cher de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no //
T05TD4016.3E:86b-0: gzhan @86b yang bstan bcos bye brag tu smra ba chen po las /
T05TD4016.3E:86b-1: skad cig gi tshad de ji ltar shes par bya zhe na /
T05TD4016.3E:86b-2: kha cig na re bstan bcos gdags pa byas pa las /
T05TD4016.3E:86b-3: dper na bud med dar la bab pa bal 'khal ba 'bring gis ha cang yang mi ring /
T05TD4016.3E:86b-4: ha cang yang mi thung bar bal bsnyad pa de tsam gyi yun gang yin pa de ni de'i skad cig gi tshad yin no zhes bshad de /
T05TD4016.3E:86b-5: de las bstan pa yang bal dang skud pa'i ring thung la bya ba ma yin gyi /
T05TD4016.3E:86b-6: bal de lag pa nas 'byin cing bsnyad pa'i tshad la de'i skad cig ces bstan pa yin no //
T05TD4016.3E:86b-7: sngar skad cig gi tshad dris pa yin na ci'i phyir bstan bcos gdags pa byas pa las bstan pa de'i skad cig gi tshad khungs su bstan ce na /
T05TD4016.3E:86b-9: 'dir ni rags pa smos nas phra ba bstan pa yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:86b-10: 'di ltar phra ba ni khong du chud par dka' zhing gsal bar bstan par mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:86b-12: skad cig brgya nyi shu la ni skad cig gcig go zhes bya ba nas rgya cher bshad pa'i bar du'o //
T05TD4016.3E:86b-13: kha cig na re 'di ni rags pa yin pa skad cig gi tshad ni ma yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:86b-14: bdag gis bshad pa'i don lta na skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa'i se gol gtogs pa gcig la ni skad cig drug cu rtsa bzhi yod do zhes zer ro //
T05TD4016.3E:86b-15: kha cig na re de ni de lta ma yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:86b-16: bdag gis bshad pa de lta na /
T05TD4016.3E:86b-17: dper na skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa gnyis kyis ka shi ka'i skud pa phra mo mang po phan tshun drangs nas gcod pa /
T05TD4016.3E:86b-18: skud pa ji tsam chad pa skad cig kyang de snyed do zhes zer ro //
T05TD4016.3E:86b-19: kha cig na re 'on kyang de dag ni rags pa yin pas skad cig gi tshad ni ma yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:86b-20: yang dag pa'i skad cig gi tshad ni bcom ldan 'das kyis ma gsungs so //
T05TD4016.3E:86b-21: de ltar ci mngon zhe na /
T05TD4016.3E:86b-22: mdo las ji skad du dge slong zhig bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su song ste /
T05TD4016.3E:86b-23: zhabs gnyis la phyag byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug ste bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
T05TD4016.3E:86b-24: bcom ldan 'das srog dang ldan pa dag gi skye ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:86b-25: 'jig pa shin tu myur ba ji lta bu lags /
T05TD4016.3E:86b-26: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T05TD4016.3E:86b-27: ngas bshad par nus kyang khyod kyis shes par mi nus so //
T05TD4016.3E:86b-29: dpe 'ga' zhig gis de gsal bar bgyir rud ba lta mchis sam /
T05TD4016.3E:86b-30: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T05TD4016.3E:86b-31: skad cig ma zhes bya ba yod de /
T05TD4016.3E:87a-0: @87a * // khyod la dpe bstan par bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:87a-1: dper na 'phong la shin tu mkhas pa'i skyes bu bzhi zhig so so nas mda' thogs shing phan tshun rgyab sprad de 'greng nas phyogs bzhir mda' 'phang bar 'dod pa las yang skyes bu shin tu skyen myur che ba zhig 'ongs nas 'di skad du /
T05TD4016.3E:87a-2: kye khyed kyi deng dus gcig tu mda' 'phongs shig dang /
T05TD4016.3E:87a-3: bdag gis gcig kyang mi ltung bar 'dzin nus zhes zer na /
T05TD4016.3E:87a-5: sems shin tu myur ba yin nam /
T05TD4016.3E:87a-6: dge slong gis bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba /
T05TD4016.3E:87a-7: bcom ldan 'das shin tu myur ba lags so //
T05TD4016.3E:87a-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T05TD4016.3E:87a-9: gang zag de'i myur ba ni gnod sbyin sa la 'gro ba tsam gyi myur bar mi phod do //
T05TD4016.3E:87a-10: gnod sbyin sa la 'gro ba'i myur ba ni nam mkha' la 'gro ba'i gnod sbyin gyi myur ba tsam mi phod do //
T05TD4016.3E:87a-11: nam mkha' la 'gro ba'i myur ba ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i myur ba tsam mi phod do //
T05TD4016.3E:87a-12: lha de dag gi myur ba ni nyi ma zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bdag gi myur ba tsam mi phod do //
T05TD4016.3E:87a-13: nyi ma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ba dag gi myur ba ni lha'i bu'i bstan par 'gro ba tsam mi phod do //
T05TD4016.3E:87a-14: de ni nyi ma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dren par byed pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:87a-15: lha 'di dag la sogs pa ni gong nas gong du ches myur ba yin pas srog dang ldan pa'i skye ba dag 'jig pa ni de dag las ches shin tu myur ba yin pas skad cig ma 'jug pa re zhig tsam du yang mi gnas pa'o zhes gsungs pa lta bu ste /
T05TD4016.3E:87a-16: de'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dag pa'i skad cig ma'i tshad ni ma gsungs par shes so //
T05TD4016.3E:87a-17: ci'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhan dag la yang dag pa'i skad cig ma'i tshad ma gsungs she na /
T05TD4016.3E:87a-19: sems can gang yang shes par nus pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:87a-20: ci 'phags pa sh'a ri'i bus kyang shes par mi nus sam /
T05TD4016.3E:87a-22: des shes par nus mod kyi /
T05TD4016.3E:87a-23: de la dgongs pa med pas de'i phyir ma gsungs te /
T05TD4016.3E:87a-24: bcom ldan 'das don med par chos ston par mi mdzad pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:87a-25: de la thang cig ces bya ba ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:87a-27: yang na dbugs dbyung ba tsam gyi don to //
T05TD4016.3E:87b-0: bstan bcos bye brag tu bshad pa chen po las skad cig brgya nyi shu la ni @87b de'i skad cig gcig go //
T05TD4016.3E:87b-1: de'i skad cig drug cu la ni thang cig gcig ste /
T05TD4016.3E:87b-2: de la ni skad cig bdun stong nyis brgya yod do zhes bshad do //
T05TD4016.3E:87b-3: de la yud tsam zhes bya ba ni bstan bcos bye brag tu bshad pa chen po las /
T05TD4016.3E:87b-4: thang cig sum cu la ni yud tsam gcig ste /
T05TD4016.3E:87b-5: 'di la skad cig khri phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig dang drug stong yod do zhes bshad do //
T05TD4016.3E:87b-6: de la thun phyed ces bya ba ni 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:87b-7: nyin dang zhag la so so nas dus gsum yod pas drug tu 'gyur te /
T05TD4016.3E:87b-8: 'dir thun phyed ces gsungs pa ni dus gcig gi dus phyed la bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:87b-9: de la thun zhes bya ba ni dus drug las dus gcig go //
T05TD4016.3E:87b-10: bshad pa'i rnam pa gzhan du na mdzod kyi bstan bcos las ni lo gcig la dus gsum du 'byed de /
T05TD4016.3E:87b-15: re re la yang zla ba bzhi bzhi ste /
T05TD4016.3E:87b-16: thun phyed ces gsungs pa ni char gyi dus so //
T05TD4016.3E:87b-17: thun zhes gsungs pa ni zla ba bzhi la bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:87b-18: de ltar rnam pa gnyis su bshad pa yod kyang bshad pa ni snga ma bzang ste /
T05TD4016.3E:87b-19: de'i phyir mdo 'di'i dgongs pa ni thung du nas ring por brtsegs te bstan pa yin no //
T05TD4016.3E:87b-20: mdzod kyi bstan bcos las ni dus ring po gang yin pa de ni nyin zhag gcig go zhes ston pas de'i phyir bshad pa snga ma ni yang dag pa yin no //
T05TD4016.3E:87b-21: 'phags pa padma dka' po'i mdo'i 'grel pa las ni dus ring po gang yin pa ni zla ba'o zhes bshad do //
T05TD4016.3E:87b-22: de'i phyir 'grel ba de nyid las /
T05TD4016.3E:87b-27: lo bgrang bar mi nus pa'i phyir ro zhes bshad pa yin no ;
T05TD4016.3E:87b-29: zhag ces bya ba ni bstan bcos bye brag tu bshad pa chen po las yud tsam sum cu la ni nyin zhag gcig ste /
T05TD4016.3E:87b-30: 'di la skad cig ma 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi dang /
T05TD4016.3E:87b-31: khri phrag brgyad yod de zhes bshad de /
T05TD4016.3E:87b-32: phung po lnga'i lus 'di ni nyin zhag gcig la skye shi'i mi rtag pa de snyed dang ldan no //
T05TD4016.3E:87b-33: de la zla ba phyed ces bya ba ni zhag bco lnga'o //
T05TD4016.3E:87b-34: de la zla ba zhes bya ba ni zhag sum cu'o //
T05TD4016.3E:87b-35: de la lo zhes bya ba ni zla ba bcu gnyis te /
T05TD4016.3E:87b-36: de'i phyir mdzod kyi bstan bcos las /
T05TD4016.3E:87b-37: skad cig brgya nyi shu la de'i skad cig gcig go //
T05TD4016.3E:87b-38: de skad cig drug cu la thang cig go //
T05TD4016.3E:88a-0: @88a * // thang cig sum cu la yud tsam gcig go //
T05TD4016.3E:88a-1: yud tsam sum cu la nyin zhag gcig go //
T05TD4016.3E:88a-2: nyin zhag sum cu la zla ba gcig go //
T05TD4016.3E:88a-3: zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig go //
T05TD4016.3E:88a-4: lo gcig la dus gsum du dbye ba 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:88a-8: re re la yang zla ba bzhi bzhi'o zhes 'byung ste /
T05TD4016.3E:88a-9: rgya cher de nyid las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:88a-10: skad cig la sogs pa la bskal pa zhes bstan pa ni bstan bcos bye brag tu bshad pa chen po las ji skad bstan pa bzhin te /
T05TD4016.3E:88a-11: de'i phyir bstan bcos de nyid las ci'i phyir bskal pa zhes bya /
T05TD4016.3E:88a-12: bskal pa zhes bya ba'i don ci yin zhe na /
T05TD4016.3E:88a-14: dus gsum gyi cha rab tu 'byed pa'i phyir bskal pa zhes bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:88a-17: yud tsam gyi dus kyi cha rab tu dbye ba las ni nyin zhag mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T05TD4016.3E:88a-18: nyin zhag gi dus kyi cha rab tu dbye ba las ni zla ba phyed dang /
T05TD4016.3E:88a-22: zla ba phyed la sogs pa'i dus kyi rab tu dbye ba las ni bskal pa mngon par 'grub par 'gyur te /
T05TD4016.3E:88a-23: bskal pa'i tshad kyi cha ni dus rab tu dbye ba'i mtha' yin pa'i phyir spyi'i ming thob pa yin no //
T05TD4016.3E:88a-24: sgrar smra ba dag ni gnas skabs rab tu 'byed pa'i phyir bskal pa zhes bya'o zhes zer te ;
T05TD4016.3E:88a-26: bskal pa ni 'dus byas kyi 'du byed rnam par 'byed pa'i nang na mthar thug pa'i gnas skabs yin pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:88a-27: de la aa sa khya zhes bya ba la bsgyur na grangs med pa zhes zer te /
T05TD4016.3E:88a-28: grangs med pa de yang bstan pa rnams las so so nas bshad pa mi mthun pas mdzod kyi bstan bcos las grangs kyi 'gres drug cu las grangs med pa zhes bya ba ni gcig gi ming yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:88a-29: de'i bstan bcos de las bskal pa ni rnam pa bzhir rig par bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:88a-34: de la 'jig pa ni sems can dmyal ba dag tu mi skye ba nas phyi rol gyi snod ci yang ma lus pa'i bar gang yin pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:88a-35: chags pa'i bskal pa ni rlung gi dkyil 'khor langs pa nas sems can dmyal bar dang por skye ba'i bar gang yin pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:88a-36: bar gyi bskal pa ni dang po dpag tu med pa las 'gribs nas lo bcu la thug pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:88b-0: bar du yar skye ba @88b dang ;
T05TD4016.3E:88b-2: tha mar yar skye ba nas lo brgyad khri la thug pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:88b-3: de ltar chags nas gnas pa gang yin pa de ni bar gyi bskal pa zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:88b-6: zhig nas stong par gnas pa'i dus kyang 'dra bas gnas pa'i bskal pa ni bar gyi bskal pa brgyad cu'o ;
T05TD4016.3E:88b-7: / de la bskal pa chen po ni bskal pa grangs med pa gang yin pa'o zhes bya ba nas /
T05TD4016.3E:88b-8: gzhan yang de las de ltar bstan pa'i chags pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:88b-11: stong pa yang so so nas bar gyi bskal pa nyi shu nyi shu yod pa las brgyad cur 'gyur ro //
T05TD4016.3E:88b-12: brgyad cu po dag bsdus pa las ni bskal pa chen po'i tshad mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T05TD4016.3E:88b-13: bar du bstan pa yin no //
T05TD4016.3E:88b-14: bskal pa zhes bya ba'i ngo bo nyid ci yin zhe na /
T05TD4016.3E:88b-16: phung po lnga po dag nyid kho na'o //
T05TD4016.3E:88b-17: mdo dag las ni bskal pa grangs med pa gsum po dag tu nan tan brtson 'grus spyad nas gdod sangs rgyas su 'grub bo zhes gsungs na sngar bstan pa'i bskal pa bzhi po dag las /
T05TD4016.3E:88b-18: bskal pa gang dag brtsegs pa las /
T05TD4016.3E:88b-19: bskal pa grangs med pa gsum mngon par 'grub par 'gyur zhe na /
T05TD4016.3E:88b-20: snga ma'i bskal pa chen po dag bcu dang /
T05TD4016.3E:88b-21: brgyad stong du brtsegs pa nas /
T05TD4016.3E:88b-22: de bzhin du bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyi bar du brtsegs pa las so //
T05TD4016.3E:88b-23: gal te grangs med pa zhes brjod pa yin na /
T05TD4016.3E:88b-24: ci'i phyir gsum zhes kyang brjod ce na /
T05TD4016.3E:88b-25: grangs med pa ma yin pa'i tshig gis bgrang du med pa rab tu ston pas so //
T05TD4016.3E:88b-26: rnam par grol ba'i mdo las ni grangs rnam pa drug cu las grangs med pa zhes bya ba ni grangs gcig gi ming ngo zhes bya ba nas rgya cher bshad pa'i bar du 'byung ste /
T05TD4016.3E:88b-27: de la grangs med pa zhes bya ba ni lnga bcu gnyis pa'i ming yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:88b-28: 'di ltar 'don pa brgyud pa dag gis phyi ma brgyad brjod pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:88b-29: bstan bcos bye brag tu bshad pa chen po las /
T05TD4016.3E:88b-30: grangs med pa zhes bya ba ni grangs drug cu las lnga bcu gnyis pa yin no zhes bstan to //
T05TD4016.3E:88b-31: yang na grangs med pa zhes bya ba ni grangs drug cu'i ming yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:88b-32: 'don pa brgyud pa dag gis snga ma dag gi ming brjod pas so //
T05TD4016.3E:89a-0: 'phags pa sangs rgyas phal po che'i nang nas grangs med kyi le'u las ni grangs @89a * //
T05TD4016.3E:89a-1: kyis bsgyur ba brgya nyi shu las /
T05TD4016.3E:89a-2: brgya rtsa gsum pa ni grangs med pa zhes bya ba'o zhes 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:89a-3: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las ni grangs kyis bsgyur ba bcu gcig las grangs bcu gcig pa ni grangs med pa zhes bya'o zhes bshad do //
T05TD4016.3E:89a-4: gzhan yang 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las /
T05TD4016.3E:89a-5: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i mdo khungs su bstan pa las ni grangs brgya nyi shu rtsa gnyis la grangs med pa zhes bya ba ni grangs brgya bdun pa'i ming 'byung ste /
T05TD4016.3E:89a-6: rgya cher rnam par 'byed pa ni mtshan nyid bstan pa dag las bshad pa bzhin du bshad par rig par bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:89a-7: byang chub sems dpa' byang chub chen po mngon par bsgrub pa la bskal pa grangs med pa gsum dgos sam /
T05TD4016.3E:89a-10: bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:89a-12: 'phags pa legs pa'i tshul khrims bstan pa'i mdo dang /
T05TD4016.3E:89a-13: theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa ngo bo nyid med kyis byas pa las ni /
T05TD4016.3E:89a-14: nges par bskal pa grangs med pa gsum dgos so zhes bshad do //
T05TD4016.3E:89a-15: 'phags pa don tshad med pa'i mdo dang /
T05TD4016.3E:89a-16: sangs rgyas phal po che'i mdo la sogs pa las ni bskal pa grangs med pa gsum ma tshang bar yang sangs rgyas su 'grub pa zhes gsungs so //
T05TD4016.3E:89a-17: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mdo las ni /
T05TD4016.3E:89a-18: bskal pa grangs med pa gsum du spyod pa spyad pas /
T05TD4016.3E:89a-19: sangs rgyas su 'grub po zhes bstan pa de'i mdo ni de lta ma yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:89a-20: bskal pa dpag tu med pas 'grub pa'i phyir ro zhes gsungs so ;
T05TD4016.3E:89a-21: / byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
T05TD4016.3E:89a-22: bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis sa de dag la nyon mongs pa skye ba'i mtshan nyid ni gang lags /
T05TD4016.3E:89a-24: yon tan ni gang lags par rig par bgyi lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni /
T05TD4016.3E:89a-25: bzhi pa byang chub sems dpa'i nyon mongs pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:89a-26: skyon dang yon tan rab tu dbye ba zhes bya ba ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:89a-27: 'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:89a-29: zhu ba gsol ba'i dgongs pa ni lan du gsungs pa bzhin du rig par bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:89b-0: bcom @89b ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa /
T05TD4016.3E:89b-1: rigs kyi bu kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i mtshan nyid du'o zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni /
T05TD4016.3E:89b-2: gnyis pa bcom ldan 'das kyis yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:89b-3: 'di yang gong ma zhus tshig gsum gyi lan bstan pa nyid las rnam pa gsum du dbye ste /
T05TD4016.3E:89b-4: 'di ni zhu ba dang po'i lan bstan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:89b-6: 'di ni dang po ming smos nas lan mdor gsungs pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:89b-7: de ci'i phyir zhe na zhes bya bas ni gnyis pa slar brtag pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:89b-8: byang chub sems dpa' de dag sa dang po la so sor nges pa kho nar chos rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings thams cad rab tu rtogs pas /
T05TD4016.3E:89b-9: rgyu dang rkyen des na byang chub sems dpa'i nyon mongs pa ni shes bzhin kho nar skye ba yin gyi /
T05TD4016.3E:89b-10: mi shes pa ni ma yin pa zhes bya ba ni gsum pa yang dag par rnam par bshad pa bstan pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:89b-11: 'di ltar nyon mongs pa'i skyon khong du chud nas gdod nyon mongs pa bskyed pa'i phyir kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i mtshan nyid ces bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:89b-12: yang dag pa'i don du na kun nas nyon mongs pa yin yang shes pa las skyes pa nas kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:89b-13: gzhan yang 'phags pa bla na med pa'i gnas bstan pa'i mdo las kun dga' bo sangs rgyas thams cad ni rgyu'i gnas skabs su de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbyings la brten nas dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par bsgrubs pas sems can la phan 'dogs pa'i ched du khams gsum dag tu 'jug kyang byang chub sems dpa' de dag la skye ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:89b-14: rga ba la sogs pa sdug bsngal ni yang dag par yod pa ni ma yin no //
T05TD4016.3E:89b-16: de kho na nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbyings mthong ba'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:89b-17: nyon mongs pa dang ldan yang kun nas nyon mongs pa can du mi 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa ste zhib tu de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no //
T05TD4016.3E:89b-18: de'i phyir kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i mtshan nyid ces bstan to zhes bya ba ni bzhi pa mjug bsdu ba ste brda phrad par zad do //
T05TD4016.3E:89b-19: rang gi rgyud la sdug bsngal bskyed par mi nus pa'i phyir skyon med pa yin no //
T05TD4016.3E:89b-20: zhus pa'i lan gnyis pa'i lan bstan pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:89b-21: nyon mongs pa dang ldan yang zil gyis mnan pa'i phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:90a-0: @90a * // sdug bsngal bskyed par mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:90a-1: skyon du mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T05TD4016.3E:90a-2: slob dpon ngo nyid med kyis 'grel pa las ni /
T05TD4016.3E:90a-3: sdug bsngal 'dren par mi byed pa'i phyir kha na mtho ba med pa yin no zhes bshad do //
T05TD4016.3E:90a-4: gzhan yang bstan bcos chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las byang chub sems dpa' de dag nyon mongs pa ma spangs su zin kyang sngags dang sman gyis bsad pa'i dug lta bur nyon mongs pa'i nyes ba thams cad mi skyed de /
T05TD4016.3E:90a-5: dper na nyon mongs pa spangs pa'i dgra bcom pa ltar sa thams cad du nyon mongs pa'i nyes pa mi skyed do zhes bshad de ;
T05TD4016.3E:90a-6: bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:90a-7: chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:90a-8: rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las kyang de skad du bstan to //
T05TD4016.3E:90a-9: gzhan yang bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa las /
T05TD4016.3E:90a-10: nyon mongs thul la spangs pa med //
T05TD4016.3E:90a-11: sngags kyis bsad pa'i dug dang 'dra //
T05TD4016.3E:90a-12: sangs rgyas rnams ni nyon mongs las //
T05TD4016.3E:90a-13: nyon mongs zad pas kun mkhyen brnyes //
T05TD4016.3E:90a-15: slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis 'grel pa las //
T05TD4016.3E:90a-16: nyon mongs thul la spangs pa med //
T05TD4016.3E:90a-17: ces bya ba ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:90a-18: byang chub sems dpa'i gnas skabs dang /
T05TD4016.3E:90a-19: de dag nyon mongs pa thul cing ma spangs pa'o ;
T05TD4016.3E:90a-20: / sngags kyis bsad pa'i dug dang 'dra //
T05TD4016.3E:90a-21: zhes bya ba ni dper na /
T05TD4016.3E:90a-22: sngags kyis bsad pa'i dug ni ngo bo nyid ma spangs kyang nang du mi 'gyur ba de bzhin du nyon mongs pa yang de bzhin te /
T05TD4016.3E:90a-24: shes rab kyi stobs kyis kun nas dkris pa zil gyis mnan kyang bag la nyal ni lus pa'i phyir ro ;
T05TD4016.3E:90a-25: / ci'i phyir nyon mongs pa'i bag la nyal lhag ma 'jog ce na /
T05TD4016.3E:90a-26: nyan thos kyi theg pa dang 'dra bar myur du yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur ro snyam pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:90a-27: rigs pa des na nyon mongs pas rgyu byas pas nyon mongs pa zad na thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur te /
T05TD4016.3E:90a-28: tshigs su bcad pa las ji skad du /
T05TD4016.3E:90a-29: dran dang shes pa'i stobs kyis rab zin no //
T05TD4016.3E:90a-30: nyan thos byang chub dag ni thob par 'gyur //
T05TD4016.3E:90a-31: ji ltar dug ni sngags kyis bsad pa bzhin //
T05TD4016.3E:90a-32: skyon ni yon tan nyid du mngon par 'grub //
T05TD4016.3E:90a-33: ces bshad pa lta bu'o zhes 'byung ste /
T05TD4016.3E:90b-0: slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel @90b pa las kyang phal cher de skad du bstan to //
T05TD4016.3E:90b-1: byang chub sems dpa' ni nyon mongs pa de lta bu bskyed nas sems can gyi khams su sdug bsngal gyi rgyu bzlog par nus pas de'i phyir de dag yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni zhus tshig gsum pa'i lan bstan to //
T05TD4016.3E:90b-2: 'di yang rnam pa gnyis su dbye ste /
T05TD4016.3E:90b-3: de bzhin gshegs pas lan du gsungs pa bstan pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:90b-4: byang chub sems dpa' bsngags pa brjod pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:90b-6: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams ched du nyon mongs pa bskyed nas sems can gyi sdug bsngal brlag par byed pas na byang chub sems dpa'i nyon mongs pa la sdug bsngal spong ba'i rgyu zhes bshad do //
T05TD4016.3E:90b-7: bshad pa'i rnam grangs gzhan du na byang chub sems dpa' ni ched du sems can gyi nyon mongs pa gcod par byed pas /
T05TD4016.3E:90b-8: sems can gyi nyon mongs pa nyid la sdug bsngal gyi rgyu zhes bshad de /
T05TD4016.3E:90b-9: skye shi'i sdug bsngal mngon par 'grub pa ni nyon mongs pa las 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:90b-10: sa dang po nas sa bdun pa'i bar du nyon mongs pa bskyed pa la yang dgos pa gnyis yod de /
T05TD4016.3E:90b-11: dang po ni rang gi shes pa la dbang gi stobs yod par rab tu bstan pa'i phyir ched du nyon mongs pa bskyed nas zil gyis mnan cing rab tu sel bar byed de /
T05TD4016.3E:90b-12: dper na byi las byi ba la rtsed mo byed pa bzhin no //
T05TD4016.3E:90b-13: de'i phyir slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis 'grel pa las /
T05TD4016.3E:90b-14: ched 'ga' ni zil gyis gnon par yang mi byed de /
T05TD4016.3E:90b-15: de'i mthu nyams sad pa'i phyir ched du sems bskyed nas re zhig ldang bar byed do zhes bstan pa yin no ;
T05TD4016.3E:90b-16: / gnyis pa nyon mongs pa bskyed de dngos po can gyi lus blangs nas sems can la phan 'dogs par byed pas /
T05TD4016.3E:90b-17: des na de'i phyir yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:90b-18: de'i phyir bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las /
T05TD4016.3E:90b-19: 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni rang gi nyon mongs pas sems can thams cad kyi phan pa'i bya ba dag byed pas bsod nams dpag tu med pa dag skyed do zhes bshad pa yin no //
T05TD4016.3E:90b-20: gzhan yang bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa las /
T05TD4016.3E:91a-0: byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pas srog gcod pa la sogs pa'i las rnam pa bcu @91a * //
T05TD4016.3E:91a-1: byas kyang kha na ma tho ba med pa la bsod nams dpag tu med pa yang skye bar 'gyur zhing byang chub kyang thob par 'gyur ro zhes bshad do //
T05TD4016.3E:91a-2: slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis 'grel pa las /
T05TD4016.3E:91a-3: sdug bsngal mi skyed pa'i phyir kha na ma tho ba yang med do //
T05TD4016.3E:91a-4: lam gyi grangs su gyur pa'i phyir bsod nams dpag tu med pa skye bar yang 'gyur ro zhes bshad do //
T05TD4016.3E:91a-5: byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
T05TD4016.3E:91a-6: bcom ldan 'das bla na ma mchis pa'i byang chub gang yon tan gyi phan yon chen po de lta bu dang ldan pa ni ngo mtshar che ba lags pas zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa byang chub sems dpa' bsngags pa brjod pa ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:91a-7: 'di yang rnam pa gnyis te sangs rgyas kyi yon tan gyi bsngags pa brjod pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:91a-8: byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan gyi bsngags pa brjod pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:91a-9: 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi yon tan gyi bsngags pa brjod pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:91a-10: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams ma 'ongs pa na bla na med pa'i byang chub gnyer bar byed pas /
T05TD4016.3E:91a-11: yon tan gyi phan yon de lta bu dang ldan par gyur pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:91a-13: yang na dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyi byang chub kyi phan yon gyi dbang gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bya ba khyad par du 'phags par 'gyur ba'o //
T05TD4016.3E:91a-14: byang chub sems dpa' rnams las nyon mongs pa skye ba dag gis kyang sems can dang /
T05TD4016.3E:91a-16: rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba las khyad par du 'phags par bgyid na /
T05TD4016.3E:91a-17: de las gzhan pa'i yon tan rnams lta smos kyang ci 'tshal zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan gyi bsngags pa brjod pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:91a-18: byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa skye ba dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba yang so so'i skye bo dang theg pa gnyis po thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba las khyad par du 'phags na /
T05TD4016.3E:91a-19: de las gzhan pa'i dge ba'i yon tan dang ldan pa lta smos kyang ci dgos te /
T05TD4016.3E:91a-20: so so skye bo las sems bskyed pa yang theg pa gnyis pa las khyad par du 'phags pa yin na /
T05TD4016.3E:91b-0: sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems can la phan 'dogs @91b pa'i ched du nyon mongs pa bskyed pa lta smos kyang ci dgos zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T05TD4016.3E:91b-1: de'i 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las /
T05TD4016.3E:91b-3: rang sangs rgyas kyang zag pa zad pa yin yang /
T05TD4016.3E:91b-4: byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa tsam mi phod de /
T05TD4016.3E:91b-5: dper na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bu mngal na gnas kyang /
T05TD4016.3E:91b-6: gzhan dag gi bu las khyad par du 'phags pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:91b-7: gzhan yang dper na rgyal po'i bu rgyal por dbang ma bskur mod kyi /
T05TD4016.3E:91b-8: 'on kyang blon po thabs dang ldan pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:91b-9: phyug po dag las khyad par du 'phags pa bzhin no //
T05TD4016.3E:91b-11: sems can ni rang gi bde ba gnyer ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:91b-12: bdag nyid kyi lus kyi phyir gnyen bshes la sred par byed do //
T05TD4016.3E:91b-13: theg pa gnyis po dag ni 'jig rten pa bde ba la srid pa med kyang /
T05TD4016.3E:91b-14: rang gi sdug bsngal nye bar zhi bar byed pa'i phyir /
T05TD4016.3E:91b-15: mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba tshol bar sems can la phan mi 'dogs te /
T05TD4016.3E:91b-16: byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can yongs su bzla ba'i ched du sems bskyed pa yin pas /
T05TD4016.3E:91b-17: de'i phyir khyad par du 'phags so //
T05TD4016.3E:91b-18: gzhan ji skad du dper na mngon par shes pa drug dang ldan pa'i dgra bcom pa zhig gis /
T05TD4016.3E:91b-19: dge tshul gcig la chos gos dang lhung bzed bskur nas /
T05TD4016.3E:91b-20: lam du zhugs te song ba las dge tshul de 'di snyam du /
T05TD4016.3E:91b-21: bdag gis theg pa gang gis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya zhes bsams pa las /
T05TD4016.3E:91b-22: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mchog dam pa yin pas bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi theg pas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'o zhes sems bskyed pa de'i bsam pa slob dpon gyis rig nas /
T05TD4016.3E:91b-23: chos gos dang lhung bzed slar blangs te /
T05TD4016.3E:91b-24: bdag nyid kyis khyer nas dge tshul mdun du gtong ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:91b-25: dge tshul de yang 'di snyam du bla na med pa'i byang chub ni shin tu thag ring ste /
T05TD4016.3E:91b-26: yun ring por 'khor ba na gnas shing sdug bsngal tshad med pa dang du blangs dgos pas re zhig theg pa chung du'i mya ngan las 'das pas myur du yongs su mya ngan las 'das na rung ngo snyam du sems bskyed pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:92a-0: slob dpon gyis rig nas chos gos dang lhung bzed de dag dge tshul la bskur nas phyi bzhin 'gror @92a * //
T05TD4016.3E:92a-2: de ltar lan gsum du byas pas dge tshul des slob dpon la smras pa /
T05TD4016.3E:92a-3: slob dpon bgres pas byis pa chung du dang 'dra ste /
T05TD4016.3E:92a-4: res 'ga' ni bdag mdun du btang /
T05TD4016.3E:92a-5: res 'ga' ni bdag phyi bzhin du mchir gsal ba ci lags /
T05TD4016.3E:92a-7: khyod dang po ni sangs rgyas mngon par bsgrub par sems bskyed pas sems de btsun par byas pa yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:92a-8: de ni slob dpon gyi lam la gnas pa yin pas /
T05TD4016.3E:92a-9: gang zag de lta bu de la ni sangs rgyas kyis kyang mchod par bya ba yin na dgra bcom pa lta ci smos te /
T05TD4016.3E:92a-10: de'i phyir khyod mdun du btang ba yin no //
T05TD4016.3E:92a-11: khyod yang sems 'gyod par gyur nas /
T05TD4016.3E:92a-12: theg pa chung ngu gnyer bar 'dod pa ni khyod dang nga'i bar na thag shin tu ring bas de'i phyir khyed phyi bzhin du 'gror bcug pa yin no //
T05TD4016.3E:92a-13: dge tshul de skad du thos pas shin tu skrag pa skyes te bdag gi slob dpon ni bdag gi sems shes te /
T05TD4016.3E:92a-14: bdag gis lan cig tsam sems bskyed pa yang theg pa gnyis las khyad par du 'phags par gyur na yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa lta ci smos zhes bdag nyid brtan par theg pa chen po'i chos la gnas par gyur to zhes 'byung ba lta bu'o //
T05TD4016.3E:92a-15: gzhan yang 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las /
T05TD4016.3E:92a-16: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su gang ba'i theg pa pa gnyis 'od ma'i tshal bzhin du gyur pa la mchod pa byas pas //
T05TD4016.3E:92a-17: gang gis sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa byas pa bsod nams che'o //
T05TD4016.3E:92a-18: theg pa pa gnyis ni de kho na nyid kyi mtha' mngon du gyur pas sems can thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi gzhi yin na /
T05TD4016.3E:92a-19: ci'i phyir sems bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' tsam mi phod ce na /
T05TD4016.3E:92a-21: dngos po gsum gyi phyir de tsam ma yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:92a-22: thams cad mkhyen pa'i sems la spyad pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:92a-23: rtag par pha rol tu phyin pa drug la sogs pa'i yon tan dang mi 'bral ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:92a-24: byang chub sems dpa' khams gsum gyi nyes pa spang zhing theg pa gsum po dag 'byung bar byed pa yin la /
T05TD4016.3E:92a-25: theg pa pa gnyis ni de lta ma yin pas de'i phyir khyad par du 'phags so //
T05TD4016.3E:92b-0: byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis @92b bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
T05TD4016.3E:92b-1: bcom ldan 'das bcom 'das kyis ji skad du nyan thos kyi theg pa gang yin pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:92b-2: theg pa chen po gang yin pa de ni theg pa gcig go zhes bka' stsal pa de la dgongs pa gang lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bzhi pa de bzhin gshegs pas theg pa gcig tu gsungs pa'i dgongs pa zhes bya ba ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:92b-3: 'di yang zhu ba gsol pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:92b-5: 'di ni zhu ba gsol ba nyid do //
T05TD4016.3E:92b-6: 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyi sngar nyan thos kyi theg pa zhes gang gsungs pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:92b-7: theg pa chen po'i mdo dag las ;
T05TD4016.3E:92b-8: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa zhes gang gsungs pa de dag ni theg pa gcig go zhes dam pa'i chos padma dkar po'i mdo las ji skad gsungs pa lta bu ste /
T05TD4016.3E:92b-9: de dag gi dgongs pa gang lags zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T05TD4016.3E:92b-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa /
T05TD4016.3E:92b-11: rigs kyi bu ji ltar nyan thos kyi theg pa de dag tu chos rnam pa sna tshogs kyi ngo bo nyid 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:92b-13: nang gi skye mched drug dang /
T05TD4016.3E:92b-14: phyi rol gyi skye mched drug dang /
T05TD4016.3E:92b-15: de dag la sogs pa gang dag bstan pa ni theg pa chen por chos de dag chos kyi dbyings gcig par mtshungs shing tshul gcig par mtshungs pa'i phyir nga ni theg pa tha dad pa nyid du mi smra'o zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan gsungs pa ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:92b-16: 'di yang rnam pa gsum du dbye ste /
T05TD4016.3E:92b-17: dgongs pa yang dag par bshad pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:92b-18: rmongs pa dag gi nor pa 'dzin par bstan pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:92b-19: dgongs pa bshad pa'i mjug bsdu ba'o //
T05TD4016.3E:92b-20: 'di ni dgongs pa rnam par bshad pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:92b-21: bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa /
T05TD4016.3E:92b-22: ji ltar ngas nyan thos kyi theg pa de dag tu phung po la sogs pa bshad pa'i dgongs pa des ni theg pa rnam pa tha dad par 'gyur ba yin la /
T05TD4016.3E:92b-23: ngas 'dir theg pa chen po'i bstan pa las ni ngo bo nyid gcig pa'i de bzhin nyid dang mtshungs par bstan pa'i phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:93a-0: tshul gcig pa'i lam mtshungs pa nyid du bstan pa'i phyir theg pa gcig tu bstan kyang @93a * //
T05TD4016.3E:93a-1: theg pa rnams kyi tha dad pa ni med pa ma yin no //
T05TD4016.3E:93a-2: de la gang dag don la sgra ji bzhin kho nar yang dag pa ma yin pa rnam par rtog pa bskyed pa kha cig ni sgro 'dogs par byed de /
T05TD4016.3E:93a-3: kha cig skur ba 'debs par byed ces bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa rmongs pa dag gi nor par 'dzin pa bstan to //
T05TD4016.3E:93a-5: sgro 'dogs shing skur pa 'debs pa bstan pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:93a-6: rtsod par smra ba bstan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:93a-8: 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pas theg pa gsum gyi bstan pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:93a-9: sgrub pa bshad pa la sgra ji bzhin du don 'dzin pas theg pa gsum po dag yod par bstan pa thos na /
T05TD4016.3E:93a-10: nges par theg pa gsum po dag yod par 'dzin cing phyogs gcig tu tha dad do zhes zer ba ni sgro 'dogs pa zhes bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:93a-11: sangs rgyas su grub par ma nges pa'i don ni mi 'dod pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:93a-12: gal te theg pa gcig gis thams cad sangs rgyas su 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes thos na theg pa ni gcig kho na zhes zer ba ni skur pa 'debs pa zhes bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:93a-13: zhi ba phyogs gcig pa sangs rgyas su mi 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:93a-14: gzhan yang theg pa rnams tha dad par gyur pa'i rigs pa la phan tshun mi mthun par sems shing de bzhin du gcig la gcig phan tshun rtsod pa smra bar byed pa gang yin pa zhes bya bas ni gnyis pa rtsod par smra ba bstan te /
T05TD4016.3E:93a-15: 'di ltar theg pa gcig tu gsungs par thos na nges par gsum du gsungs pa thabs kyis bstan pa yin par shes par bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:93a-16: theg pa gsum du gsungs par thos pa las nges par theg pa gsum yod pa nyid du 'dzin par byed na ni theg pa gcig tu gsungs pa mi mthun par 'gyur ro //
T05TD4016.3E:93a-17: tha dad pa'i don brjod pa'i phyir theg pa gsum yod par gsungs kyang /
T05TD4016.3E:93a-18: theg pa gcig tu gsungs pa dang 'gal bar mi 'gyur te /
T05TD4016.3E:93a-19: theg pa gsum po dag tha dad par gyur kyang /
T05TD4016.3E:93a-20: de bzhin nyid gcig tu mtshungs pa'i phyir theg pa gsum dang gcig tu gsungs kyang 'gal ba med de /
T05TD4016.3E:93a-21: de'i phyir gong du mdo las /
T05TD4016.3E:93a-22: gzhan yang don dam yang dag 'phags nyan thos pa'i rigs can gyi sems can dag gis kyang lam 'di nyid dang /
T05TD4016.3E:93a-23: sgrub pa'i gnas 'di nyid kyi phyir bla na med pa'i bde ba mya ngan las 'das pa thob par 'gyur la /
T05TD4016.3E:93b-0: sangs rgyas kyi theg @93b pa'i rigs can gyi sems can dang /
T05TD4016.3E:93b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs can gyi sems can rnams kyis kyang lam 'di nyid dang /
T05TD4016.3E:93b-2: sgrub pa'i gnas 'di nyid kyi phyir bla na med pa'i bde ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa thob par 'gyur te /
T05TD4016.3E:93b-3: gnyis pa gang yang med pas sa de las dgongs nas theg pa ni gcig kho na'o zhes bstan kyang sems can gyi khams thams cad na sems can gyi rigs rnam pa sna tshogs dbang po rtul po nyid dang /
T05TD4016.3E:93b-5: dbang po rnon po nyid kyi bye brag dang med pa ni ma yin no //
T05TD4016.3E:93b-6: rigs kyi bu zhi ba la phyogs gcig tu bgrod pa'i nyan thos kyi rigs can gyi gang zag ni sangs rgyas rnams kyis brtson pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:93b-7: sbyor ba'i thabs rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gdul bar mdzad kyang byang chub kyi snying po la gzhag ste /
T05TD4016.3E:93b-8: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par mi nus so zhes gsungs te /
T05TD4016.3E:93b-9: zhib tu de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no //
T05TD4016.3E:93b-10: de'i phyir gcig tu gsungs pa ni don dang spyod pa'i dbang du mdzad nas gsungs pa yin par rig par bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:93b-11: de ni 'dir dgongs pa yin no zhes bya ba ni gsum pa mjug bsdu ba ste /
T05TD4016.3E:93b-12: mdo 'di nyid kyis brda phrad par zad do //
T05TD4016.3E:93b-13: de ltar theg pa gsum po dag tha dad par gyur kyang don gyi tshul gyi dbang du mdzad na tshul gcig tu gyur pas de'i phyir dgongs pas theg pa gcig tu gsungs te /
T05TD4016.3E:93b-14: de yang phung po la sogs pa'i chos las yin gyi /
T05TD4016.3E:93b-15: tshig las brtsams nas gcig ces gsungs pa ni ma yin no //
T05TD4016.3E:93b-16: theg pa gcig rgya cher bshad pa ni sngar gong du bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:93b-17: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de nyid yang bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa tshigs su bcad pas mdor bstan pa zhes bya ba ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:93b-20: tshigs su bcad pa nyid kyis yang dag par bstan pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:93b-22: / sa rnams bsdus dang 'du shes mi mthun phyogs //
T05TD4016.3E:93b-23: khyad par skyed dang smon dang bslab pa rnams //
T05TD4016.3E:93b-24: 'di brten sangs rgyas rnams kyis theg chen bshad //
T05TD4016.3E:93b-25: 'di la rab bsgoms sangs rgyas 'grub par 'gyur //
T05TD4016.3E:94a-0: zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa tshigs su bcad pas @94a * //
T05TD4016.3E:94a-1: yang dag par bshad pa ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:94a-2: 'dir tshigs su bcad pa gsum gsungs pa 'dis ni gong du bstan pa'i tshig rkyang pa yin no //
T05TD4016.3E:94a-3: 'di yang rnam pa gnyis su dbye ste /
T05TD4016.3E:94a-4: de la tshigs su bcad pa dang po ni gong du bstan pa'i sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa rnams zlos pa yin no ;
T05TD4016.3E:94a-5: / tshigs su bcad pa phyi ma gnyis ni gong du bstan pa'i theg pa gcig tu gsungs pa zlos pa yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:94a-7: de la sa rnams bsdus zhes bya ba ni gong du mdo las gsungs pa'i rnam par dag pa bzhi dang /
T05TD4016.3E:94a-8: yan lag bcu gcig bstan pa dag zlos pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:94a-9: de la 'du shes bsdus zhes bya ba ni gong du bstan pa'i sa bcu gcig gi ming bstan pa zlos pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:94a-10: 'du shes ni ming la bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:94a-11: ming ni 'du shes la skye bas rgyu la ming du btags pa'i phyir 'du shes zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:94a-12: sa rnams kyi mi mthun pa'i phyogs zhes bya ba ni kun tu rmongs pa nyi shu rtsa gnyis dang /
T05TD4016.3E:94a-13: gnas ngan len bcu gcig zlos pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:94a-14: 'phags pa sa bcu'i mdo las spyod pa'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs yin par gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:94a-15: sa rnams kyi khyad par zhes bya ba'i ming ni gong du bstan pa'i rnam par dag pa brgyad zlos pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:94a-16: sa rnams kyi khyad par zhes bya ba ni gong du mdo las byang chub sems dpa'i skye ba khyad par du 'phags pa gsungs pa zlos pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:94a-17: sa rnams kyi smon lam zhes bya ba ni /
T05TD4016.3E:94a-18: gong du mdo las smon lam gsum gsungs pa zlos pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:94a-19: sa rnams kyi bslab pa rnams zhes bya ba ni gong du bstan pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi sgo sna tshogs zlos pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:94a-20: ci'i phyir bag la nyal la sogs pas bzlas te ma bstan zhe na /
T05TD4016.3E:94a-21: sngar bstan pa'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi nang du bsdus pa'i phyir logs shig tu ma bstan to //
T05TD4016.3E:94a-22: de yan chad ni yang dag par bshad pa'i tshigs su bcad pa bstan nas /
T05TD4016.3E:94a-23: da ni tshig phyi ma gnyis kyis theg pa chen po bslab pa rnams bla na med pa'i byang chub len par bstan to //
T05TD4016.3E:94a-24: yang na tshig phyi ma gnyis ni tshigs su bcad pa phyi ma gnyis kyi mtshams sbyar ba yin no //
T05TD4016.3E:94a-25: chos rnams sna tshogs nyid ni gang bstan pa //
T05TD4016.3E:94a-26: de dag nyid ni tshul gcig par yang bstan //
T05TD4016.3E:94a-27: 'di ltar theg pa dman dang theg chen dang //
T05TD4016.3E:94b-0: de phyir ngas ni theg nyid @94b tha dad med par bshad //
T05TD4016.3E:94b-1: ces bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa tshigs su bcad pa gnyis kyi gong du theg pa gcig tu gsungs pa zlos pa ston te /
T05TD4016.3E:94b-2: 'di ni gong du mdo las bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa zhes bya ba nas /
T05TD4016.3E:94b-3: nga ni theg pa tha dad pa nyid du mi smra'o zhes bya ba'i bar du gsungs pa dag zlos pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:94b-4: 'di ltar nyan thos dang de bzhin gshegs pa tshul gcig pa nyid du mtshungs pa'i phyir /
T05TD4016.3E:94b-5: da ni theg pa tha dad du mi smra'o zhes gsungs te /
T05TD4016.3E:94b-6: de bzhin du mtshungs pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:94b-7: don la sgra bzhin du rnam par rtog par byed pa /
T05TD4016.3E:94b-8: kha cig sgro 'dogs kha cig skur ba 'debs shing zhes bya ba ni gong du mdo las de dag la gang dag ces bya ba nas kha cig ni skur pa 'debs par byed ces bya ba'i bar du gsungs pa dag zlos pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:94b-9: de nyid 'gal ba tsam du gang sems pa //
T05TD4016.3E:94b-10: rmongs pa'i blo can mi mthun rtsod smrar 'gyur //
T05TD4016.3E:94b-11: zhes bya ba ni gong du mdo las gzhan yang theg pa rnams zhes bya ba nas /
T05TD4016.3E:94b-12: de ni 'di'i dgos pa yin no zhes bya ba'i bar du gsungs pa dag zlos pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:94b-13: theg pa gcig tu gsungs pa rgya cher bstan pa ni gong du bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:94b-14: de nas spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
T05TD4016.3E:94b-15: bcom ldan 'das dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'dir bstan pa 'di'i ming ci lags /
T05TD4016.3E:94b-16: bdag gis ji ltar gzung bar bgyi zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa bka' bzhin du ma bsgrubs pa'i phyogs zhes bya ba ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:94b-17: 'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:94b-18: lan du gsungs pa bstan te ;
T05TD4016.3E:94b-19: 'di ni dang po ji ltar gsungs pa'i don du zhus pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:94b-20: bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la bka' stsal pa /
T05TD4016.3E:94b-21: rigs kyi bu 'di ni sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa'i nges pa'i don bstan pa zhes bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:94b-22: sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa'i nges pa'i don bstan pa 'di khyod kyis yongs su gzung bar bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:94b-23: 'di yang yongs su zhu zhing bslab par bskul ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:94b-24: bstan pa gsungs pa'i phan yon gyis bstan te /
T05TD4016.3E:95a-0: 'di ni dang por yongs gzung zhing bslab par @95a * //
T05TD4016.3E:95a-2: / sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa'i nges pa'i don bstan pa 'di bshad pa na /
T05TD4016.3E:95a-3: 'khor 'dus pa chen po de las byang chub sems dpa' bdun khri lnga stong gis byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin theg pa chen po snang ba thob par gyur to zhes bya bas ni gnyis pa bstan pa gsungs pa'i phan yon bstan to //
T05TD4016.3E:95a-4: de la ting nge 'dzin theg pa chen po snang ba zhes bya ba ni bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa las ji skad du /
T05TD4016.3E:95a-5: theg pa chen po snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:95a-6: 'dir theg pa chen po'i don dam pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:95a-9: 'bras bu'i shes pa'i snang ba slong zhing gsal bar byed pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa lta bu'o //
T05TD4016.3E:95a-10: gzhan yang bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel ba lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las /
T05TD4016.3E:95a-11: theg pa chen po snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin zhes bya ba la /
T05TD4016.3E:95a-12: theg pa chen po ni rnam pa gsum ste /
T05TD4016.3E:95a-16: de la ngo bo nyid ni dang po ngo bo nyid med pa gsum mo //
T05TD4016.3E:95a-17: rjes su 'brang ba ni bsod nams dang ye shes kyis bcu dang /
T05TD4016.3E:95a-18: pha rol tu phyin pa bcu yongs su bsdus pas ngo bo nyid med pa dang rjes su mthun pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:95a-19: thob pa ni yon tan bzhi dang ldan pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:95a-20: ting nge 'dzin ni yul rnam pa 'di gsum la dmigs pa'i phyir theg pa chen po zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:95a-21: ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas nas ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes 'thob par 'gyur la /
T05TD4016.3E:95a-22: ye shes 'dis ni de bzhin nyid dang sangs rgyas tha dad pa nyid du gsal bar byed pa'i phyir gsal ba zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:95a-23: gzhan yang ting nge 'dzin 'dis 'dod chen pa'i ma rig pa'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs 'joms par byed pa'i phyir snang ba zhes bya'o zhes 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:95a-24: dgongs pa zab mo nges par 'grel ba'i mdo las de bzhin gshegs pa'i bya ba sgrub pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o /
T05TD4016.3E:95a-26: // / bam po drug cu rtsa drug pa /
T05TD4016.3E:95a-27: le'u 'di gcig bstan pa yang sgo rnam pa gsum du rnam par phye nas bshad par bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:95a-28: le'u nyid kyi ming gi don bstan pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:95b-0: le'u bstan pa'i dgongs pa @95b bstan pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:95b-1: tshig gi don yang dag par bshad pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:95b-2: de la le'u'i ming gi don bstan pa la yang don rnam pa gnyis yod de /
T05TD4016.3E:95b-3: de la dang po de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya bas ni 'dul bar mdzad pa'i bdag po bstan to //
T05TD4016.3E:95b-4: gnyis pa bya bsgrub pa'i le'u zhes bya bas ni las su bya ba nyid bstan to //
T05TD4016.3E:95b-5: de la de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya bas ni mdor bsdu na don rnam pa gsum dang ldan te /
T05TD4016.3E:95b-6: don dam pa las brtsams te /
T05TD4016.3E:95b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bstan pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:95b-8: sgrub pa las brtsams pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:95b-10: sgrub pa gnyis ka las brtsams pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:95b-11: de la don dam pa kho na las brtsams pa ni de bzhin nyid la brten nas bstan pa gang yin pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:95b-12: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mdo las ji skad du gang nas kyang ma byon pa gang du yang mi gshegs pas de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:95b-13: gzhan yang 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rdo rje gcod pa'i mdo las /
T05TD4016.3E:95b-14: de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ba ni de kho na nyid kyi de bzhin nyid de /
T05TD4016.3E:95b-15: gang du yang mi gshegs gang nas kyang ma byon pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:95b-16: 'phags pa stug po bkod pa'i mdo las /
T05TD4016.3E:95b-18: 'gag pa med pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya'o zhes gsungs pa lta bu ste /
T05TD4016.3E:95b-19: 'di la sogs pa'i bstan pa dag las de bzhin gshegs pa zhes gsungs pa ni /
T05TD4016.3E:95b-20: las yongs su 'dzin pa ni rnam par bshad pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:95b-21: de la bsgrub pa kho na las brtsams nas bstan pa ni gnas bcu'i 'grel ba las ji skad du /
T05TD4016.3E:95b-22: de bzhin nyid ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug ces bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:95b-23: chos drug po 'di dag gis sangs rgyas kyi sar 'gro bar byed pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:95b-24: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las de kho na nyid kyi la ma la bcibs nas mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa lta bu ste /
T05TD4016.3E:95b-25: bshad pa 'di dang sbyar na de bzhin nyid kyi de bzhin gshegs pa yin pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:96a-0: 'di ni bdag po'i dbang du byas pa'i rnam par @96a * //
T05TD4016.3E:96a-2: de la don dam pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:96a-3: sgrub pa las brtsams nas bstan pa ni 'phags pa mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mdo las ji skad du /
T05TD4016.3E:96a-4: pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang /
T05TD4016.3E:96a-5: stong pa nyid bcu gcig la bcibs nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:96a-6: gzhan yang 'phags pa gnas bcu'i 'grel pa las /
T05TD4016.3E:96a-7: de la de bzhin zhes bya ba ni de kho na nyid kyi mtshan nyid do //
T05TD4016.3E:96a-8: gshegs pa zhes bya ba ni shes rab yin pa'i phyir /
T05TD4016.3E:96a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya'o zhes bstan pa lta bu ste /
T05TD4016.3E:96a-10: de la pha rol tu phyin pa drug ni sgrub pa yin la /
T05TD4016.3E:96a-11: stong pa nyid dang de kho na nyid kyi mtshan nyid ni mngon du bya ba'i don yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:96a-12: 'di ltar rgyu dang yul la mngon par sangs rgyas par gshegs pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:96a-13: 'di yang dbang po'i dbang du byas pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:96a-14: rgya cher rnam par 'byed pa'i mtshan nyid rnam par bstan pa las bshad pa bzhin du rig par bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:96a-15: de la sgrub pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ni las su bya ba nyid yang dag par bstan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:96a-16: sgrub pa zhes bya ba 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:96a-17: bya ba nyid la sogs par sgrub par nus pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:96a-18: bya ba zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:96a-19: yul la brten nas sgrub pa mngon par grub pa gang yin pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:96a-20: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang /
T05TD4016.3E:96a-21: zhing la sogs pa ston pa'i sku phrin las su bya ba rnams 'byor par gyur pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:96a-22: yang dag pa'i don du na sku gsum sgrub pa'i le'u zhes bya ba las /
T05TD4016.3E:96a-23: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni sems can la phan 'dogs pa sngon du gtang bas de'i phyir 'dul ba'i dbang du mdzad nas le'u 'di smos pa yin no //
T05TD4016.3E:96a-24: yang na sku gsum char yang sems can gdul ba'i bya ba mdzad par spyod pas so //
T05TD4016.3E:96a-25: mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las kyang /
T05TD4016.3E:96a-26: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i gnas nges pa'i don bstan pa'i le'u zhes 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:96a-27: dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni /
T05TD4016.3E:96a-28: byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal chos kyi rgyal bus zhu ba zhus pa'i le'u zhes 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:96b-0: de la le'u gnyis bstan pa'i dgongs pa bstan @96b pa ni /
T05TD4016.3E:96b-1: de yan chad du spyod yul dang /
T05TD4016.3E:96b-2: sgrub pa mtshungs pa med par bshad zin pas /
T05TD4016.3E:96b-3: de'i phyir 'di mtshungs pa med pa'i 'bras bu don yang dag par bstan pa yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:96b-4: don de la brten nas spyod pa skye ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:96b-5: spyod pa'i rgyu 'bras thob pa ni don gyi go rims yin pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:96b-6: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
T05TD4016.3E:96b-7: bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku zhes gsungs na /
T05TD4016.3E:96b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku'i mtshan nyid ji lta bu lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa tshig gi don yang dag par bshad pa zhes bya ba ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:96b-9: le'u 'di gcig kyang mdor bsdu na rnam pa gnyis su dbye ste /
T05TD4016.3E:96b-11: lan dag gis yang dag par bshad pa'i don dang /
T05TD4016.3E:96b-12: de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyi zhes bya ba nas /
T05TD4016.3E:96b-13: ji ltar yongs su bsrung bar bgyi zhes bya ba'i bar gyi bka' bzhin du sgrub pa'i phyogs bstan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:96b-14: de la yang dag par bshad pa'i phyogs kyang zhu ba gsol ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:96b-15: lan du gsungs pa bcu gnyis yod pa gnyis las rnam pa bcu gnyis su dbye ste /
T05TD4016.3E:96b-17: lan dag gis chos kyi sku'i mtshan nyid rab tu dbye ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:96b-18: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'i sku skye ba med par 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid bstan pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:96b-19: sprul pa'i sku ston pa'i thabs la mkhas pa bstan pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:96b-20: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung gi dbye brag bstan pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:96b-21: de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis zhes bya ba 'di man chad de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi thugs skye ba'i mtshan nyid bstan pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:96b-22: sprul pa'i sku la sems mnga' 'am mi mnga' ba bstan pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:96b-23: de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul gyi bye brag gi mtshan nyid bstan pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:96b-24: de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba la sogs pa gnyis su med pa'i mtshan nyid rnam pa gsum bstan pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:96b-25: de bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams kyi dmigs pa mdzad pa'i bye brag bstan pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:97a-0: de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku @97a * //
T05TD4016.3E:97a-2: theg pa gnyis kyi rnam par grol ba'i sku'i bye brag gi sku'i mtshan nyid bstan pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:97a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa dang byang chub sems dpa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi mthus sems can yongs su 'dzin pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:97a-4: zhing yongs su dag pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:97a-5: yongs su ma dag pa gnyis kyi bye brag gi mtshan nyid bstan pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:97a-6: 'di ni dang po zhu ba gsol ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:97a-7: lan dag gis chos kyi sku'i mtshan nyid rab tu dbye ba'o //
T05TD4016.3E:97a-8: yang na rnam pa bcu gnyis po de dag rnam pa gsum du bsdus te /
T05TD4016.3E:97a-9: chos kyi sku'i mtshan nyid bstan pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:97a-10: byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyi zhes bya ba nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi skye ba 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid ji lta bur rig par bgyi lags zhes bya ba man chad kyis sprul pa'i sku'i mtshan nyid bstan pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:97a-11: de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal zhes bya ba man chad kyis longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:97a-12: de ltar rnam pa gnyis su bshad pa yod kyang /
T05TD4016.3E:97a-13: 'dir ni re zhig bshad pa phyi ma dang sbyar nas bshad par bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:97a-14: sku gsum po de dag gi mtshan nyid kyang khong du chud par dka' bas de'i phyir 'dir sku gsum gyi don bstan nas /
T05TD4016.3E:97a-15: de'i 'og tu mdo'i tshig gi don bshad par bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:97a-16: sku gsum gyi don gyi mtshan nyid bstan pa dag bshad pa bzhin du rig par bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:97a-17: tshig gi don bshad pa yang zhu ba gsol ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:97a-18: len du gsungs pa bstan te /
T05TD4016.3E:97a-19: 'di ni dang po byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyis zhu ba gsol ba nyid do //
T05TD4016.3E:97a-20: de la byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa 'jam dpal zhes bya ba ni de kho na nyid kyi bden pa'i sems rtag par zhi zhing dben la /
T05TD4016.3E:97a-21: dgra zun kun la phan 'dogs shing gnod pa mi byed pa'i 'jam dpal zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:97a-22: 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi sa'i 'grel pa las /
T05TD4016.3E:97a-23: 'jig rten pa thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byed cing mchod pa dang kun gyis bsngags pa brjod pa'i phyir dpal gyi don dang ldan pa yin no zhes bshad do //
T05TD4016.3E:97a-24: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:97a-25: dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi mdo las /
T05TD4016.3E:97a-26: byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal ni /
T05TD4016.3E:97b-0: 'das @97b pa'i sangs rgyas klu'i rigs kyi gtso bo zhes bya ba yin no zhes 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:97b-1: 'phags pa sor mo phreng ba'i mdo las /
T05TD4016.3E:97b-2: 'phags pa 'jam dpal ni byang phyogs kyi sangs rgyas rab tu dga' ba'i nor bu rin po che brtsags pa yin no zhes gsungs so //
T05TD4016.3E:97b-3: byang chub sems dpa' 'di yang dag par de bzhin gshegs pa yin yang sangs rgyas kyi chos rab tu bstan pa'i phyir /
T05TD4016.3E:97b-4: byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs su ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:97b-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la bka' stsal pa /
T05TD4016.3E:97b-6: rigs kyi sa dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu bsgoms pa'i nges par 'byung bas gnas su gyur pa yongs su rdzogs pa gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i mtshan nyid ces bya'o zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:97b-8: chos kyi sku'i mtshan nyid bstan pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:97b-9: rnam par grol ba'i sku bstan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:97b-10: dngos po yang rnam pa gnyis te /
T05TD4016.3E:97b-11: chos kyi sku'i mtshan nyid yang dag par bstan pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:97b-12: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i mtshan nyid du bstan pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:97b-14: mdo'i tshig 'di yang rnam pa bzhir dbye ste /
T05TD4016.3E:97b-15: de la dang po bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal la bka' stsal pa zhes bya ba ni 'chad pa po dang /
T05TD4016.3E:97b-17: gnyis pas dang pha rol tu phyin pa ni shin tu bsgoms pa'i nges par 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sku'i rgyu rnam pa gnyis yod pa nyid du rab tu bstan te /
T05TD4016.3E:97b-18: sa bcu dang pha rol tu phyin pa drug go //
T05TD4016.3E:97b-19: de la sa ni rgyu yang dag par bsgrubs pas gnas par bya ba'i sa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:97b-20: pha rol tu phyin pa ni sa la brten nas mngon par sgrub pa yang dag pa'i rgyu nyid de /
T05TD4016.3E:97b-21: chos kyi sku la ltos na ni gsal bar byed pa'i rgyu yin la /
T05TD4016.3E:97b-22: rgyu gnyis kyis ni skyed pa'i rgyu yin no //
T05TD4016.3E:97b-23: 'dir ni gsal bar byed pa'i rgyu nyid du yang dag par ston te /
T05TD4016.3E:97b-24: chos kyi sku la gsal bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:97b-25: de la shin tu bsgoms pa'i nges par 'byung ba zhes bya ba ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug bsgoms pa'i dbang gis nyon mongs pa las nges par 'byung ba'i phyir nges par 'byung ba zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:98a-0: de'i phyir bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las spyad pa rnams mya ngan las @98a * //
T05TD4016.3E:98a-1: 'das pa dang rjes su mthun par gyur pa'i phyir nges par 'byung ba zhes bshad do //
T05TD4016.3E:98a-2: yang na mya ngan las 'das pa la nges par 'byung ba zhes bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:98a-3: 'dir yang lam bsgoms pa las mya ngan las 'das pa dang rjes su mthun par gyur pa'i phyir nges par 'byung ba zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:98a-4: gzhan yang nges par 'byung ba zhes bya ba ni bgrod pa'i don yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:98a-5: de'i phyir bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa las /
T05TD4016.3E:98a-6: bgrod par bya ba mthar thug pa'i phyir nges par 'byung ba zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:98a-7: bshad pas nges par 'byung ba ni mya ngan las 'das pa bgrod pa'i don yin no //
T05TD4016.3E:98a-8: gsum pa gnas gyur pa yang dag par bsgrub cing yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya ba ni chos kyi sku'i mtshan nyid yang dag par bstan to //
T05TD4016.3E:98a-9: de la gnas gyur pa zhes bya ba ni bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa las ji skad du /
T05TD4016.3E:98a-10: 'di ltar de kho na nyid kyi don ma yin pa dag ni mngon du mi snang la /
T05TD4016.3E:98a-11: de kho na nyid kyi don ji snyed pa dag ni mngon du snang ba'i phyir /
T05TD4016.3E:98a-12: gnas gyur pa lta bu'o zhes bstan pa lta bu'o //
T05TD4016.3E:98a-13: de la yongs su grub par rdzogs pa zhes bya ba ni tha dad pa'i yongs su rdzogs pa las rab tu dbye ba'o //
T05TD4016.3E:98a-14: de bzhin nyid kyi chos kyi sku ni rnam pa gnyis te /
T05TD4016.3E:98a-15: rgyu'i gnas skabs la gnas pa gang yin pa de ni rdzogs pa zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:98a-16: 'bras bu'i gnas skabs la gnas pa gang yin pa de ni yongs su grub par rdzogs pa zhes bya ste yongs su grub pa dang yongs su grub pa'i ming gi rnam grangs so //
T05TD4016.3E:98a-17: mdo 'di nyid las kyang de gong du de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa la ni sgrib pa gnyis po bcom pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:98a-18: dgongs pa yongs su grub pa la brten nas /
T05TD4016.3E:98a-19: chos kyi sku shin tu rnam par dag pa rnam par gzhag pa yin no zhes gsungs so //
T05TD4016.3E:98a-20: gzhan yang bstan bcos chos mngon pa kun las btus pa las /
T05TD4016.3E:98a-21: chos kyi sku ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:98a-22: shes bya'i sgrib pa gtan bcom pa gnas su gyur bas bsdus pa gang yin pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:98a-23: de yang sa bcu pa la ni yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:98a-24: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa la ni yongs su grub pa zhes bya'o zhes bshad de /
T05TD4016.3E:98b-0: ngo bo nyid med kyis mdzad pa theg pa chen po bsdus @98b pa'i 'grel pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:98b-1: bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las kyang de skad du bstan to //
T05TD4016.3E:98b-2: de ni de skad du sa bcu dang pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu bsgoms pa'i nges par 'byung ba'i lam gyi gnas gyur pa thob pas /
T05TD4016.3E:98b-3: chos kyi sku mngon par grub pa yin no zhes bstan par 'gyur te /
T05TD4016.3E:98b-4: 'phags pa bla na med pa'i gnas bstan pa'i mdo las /
T05TD4016.3E:98b-5: theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las kyang /
T05TD4016.3E:98b-6: sa bcu dang pha rol tu phyin pa bcu yongs su bsgoms pa'i nges par 'byung ba'i lam gyi gnas gyur pa thob pa'i mtshan nyid do zhes bshad do //
T05TD4016.3E:98b-7: gnas gyur pa'i mtshan nyid de yang rgyu cher ni mtshan nyid bstan pa dag dang /
T05TD4016.3E:98b-8: bstan bcos kun las btus pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:98b-9: theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon dbyig gnyen dang ngo bo nyid med kyis mdzad pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:98b-10: lang gi tshe bsgyur ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:98b-12: ngo bo nyid med pa gsum bstan ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:98b-13: rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa la sogs pa las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:98b-14: mtshan nyid de yang rgyu rkyen rnam pa gnyis kyi phyir /
T05TD4016.3E:98b-15: bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid du rig par bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni /
T05TD4016.3E:98b-16: gnyis pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid du bstan to //
T05TD4016.3E:98b-19: rgyu gnyis kyi mtshan nyid bstan pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:98b-20: nor bar gzung ba'i nyes pa bstan pa ste 'di ni dang po'o //
T05TD4016.3E:98b-21: spros pa med pa'i phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:98b-22: mngon par 'du bya ba med pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa rgyu gnyis kyi mtshan nyid bstan te /
T05TD4016.3E:98b-23: dang po ni spros pa med pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:98b-24: gnyis pa ni mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:98b-25: mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni yang dag pa ma yin pa dang bral ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:98b-26: mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'o zhes 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:98b-27: dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni /
T05TD4016.3E:98b-28: spros pa dang bral ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:98b-29: 'dus byas kyi rnam pa'i mtshan nyid thams cad dang bral zhes 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:98b-30: de la spros pa zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:98b-31: yod pa dang med pa la sogs pa'i spros pa rnam pa bzhi dang /
T05TD4016.3E:98b-32: de bzhin du thams cad rtag go mi rtag go zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i spros pa rnams so //
T05TD4016.3E:99a-1: ba zhes bya ba ni thogs pa dang bcas pa /
T05TD4016.3E:99a-2: skye ba dang 'gag pa la sogs pa las dang nyon mongs pa'i ngo bo nyid dang /
T05TD4016.3E:99a-3: chos kyi sku de la ni spros pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:99a-4: skye ba dang 'jig pa la sogs pa med pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:99a-5: 'dir theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis byas pa las /
T05TD4016.3E:99a-6: de la chos kyi sku'i gnas gyur pa'i mtshan nyid de sgrib pa thams cad dang bral ba /
T05TD4016.3E:99a-7: rtag par de bzhin nyid du gnas pa /
T05TD4016.3E:99a-8: rnam par 'gyur ba med pa'i phyir /
T05TD4016.3E:99a-9: las dang nyon mongs pas mngon par 'du byas pa ma yin pa'o zhes bshad do ;
T05TD4016.3E:99a-10: / gzhan yang bla na med pa'i gnas bstan pa'i mdo las kyang /
T05TD4016.3E:99a-11: rgyu dang rkyen rnam pa gnyis kyi phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:99a-12: dang po ni tshig gis brjod du med pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:99a-13: tshig spyi dang yul las yang dag par 'das pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:99a-14: gnyis pa ni 'jig rten pa'i mtshan nyid thams cad las 'das pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:99a-15: 'jig rten na dpe zla med pa'i phyir ro zhes gsungs te /
T05TD4016.3E:99a-16: bstan bcos rnam par bshad pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:99a-17: theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa las kyang de skad du bshad do //
T05TD4016.3E:99a-18: bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa las ni /
T05TD4016.3E:99a-19: don rnam pa gsum gyis de bzhin nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid ston te /
T05TD4016.3E:99a-20: de'i phyir bstan bcos de nyid las bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i mtshan nyid ni /
T05TD4016.3E:99a-21: 'di ltar de bzhin nyid rnam par dag pa de so so rang gis rig par bya ba yin pa'i phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:99a-23: dper byar med pa'i phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:99a-24: yi ge'i spyod yul ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ba yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:99a-25: slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis 'grel pa las /
T05TD4016.3E:99a-26: de la bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:99a-27: rig pa nges par sems pa las 'byung ba rnam par rtog pa'i shes pa rtog pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:99a-28: dpyod par rtogs pa dpes rab tu dbye ba'o //
T05TD4016.3E:99a-29: sangs rgyas rnams ni de dag gi spyod yul ma yin pas bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:99a-30: rtog pa dang dpyod pa'i sa thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i phyir mos pa bskyed par bya ba yin gyi /
T05TD4016.3E:99a-31: bsam par bya ba ni ma yin no zhes bshad do //
T05TD4016.3E:99b-0: sems can rnams ni smros pa la mngon par zhen cing mngon par 'du bya ba dang @99b bcas pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bas ni gsum pa nor par bzung ba'i nyes dmigs bstan te /
T05TD4016.3E:99b-1: 'di ltar sems can rnams thog ma med pa'i dus nas shes pa med pa'i phyir chos kyi sku la yod pa dang med pa la sogs pa'i spros pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:99b-2: skye ba dang 'jig pa la sogs pa 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid la mngon par zhen pa'i rgyu dang rkyen des chos kyi sku thob par ma gyur to zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T05TD4016.3E:99b-3: bcom ldan 'das nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis thob pa'i gnas gyur pa gang yin pa de yang chos kyi sku legs par brjod par bgyi 'am zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa rnam par grol ba'i sku ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:99b-4: 'di yang rnam pa bzhis bstan te /
T05TD4016.3E:99b-9: 'di ni dang po zhu ba gsol ba ste /
T05TD4016.3E:99b-10: 'di ltar theg pa gnyis po de dag gis nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa spangs pas 'thob pa'i dus byas kyang chos kyi sku zhes bgyi ba lags sam zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T05TD4016.3E:99b-11: rigs kyi bu chos kyi sku zhes brjod par mi bya'o zhes bya ba 'di ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:99b-12: mya ngan las 'das pas yongs su mngon du byas pa yin yang chos kyi sku zhes brjod par mi bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:99b-13: yon tan gyi chos kyi gnas su gyur pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:99b-14: bcom ldan 'das 'o na ci'i lus legs par brjod par bgyi zhes bya ba ni gsum pa bstan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:99b-15: rigs kyi bu rnam par grol ba'i lus zhes brjod par bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par bshad pa ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:99b-17: rnam par grol ba'i mtshan nyid mdor bstan pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:99b-18: bye brag gi mtshan nyid bstan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:99b-19: 'di ni dang po mdor bstan pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:99b-20: 'di ltar nyon mongs pa'i 'ching ba las rnam par grol bas na rnam par grol ba'i lus zhes bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T05TD4016.3E:99b-21: rnam par grol ba'i lus kyi phyir ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang mtshungs shing mnyam mo zhes ston to zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa sku gnyis kyi bye brag gi mtshan nyid bstan to //
T05TD4016.3E:99b-23: rnam par grol ba'i sku las brtsams nas /
T05TD4016.3E:100a-1: po dag bye brag med par bstan pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:100a-2: chos kyi sku las brtsams nas bye brag yod par bstan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:100a-4: 'di ltar theg pa gnyis po de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams nyon mongs pa spangs pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:100a-5: bye brag med pa'i phyir dang ;
T05TD4016.3E:100a-6: so sor brtags pa thob pa la yang bye brag med pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang mtshungs shing mnyam mo zhes bya ba gsungs so //
T05TD4016.3E:100a-7: don de yang so so nas bshad pa mi mthun pas thams cad yod par smra ba'i gzhung gis ni rnam pa gnyis su bshad de /
T05TD4016.3E:100a-8: de'i phyir bstan bcos bye brag tu bshad pa chen po las /
T05TD4016.3E:100a-9: dpyad pa dag gis smras pa /
T05TD4016.3E:100a-10: de ni 'di skad du brjod par bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:100a-11: zab pa dang bcas pa'i chos kyi bdag nyid ji snyed yod pa'i rjes su so sor brtags pa yang de snyed do //
T05TD4016.3E:100a-12: 'ching bar bya ba'i dngos po bdag nyid ji snyed pa'i rjes su 'ching ba dang bral ba'i bdag nyid kyang de snyed do //
T05TD4016.3E:100a-13: sems rnams so sor brtags pa thob pa na so so nas thob pa gcig yin nam /
T05TD4016.3E:100a-14: 'on te thun mong bar gyur zhe na /
T05TD4016.3E:100a-15: slob dpon gzhan kha cig na re so so nas tha dad pa thob par 'gyur ro zhes zer ro //
T05TD4016.3E:100a-16: gal te de lta na mdo las gsungs pa de ltar go zhing rnam par bshad par bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:100a-17: ji skad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par grol ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:100a-18: gzhan dgra bcom pa la sogs pa'i rnam par grol ba ni gnyis su med do zhes gsungs so zhe na /
T05TD4016.3E:100a-20: theg pa chen po dag gi rgyud la yod pa'i rnam par grol ba tha dad mod kyi /
T05TD4016.3E:100a-21: dge ba nyid du rtag par mtshungs pa'i phyir tha dad pa med pa zhes bstan to //
T05TD4016.3E:100a-22: gzhan yang rgyud kyi rgyun gcig pa la theg pa gsum gyi rigs dang ldan pas rnam par grol bas thob par mtshungs te /
T05TD4016.3E:100a-23: 'di ltar gzhan gyi rgyud la yod pa'i rnam par grol ba'i thob pa la ltos nas so sor tha dad pa yin yang rgyud gcig la theg pa gsum gyi rigs yod pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:100a-24: rnam par grol ba thob par mtshungs pas na theg pa gang la brten nas 'phags pa'i lam skye bar 'gyur ba des mya ngan las 'das pa 'di thob par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:100b-0: dpyad pa dag gis smras @100b pa /
T05TD4016.3E:100b-1: des de skad smra ba'i mi rigs kyi /
T05TD4016.3E:100b-2: 'di skad du ci tsam du sems can gyi rigs su gtogs pa rnams ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos re re kun las so sor brtags pa'i bdag nyid re re thob par 'gyur ro zhes brjod par bya'o zhes 'byung ste //
T05TD4016.3E:100b-3: dpyad pa dag gis thun mong du 'gog pa rnams mngon du byed par bstan pa'i phyir /
T05TD4016.3E:100b-4: rnam par grol ba yang dpag tu med do zhes bshad de zhib tu de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no //
T05TD4016.3E:100b-5: mdo sde dag gi gzhung gis ni nyon mongs pa yang spangs shing /
T05TD4016.3E:100b-6: 'gog pa mngon du byed par mtshungs pa'i phyir brtags pa tsam du mtshungs par zhes bya ba'i tshig bstan pa yin no zhes zer te /
T05TD4016.3E:100b-7: gud na bdag nyid gzhan yod pa dag gis mtshungs pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:100b-8: tha dad par bstan pa ni yod pa ma yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:100b-9: de'i gzhung gis 'dod pa'i so sor brtags pa'i 'gog pa la bdag nyid med pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:100b-10: 'dir yang theg pa chen po'i bstan pa las ni /
T05TD4016.3E:100b-11: de bzhin gcig la so sor brtags pa'i 'gog pa zhes ston pa'i phyir thams cad yod par smra ba dang mi mtshungs so //
T05TD4016.3E:100b-12: de bzhin nyid la brtags pa tsam du rnam par gzhag pa'i phyir mdo sde pa dag dang mi mtshungs so //
T05TD4016.3E:100b-13: kha cig na re 'dir gsungs pa'i chos kyi sku ni ye shes dang /
T05TD4016.3E:100b-15: cha rnam pa lnga'i chos kyi sku yang bsdu ba yin no zhes zer te /
T05TD4016.3E:100b-16: de ltar rnam pa gnyis su bshad pa yod kyang bshad pa ni snga ma yang dag pa yin no //
T05TD4016.3E:100b-17: chos kyi sku'i phyir ni khyad par yod par bstan to zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa chos kyi sku las brtsams nas khyad par yod par bstan to //
T05TD4016.3E:100b-22: sgrib pa gnyis spangs pa'i phyir dang yon tan dpag tu med pa'i gnas su gyur pa'i phyir khyad par yod par gyur to zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T05TD4016.3E:100b-23: de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku'i khyad par dang ldan pa'i phyir ni yon tan dpag tu med pas kyang khyad par du 'phags pa yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:100b-24: bgrang ba dang dper bya bar yang sla ba ma yin no zhes bya ba 'di gnyis pa bye brag yod par bshad pa bstan pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:101a-0: @101a * // 'di ltar chos kyi sku khyad par dang ldan pa'i phyir yon tan dpag tu med pa khyad par du 'phags pa'i bye brag rnam pa sna tshogs gang yin pa de ni /
T05TD4016.3E:101a-1: dpe la sogs pas shes par bya ba ma yin no zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:101a-2: yang na yon tan dpag tu med pa'i rten du gyur pas khyad par du 'phags pa dag gis theg pa gnyis las bye brag tu gyur pas na /
T05TD4016.3E:101a-3: bgrang ba dang dper bya bar sla ba ma yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:101a-4: 'di ni sku gnyis kyi bye brag gi mtshan nyid do //
T05TD4016.3E:101a-5: gzhan yang theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa las /
T05TD4016.3E:101a-6: de la chos kyi sku dang /
T05TD4016.3E:101a-7: rnam par grol ba'i lus kyi khyad par ni 'di yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:101a-8: rnam par grol ba ni nyon mongs pa 'ching ba dang bral ba tsam du zad de /
T05TD4016.3E:101a-9: dper na grong mi zhig lcags sgrog la sogs pa'i 'ching ba dang bral na sdug bsngal ba'i 'bras bu tsam zad kyi /
T05TD4016.3E:101a-10: de las lhag pa'i dbang phyug dang ldan pa ni ma yin pa lta bu'o //
T05TD4016.3E:101a-11: chos kyi sku ni bag chags dang bcas pa'i nyon mongs pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:101a-12: shes bya'i sgrib pa las rnam par grol ba ste /
T05TD4016.3E:101a-13: stobs dang mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa'i ngo mtshar gyi yon tan du mas brgyan pa 'byor ba thams cad kyi gnas so //
T05TD4016.3E:101a-14: ci ltar 'dod pa bzhin du spyod pas rang dbang mchog brnyes pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:101a-15: dper na rgyal po'i bu bcings pa dang bral ma thag tu spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba dbang phyug phun sum tshogs pa mchog dang ldan pa lta bu'o zhes 'byung ste /
T05TD4016.3E:101a-16: lang gi tshe bsgyur ba'i 'grel ba las kyang de skad bstan to //
T05TD4016.3E:101a-17: gzhan yang bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa las /
T05TD4016.3E:101a-18: theg pa gnyis kyis yongs su rdzogs pa'i gnas skabs gang yin pa de ni rnam par grol ba'i lus zhes bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:101a-19: thub pa chen po gang yin pa de ni chos kyi sku zhes bya ba'i phyir ro zhes bshad de /
T05TD4016.3E:101a-20: rnam par grol ba gnyis la gal te bye brag med pa yin na /
T05TD4016.3E:101a-21: bstan bcos theg pa chen po la 'jug pa de ji ltar go zhing rnam par bshad par bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:101a-22: de las de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par grol ba ni theg pa gnyis pa las khyad par du 'phags pa yin te //
T05TD4016.3E:101a-23: bag chags spangs pa'i phyir ro zhes bshad do zhe na /
T05TD4016.3E:101a-24: slob dpon rgyan tsang gis mdo sde dang /
T05TD4016.3E:101b-0: bstan bcos phan tshun brda phrad de @101b bshad pa las yang dag pa'i don du na de bzhin gshegs pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:101b-1: theg pa gnyis kyis rnam par grol ba'i ngo bo nyid la bye brag med cing nyon mongs pa spangs par mtshungs kyang 'gog pa mngon du byed pa'i phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:101b-2: bag chags spangs shing 'gog pa sngon mi mdzad pa'i phyir bye brag yod par gyur pa yang theg pa gnyis kyis rnam par grol ba ni bag chags da dung ma zad pa yin la /
T05TD4016.3E:101b-3: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par grol ba ni bag chags gtan du spangs pas rab tu che ba yin pas des na mdo sde dang bstan bcos dag las so so nas don re re smos pas phan tshun 'gal ba med do zhes bshad do //
T05TD4016.3E:101b-4: byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
T05TD4016.3E:101b-5: bcom ldan 'das bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi skye ba 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid ji lta bur rig par bgyi lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'i sku skye ba 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:101b-6: dang po zhu ba gsol ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:101b-7: lan du gsungs pa bstan te /
T05TD4016.3E:101b-8: 'di ni dang po sprul pa'i sku'i mtshan nyid zhus pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:101b-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la bka' stsal pa /
