T05TD4016.3E:101b-10: rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sprul pa'i sku'i phrin las mngon par 'du mdzad pa ni 'jig rten gyi khams na rnam pa thams cad 'byung ba lta bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa byin gyis brlabs pa'i mtshan nyid de bzhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:101b-12: sprul pa'i sku'i mtshan nyid bstan pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:101b-13: sku'i bye brag gi mtshan nyid bstan pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:101b-15: mdo'i tshig 'di yang rnam pa gsum du dbye ste /
T05TD4016.3E:101b-16: don dang dpe dang don du sbyar ba'o //
T05TD4016.3E:101b-17: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sprul pa'i sku'i phrin las ni /
T05TD4016.3E:101b-18: 'phags pa gser 'od dam pa'i mdo las ji skad du bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:101b-19: de'i phyir mdo sde 'di nyid las /
T05TD4016.3E:101b-20: byang chub sems dpa' sprul pa'i sku ji ltar rig par bya zhe na /
T05TD4016.3E:102a-0: @102a * // rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa sngon spyod pa'i sa la gnas pa na sems can thams cad kyi ched du chos rnam pa sna tshogs sgrub par byed do //
T05TD4016.3E:102a-1: bsgrub pa'i chos de dag kyang bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:102a-2: bsgom pa'i stobs kyi dbang thob par 'gyur ro /
T05TD4016.3E:102a-5: // / dbang thob pa'i stobs kyi ni sems can gyi mos pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:102a-6: sems can gyi spyod pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:102a-7: sems can gyi spyod pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam pa sna tshogs khong du chud cing dus la mi ltos pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:102a-8: dus dang gnas la mi 'da' bar dus dang mthun pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:102a-9: spyod pa dang mthun pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:102a-10: rjes su mthun par chos bstan pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:102a-11: rjes su mthun par sku rnam pa sna tshogs ston pa gang yin pa de ni sprul pa'i sku zhes bya'o zhes gsungs so //
T05TD4016.3E:102a-12: mdo 'di yang de bzhin te sngon rgyu dang smon lam rnam pa sna tshogs bsgrub pa las de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi phrin las sna tshogs 'byung ba yang dper na 'jig rten gyi khams na las rnam pa sna tshogs kyi dbang gis dngos po sna tshogs byung nas sems can yongs su 'dzin par byed pa ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'i sku yang de bzhin du spyod pa sna tshogs dang //
T05TD4016.3E:102a-13: yon tan gyi rnam pa dpag tu med pas brgyan pa sems can sdud pa gang yin pa de ni sprul pa'i sku'i mtshan nyid do zhes bya ba'i don to //
T05TD4016.3E:102a-14: sprul pa'i sku'i mtshan nyid ni skye zhing 'byung ba dang bcas pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:102a-15: chos kyi sku'i mtshan nyid ni skye ba 'byung ba med pa nyid du rig par bya'o zhes bya bas ni gnyis pa sku rnam pa gnyis kyi bye brag gi mtshan nyid bstan to //
T05TD4016.3E:102a-16: 'di ltar sku rnam pa gnyis las sprul pa'i sku ni rgyu las 'byung ba'i phyir skye ba 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid dang bcas pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:102a-17: de bzhin nyid kyi chos kyi sku ni ngo bo nyid de /
T05TD4016.3E:102a-18: rtag pa yin pa'i phyir skye ba 'byung ba med pa'i mtshan nyid do /
T05TD4016.3E:102a-20: // / bam po drug cu bdun pa /
T05TD4016.3E:102a-21: byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
T05TD4016.3E:102a-22: bcom ldan 'das sprul pa'i sku ston pa'i thabs la mkhas pa gang lags par bgyi lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa sprul pa'i sku bstan pa'i thabs la mkhas pa'i mtshan nyid bstan to //
T05TD4016.3E:102a-23: 'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang lan du gsungs pa bstan te /
T05TD4016.3E:102b-0: @102b 'di ni zhu ba gsol ba nyid do //
T05TD4016.3E:102b-1: sprul pa'i sku ston pa'i thabs la mkhas pa 'di ni /
T05TD4016.3E:102b-2: 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi sa'i 'grel pa las ji skad bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:102b-3: de'i phyir 'grel ba de nyid las bya ba sgrub pa'i ye shes las byung ba'i phrin las rnam pa gsum sems can gyi dbang po dang 'tsham par gyur ba'i phyir mkhas pa zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:102b-4: sbyor ba rgyun mi 'chad pa'i phyir thabs zhes bya'o zhes bshad do //
T05TD4016.3E:102b-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la bka' stsal pa /
T05TD4016.3E:102b-6: rigs kyi bu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du bdag por grags pa 'am /
T05TD4016.3E:102b-7: sbyin gnas chen por grags pa'i khyim du zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:102b-11: rnam par bshad pa yang rnam pa gnyis su dbye ste /
T05TD4016.3E:102b-12: sprul pa ston pa'i gnas bstan pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:102b-13: sprul pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:102b-15: gnas bstan pa yang rnam pa gnyis te /
T05TD4016.3E:102b-16: dang po ni gnas spyod yul gyi spyir bstan pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:102b-17: 'di ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad gang yin pa de ni sprul pa'i sku thams cad kyi spyod yul yin pas so //
T05TD4016.3E:102b-18: gnyis pa ni gnas tha dad par skye bar bstan te /
T05TD4016.3E:102b-19: 'di ltar bdag po'i grags pa ni rgyal rigs kyi khyim mo //
T05TD4016.3E:102b-20: sbyin gnas chen por grags pa ni bram ze'i khyim ste /
T05TD4016.3E:102b-21: de'i phyir bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las rgyal rigs kyi 'khor ni mi'i 'gro ba'i nang na mchog tu bdag por gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:102b-22: bram ze'i 'khor ni 'jig rten na kun gyi sbyin gnas su gyur ba'i phyir ro zhes bshad pa yin no //
T05TD4016.3E:102b-23: dus gcig tu mngal du 'jug pa dang bcas pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:102b-24: 'dod pa la longs spyod pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:102b-26: dka' ba spyod pa kun tu ston pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:102b-27: dka' ba spyod pa btang nas mngon par byang chub pa'i rim pa kun tu ston pa gang yin pa gnyis pa sprul pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:103a-0: sprul pa'i mtshan nyid mang nyung gi mtshan nyid bye brag kyang bstan pa rnams las so so nas bshad pa mi mthun pas bla na med pa'i gnas @103a * //
T05TD4016.3E:103a-1: bstan pa'i mdo las ni mtshan nyid rnam pa bcu gsum ston te /
T05TD4016.3E:103a-2: dga' ldan gyi gnas su skye ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:103a-3: lha'i gnas de las babs pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:103a-7: bslab pa rnams slob pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:103a-8: skyed mos tshal du rnam par rol pas ston pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:103a-10: dka' ba spyod pa kun du ston pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:103a-11: byang chub kyi snying por gshegs pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:103a-12: mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:103a-13: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:103a-14: yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'o zhes bstan pa'o//
T05TD4016.3E:103a-15: mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni mtshan nyid rnam pa bcu gcig tu ston te /
T05TD4016.3E:103a-19: 'dod pa la longs spyod pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:103a-22: byang chub kyi snying por gshegs pa dang ;
T05TD4016.3E:103a-24: mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:103a-25: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:103a-26: yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'o zhes 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:103a-27: dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las mtshan nyid rnam pa bcu gnyis su ston pa yang /
T05TD4016.3E:103a-28: phal cher mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las gsungs pa dang mthun par cung zad cig tha dad pa ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:103a-29: yang lhums su gnas pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:103a-30: yongs su btang ba chen po'i mtshan nyid kyis bsnan pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:103a-31: byang chub kyi snying por gshegs pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:103a-32: bdud btul ba mtshang bas so //
T05TD4016.3E:103a-33: 'dir mdo las ni mtshan nyid rnam pa bdun las mi ston pas mdo sde rnams las lha'i gnas su gnas pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:103a-35: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:103a-36: yongs su mya ngan las 'das zhes gsungs pas kyang bstan nas mtshan nyid bcu gcig tu byas te /
T05TD4016.3E:103a-38: de la lha'i gnas su gnas pa zhes bya ba ni bkod pa chen po'i mdo'i nang nas dga' ldan gyi le'u las /
T05TD4016.3E:103a-39: bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
T05TD4016.3E:103a-40: bkod pa chen po zhes bya ba'i mdo gang zhe na /
T05TD4016.3E:103b-0: byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi pho @103b brang na bzhugs shing rtag par lta ba mthu bo che rnams mchod par byed pa rab tu ston pa gang yin pa'o zhes bya ba nas rgya cher bshad pa'i bar du gsungs pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:103b-1: gzhan yang mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mdo las dga' ldan gyi lha ni 'dod pa'i khams kyi nang na mchog yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:103b-2: lha 'og ma dag ni bag med pa dang ldan pa yin lha gong ma dag ni mi gsal zhing rmongs rtul ba yin pas sbyin pa gtong zhing tshul khrims bsrungs pas ni gong ma dang 'og ma'i lus thob par 'gyur ro //
T05TD4016.3E:103b-3: sbyin pa dang tshul khrims dang ting nge 'dzin bsgoms pas ni dga' ldan gyi lus thob par 'gyur bas /
T05TD4016.3E:103b-4: de'i phyir mchog ces bya'o zhes gsungs pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:103b-5: gzhan yang 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las /
T05TD4016.3E:103b-6: byang chub sems dpa' ci'i phyir dga' ldan gyi gnas kho na nas skye zhing /
T05TD4016.3E:103b-8: 'og ma dag tu mi skye zhe na /
T05TD4016.3E:103b-10: sangs rgyas ni rtag par dbu ma'i lam la gnas pa'i phyir dga' ldan gyi lha ni 'dod pa'i khams kyi lha'i ris drug dang /
T05TD4016.3E:103b-11: tshangs pa'i gnas gong ma gsum dang /
T05TD4016.3E:103b-12: 'og ma gsum gyi bar na gnas te /
T05TD4016.3E:103b-13: lha de las babs la gdon mi za bar yul gyi dbus su skye ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:103b-14: nam gyi gung thun la lhums su zhugs pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:103b-15: nam gyi gung thun la rab tu 'byung ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:103b-16: dbu ma'i lam la spyad de sangs rgyas kyi byang chub brnyes nas kyang dbu ma'i lam gyi chos ston pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:103b-17: nam gyi gung thun la yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:103b-18: chos dbu ma legs par rtogs par 'gyur ba'i phyir lha'i gnas bar mar skye ba yin no zhes bstan pa lta bu ste /
T05TD4016.3E:103b-19: rgya cher de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no //
T05TD4016.3E:103b-20: gzhan yang 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las /
T05TD4016.3E:103b-21: ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi gnas 'ba' zhig tu skye zhe na /
T05TD4016.3E:103b-22: gzugs med pa'i khams su ni gzugs med pas chos bstan du med pa'i phyir der mi skye'o //
T05TD4016.3E:103b-23: gzugs kyi khams su ni gzugs kyi phung po dang ldan mod kyi /
T05TD4016.3E:103b-24: der chos bshad du yang bsam gtan la mngon par zhen pas der mi skye'o //
T05TD4016.3E:104a-0: 'dod pa'i lha'i ris 'og ma gsum po dag ni nyon mongs pa stug cing @104a * //
T05TD4016.3E:104a-1: sems rnam par g-yeng ba dag yin la 'dod pa'i lha'i ris gong ma rnams kyang nyon mongs pa stug cing sems mnyen pa yin yang rno ba yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:104a-2: dga' ldan gyi lha ni nyon mongs pa yang srab /
T05TD4016.3E:104a-3: sems kyang mnyen zhing rno ba'i phyir /
T05TD4016.3E:104a-4: der skye ba yin zhes bshad do ;
T05TD4016.3E:104a-5: / gzhan yang bstan bcos bye brag tu bshad pa chen po las /
T05TD4016.3E:104a-6: ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi lha'i gnas kho nar skye zhe na /
T05TD4016.3E:104a-8: dga' ldan gyi lha'i gnas chad kho nas byang chub sems dpa' mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:104a-9: 'dzam bu gling gi mi rnams sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur ba'i las yongs su smin pa'i dus kyi cha gcig gis gcig bsdus pas 'di ltar mi yul na lo bye ba phrag lnga bcu rtsa bdun dang stong phrag bcu na 'dul bar byed pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:104a-10: 'dul bar bya ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gdod yongs su smin par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni dga' ldan gyi lha'i tshe'i tshad yin pas /
T05TD4016.3E:104a-11: de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' lha'i gnas de 'ba' zhig tu skye'o //
T05TD4016.3E:104a-12: gal te lha'i gnas 'og ma dag tu skye bar gyur na tshe'i tshad ni zad la dge ba'i rtsa ba da dung yongs su smin par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir der mi skye'o zhes 'byung ste /
T05TD4016.3E:104a-13: rgya cher de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no //
T05TD4016.3E:104a-14: gzhan yang de nyid las ci'i phyir lha'i gnas de nyid du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya bar mi'i nang du gshegs she na /
T05TD4016.3E:104a-15: srid pa tha ma'i byang chub sems dpa' ni gdon mi za bar mngal nas skye ba 'dzin pa yin la /
T05TD4016.3E:104a-16: lha'i 'gro ba dag ni gcig tu rdzus te skye ba'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:104a-17: gzhan yang lha dang mi ni chos kyi snod yin pas gnyi ga bsdu ba'i phyir mi'i nang du gshegs pa yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:104a-18: gal te lha'i nang du skyes par gyur na mis der 'gro bar mi nus pas so //
T05TD4016.3E:104a-19: gzhan yang lha'i gnas su mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas mi'i nang du gshegs te /
T05TD4016.3E:104a-20: mi rnams gdul bar mdzad pa yang mi rung ste /
T05TD4016.3E:104a-21: de dag 'di snyam du sangs rgyas ni sprul pa yin no zhes chos yang dag par 'dzin par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:104b-0: de nas byang chub sems dpa' mi rnams kyi nang nas mngon par rdzogs par @104b sangs rgyas pa yin no zhes 'byung ste /
T05TD4016.3E:104b-1: rgya cher de nyid las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:104b-2: theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bskyur ba las /
T05TD4016.3E:104b-3: 'phags pa sa bcu'i 'grel pa las bshad pa'i rnam grangs mang po 'byung ba ni mngas kyis dogs nas 'dir ma brjod do//
T05TD4016.3E:104b-4: de la mngal du 'jug pa zhes bya ba ni 'phags pa kun du khyab par gsal ba'i mdo las /
T05TD4016.3E:104b-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa /
T05TD4016.3E:104b-6: de'i tshe byang chub sems dpas lha rnams la chos bshad zin nas lha'i bu rnams la kye nga ji lta bu'i gzugs kyis yum gyi lhums su 'jug par rigs zhes dris pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:104b-7: de dag las kha cig ni gzhon nu'i gzugs kyis so //
T05TD4016.3E:104b-8: kha cig ni brgya byin dang tshangs pa'i gzugs kyis so //
T05TD4016.3E:104b-9: kha cig ni bya gser 'dab can gyi gzugs kyis so zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
T05TD4016.3E:104b-10: de nas tshangs pa'i mchog tu dar ba zhes bya ba sngon drang srong gi lam nas 'ongs pa zhig gis lha rnams la smras pa /
T05TD4016.3E:104b-11: bdag gis bram ze'i smrang brtags pa las /
T05TD4016.3E:104b-12: de'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa' yul gyi lhums su 'jug pa ni glang po che'i gzugs mchog go zhes bsngags te /
T05TD4016.3E:104b-13: glang po che de yang dkar zhing so drug dang ldan pa /
T05TD4016.3E:104b-14: mgo shin tu legs pa gzi byin dang ldan pa /
T05TD4016.3E:104b-15: gzugs khyad par du 'phags pa'o zhes bram ze'i smrang las byung ba ni de lta bu zhes gsungs te /
T05TD4016.3E:104b-18: ri bong dang rta dang glang po che yod de /
T05TD4016.3E:104b-19: de la ri bong chu long las bsgral ba ni bdag gcig pu thar par zad do //
T05TD4016.3E:104b-20: rta ni dpa' ba'i shugs dang ldan chu'i gting zab bam mi zab dpag par mi nus so //
T05TD4016.3E:104b-21: glang po che ni gting zab tu rtogs pa'i phyir /
T05TD4016.3E:104b-22: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas ni ri bong dang rta 'dra ste /
T05TD4016.3E:104b-23: 'khor ba las yang dag par 'das kyang chos kyi rtse ba nyid mi rtogs so //
T05TD4016.3E:104b-24: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa chen po ni dper na glang po che dang 'dra bas khams gsum na rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis bsgrags nas 'byung ba'i rtsa ba rab tu rtogs par byed pas gang la yang mi skyob pa'am /
T05TD4016.3E:105a-2: ; mdzod kyi bstan bcos rnying 'gyur las //
T05TD4016.3E:105a-3: de la so drug ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi dper bstan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:105a-4: rkang pa bzhi ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i dper bstan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:105a-5: yan lag bdun ni byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi dper bstan pa yin no zhes bshad do ;
T05TD4016.3E:105a-6: ; slob dpon yang dag bden pa'i 'grel ba las /
T05TD4016.3E:105a-7: byang chub sems dpa' glang po che'i gzugs su ston pa ni /
T05TD4016.3E:105a-8: don rnam pa gsum gyis te /
T05TD4016.3E:105a-10: so drug dang ldan pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:105a-11: rkang pa bzhi'i nang nas mchog tu gyur pas so //
T05TD4016.3E:105a-12: de'i lus che ba yang mi yul na yod pa'i glang po che ni lus kyi tshad dpag tshad gcig go //
T05TD4016.3E:105a-13: lha'i ris na yod pa'i glang po che'i lus kyi tshad dpag tshad dgu yod do //
T05TD4016.3E:105a-14: 'dir che ba zhes bya ba ni lha'i ris na yod pa'i glang po che la bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:105a-15: 'dis ni byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams che bar bstan to //
T05TD4016.3E:105a-16: de la rkang pa bzhis ni spyod pa bzhi po ye shes dang /
T05TD4016.3E:105a-19: rab tu bden pa bstan to //
T05TD4016.3E:105a-20: so drug gis ni bla na med pa drug po rnyed pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:105a-26: seng ge ni ri dags kyi rgyal po yin na /
T05TD4016.3E:105a-27: ci'i phyir seng ge'i gzugs su mi ston ce na /
T05TD4016.3E:105a-28: seng ge ni gcig tu grogs med pas 'khor rjes su 'brang ba med pa yin la /
T05TD4016.3E:105a-29: byang chub sems dpa' ni gdon mi za bar 'khor bzhi po dag rjes su 'brang bas so zhes bshad do //
T05TD4016.3E:105a-30: 'phags pa mya ngan las 'das pa'i mdo dang 'bras bu ston pa'i mdo las kyang /
T05TD4016.3E:105a-31: byang chub sems dpa' ni glang po che dkar po la bcibs pa lta bur dmigs nas yum gyi lhums su 'jug go zhes bshad do //
T05TD4016.3E:105a-32: de la lhums su gnas pa zhes bya ba ni /
T05TD4016.3E:105a-33: 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa'i mdo'i nang nas lhums su gnas pa'i le'u las /
T05TD4016.3E:105a-34: byang chub sems dpa' lhums su zla ba bcu gnas pa'i gzhal med khang de ni tshangs pas phul ba /
T05TD4016.3E:105a-35: chu mnyam par dpag tshad sum brgya yod pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa /
T05TD4016.3E:105b-0: 'dod pa'i khams kyi lha'i ris drug yod pa dag gis mthong bar mi nus @105b pa'o ;
T05TD4016.3E:105b-1: / bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal ba /
T05TD4016.3E:105b-2: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad lhums su 'jug pa na sngar yum gyi lhums kyi g-yas phyogs su gzhal med khang rin po che sna tshogs kyis bkod pa de lta bu yod par 'gyur la /
T05TD4016.3E:105b-3: de'i 'og tu gdod byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gyi lha'i gnas kyi gzhal med khang nas yum gyi lhums su zhugs nas gzhal med khang der skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug go //
T05TD4016.3E:105b-4: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /
T05TD4016.3E:105b-5: gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po bzhi dang /
T05TD4016.3E:105b-6: gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad 'khor dang bcas pa rtag tu nang par byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa byed cing /
T05TD4016.3E:105b-7: chos yang dag par nyan par byed do //
T05TD4016.3E:105b-8: brgya byin lha'i dbang po yang su sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha dag dang rtag par nyi ma gung la byang chub sems dpa' la mchod par byed cing ;
T05TD4016.3E:105b-9: tshangs pa chen po lha'i rgyal po la yang tshangs ris kyi lha rnams dang rtag par nyi ma gung la byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa byed cing /
T05TD4016.3E:105b-10: chos yang dag par nyan par byed do //
T05TD4016.3E:105b-11: phyogs bcu thams cad nas byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pa mchod pa byed cing chos nyan pa'i phyir der 'ongs te /
T05TD4016.3E:105b-12: de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i khri tshad med pa sprul nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag so so nas de'i steng du 'dug ste /
T05TD4016.3E:105b-13: phan tshun dris lan dag gis theg pa chen po bstan par byed cing dri bar byed kyang /
T05TD4016.3E:105b-14: btsun mo sgyu mas mthong bar mi nus so ;
T05TD4016.3E:105b-15: ; kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' zla ba bcu lhums su gnas pa na yang lha dang mi sa ya sum cu rtsa drug theg pa chen po la dgod par byed do zhes gsungs so //
T05TD4016.3E:105b-16: de la btsas pa zhes bya ba ni 'phags pa bkod pa chen po'i mdo las /
T05TD4016.3E:105b-17: bltams pa bstan pa'i le'u las de'i tshe btsun mo'i sgyu ma byang chub sems dpa'i mthus byang chub sems dpa' ring por mi thogs par bltams par rig nas lum pa'i tshal du zhugs te /
T05TD4016.3E:105b-18: shing rnams kun tu bltas nas rin po che'i shing bla ksha'i drung du phyin pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:106a-0: shing la gyen du bltas lag pa g-yas @106a * //
T05TD4016.3E:106a-1: shar phyogs kyi yal ga la 'jus te /
T05TD4016.3E:106a-2: lus btsir nas glal ba tsam gyis sku drang por 'greng ba bzhin du yum gyi mchan khung g-yas phyogs nas bde bar bltams so //
T05TD4016.3E:106a-3: de'i tshe su la yang mi rten par shar phyogs su gom pa bdun por ba las gom pa bor pa'i rjes re re la padma re re skyes te /
T05TD4016.3E:106a-4: de bzhin du lho dang nub dang byang phyogs su gom pa bdun bdun bor ba las padma bdun bdun skyes so //
T05TD4016.3E:106a-5: 'di skad du nga ni 'jig rten na mchog tu btsun zhing mchog tu khyad par du 'phags pa yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:106a-6: sems can thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur bya ba yin no zhes bsgrags pa'i tshe /
T05TD4016.3E:106a-7: sgra des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du grags par gyur to zhes gsungs so //
T05TD4016.3E:106a-8: gzhan yang kun du gsal ba'i mdo las /
T05TD4016.3E:106a-9: brgya byin lha'i dbang po dang /
T05TD4016.3E:106a-10: lha'i rgyal po yang de ma thag tu 'ongs nas spos rnam pa sna tshogs kyi chus chub sems dpa'i sku bsil to //
T05TD4016.3E:106a-11: klu'i rgyal po dgus steng nas spos kyi chu phab nas 'phags pa'i sku bsil to zhes gsungs so /
T05TD4016.3E:106a-12: 'phags pa mya ngan las 'das pa chen po las ni /
T05TD4016.3E:106a-13: bltams ma thag tu sa la ma reg par brgya byin lha'i dbang pos blangs so //
T05TD4016.3E:106a-14: klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nye dga' bos chu'i rgyun phab nas sku bsil to //
T05TD4016.3E:106a-15: lha'i rgyal po nor bu bzang gis rin po che'i gdugs thogs nas zham 'bring byas so //
T05TD4016.3E:106a-16: sa'i lha dag gis ni padma sprul nas zhabs nas bteg ste /
T05TD4016.3E:106a-17: phyogs bzhir gom pa bdun bdun gshegs so zhes bshad do //
T05TD4016.3E:106a-18: 'phags pa sangs rgyas phal po che'i mdo las ni /
T05TD4016.3E:106a-19: ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' gom pa bdun bdun du bor zhe na /
T05TD4016.3E:106a-20: rin po che sna bdun rab tu bstan pa'i phyir gom pa bdun bdun bor ro //
T05TD4016.3E:106a-21: sa'i lha dag gis ni bsam pa yongs su bskang ba'i phyir gom pa bdun por ro //
T05TD4016.3E:106a-22: byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi mtshan nyid rab tu bstan pa'i phyir gom pa bdun bor ro zhes bshad do //
T05TD4016.3E:106a-23: de la cher skyes pa zhes bya ba ni 'phags pa bkod pa chen po'i mdo las yi ge bstan pa'i le'u las ji skad du /
T05TD4016.3E:106a-24: lo bdun lon nas yi ge bslab pa'i rkan du phyin pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:106b-0: slob dpon gyis @106b bdag nyid byang chub sems dpa'i slob dpon du mi ldom pa mthong ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:106b-1: de nas rgyal bu yi ge rnam pa drug cu rtsa bzhi las yi ge zhig bdag la slob par byed ces smras pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:106b-2: de'i tshe sngon slob dpon ma thos pa thos pas ngo mtshar cher skyes nas /
T05TD4016.3E:106b-3: rgyal bu la bshad par gsol ba btab po zhes gsungs pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:106b-4: gzhan yang zhing las byed pa la rtog pa'i le'u las /
T05TD4016.3E:106b-5: byang chub sems dpa' rim gyis cher skyes nas dus gzhan zhig na 'dzam bu'i gling gi shing drung na skyil mo krung bcas te /
T05TD4016.3E:106b-6: bsam gtan bzhi la snyoms par 'jug pa las shing gzhan rnams kyi grib ma ni nyi ma'i rjes su 'phos so //
T05TD4016.3E:106b-7: byang chub sems dpa' bzhugs pa'i shing gi grib ma ni mi bskyod par gnas so zhes gsungs pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:106b-8: gzhan yang rtsal bstan pa'i le'u las /
T05TD4016.3E:106b-9: de'i tshe rgyal bu sh'akya lnga brgya dang /
T05TD4016.3E:106b-10: 'phong dang yi ge dang grangs dang //
T05TD4016.3E:106b-11: phan tshun bsnun pa la sogs pa rtsal rnam pa sna tshogs 'gran pa las /
T05TD4016.3E:106b-12: thams cad rgyal bar gyur to zhes gsungs pa lta bu ste /
T05TD4016.3E:106b-13: rgya cher de nyid las gsungs pa bzhin no //
T05TD4016.3E:106b-14: de la 'dod pa la longs spyod pa zhes bya ba ni 'phags pa bkod pa chen po'i mdo nas rtsal bstan pa'i le'u las ji skad du ;
T05TD4016.3E:106b-15: de nas sh'akya rnams kyis rgyal po la rgyal bu ni cher skyes te mtshan mkhan dag gis gal te rab tu 'byung bar 'gyur na ni gdon mi za bar sangs rgyas su 'grub par 'gyur ro //
T05TD4016.3E:106b-16: gal te khyim na gnas na ni 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pas btsun mo btsal to mngon par zhen par bgyis nas rgyu dang rkyen des rab tu 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro zhes gsol to //
T05TD4016.3E:106b-17: de'i tshe grong khyer ser skya nyid na blon po la gan dbyig pa thogs pa zhes bya ba zhig gnas pa de la bu mo grags 'dzin ma zhes bya ba mtshan gyis brgyan pa mchog tu byad bzhin bzang ba zhig yod de /
T05TD4016.3E:106b-18: de nas rgyal po'i yab kyis de rgyal bu'i btsun mor blangs te khab tu bzhes so //
T05TD4016.3E:106b-19: de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' yang 'jig rten pa'i chos dang mthun par btsun mo brgyad khri bzhi stong gi nang na bzhugs shing /
T05TD4016.3E:106b-20: 'dod pa la longs spyod par bstan te /
T05TD4016.3E:107a-1: mchog tu gyur to zhes bstan pa gsungs pa lta bu ste /
T05TD4016.3E:107a-2: rgya cher de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no //
T05TD4016.3E:107a-3: 'phags pa mya ngan las 'das pa chen po bstan pa'i mdo las /
T05TD4016.3E:107a-4: byang chub sems dpa' ni btsun mo drug khri dang lhan cig tu pho brang na bzhugs te /
T05TD4016.3E:107a-5: 'dod pa'i bde ba la longs spyod par gyur to zhes bshad do //
T05TD4016.3E:107a-6: de la mngon bar 'byung ba zhes bya ba ni 'phags pa bkod pa chen po'i mdo las ji skad du /
T05TD4016.3E:107a-7: byang chub sems dpa' grong khyer gyi phyi rol du byung ste gshegs pa las grong khyer gyi shar phyogs kyi sgor mi rgan po zhig dang phrad pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:107a-8: lho phyogs kyi sgor nad pa dang phrad pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:107a-9: nub phyogs kyi sgor shi ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:107a-10: byang phyogs kyi sgor dge sbyong rdzu 'phrul gyis nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang phrad nas rab tu byung ba'i phan yon gyi yon tan rgya cher bshad pa thos nas /
T05TD4016.3E:107a-11: rab tu byung bar gsol ba las rgyal po yab kyis ma gnang ngo zhes gsungs pa dang ;
T05TD4016.3E:107a-12: gzhan yang rab tu byung ba'i le'u las /
T05TD4016.3E:107a-13: de'i byang chub sems dpa' la lha rnams kyis nam gyi gung thun las myur du 'byung bar bskul bas /
T05TD4016.3E:107a-14: mos pa can la bcibs pa gtod ces bsgo ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:107a-15: mos pa can gyis ched du pho brang gi nang mi rnams kyis thos par bya ba'i phyir skad cher phyung ba las nam mkha'i lha rnams kyi mthus de dag thams cad gnyid log par gyur te gang gis kyang ma tshor ro //
T05TD4016.3E:107a-16: mos pa can gyis bcibs pa gtad nas byang chub sems dpa' la phul lo //
T05TD4016.3E:107a-17: der rta'i rgyal po la bcibs nas dang por 'byung ba'i tshe phyogs bcur sa chen po rnam pa drug tu rab tu g-yos so //
T05TD4016.3E:107a-18: nam mkha' la gshegs pa'i tshe rgyal po chen po bzhis ni rta'i rkang pa la bteg ste gshegs so //
T05TD4016.3E:107a-19: de nas byang chub sems dpa'i yul ni mi shes bya ba nas sngon gyi drang srong rnying ba rnams dka' thub spyad pa'i tshal yod par byon nas chibs pa las gshegs te mos pa che la spro ba bskyed nas khyod kan da ka khrid la slar song shig ces bsgo ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:107a-20: de nas mos pa can skad cher phyung ste dus so //
T05TD4016.3E:107a-21: ka na da ka yang mgo smad lag pa gnyis bkug nas sa la btsugs te byang chub sems dpa'i zhabs la lces bldags nas skad phyung nas dus so //
T05TD4016.3E:107b-0: byang @107b chub sems dpa' gal te skra dang kha spu ma bregs na ni rab tu byung ba'i chos ma yin no snyam nas /
T05TD4016.3E:107b-1: mos pa can las ral gyi rin po che ral gyi bzhes te nyid kyi dbu skra bregs so //
T05TD4016.3E:107b-2: de'i tshe gnas gtsang ma'i lha zhig / rngon pa gos dur smrig gyon pa lta bur sprul nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyan sngar 'greng ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:107b-3: byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i na bza' bsnams nas de rnams kyi gos dur smrig de dang brjes so //
T05TD4016.3E:107b-4: de nas byang chub sems dpa' dbu skra bregs chos gos dur smrig mnabs nas 'di skad du /
T05TD4016.3E:107b-5: bdag deng gdod yang dag pa'i rab tu byung bar gyur to zhes bka' stsal to zhes gsungs pa lta bu ste /
T05TD4016.3E:107b-6: rgya cher de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no //
T05TD4016.3E:107b-7: de la dka' ba spyad pa kun du ston pa zhes bya ba ni /
T05TD4016.3E:107b-8: 'phags pa kun du gsal ba'i mdo'i nang nas dka' ba spyad pa'i le'u las ji skad du /
T05TD4016.3E:107b-9: lo drug gi bar du dka' thub spyad pa gang yin pa de ni ;
T05TD4016.3E:107b-10: lha 'am mi gang gis kyang spyad par mi nus kyi /
T05TD4016.3E:107b-11: tshe gcig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'ba' zhig gis spyod par nus so zhes gsungs pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:107b-12: gzhan yang 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las /
T05TD4016.3E:107b-13: mu stegs can la sogs pa ni dka' thub la mngon par yid ches shing mngon par zhen pas na gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis lo drug gi bar du dka' thub rnams spyad par ma gyur na gzhan dag mngon par yid ches par mi 'gyur te /
T05TD4016.3E:107b-14: 'di skad du rgyal bu bde ba la goms pas dka' thub spyod par mi nus so zhes zer ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:107b-15: gzhan yang mu stegs can dka' thub la dga' ba kha cig zla ba gsum dang /
T05TD4016.3E:107b-17: lo gcig gi bar du spyod par zad kyi /
T05TD4016.3E:107b-18: gang yang lo drug gi bar du nyi ma gcig la til 'bru gcig tsam za zhing dka' thub spyod pa byed pas mu stegs can rnams 'di ni dka' thub spyod pa'i mchog yin no snyam du sems pas /
T05TD4016.3E:107b-19: mngon par yid ches par gyur nas yang dag pa'i lam la 'jug par 'gyur bas rgyu dang rkyen nges na lo drug gi bar du dka' ba spyad pa yin no zhes bshad pa lta bu'o //
T05TD4016.3E:107b-20: de la dka' ba spyad pa btang nas mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa zhes bya ba ni /
T05TD4016.3E:108a-0: @108a * // 'phags pa mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mdo las lo drug gi bar du dka' ba spyad kyang dka' ba spyad pa des lam rtogs par mi 'gyur bar rig nas de dag spangs te /
T05TD4016.3E:108a-1: chu bo neeranydza nar sku bsil nas ba lang rdzi bo mo las 'o thug gsol te /
T05TD4016.3E:108a-2: byang chub kyi shing drung du gshegs nas bdud sdig can btul te /
T05TD4016.3E:108a-3: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes dang /
T05TD4016.3E:108a-4: gzhan yang 'phags pa kun du gsal ba'i mdo las /
T05TD4016.3E:108a-5: khyim bdag gis bu khye'u 'dod pa'i phyir 'o thug gis ri dang shing gi lha dag la mchod pa byas pa las de bzhin du khye'u btsas par gyur nas rab tu dga' bar gyur nas bstod bzhos nas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud de blud /
T05TD4016.3E:108a-6: de nas tha ma'i 'o ma ska ba las thug pa btsos pa las zangs kyi kha nas 'dom do lhag tsam du 'phags pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:108a-7: bu mo de yang ya mtshan du bzung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:108a-8: bram ze zhig der 'ongs nas bu mo de la 'o thug de ni so so skye bos btung bar bya ba ma yin gyi /
T05TD4016.3E:108a-9: gang de nyid du mngon par 'tshang rgya ba des 'o thug 'di nyu bar nus so zhes smras so //
T05TD4016.3E:108a-10: bu mo des khyer nas drang srong byang chub sems dpa' la phul ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:108a-11: des gsol ma thag tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o //
T05TD4016.3E:108a-12: gzhan yang bstan bcos bye brag tu bshad pa chen po las /
T05TD4016.3E:108a-13: ngas mu stegs can gyi dka' ba spyod ma nus pa'i spangs pa ma yin gyi /
T05TD4016.3E:108a-14: dka' ba spyod pa de dag las brtags na mthar nyon mongs pa rnams spangs nas yang dag pa'i phan yon thob par mi nus pa'i phyir /
T05TD4016.3E:108a-15: ngas spangs nas yang de kho na nyid kyi dbu ma'i spyod pa gya nom pa spyad pas bla na med pa'i byang chub thob nas sems can 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal shin tu mi bzad pa las drangs pa yin no zhes bstan pa lta bu'o //
T05TD4016.3E:108a-16: de la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba zhes bya ba ni sngar gong du bstan pa las 'byung ba bzhin du rig par bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:108a-17: de la yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba ni bstan bcos bye brag tu bshad pa chen po las /
T05TD4016.3E:108b-0: bcom ldan 'das grong khyer rtsva can gyad kyi @108b shing s'a la zung cig gi drung du mya ngan las 'das so zhes gsungs pa de la /
T05TD4016.3E:108b-1: bcom ldan 'das ci'i phyir grong khyer rtsva can du yongs su mya ngan las 'das she na /
T05TD4016.3E:108b-3: grong khyer rtsva can na gnas pa'i gyad rnams gdul bar bzhed pa'i phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:108b-4: gzhan yang mu stegs can su bha dra bsdu zhing 'dul bar bzhed pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:108b-5: kha cig na re gnas der bcom ldan 'das yang nas yang du sku lus btang ba'i phyir te /
T05TD4016.3E:108b-7: bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
T05TD4016.3E:108b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa ni gnas 'dir lan drug 'khor los sgyur ba'i lus yongs su btong ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:108b-9: 'dir bdun pa la ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi sku yongs su btang ba yin no zhes bya ba nas rgya cher bshad pa'i bar du'o //
T05TD4016.3E:108b-10: gzhan yang de las bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
T05TD4016.3E:108b-11: khyed shing s'a la zung cig gi drung du song la de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyir khri shoms la sngas byang phyogs su ston cig / de bzhin gshegs pa ni deng gi nam gyi gung thun la lhag ma med pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o zhes bya ba nas rgya cher bshad pa'i bar du'o //
T05TD4016.3E:108b-12: bcom ldan 'das ci'i phyir khri stan bting la sngas byang phyogs su ston cig ces bka' stsal zhe na /
T05TD4016.3E:108b-13: yul de'i smra ba'i slob dpon rnams chos de yin par bstan pa'i phyir te /
T05TD4016.3E:108b-14: 'di ltar yul de smra ba'i slob dpon sngas byang phyogs su bstan pa'i khri stan bshams nas nyal bar byed pas bcom ldan 'das kyang de bzhin te /
T05TD4016.3E:108b-15: 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das ni ston pa rnams gdul bar spyod pa'i phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:108b-16: bla na med pa'i ston pa mchog yin pa'i phyir 'dir bdag gi rjes su gdan shoms shig ces gsungs pa yin no zhe'o //
T05TD4016.3E:108b-17: kha cig na re 'jig rten pa'i yang dag pa ma yin pa la bkra shis kyi dngos po 'dzin pa dang bral ba yin par rab tu bstan par bzhed pa'i phyir te /
T05TD4016.3E:109a-0: 'di ltar yul de na gang shi ba de dag khri'i steng du bzhag nas mgo byang du bstan nas nyal bar byed pas bcom ldan 'das ni yang dag ma yin pa la bkra @109a * //
T05TD4016.3E:109a-1: shis kyi dngos por 'dzin pa zhig par mdzad pas de'i phyir mya ngan las 'das par sngas byang du shoms shig ces gsungs pa yin no zhes zer ro //
T05TD4016.3E:109a-2: kha cig na re bcom ldan 'das chos yang dag pa la shin tu bkur bar yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir te /
T05TD4016.3E:109a-3: 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis snga nas mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu bla na med pa'i chos kyi sgron ma byang phyogs su rab tu dar zhing yun ring du gnas par thugs su chud pa'i phyir dbu byang du bstan nas gzims pa yin no zhes bya ba nas rgya cher bshad pa'i bar du'o //
T05TD4016.3E:109a-4: gzhan yang de nyid las 'di skad du /
T05TD4016.3E:109a-5: de nas bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams pa las logs su gshegs te /
T05TD4016.3E:109a-6: rtsib logs g-yas pa sa la phab nas zhabs gzhibs te dbu byang du bstan nas snang ba'i 'du shes dran pa dang yang dag pa'i mkhyen pa dang ldan par gzims so zhes bya ba nas /
T05TD4016.3E:109a-7: rgya cher bshad pa'i bar du'o //
T05TD4016.3E:109a-8: ci'i phyir bcom ldan 'das glo g-yas pa phab ste gzims she na /
T05TD4016.3E:109a-10: sangs rgyas rnams ri dags kyi rgyal po seng ge dang 'dra bar gzims par rab tu bstan pa'i phyir te /
T05TD4016.3E:109a-12: nyal ba ni rnam pa bzhi po 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:109a-13: ri dags kyi rgyal po seng ge nyal ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:109a-15: yi dags kyi nyal ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:109a-16: 'dod pa la zhen pa'i nyal ba'o /
T05TD4016.3E:109a-17: de la seng ge'i nyal ba ni glo g-yas pas nyal bar byed do //
T05TD4016.3E:109a-18: lha ni gan rkyal du nyal bar byed do //
T05TD4016.3E:109a-19: yi dags ni kha bub tu nyal bar byed do //
T05TD4016.3E:109a-20: 'dod pa la zhen pa ni glo g-yon pa sa la phab nas nyal bar byed do //
T05TD4016.3E:109a-21: bcom ldan 'das ni bla na med pa'i seng ge yin pa'i phyir glo g-yas pas gzims so //
T05TD4016.3E:109a-22: bcom ldan 'das ci'i phyir gzims nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das par mdzad kyi bzhugs nas ni ma yin zhe na /
T05TD4016.3E:109a-24: bcom ldan 'das rgyu spangs pa yin par rab tu spangs par bzhed pa'i phyir te /
T05TD4016.3E:109a-25: gal te bcom ldan 'das bzhugs nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur na /
T05TD4016.3E:109a-26: ma dad pa dag 'di skad du 'di sgyu byed pa yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:109a-27: shi ba'i ro la tsog pur 'dug pa ga la yod ces zer bas so //
T05TD4016.3E:109b-0: kha @109b cig na re ma 'ongs pa na 'phags pa rnams la skur pa 'debs pa dgag pa'i phyir te /
T05TD4016.3E:109b-1: gal te bzhugs nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur na /
T05TD4016.3E:109b-2: da ltar gyi dgra bcom pa lus kyi nyams stobs chung ba nyal nas yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dag la 'jig rten pa dag dgra bcom pa ma yin no zhes skur bar 'gyur te /
T05TD4016.3E:109b-3: gal te dgra bcom pa yin na ci'i phyir bcom ldan 'das dang 'dra ba ci'i phyir 'dug bzhin du yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das zhes zer bas so //
T05TD4016.3E:109b-4: bcom ldan 'das ci'i phyir nam gyi gung thun cha las yongs su mya ngan las 'das she na ;
T05TD4016.3E:109b-6: dus de'i tshe mchog tu dben par gyur pa'i phyir te /
T05TD4016.3E:109b-7: 'di ltar yul de na tsha ba'i dus su las byed mi nus pas phal cher nam gyi cha stod la las rnams byed de /
T05TD4016.3E:109b-8: nam gyi gung thun kho na la thams cad dben pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:109b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa yang rtag par dben pa la dgyes shing /
T05TD4016.3E:109b-10: dben pa'i bsngags pa brjod pa'i phyir nam gyi gung thun la mya ngan las 'das so zhes zer ro //
T05TD4016.3E:109b-11: kha cig na re bcom ldan 'das dus gcig na dbu ma'i spyod pa la dgyes pa'i phyir te /
T05TD4016.3E:109b-12: 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das sngon byang chub sems dpa' mdzad pa na lhar skye ba'i nang na tha ma kho nar dga' ldan gyi lha'i gnas pa bar mar skyes pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:109b-13: mir skye ba'i nang na tha ma yul gyi dbus grong khyer ser skyar skyes te /
T05TD4016.3E:109b-14: nam gyi gung thun la mngon par byung nas dbu ma'i spyod pa bsgoms pas bla na med pa'i byang chub brnyes nas sems can la phan gdags pa'i ched du yod pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:109b-15: med pa dang bral ba nyid du gsungs shing /
T05TD4016.3E:109b-16: dbu ma'i chos dam pa la gnas pas na /
T05TD4016.3E:109b-17: nam gyi gung thun la yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa yin no zhes bya ba nas rgya cher bshad pa'i bar du'o zhes zer te zhes 'byung ba lta bu yin no ;
T05TD4016.3E:109b-18: /'phags pa sangs rgyas phal po che'i mdo las ni /
T05TD4016.3E:109b-19: don rnam pa bcu'i phyir yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bstan pa yin no zhes bshad do //
T05TD4016.3E:109b-21: 'du byed thams cad mi rtag pa nyid du bstan pa'i phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:110a-0: 'dus byas thams cad bde ba ma yin pa nyid du bstan pa'i @110a * //
T05TD4016.3E:110a-2: mya ngan las 'das pa mchog tu bde ba nyid du bstan pa'i phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:110a-3: 'jig rten pa thams cad yongs su spangs pa'i phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:110a-4: lha dang mi rnams ni gzugs kyi lus la mngon par zhen pas na gzugs su lus mi rtag cing 'jig pa'i chos can nyid du bstan cing rtag par gnas pa'i rnam par dag pa'i chos kyi sku gnyer du gzhug pa'i phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:110a-5: mi rtag pa'i mthu stobs che zhing bsgyur du mi rung ba nyid du bstan pa'i phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:110a-6: 'dus byas kyi chos ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du mi 'gyur zhing rang dbang med pa nyid du bstan pa'i phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:110a-7: khams gsum gyi chos rnams ni so ma btang ba'i snod dang 'dra bas mi brtan pa nyid du bstan pa'i phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:110a-8: yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa ni de kho na nyid mchog yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:110a-9: 'jig pa med pa nyid du bstan pa'i phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:110a-10: skye shi yongs su spangs pas byung nas zhig pa ma yin pa nyid du bstan pa'i phyir te /
T05TD4016.3E:110a-11: dngos po rnam pa 'di bcus yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa bstan pa yin no zhes gsungs so //
T05TD4016.3E:110a-12: 'phags pa sa bcu pa'i 'grel pa las ni /
T05TD4016.3E:110a-13: ci'i phyir yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po ston par mdzad ce na /
T05TD4016.3E:110a-14: sems can le lo can brtson pa'i sems kyis lam bsgom du gzhug pa'i phyir ro zhes bshad do //
T05TD4016.3E:110a-15: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mdo las ni /
T05TD4016.3E:110a-16: gzhan yang lha dang mi kha cig yongs su rdzogs pa'i rab tu dben pa thos par mos pas na byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi ched du yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa bstan to zhes gsungs so //
T05TD4016.3E:110a-17: de yan chad du de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa ston pa'i mtshan nyid mdo tsam du bstan te /
T05TD4016.3E:110a-18: rgya cher rnam par dbye ba ni 'phags pa rgya cher rnam par rol ba'i mdo dang /
T05TD4016.3E:110a-19: kun tu gsal ba'i mdo dang /
T05TD4016.3E:110a-20: rgyu dang 'bras bu bstan pa'i mdo dang /
T05TD4016.3E:110a-21: sangs rgyas phal po che'i mdo dang /
T05TD4016.3E:110b-0: bkod pa chen po'i mdo la sogs pa las bstan pa bzhin rig par bya'o zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa'i sku ston pa'i thabs la mkhas pa @110b bshad pa'am mjug bsdu ba'i phyir gsungs pa'o /
T05TD4016.3E:110b-2: // / bam po drug cu brgyad pa /
T05TD4016.3E:110b-3: byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
T05TD4016.3E:110b-4: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sku byin gyis brlabs pa'i gsung khyad par du zhig mchis na /
T05TD4016.3E:110b-5: gsung des 'dul ba'i sems can yongs su ma smin pa ni yongs su smin par mdzad la yongs su smin pa ni de dmigs pa de nyid kyis myur du rnam par grol ba thob par bgyid pa lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gsum pa gsung gi bye brag gi mtshan nyid bstan pa zhes ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:110b-6: 'di yang rnam pa bzhir dbye ste /
T05TD4016.3E:110b-7: zhu ba mdor gsol ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:110b-10: rgya cher rnam par bshad pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:110b-11: 'di ni dang po zhu ba mdor gsol ba ste /
T05TD4016.3E:110b-12: gsung gi bye brag gi mtshan nyid bstan pa'i mdo'i tshig 'di yang rnam pa gsum du dbye'o //
T05TD4016.3E:110b-13: de yang 'jam dpal zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni zhu ba gsol ba'i gleng bslangs pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:110b-14: rnam pa du zhig mchis na zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni rnam pa'i grangs su mang nyung zhus pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:110b-15: gsung des zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gsung gi nus pa'i phan yon bstan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:110b-16: zhu ba gsol ba'i dgongs pa ni 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sku la brten nas bskyed pa byin gyis brlabs pa'i 'phags pa'i bstan pa rnam pa du zhig mchis na gsung des yongs su ma smin par yongs su smin par mdzad la /
T05TD4016.3E:110b-17: gang yongs su smin pa ni rnam par grol bar mdzad ces bstan par 'gyur ro //
T05TD4016.3E:110b-18: bstan bcos chos mngon pa kun las btus pa las kyang /
T05TD4016.3E:110b-19: don gyis mdo 'di las gsungs pa dang mthun par ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:110b-20: bstan bcos yang dag par rig pa dang rjes su mthun par las ni tshig yongs su rdzogs pas gsung gi bye brag rnam pa gsum ston te /
T05TD4016.3E:110b-21: de'i phyir bstan bcos de nyid las sde snod gsum po de dag gis bye brag gang zhe na /
T05TD4016.3E:110b-22: dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:110b-23: don dam pa la spro ba med pa rnams spro bar byed pa'i phyir ni mdo sde gsungs pa yin no //
T05TD4016.3E:111a-2: spro bar 'gyur ba dag yongs su smin cing rgyun chad pa med par bya ba rnams med par bya ba'i phyir ni 'dul ba gsungs pa yin no //
T05TD4016.3E:111a-3: yongs su smin cing bya ba byas pa rnams rnam par grol ba'i yang dag pa'i sbyor ba khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir ni chos mngon pa gsungs pa yin no zhes 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:111a-4: 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi sa'i mdo las ni /
T05TD4016.3E:111a-5: bya ba sgrub pa'i ye shes la tshig gsum yod par ston te /
T05TD4016.3E:111a-6: 'phags pa'i bstan pa la gzud pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:111a-8: rnam par grol bar mdzad pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:111a-9: de'i phyir mdo de nyid las /
T05TD4016.3E:111a-10: bya ba sgrub pa'i ye shes thabs la mkhas pa des kyang 'phags pa'i bstan pa la gzud par mdzad /
T05TD4016.3E:111a-11: yongs su smin par mdzad do zhes gsungs pa yin no //
T05TD4016.3E:111a-12: slob dpon nye ba'i 'od kyis 'grel pa las ni /
T05TD4016.3E:111a-13: rnam grangs 'dis mdo'i tshig gsum bshad de /
T05TD4016.3E:111a-14: de la dang po ni thog ma kho nar yid ches pa skyed par byed pa'i phyir sems can rnams 'phags pa'i bstan pa la 'jug par mdzad pa zhes bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:111a-15: ji ltar rdzu 'phrul mngon par bstan nas 'od srungs la sogs pas btul ba lta bu ste /
T05TD4016.3E:111a-16: 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi sngon gyi spyod pa bstan pa'i mdo las ji skad du bstan pa bzhin no //
T05TD4016.3E:111a-17: de'i 'og tu dul zhing las su rung pa'i phyir yongs su smin pa zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:111a-18: dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams 'phel zhing brtas par bya ba'i phyir rnam par grol ba dang cha mthun pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:111a-19: nges par 'byed pa dang cha mthun pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ;
T05TD4016.3E:111a-21: ngan 'gro las rigs dang ldan pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:111a-22: rigs med pa dag go rims bzhin du rnam par grol bar mdzad pa'i phyir rnam par grol ba mdzad pa zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:111a-23: 'di ltar bstan pas btul ba'i stobs kyis rigs dang ldan pa gang yin pa de dag ni 'phags pa'i lam skyes pas khams gsum pa las rnam par grol bar mdzad la /
T05TD4016.3E:111a-24: rigs med pa gang yin pa de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i dge ba bsgrub tu bcug pas rtag par bde 'gror skye bar mdzad de /
T05TD4016.3E:111b-0: dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag gi phyir chos yang dag par bstan pas ni khams gsum @111b las rnam par grol bar mdzad do //
T05TD4016.3E:111b-1: 'od zer bkye nas sdug bsngal nye bar zhi bar mdzad pas ni bde 'gro la 'jog par mdzad do //
T05TD4016.3E:111b-2: gzhan yang de dag thos pa dang bsam pa dang bsgom pa'i shes rab skyed par mdzad pas go rims bzhin du tshig gsum gsungs so //
T05TD4016.3E:111b-3: gzhan yang rnam par grol ba dang cha mthun pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:111b-4: nges par 'byed pa dang cha mthun pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:111b-5: 'phags pa'i lam skyed par mdzad pas go rims bzhin du tshig gsum gsungs so //
T05TD4016.3E:111b-6: gzhan yang de dag mthong ba'i lam dang /
T05TD4016.3E:111b-8: mi slob pa'i lam la gzung pa'i phyir go rims bzhin du tshig gsum gsungs so zhes 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:111b-9: bstan bcos chos mngon pa kun las btus pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:111b-12: theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:111b-14: rnam pa sna tshogs su bshad pa 'byung ba ni mangs kyis dogs nas 'dir ma brjod do //
T05TD4016.3E:111b-15: bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la bka' stsal pa /
T05TD4016.3E:111b-16: rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung ni mdor bsdu na rnam pa gsum yod de /
T05TD4016.3E:111b-19: ma mo'o zhes bya bas ni de bzhin gshegs pas lan mdor gsungs pa ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:111b-20: mdo'i tshig 'di yang rnam pa gsum du dbye ste /
T05TD4016.3E:111b-21: rigs kyi bu zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni grangs smos pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:111b-22: mdo sde zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni grangs smos pa bzhin du ming smos pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:111b-23: de la mdo sde zhes bya ba ni 'di ltar rigs pa dang mthun zhing sems can gyi dbang po dang 'tsham par 'gyur ba'i phyir mdo sde zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:111b-24: mdo zhes bya ba'i don de yang bstan pa rnams las so so nas mi mthun pas 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi sa'i 'grel pa las /
T05TD4016.3E:111b-25: don rnam pa gnyis kyis mdo sde zhes bshad de /
T05TD4016.3E:111b-26: de'i phyir mdo sde de nyid las brgyus pa sdud par byed pa'i phyir mdo zhes bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:111b-27: 'di ltar 'phags pa'i gsung rab kyis bshad par bya ba'i phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:111b-28: gdul bar bya ba'i sems can brgyus shing sdud par byed pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ste /
T05TD4016.3E:112a-1: dum bu bzhi pa las kyang /
T05TD4016.3E:112a-2: 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi sa'i 'grel pa las bstan pa dang mthun par bshad do //
T05TD4016.3E:112a-3: bstan bcos sems sna tshogs kun las btus pa las ni don rnam pa lngas ston te /
T05TD4016.3E:112a-4: de'i phyir de nyid las mdo sde zhes bya ba ni don rnam pa lnga dang ldan te /
T05TD4016.3E:112a-5: dang po ni 'byung gnas te don rnams 'byung bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:112a-6: gnyis pa ni chu mig lta bu ste don gyi ro la zad pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:112a-7: gsum pa ni rab tu bstan pa ste don rab tu ston pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:112a-8: bzhi pa ni thig lta bu ste log par yang dag par rab tu 'byed pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:112a-9: lnga pa ni phreng ba brgyus pa lta bu ste /
T05TD4016.3E:112a-10: chos rnams rab tu brgyus pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:112a-11: don rnam pa lnga po 'di dag ni mdo'i don ces bya'o zhes 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:112a-12: bstan bcos legs par mthong ba las ni /
T05TD4016.3E:112a-13: don rnam pa bdun gyis ston te /
T05TD4016.3E:112a-14: rgya cher de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no //
T05TD4016.3E:112a-15: theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:112a-16: lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las /
T05TD4016.3E:112a-17: sde snod gsum po 'di dag re re la yang bshad pa mang po 'byung ba ni 'dir mangs kyis dogs nas ma bshad do //
T05TD4016.3E:112a-18: de la 'dul ba zhes bya ba ni 'di ltar rnam par dag pa'i sdom pa dag gis nyes pa rnam pa bdun 'dul bar byed pa 'am /
T05TD4016.3E:112a-19: dbang po drug 'dul bar byed pa'i phyir 'dul ba zhes bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:112a-20: de'i phyir bstan bcos legs par mthong ba las /
T05TD4016.3E:112a-21: lus dang ngag gi las 'dul bar byed pa gang yin pa de ni 'dul ba'i don du zhes bstan pa dang ;
T05TD4016.3E:112a-22: gzhan yang mdzod kyi bstan bcos las /
T05TD4016.3E:112a-23: de la 'dul ba zhes bya ba ni don gyis 'dul ba bstan pa yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:112a-24: 'di'i dbang gis dbang po rnams shin tu 'dul bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
T05TD4016.3E:112a-25: bstan bcos gzhung rab tu bstan pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:112a-26: yang dag pa'i rigs pa dang rjes su mthun pa las kyang phal cher mdzod kyi bstan bcos las bshad pa dang mthun par bshad do //
T05TD4016.3E:112a-27: 'dul ba ni 'di la'ang ming gi don mang po yod pas so //
T05TD4016.3E:112a-28: de'i phyir bstan bcos bye brag tu bshad pa chen po las /
T05TD4016.3E:112a-29: mdo las tshul khrims la sh'i la /
T05TD4016.3E:112b-3: bya zhes gang gsungs pa de la /
T05TD4016.3E:112b-4: sh'i la zhes bya ba ni bsil bar byed pa'i don yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:112b-5: 'di ltar nyes pa dag gis lus dang sems kun du gdung bar byed pa yin la /
T05TD4016.3E:112b-6: tshul khrims kyis ni bde zhing zhi bar byed pa'i phyir bsil byed ces bya'o ;
T05TD4016.3E:112b-7: / gzhan yang nyes pa dag gis ngan 'gro'i shin tu gdung ba 'dren par byed pa yin la tshul khrims kyis ni bde 'gro 'dren pa'i phyir bsil bar byed ces bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:112b-8: de la tshul khrims la spyod pa zhes bya ba ni 'di ltar 'jig rten na tshul khrims la spyod pa zhes brjod pas na /
T05TD4016.3E:112b-9: de'i phyir tshul khrims dang ldan pa mthong na /
T05TD4016.3E:112b-10: 'di ni spyod pa dang ldan pa'o zhes zer la /
T05TD4016.3E:112b-11: tshul khrims zhig pa dag mthong na 'di ni spyod pa med pas so zhes zer bas so //
T05TD4016.3E:112b-12: gzhan yang tshul khrims yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa gang yin pa de ni spyod pa mang po'i gzhi yin pas mya ngan las 'das par phyin par byed pa'i phyir spyod pa zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:112b-13: de la tshul khrims la rkang pa zhes bya ba ni bde 'gror 'gro zhing mya ngan las 'das par phyin par byed pa'i phyir ji ltar rkang pa dang ldan pa dag ya nga ba spangs nas gnas bde bar 'gyur zhing phyin par 'gyur ba bzhin du /
T05TD4016.3E:112b-14: tshul khrims yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa yang ngan 'gro las yang dag par 'das nas lha dang mi'i gnas su skye bar 'gyur bas so //
T05TD4016.3E:112b-15: yang na 'khor ba las yang dag par 'das nas /
T05TD4016.3E:112b-16: mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'gram du phyin par byed pa'i phyir rkang pa zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:112b-17: de la tshul khrims la gzeb ces bya ba ni yon tan gyi chos thams cad yongs su 'dzin par byed pa'i phyir te /
T05TD4016.3E:112b-18: 'di ltar tshul khrims dang ldan pas yon tan yongs su ldan cing mi nyams pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:112b-19: stor bar mi 'gyur bar byed pa ni dper na gzeb kyi rin po che yongs su 'dzin par byed pa dang mtshungs pas so //
T05TD4016.3E:112b-20: btsun pa rab dbyangs na re /
T05TD4016.3E:112b-21: tshul khrims ni 'jig par mi 'gyur ba zhes bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:112b-23: ji ltar rkang pa nyams pa med pas rang dbang kho nar bde ba'i gnas su 'gro ba bzhin du /
T05TD4016.3E:113a-0: tshul khrims yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa 'ang de bzhin du mya ngan las @113a * //
T05TD4016.3E:113a-1: 'das par 'gro ba'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ste /
T05TD4016.3E:113a-2: rgya cher de nyid las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:113a-3: gzhan yang mdzod kyi bstan bcos las /
T05TD4016.3E:113a-4: so sor thar pa'i sdom pa'i ming bye brag tu gyur pa ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:113a-5: nyam nga'i las rnams mnyam pa nyid du dbye ba'i phyir sh'i la zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:113a-6: mkhas pa rnams kyis bsngags pa'i phyir spyod pa mchog ces bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:113a-7: rang gi ngo bo nyid byed pa'i phyir las zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:113a-8: lus dang ngag bsrung ba'i phyir sdom pa zhes bya'o zhes 'byung ste /
T05TD4016.3E:113a-9: bstan bcos gzhung rab tu bstan pa dang yang dag pa'i rigs pa las mdzod kyi bstan bcos las bshad pa dang mthun par ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:113a-10: bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las /
T05TD4016.3E:113a-11: de la tshul khrims ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:113a-12: 'chal ba'i tshul khrims kyi kha na ma tho bas kun du gdungs pa nye bar zhi ba'i phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:113a-13: gzhan yang rnam par dag pa'i don dang ldan pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:113a-14: sdom pa zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:113a-15: spong ba'i rang bzhin gyi mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bshad do //
T05TD4016.3E:113a-16: gzhan yang bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa las /
T05TD4016.3E:113a-17: nyes pa rnams zhi bar byed pas 'dul ba zhes bshad do //
T05TD4016.3E:113a-18: de ltar mi mthun pa'i ming mang po yod kyang de dag thams cad ni 'dul ba'i bye brag gi ming yin no //
T05TD4016.3E:113a-19: de la ma mo zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad kyi rtsa ba bskyed pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:113a-20: rab tu ston par byed pa'i phyir ma mo zhes bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:113a-21: de'i phyir bstan bcos yang dag pa'i rigs pa dang rjes su mthun pa las /
T05TD4016.3E:113a-22: gtan la phab par bstan pa la yang ma mo zhes bya ba ste /
T05TD4016.3E:113a-23: mdo sde gzhan dag gi don rnam par bshad pa na 'dis ma mo byed pa'i phyir ro zhes bshad do //
T05TD4016.3E:113a-24: dper na yi ge'i ma mos yi ge rnams skyed par byed pa bzhin no //
T05TD4016.3E:113a-25: shes pa thams cad skyed par byed pa'i phyir yang ma mo zhes bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:113a-26: de'i phyir bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las /
T05TD4016.3E:113a-27: mdo sde rab tu rnam par dbye ba'i phyir mdo sde bzhi po 'di dag las lhag par bshad pa gang yin pa de las brtsams te /
T05TD4016.3E:113b-0: mdo sde'i ma mo de bzhin gshegs pas bsdus shing de bzhin gshegs pas bstan la @113b bsngags shing brjod pa'i gtsug lag bstan par bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:113b-1: dper na ma mo byed pa'i yi ge rnams gsal ba ma yin pa de bzhin du ma mos yongs su ma zin pa'i mdo sde rnams ni don mi gsal ba yin no //
T05TD4016.3E:113b-2: de las bzlog pa ni don gsal ba yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:113b-3: de bas na ma mo zhes bya'o zhes 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:113b-4: gzhan yang bstan bcos rnam par bshad pa las /
T05TD4016.3E:113b-5: gtan la phab par bstan pa ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:113b-6: mdo sde rnams las ma mo bsdu bar bya ba gang yin pa rnams te /
T05TD4016.3E:113b-7: re zhig dper nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde gang yin pa de dag ni ma mo zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:113b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis chos rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid rgya cher rnam par phye ba gang yin pa rnams dang /
T05TD4016.3E:113b-10: gzhan yang slob pa rnams las gang gis 'phags pa gnas mthong ba dag gis rang gi rigs la brten nas phyin ci ma log par chos rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid ston par byed pa de dag la'ang ma mo zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:113b-11: ma mo de nyid la chos mngon pa zhes bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:113b-12: dper na 'jig rten pa'i yi ge dang rtsis dang /
T05TD4016.3E:113b-13: gtsug lag thams cad la ma mo yod pa ltar /
T05TD4016.3E:113b-14: mdo dag las chos kyi mtshan nyid gtan la 'bebs pa'i brjod pa rnams la yang de bzhin du rig par bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:113b-15: gzhan yang dper na 'jig rten na gal te yi ge rnams la ma mo med na yi ge rnams gsal bar mi 'gyur te /
T05TD4016.3E:113b-16: de bzhin du gsung rab yan lag bcu gnyis la'ang /
T05TD4016.3E:113b-17: gal te chos rnams kyi ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid rnam par gzhag pa med na ni chos rnams gsal bar mi 'gyur la /
T05TD4016.3E:113b-18: gal te rnam par bzhag na chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid gsal bar 'gyur bas so //
T05TD4016.3E:113b-19: gzhan yang chos 'dres pa med pa'i mtshan nyid rab tu ston pa'i phyir /
T05TD4016.3E:113b-20: ma mo de nyid la chos mngon pa zhes kyang bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:113b-21: ma mo 'di las gzhan pa mdo sde rnams kyi don ston pa gang yin pa de dag ni gtan la phab par bstan pa zhes bya'o zhes 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:113b-24: chos kyi mtshan nyid kyi ma mo gsum po dag gi bye brag ni bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las zhib tu bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:114a-0: ma mo de dag la yang ming mang du yod pas @114a * //
T05TD4016.3E:114a-1: theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa las /
T05TD4016.3E:114a-2: chos mngon pa ni mngon du gyur pa'i chos zhes kyang bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:114a-3: chos 'dis mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa mngon par byed cing /
T05TD4016.3E:114a-5: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos dang ;
T05TD4016.3E:114a-6: rnam par thar pa'i sgo la sogs pa ston pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:114a-7: rgyun mi 'chad pa'i chos zhes kyang bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:114a-8: chos re re la'ang rgyun 'chad pa med par yang nas yang du nges pa'i tshig dang /
T05TD4016.3E:114a-10: spyi'i mtshan nyid la sogs pa dpag tu med pa'i bye brag ston pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:114a-11: zil gyis gnon pa'i chos zhes kyang bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:114a-12: smra ba phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa 'dis gzhan dag gi smra ba la mchog tu gyur pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:114a-13: rtogs pa'i chos zhes kyang bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:114a-14: 'di'i dbang gis mdo'i don rtogs par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:114a-15: lang gi tshe bsgyur ba'i 'grel pa las kyang de skad bstan to //
T05TD4016.3E:114a-16: bcom ldan 'das mdo sde ni gang lags /
T05TD4016.3E:114a-18: mngon pa ni gang lags zhes bya ba ni gsum pa gsum po dag gi mtshan nyid gang yin pa bstan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:114a-19: 'jam dpal gang du ngas bsdu ba'i dngos po'i dbang du byas nas chos bstan pa de ni mdo sde zhes bya'o zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bzhi pa bdag gi mtshan nyid rgya cher rnam par bshad pa ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:114a-20: 'di yang rnam pa gnyis te gsum po dag gi mtshan nyid rgya cher rnam par bshad pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:114a-21: byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis kyang zhes bya ba nas /
T05TD4016.3E:114a-22: thun mong ba'i gzugs zhes bya ba'i bar dag gis sde snod gsum po dag gi thun mong ma yin pa gzugs bstan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:114a-23: dang po yang rnam pa gsum du dbye ste /
T05TD4016.3E:114a-24: mdo sde rnam pa bshad pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:114a-26: ma mo rnam par bshad pa'o ;
T05TD4016.3E:114a-27: /'di ni dang po mdo sde rnam par bshad pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:114a-28: 'di yang rnam pa gsum du dbye ste /
T05TD4016.3E:114a-30: mtshan nyid mdor smos pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:114a-31: sgo rnam pa gsum du rab tu dbye ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:114a-32: go rims bzhin du rnam par phye ste bshad pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:114b-0: 'di ni dang po mdo sde'i mtshan nyid smos @114b pa'o ;
T05TD4016.3E:114b-1: / de la gang du zhes bya ba ni mdo sde nyid gnas su bstan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:114b-2: de la yang zhes bya ba ni gshegs nyid de /
T05TD4016.3E:114b-3: phung po lnga la btags pa tsam gang yin pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:114b-4: dngos po ni ngo bo nyid kyi dngos po nyid de bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la sogs pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:114b-5: 'di ltar mdo ni dngos po rnams bsdus pa dag gi chos rnams rtogs pas na de'i phyir bcom ldan 'das kyis ngas bsdu ba'i dngos po'i dbang du byas nas chos rnams bstan pa de ni mdo zhes bya ba'o zhes gsungs pa yin no /
T05TD4016.3E:114b-7: ngos po bzhi'i dbang du byas pa'am /
T05TD4016.3E:114b-8: dngos po dgu'i dbang du byas pa 'am /
T05TD4016.3E:114b-9: dngos po nyi shu rtsa dgu'i dbang du byas pa gang yin pa'o zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa sgo rnam pa gsum rab tu dbye ba'o //
T05TD4016.3E:114b-10: 'di ltar bsdu ba'i dngos po ni rnam pa gsum yod do //
T05TD4016.3E:114b-13: dngos po nyi shu rtsa dgu gang yin pa'o ;
T05TD4016.3E:114b-14: / dngos po bzhi gang zhe na zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gsum pa go rims bzhin du rnam par phye ste bshad pa ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:114b-15: 'di 'ang dngos po gsum rnam par bshad pa nyid las rnam pa gsum du dbye ste /
T05TD4016.3E:114b-16: 'di ni dang po'i dngos po bzhi rnam par bshad pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:114b-17: 'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang lan du gsungs pa bstan te /
T05TD4016.3E:114b-20: skyabs su 'gro ba'i dngos po dang /
T05TD4016.3E:114b-21: bslab par bya ba'i dngos po dang /
T05TD4016.3E:114b-22: byang chub kyi dngos po'o zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa lan gsungs pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:114b-23: dngos po 'di bzhi rnam par bshad pa bsdus pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:114b-24: rgyas par rnam par dbye ba ni bstan bcos rnam par bshad pa las ji skad bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:114b-25: de la gsum ste bstan pa ni bstan bcos de nyid kyi tshig le'ur byas pa las ji skad du gsung rab yan lag bcu gnyis po dag ni sde snod gsum dang ldan te /
T05TD4016.3E:114b-26: dam pa mchog gsum la ni skyabs su 'gro ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:114b-27: bslab pa gsum po dag dang byang chub gsum //
T05TD4016.3E:114b-28: sems can rnam dag thob bya'i phyir ni gsungs //
T05TD4016.3E:115a-1: bya ba ni gsung rab yan lag bcu gnyis thob pa gang yin pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:115a-2: gsung rab yan lag bcu gnyis po dag ni sde snod gsum dang ldan te /
T05TD4016.3E:115a-3: de la mdo dang dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:115a-11: rmad du byung ba'i sde gang yin pa de dag ni mdo sde'i sde snod do //
T05TD4016.3E:115a-12: de la gleng gzhi'i sde gang yin pa de ni 'dul ba'i sde snod nyid do //
T05TD4016.3E:115a-13: de la gtan la phab par bstan pa'i sde gang yin pa de ni chos mngon pa'i sde snod nyid do zhes 'byung ste /
T05TD4016.3E:115a-14: gsung rab yan lag bcu gnyis ni zhib tu de nyid las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:115a-16: dam pa mchog gsum la ni skyabs su 'gro ba dang //
T05TD4016.3E:115a-17: zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:115a-18: sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun rnams la skyabs su 'gro ba'o //
T05TD4016.3E:115a-19: bslab pa gsum zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:115a-22: shes rab kyi bslab pa rnam pa gsum po dag go //
T05TD4016.3E:115a-23: byang chub ces bya ba ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:115a-24: theg pa gsum gyi byang chub dag go //
T05TD4016.3E:115a-25: sems can rnam dag thob bya'i phyir ni gsungs //
T05TD4016.3E:115a-26: zhes bya ba ni sems can rnam pa rnam par dag pa thob par bya ba'i phyir go rims bzhin du chos rnams la gsum gsungs pa yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:115a-29: de la 'dzin par byed pa ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:115a-35: byang chub rnam pa gsum po dag go zhes bshad do //
T05TD4016.3E:115a-36: de rgyas par bstan pa ni bstan bcos de nyid las /
T05TD4016.3E:115a-37: dngos po bzhi ji ltar rgya cher bstan pa nyid yin te mangs kyis dogs nas 'dir ma brjod do //
T05TD4016.3E:115a-38: dngos po gang zhe na zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa dngos po dgu phye ste bshad par ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:115a-39: 'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:115a-40: lan du gsungs pas 'di ni zhu ba gsol ba nyid do //
T05TD4016.3E:115b-0: sems can du gdags @115b pa'i dngos po dang /
T05TD4016.3E:115b-1: de'i longs spyod kyi dngos po dang /
T05TD4016.3E:115b-3: de 'byung ba gnas pa'i dngos po dang /
T05TD4016.3E:115b-4: de'i kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:115b-5: rnam par byang ba'i dngos po dang /
T05TD4016.3E:115b-6: de'i bye brag gi dngos po dang /
T05TD4016.3E:115b-7: ston par byed pa'i dngos po dang bstan par bya ba'i dngos po dang /
T05TD4016.3E:115b-8: 'khor gyi dngos po'o zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:115b-9: dngos po dgu po 'di dag rnam par bshad pa ni /
T05TD4016.3E:115b-10: bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las ji skad bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:115b-11: de'i phyir bstan bcos de nyid las /
T05TD4016.3E:115b-12: sangs rgyas kyi bka'i dngos po dgu yang spangs par rig par bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:115b-13: dngos po dgu gang zhe na /
T05TD4016.3E:115b-14: de la sems can gyi dngos po ni nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po dag rnams so //
T05TD4016.3E:115b-15: de la longs spyod pa'i dngos po ni skye mched bcu gnyis rnams so //
T05TD4016.3E:115b-16: skye ba'i dngos po ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:115b-17: skye ba'i zas bzhi po'i dngos po ni zas bzhi po rnams so //
T05TD4016.3E:115b-18: kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:115b-19: rnam par byang ba'i dngos po ni 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po rnams so //
T05TD4016.3E:115b-20: sna tshogs kyi dngos po ni khams tshad med pa rnams so //
T05TD4016.3E:115b-21: ston pa'i dngos po ni sangs rgyas dang de dag gi nyan thos rnams so //
T05TD4016.3E:115b-22: bstan par bya ba'i dngos po ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la sogs pa byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams so //
T05TD4016.3E:115b-23: 'khor gyi dngos po ni 'khor brgyad de /
T05TD4016.3E:115b-28: rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi 'khor dang /
T05TD4016.3E:115b-29: sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i 'khor dang /
T05TD4016.3E:115b-31: tshangs pa'i 'khor to zhes 'byung ba yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:115b-32: lung ring po dang lung gcig la spros pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:115b-33: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las /
T05TD4016.3E:115b-35: rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las gsungs pa dang mthun par bstan to //
T05TD4016.3E:116a-0: mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo @116a * //
T05TD4016.3E:116a-2: dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las tshig cung zad tha dad kyang dngos po dgu bstan pa la ni don mi mthun pa med do //
T05TD4016.3E:116a-3: bstan bcos rnam par bshad pa las /
T05TD4016.3E:116a-4: dngos po dgu 'byung ba yang mdo 'di las gsungs pa dang mthun no //
T05TD4016.3E:116a-5: lha dang mi dag las so so nas 'khor bzhi bstan pa la gtan tshigs ci yod ce na /
T05TD4016.3E:116a-7: bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las /
T05TD4016.3E:116a-8: rgyu rnam pa bdun gyi phyir 'khor rnam pa brgyad rnam par gzhag pa yin no zhes bshad de /
T05TD4016.3E:116a-9: de'i phyir bstan bcos de nyid las /
T05TD4016.3E:116a-10: rgyu bzhis ni mi rnams kyi nang na de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor rnam bzhir gzhag par rig par bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:116a-11: rgyu gsum gyis ni lhar gyur pa rnams kyi 'khor bzhir rnam par gzhag par rig par bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:116a-12: bdag po'i mchog tu gyur pa'i phyir 'jig rten pa rnams yon gnas su bkur ba'i phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:116a-13: gzhan la rag ma lus pa'i longs spyod kyi 'tsho ba'i phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:116a-14: longs spyod thams cad spangs pa'i phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:116a-15: rgyu 'di bzhi ni mir gyur pa'i nang na 'khor bzhir rnam par gzhag par rig par bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:116a-16: sa gzhi la brten pa'i mthar gyur pa'i phyir dang ;
T05TD4016.3E:116a-17: 'dod pa'i khams kyi mthar gyur pa'i phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:116a-18: ngag gi 'du byed kyi mthar gyur pa'i phyir ni lhar gyur pa rnams kyi 'khor bzhir rnam par gzhag par rig par bya'o zhes 'byung ba yin no //
T05TD4016.3E:116a-19: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las /
T05TD4016.3E:116a-20: logs shig tu dge sbyong dang /
T05TD4016.3E:116a-22: sum cu rtsa gsum pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:116a-23: bdud dang tshangs pa'i 'khor rgya cher bstan pa ni mangs kyis dogs nas 'dir ma brjod do //
T05TD4016.3E:116a-24: dngos po nyi shu rtsa dgu gang zhe na zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gsum pa dngos po nyi shu rtsa dgu rnam par phye ste bshad pa bstan te /
T05TD4016.3E:116a-25: 'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:116a-26: lan du gsungs pa bstan te 'di ni zhu ba gsol ba nyid do //
T05TD4016.3E:116b-0: kun nas nyon mongs pa'i phyogs las brtsams te 'du byed rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs @116b pas dngos po nyi shu rtsa lnga rnam par phye ste /
T05TD4016.3E:116b-2: 'di yang bshad pa rnam pa gnyis su dbye ste /
T05TD4016.3E:116b-3: kun nas nyon mongs pa'i phyogs kyi dngos po bstan pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:116b-4: rnam par byang ba'i phyogs las brtsams pa'i dngos po nyi shu rtsa lnga bstan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:116b-5: de'i bstan bcos rnam par bshad pa las /
T05TD4016.3E:116b-6: dngos po nyi shu rtsa dgu ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:116b-7: dngos po dgu po yongs su bsdus pa gang yin pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:116b-8: mdo las kun nas nyon mongs pa'i phyogs las brtsams nas ni dngos po bzhi bstan to //
T05TD4016.3E:116b-9: rnam par byang ba'i phyogs las brtsams nas ni dngos po nyi shu rtsa lnga bstan to zhes 'byung ba yin no //
T05TD4016.3E:116b-10: kun nas nyon mongs pa'i phyogs bstan pa yang rnam pa bzhir dbye ste /
T05TD4016.3E:116b-11: phung po lnga bstan pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:116b-12: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba bstan pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:116b-14: kun nas nyon mongs pa la de ltar rnam pa bzhi yod par gyur pa yang kun nas nyon mongs pa ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de dag ni phung po lnga yin pa'i phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:116b-15: kun nas nyon mongs pa 'khor bar 'jug pa gang yin pa de ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba yin pa'i phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:116b-16: 'khor bar 'jug pa'i rtsa ba ni 'dzin pa gnyis yin pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:116b-17: 'dzin pa gnyis las kyang bdag tu 'dzin pa rags pa yin pas sngar bstan la /
T05TD4016.3E:116b-18: chos su 'dzin pa ni phra bas na phyis bstan te /
T05TD4016.3E:116b-19: bdag tu 'dzin pa ni gdon mi za bar chos su 'dzin pas 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:116b-20: 'di ni dang po phung po lnga'i dngos po bstan pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:116b-21: de la kun nas nyon mongs pa'i phyogs shes par bya ba ni nyon mongs pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:116b-23: skye ba'i kun nas nyon mongs pa rnam pa gsum mo //
T05TD4016.3E:116b-24: 'du byed rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po zhes bya ba ni phung po lnga nyid de /
T05TD4016.3E:116b-25: phung po lngas 'dus byas kyi dngos po rnam par bsdus pa'i phyir 'du byed bsdu ba'i dngos po zhes gsungs so //
T05TD4016.3E:116b-26: yang na 'du byed rnams zhes bya ba ni phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams bsdu'o //
T05TD4016.3E:116b-27: de ltar rnam pa gnyis su bshad pa yod kyang bshad pa ni snga ma bzang ste /
T05TD4016.3E:117a-1: dang skye mched sgo gnyis po dag ni 'du byed ma yin par yang gtogs pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:117a-2: de'i go rims rjes su 'jug pa'i dngos po zhes bya bas ni gnyis pa rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba yan lag bcu gnyis ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:117a-3: 'di ltar kun nas nyon mongs pa'i rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yan lag bcu gnyis po de dag gi go rims bzhin du rjes su 'jug pa ni ji ltar ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed 'byung ba nas skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi'i bar du 'byung ba lta bu'o //
T05TD4016.3E:117a-4: yang na de zhes bya ba ni phung po lnga po de nyid do //
T05TD4016.3E:117a-5: bstan bcos rnam par bshad pa las /
T05TD4016.3E:117a-6: de nyid go rims bzhin du 'jug pa'i dngos po zhes 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:117a-7: de dag nyid la gang zag 'du shes su byas nas phyi mar 'byung ba'i rgyu'i dngos po dang /
T05TD4016.3E:117a-8: chos kyi ming du byas nas phyi mar 'byung ba'i rgyu'i dngos po dang zhes bya ba ni gsum dag tu 'dzin pa'i dngos po ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:117a-9: bstan bcos rnam par bshad pa las ni de nyid la sems can gyi 'du shes su rnam par bzhag pas phyi mar 'byung ba'i rgyu'i dngos po zhes 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:117a-11: ji ltar 'dzin pa 'di nyid kyis kun nas nyon mongs pa phung po dag la bdag tu 'du shes pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:117a-12: chos su 'du shes pa'i dbang gis phyi mar 'khor bar 'jug pa'i rgyur 'gyur ro //
T05TD4016.3E:117a-13: rnam par byang ba'i phyogs las brtsams te dmigs pa la nye bar gtod pa'i dngos po zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa rnam par byang ba'i phyogs kyi dngos po nyi shu rtsa lnga ston to ;
T05TD4016.3E:117a-15: 'jig rten pa'i rnam par dag pa'i dngos po bzhi bstan pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:117a-16: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rnam par dag pa'i dngos po nyi shu rtsa gcig bstan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:117a-17: dngos po yang rnam pa bzhi ste /
T05TD4016.3E:117a-18: thos pa'i shes rab bstan pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:117a-19: bsam pa'i shes rab bstan pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:117a-20: sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin bstan pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:117a-21: dngos po bzhi'i ting nge 'dzin bstan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:117b-0: de la 'jig rten pa'i rnam par dag pa'i dngos po bzhi yod par gyur pa yang rnal 'byor gyi sgo'i go rims kyis gdon mi za bar sngar thos pa'i shes rab kyi dbang gis ni bsam pa'i @117b shes rab rab tu 'dren par 'gyur /
T05TD4016.3E:117b-1: bsam pa'i shes rab kyis ni sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'dren pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:117b-2: sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis ni dngos po bzhi'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ba'i go rims de'i phyir rnam pa bzhir gsungs pa yin no //
T05TD4016.3E:117b-3: 'di ni dang po thos pa'i shes rab kyi dngos po bstan pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:117b-4: de la rnam par byang ba'i phyogs zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:117b-7: zag pa dang bcas pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:117b-8: zag pa med pa'i rnam par byang ba'i chos rnams gang yin pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:117b-9: rnam par byang ba'i phyogs las ni 'di ni 'jig rten pa'i rnam par byang ba'i phyogs bstan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:117b-10: dmigs pa la nye bar gtod pa'i dngos po zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'i khams kyi thos pa'i shes rab ste /
T05TD4016.3E:117b-11: bstan pa dag la sems nye bar gtod pa gang yin pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:117b-12: yang na brjod par bya ba'i don dang /
T05TD4016.3E:117b-13: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa yul la sems nye bar gtod pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:117b-14: de nyid la rtsol ba'i dngos po zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa bsam pa'i shes rab kyi dngos po ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:117b-15: 'di ltar thos pa'i shes rab kyi yul de nyid la gcig tu bden par mthong nas nan tan brtson 'grus kyis yid la byed pa gang yin pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:117b-16: sems gnas pa'i dngos po zhes bya ba ni gsum pa sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:117b-17: 'di ltar bsam pa'i shes rab kyi dbang gis sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin la sems gnas pa gang yin pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:117b-18: tshe 'di la ni bde bar gnas pa'i dngos po zhes bya ba ni bzhi pa dngos gzhi'i ting nge 'dzin ston te ;
T05TD4016.3E:117b-19: mngon par shes pa drug thob nas mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas pa gang yin pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:117b-20: sdug bsngal thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i dmigs pa'i thabs kyi dngos po zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos po rnam pa'i dngos po nyi shu rtsa gcig ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:117b-21: 'di yang rnam pa drug tu dbye ste /
T05TD4016.3E:117b-22: dngos po gcig gis rnam par grol ba'i phyogs bstan pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:117b-23: dngos po bzhis mthong ba'i lam bstan pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:117b-24: dngos po drug gis bsgom pa'i lam bstan pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:118a-2: dngos po gnyis kyis khyad par du 'phags pa dang khyad par du 'phags pa ma yin par bstan pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:118a-3: 'di ni dngos po gcig gis rnam par grol ba'i phyogs bstan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:118a-4: mdo'i tshig 'di la yang bshad pa rnam pa gnyis yod de /
T05TD4016.3E:118a-5: ci kha cig na re sdug bsngal thams cad las yang dag par 'das zhes bya ba ni mya ngan las 'das pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:118a-6: 'di ltar mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbang gis sems can rnams sdug bsngal ba thams cad las yang dag par 'das par 'gyur bas rnam par grol ba'i phyogs kyi dge ba la dmigs pa gang yin pa de ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i thabs kyi rgyur gyur pas thabs kyi dngos po zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:118a-7: kha cig na re rnam par grol ba'i phyogs kyi dge ba la don rnam pa gnyis yod de /
T05TD4016.3E:118a-8: dang po ni 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa la dmigs pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:118a-9: gnyis pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i thabs kyi dmigs pa byed pa'i phyir sdug bsngal thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i thabs kyi dmigs pa'i dngos po zhes bya'o zhes so zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa dngos po bzhi las brtsams nas nges par 'byed pa'i cha bstan pa ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:118a-11: sdug bsngal yongs su shes par bya ba'i dngos po bstan pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:118a-13: 'gog pa mngon du bya ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:118a-14: lam bsgom pa'i dngos po bstan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:118a-15: 'di ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la brten nas dro bar gyur pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:118a-16: rtse mo la sogs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bzhi bskyed pa'i phyir dngos po rnam pa bzhi bstan pa yin no //
T05TD4016.3E:118a-17: 'di ni dang po sdug bsngal yongs su shes par bya ba'i dngos po bstan pa yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:118a-18: 'di yang rnam pa gnyis su dbye ste /
T05TD4016.3E:118a-19: sdug bsngal yongs su shes par bya ba'i mdor bstan pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:118a-20: yongs su shes pa gsum rnam par phye ste bshad pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:118a-22: 'di ltar khams gsum gyi sdug bsngal gyi bden pa yongs su shes pa zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:118b-0: de'ang rnam pa gsum yod pas phyin ci log gi gnas @118b yongs su shes pa'i phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:118b-1: sems can du 'du shes pa las brtsams te /
T05TD4016.3E:118b-2: phyi rol gyi sems can rnams la log par sgrub pa'i gnas yongs su shes pa'i phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:118b-3: nang mngon pa'i nga rgyal dang bral ba yongs su shes pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa yongs su shes pa gsum rnam par phye ste bshad pa ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:118b-4: de yang rnam pa gsum yod pas zhes bya ba la /
T05TD4016.3E:118b-5: dang po phyin ci log las brtsams pa'i gnas yongs su shes pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:118b-6: gnyis pa ni sems can du 'du shes pa'i las brtsams pa'i phyi rol gyi sems can rnams la log par sgrub pa'i gnas yongs su shes pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:118b-7: gsum pa ni nang mngon pa'i nga rgyal dang bral ba'i phyir gnas yongs su shes pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:118b-8: mdo'i tshig 'di gsum yang so so nas bshad pa mi mthun pas kha cig na re phyin ci log gi gnas yongs su shes pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni khams gsum pa'i sdug bsngal gyi bden pa phyin ci log rnams kyi gnas yin pa nyid du yongs su shes pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:118b-9: sems can du 'du shes pa las brtsams te phyi rol gyi sems can rnams la log par sgrub pa'i gnas yongs su shes pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'i khams kyi sdug bsngal gyi bden pa yongs su shes pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:118b-10: sems can du 'du shes pa la brten nas srog gcod pa la sogs pa'i lam 'byung ba'ang nges par sngar sems can gyi 'du shes bskyed pa las 'byung bas so //
T05TD4016.3E:118b-11: phyi rol gyi sems can rnams la zhes bya bas ni las slong ba'i lam bstan to //
T05TD4016.3E:118b-12: log par sgrub pa'i zhes bya ba ni des bskyed pa'i las kyi spyod pa nyid de ni 'di skad du 'dod pa'i khams kyi sdug bsngal gyi bden pa yongs su shes pas sems can du 'du shes pa las brtsams te phyi rol gyi sems can rnams la log par sgrub pa'i gnas nyid du yongs su shes pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan par 'gyur ro //
T05TD4016.3E:118b-13: nang mngon pa'i nga rgyal dang bral ba'i gnas yongs su shes pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni gzugs kyi khams gyi nang gi lus sdug bsngal gyi bden pa nyid du yongs su shes pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:119a-1: khams gong ma gnyis kyi nyon mongs pa thams cad ni nang gi lus la brten nas 'byung ba'i phyir nang mngon pa'i nga rgyal dang bral ba'i zhes gsungs so zhe'o //
T05TD4016.3E:119a-2: kha cig na re yongs su shes pa dang po gnyis ni 'dod pa'i khams kho na'o zhes pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:119a-3: yongs su shes pa gsum pa ni khams gong ma gnyis shes pa'o zhes zer te /
T05TD4016.3E:119a-4: gzhan ni snga ma'i bshad pa bzhin kha cig na re /
T05TD4016.3E:119a-5: gsum po dag ni go rims bzhin du khams gsum po dag gi sdug bsngal yongs su shes pa yin no zhes zer ro //
T05TD4016.3E:119a-6: de ltar rnas pa du mar bshad pa yod kyang /
T05TD4016.3E:119a-7: slob dpon hyan tsang gis ni rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa'i 'grel pa dang gtugs nas bshad pa gnyis pa bzang bar bshad do //
T05TD4016.3E:119a-8: bsgom pa'i gnas kyi dngos po dang /
