T05TD4016.3E:119a-9: mngon du bya ba'i dngos po dang /
T05TD4016.3E:119a-10: bsgom pa'i dngos po 'o zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa kun 'byung ba spang ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:119a-11: 'gog pa mngon du bya ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:119a-12: lam bsgom pa'i dngos po bstan pa ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:119a-13: 'di yang kun 'byung ba'i bden pa ni bsgom pa mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi nyon mongs pa gnyis yin pa'i phyir bsgom pa'i gnas kyi dngos po zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:119a-14: 'gog pa ni 'dus ma byas pa yin pas mngon du bya ba'i dngos po zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:119a-15: 'phags pa'i lam ni bsgom pa'i dngos po zhes bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:119a-16: de'i phyir mdo dang bstan bcos dag las /
T05TD4016.3E:119a-17: sdug bsngal yongs su shes par bya /
T05TD4016.3E:119a-18: lam bsgom par bya zhes gsungs pa yin no //
T05TD4016.3E:119a-19: de'i snying por bya ba'i dngos po dang /
T05TD4016.3E:119a-20: de'i rnam pa'i dngos po dang /
T05TD4016.3E:119a-21: de'i dmigs pa'i dngos po dang /
T05TD4016.3E:119a-23: ma spangs pa'i spyod pa la mkhas pa'i dngos po dang ngo zhes bya ba ni gsum pa dngos po bzhi las brtsams nas mthong ba'i lam bstan pa ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:119a-24: de la snying por bya ba'i dngos po zhes bya ba ni yang dag pa'i lam ste /
T05TD4016.3E:119a-25: yang dag pa nyid du lam mthong ba'i dbang gis yang dag pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:119a-26: mtshan ma dang bcas pa'i mthong ba'i lam rnam pa gnyis las mi nyams par byed pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:119a-27: bshad pa'i rnam pa gzhan du na /
T05TD4016.3E:119b-0: lam mthong ba thob @119b ba'i dbang gis nams kyang so so'i skye bo nyid du phyir mi ldog pa'i phyir mthong ba'i lam snying por bya ba'i dngos po zhes bstan to //
T05TD4016.3E:119b-1: de'i rnam pa'i dngos po zhes bya ba ni mtshan ma dang bcas pa'i mthong ba'i lam ste /
T05TD4016.3E:119b-3: sems rnam pa bcu drug gi rnam pa tha dad pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:119b-4: de'i dmigs pa'i dngos po zhes bya ba ni mtshan ma dang bcas pa'i mthong ba'i lam gyi dmigs pa yul gyi dngos po bstan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:119b-5: spangs pa dang ma spangs pa spyod pa la mkhas pa'i dngos po zhes bya ba ni mtshan ma dang bcas pa'i mthong ba'i lam gyis mthong ba'i spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa spangs pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:119b-6: bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa da rung ma spangs pa nyid du so sor rtog pa gang yin pa'o /
T05TD4016.3E:119b-8: // / bam po drug cu dgu pa /
T05TD4016.3E:119b-9: de la rnam par g-yang ba'i dngos po dang /
T05TD4016.3E:119b-10: rnam par mi g-yeng ba'i dngos po dang /
T05TD4016.3E:119b-11: rnam par mi g-yeng ba'i gnas kyi dngos po dang /
T05TD4016.3E:119b-12: bsgom pa las yongs su skyo ba'i sbyor ba bsam pa'i dngos po dang /
T05TD4016.3E:119b-13: bsgom pa'i phan yon gyi dngos po dang /
T05TD4016.3E:119b-14: de bstan pa'i dngos po'i zhes bya ba ni bzhi pa dngos po rnam pa drug las brtsams nas bsgom pa'i lam bstan pa zhes bya bas ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:119b-15: mdo'i tshig 'di yang so so nas bshad pa mi mthun pas kha cig na re de las rnam par g-yeng ba'i dngos po bya ba ni mthong ba'i lam las yang dag par 'das nas bsgom pa'i lam la ma zhugs pa'i bar skabs der re zhig tsam du sems rnam par g-yeng bar gyur pa gang yin pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:119b-16: kun nas nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa'i phyir rnam par g-yeng ba zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:119b-17: de la rnam par mi g-yeng ba'i dngos po dang /
T05TD4016.3E:119b-18: rnam par mi g-yeng ba'i gnas kyi dngos po zhes bya ba ni ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa na 'dod pa'i khams kyi bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa spong ba'i sbyor ba'i las yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:119b-19: rnam par mi g-yeng ba'i dngos po ni ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam pa ma gtogs pa gzhan dus mtshungs pa'i chos so //
T05TD4016.3E:119b-20: rnam par mi g-yeng ba'i gnas kyi dngos po ni ting nge 'dzin gyi bdag nyid kho na bzung ste /
T05TD4016.3E:119b-21: 'di ni shes rab kyi stong du gyur pa'i phyir gnas zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:120a-0: @120a * // sgom pa la yongs su skyo ba'i sbyor ba gsal ba'i dngos po zhes bya ba ni gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams kyi bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa spong bar thogs pa med pa'i lam gang yin pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:120a-1: de bstan pa'i dngos po zhes bya ba ni rdo rje lta bu'i sems thogs pa med pa'i lam gang yin pa'o zhes so //
T05TD4016.3E:120a-2: kha cig na re dngos po snga ma gsum ni sngar bshad pa bzhin no //
T05TD4016.3E:120a-3: dngos po bzhi pa ni khams gsum gyi bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa spong bar byed pa'i bar chad med pa'i lam mo //
T05TD4016.3E:120a-4: dngos po snga ma ni gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams kyi dngos gzhi ting nge 'dzin to //
T05TD4016.3E:120a-5: dngos po drug po ni sngar bshad pa dang 'dra'o zhe na /
T05TD4016.3E:120a-6: kha cig na re de las rnam par g-yeng ba dngos po zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:120a-7: lam bsgom pa ni thos pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:120a-8: bsam pa'i shes rab gnyis la brten nas khams gsum gyi bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa spong bar mi byed pa sbyor ba'i lam ring ba gang yin pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:120a-9: de la rnam par mi g-yeng ba'i dngos po dang rnam par mi g-yeng ba'i gnas kyi dngos po zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:120a-10: ting nge 'dzin la gnas nas khams gsum gyi bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa spong bar mi byed pa sbyor ba'i lam nye bar gnas pa gang yin pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:120a-11: de la rnam par g-yeng ba'i dngos po ni mnyam par bzhag pa na gzhan sems dang sems las byung ba rnams rnam par mi g-yeng ba gang yin pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:120a-12: gnas kyi dngos po ni ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam pa kho nas bzung ste /
T05TD4016.3E:120a-13: shes rab kyi gnas byed pa'i phyir gzhan zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:120a-14: bsgom pas yongs su skyo ba'i sbyor ba brtsams pa'i dngos po zhes bya ba ni 'dod pa'i khams kyi bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa spong bar byed pa bar chad med pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:120a-15: rnam par grol ba'i lam mo ;
T05TD4016.3E:120a-16: / bsgom pa'i phan yon gyi dngos po zhes bya ba ni gzugs kyi khams kyi bsgom pas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa spong bar byed pa bar chad med pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:120a-17: rnam par grol ba'i lam mo //
T05TD4016.3E:120b-0: de bstan pa'i dngos po zhes bya ba ni gzugs med pa'i khams kyi bsgom pas spang bar @120b bya ba'i nyon mongs pa spong bar byed pa bar chad med pa'i lam ste /
T05TD4016.3E:120b-1: rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin to //
T05TD4016.3E:120b-2: ci'i phyir rnam par grol ba'i lam bstan zhe na /
T05TD4016.3E:120b-3: rnam par grol ba'i lam de mi slob pas bsdus pa'i phyir ro zhe'o //
T05TD4016.3E:120b-4: dgongs pa zab mo nges par 'grel ba'i dpe gzhan kha cig dang /
T05TD4016.3E:120b-5: dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las /
T05TD4016.3E:120b-6: rnam par mi g-yeng ba'i dngos po zhes bya ba med de ma tshang ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:120b-7: dpe 'di las ni dngos po drug car tshang bar 'byung ste /
T05TD4016.3E:120b-8: rgya gar gyi dpe nyid dang /
T05TD4016.3E:120b-9: mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa la sogs pa dang gtugs pa las kyang dngos po drug tshang ba 'byung ba'i phyir ro /
T05TD4016.3E:120b-10: 'dir dngos po drug tshang bar bstan pa'i yang dag pa yin no //
T05TD4016.3E:120b-11: 'phags pa'i spyod yul pa bsdus pa'i dngos po dang /
T05TD4016.3E:120b-13: g-yog 'khor bsdus pa'i dngos po dang /
T05TD4016.3E:120b-14: de kho na rab tu rtogs pa'i dngos po dang /
T05TD4016.3E:120b-15: mya ngan las 'das pa yang dag par thob pa'i dngos po zhes bya ba ni lnga pa dngos po rnam pa bzhi las brtsams nas mi slob pa'i lam bstan pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:120b-16: de la 'phags pa'i spyod pa bsdus pa'i dngos po zhes bya ba ni yang dag pa'i ye shes kyis bsdus pa zad pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:120b-17: mi skye ba shes pa gang yin pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:120b-18: 'phags pa'i phyogs dang g-yog 'khor bsdus pa'i dngos po zhes bya ba ni rjes las thob pa'i ye shes kyis bzung ba zad pa dang mi skye ba'i ye shes gang yin pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:120b-19: de kho na rab tu rtogs pa'i dngos po zhes bya ba ni lhag ma med par 'jug tu nye ba na yang de kho na nyid du bsgom pa gang yin pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:120b-20: mya ngan las 'das pa yang dag par thob pa'i dngos po zhes bya ba ni lhag ma med par 'jug tu nye ba na sngar 'gog pa snyoms par 'jug pas 'gog pas snyoms par zhugs pa kun gzhi rnam par sems de nyid kyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa gang yin pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:120b-21: legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la 'jig rten pa'i yang dag pa'i lta ba 'di las phyi rol pa thams cad yang dag pa'i lta ba las spyi bor gyur pa nyid kyi dngos po dang /
T05TD4016.3E:121a-1: yongs su nyams pa'i dngos po zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni drug pa dngos po rnam pa gnyis las brtsams nas khyad par du 'phags pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:121a-2: khyad par du 'phags pa ma yin pa zhes bya ba ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:121a-4: dngos po gnyis bstan pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:121a-7: de legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba zhes bya ba ni sde snod gsum gyis bstan pa rnams so //
T05TD4016.3E:121a-8: legs par gsungs pa'i chos zhes bya ba ni mdo sde dang /
T05TD4016.3E:121a-9: chos mngon pa'i sde snod do //
T05TD4016.3E:121a-10: 'dul ba zhes bya ba ni 'dul ba'i sde snod nyid do //
T05TD4016.3E:121a-11: de'i phyir bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las legs par chos gsungs pa ni rigs pas bsdu ba'i phyir yon tan khyad par du 'phags pa yongs su 'dzin par byed pa'i 'dul ba ni nyon mongs pa thams cad zhi bar byed pa dang mthun ba'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
T05TD4016.3E:121a-12: legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba zhes bya ba ni 'di ni rgya cher bshad pa ni sngar gong du bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:121a-13: de ni 'di skad du sde snod gsum las gsungs pa'i rnam par grol ba'i phyogs kyis bsdus pa'i 'jig rten pa'i yang dag pa'i lta ba dman pa yin yang /
T05TD4016.3E:121a-14: 'di las phyi rol pa thams cad kyi yang dag pa'i lta ba las spyi bor gyur pa'i dngos po yin no zhes bya ba bstan par 'gyur ro //
T05TD4016.3E:121a-15: yang dag pa'i lta ba las spyi bor gyur pa'i dngos po zhes bya ba 'di la yang bshad pa rnam pa gnyis yod de /
T05TD4016.3E:121a-16: kha cig na re spyi bor mthong ba'i sa yang dag pa'i lta ba yin pa'i phyir /
T05TD4016.3E:121a-17: yang dag pa'i lta ba las spyi bor gyur pa'i dngos po zhes bya'o zhe'o //
T05TD4016.3E:121a-18: kha cig na re 'di ni dpe las ming du btags pa yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:121a-19: de dag gi gzhung gis bstan pa'i yang dag pa'i lta ba khyad par du 'phags pa de ni dper na mi'i spyi bo dang 'dra ba'i phyir yang dag pa'i lta ba las spyi bor gyur pa'i dngos po zhes bya'o zhe'o //
T05TD4016.3E:121a-20: de mi bsgom pa yongs su nyams pa'i dngos po zhes bya ba ni dngos po gnyis pa bstan te /
T05TD4016.3E:121b-0: 'di ltar lta ba legs par gsungs pa'i chos @121b 'dul ba de las dge ba gzhan bsgom zhing /
T05TD4016.3E:121b-1: dngos po snga ma mi bsgom pa'i phyir mi bsgom pas yongs su nyams pa'i dngos po zhes bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T05TD4016.3E:121b-2: legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba bsgom pa'i phyir yongs su nyams par gyur pa zhes bshad kyi ;
T05TD4016.3E:121b-3: lta ba'i nyes pa'i phyir yongs su nyams pa zhes brjod pa ni ma yin no zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa rgol ba'i lan ston pa 'di ltar phyi rol pa 'di dag 'di skad do //
T05TD4016.3E:121b-4: mi bsgom pas yongs su nyams pa'i dngos po yin no //
T05TD4016.3E:121b-5: nyes pa'i skyon du 'gyur ro zhes zer bas de'i phyir tshig 'di gsungs pa yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:121b-6: yongs su nyams pa zhes bya ba yang legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la mi bsgom pa'i phyir yongs su nyams pa zhes bya'i /
T05TD4016.3E:121b-7: dngos po gnyis pa la nyes pa nyid du lta ba'i phyir yongs su nyams pa zhes brjod pa ni ma yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:121b-9: ma bsgoms pa gnyis kyis yongs su nyams pa la bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:121b-10: des na dngos po gnyis pa 'di ni dpyad na phyi rol pa rnams kyis yang dag pa'i lta ba ji snyed pa yod pa dag las khyad par du 'phags so zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T05TD4016.3E:121b-11: 'jam dpal gang du ngas nyan thos dang /
T05TD4016.3E:121b-12: byang chub sems dpa' rnams las brtsams nas so sor thar pa'am /
T05TD4016.3E:121b-13: so sor thar pa dang ldan pa'i chos yongs su bstan pa gang yin pa de ni 'dul ba zhes bya'o zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa 'dul ba rnam par phye ste bshad pa zhes bya ba ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:121b-15: mtshan nyid mdor bstan pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:121b-16: zhus pa dang lan dag gis rnam par dbye'o //
T05TD4016.3E:121b-17: 'di ni dang po mtshan nyid mdor bstan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:121b-18: 'di la gang du zhes bya ba ni 'dul ba'i bstan pa la gang du zhes pa ni gnas su bstan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:121b-19: ngas zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa ste ;
T05TD4016.3E:121b-20: phung po lnga la tha snyad du btags pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:121b-21: 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa des nyan thos dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la so sor thar pa dang ldan pa'i chos yongs su bstan pa gang yin pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:122a-0: rigs bdun po dag yang dag par blangs pa'i sdom pa'i tshul khrims gang @122a * //
T05TD4016.3E:122a-1: yin pa de ni so sor thar pa zhes bya'o /
T05TD4016.3E:122a-2: de la bye brag yod pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:122a-3: theg pa gnyis kyis yang dag par blangs pa gang yin pa de ni lus dang ngag gi yan lag bdun kho na la ngo bo nyid du rnam par 'jog go //
T05TD4016.3E:122a-4: byang chub sems dpa' ni spyir lus la sogs pa'i las gsum po dag las ngo bo nyid du 'jog go //
T05TD4016.3E:122a-5: de la so sor thar pa zhes bya ba 'ang so so nas bshad pa mi mthun pas thams cad yod par smra ba'i gzhung gis ni rigs brgyad po dag gis sdom pa yang dag par len pa dang po rnam par rig byed kyi so so nas sdig pa sna tshogs spong bar byed pa'i phyir so sor thar pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:122a-6: lam gyi zhes bya'o zhes bshad do //
T05TD4016.3E:122a-7: de'i phyir mdzod kyi bstan bcos las so sor thar pa'i sdom pa'i bye brag gi ming bstan pa'i phyir /
T05TD4016.3E:122a-9: de dag thams cad kyang ni tshul khrims dang /
T05TD4016.3E:122a-12: dang po ni rnam rig min kho na so sor thar pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:122a-15: mi mnyam pa rnams mnyam par 'jog par byed pa'i tshul khrims zhes bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:122a-16: nges pa'i tshig tu ni bsil phyir zhes bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:122a-17: tshigs su bcad pa las ji skad du /
T05TD4016.3E:122a-18: tshul khrims yang dag blangs pa dpe //
T05TD4016.3E:122a-19: lus la yongs su gdung ba med //
T05TD4016.3E:122a-20: ces 'byung ba'i phyir tshul khrims zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:122a-21: mkhas pa rnams kyis bsngags pa'i phyir legs par spyad pa zhes bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:122a-22: nges pa'i tshig gi bya ba'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir lus dang ngag sdom pa'i phyir sdom pa zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:122a-23: so sor thar pa de ni gnas skabs dang po dang /
T05TD4016.3E:122a-24: tha ma las bye brag med pa'i ming du rig par bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:122a-25: skad cig ma dang po rnam par rig byed dang /
T05TD4016.3E:122a-26: rnam par rig byed ma yin pa kho na ni so sor thar pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:122a-27: las kyi lam zhes bya ba'i ming thob ste /
T05TD4016.3E:122a-28: 'di ltar dang po sdom pa yang dag par len pa na /
T05TD4016.3E:122a-29: dang po rnam par rig byed dang rnam par rig byed ma yin pas so so nas sdig pa rnam pa sna tshogs yongs su spong bar byed pa'i phyir dang po so so nas spong ba'i don las brtsams nas ni so sor thar pa'i ming du rnam par bzhag la /
T05TD4016.3E:122b-0: de nyid kyi tshe bya ba mthar phyin nas las rnams @122b bsal ba'i don las brtsams nas ni las kyi lam gyi ming du rnam par bzhag pa yin pas de'i phyir skad cig ma dang po las so sor thar pa zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:122b-1: so sor thar pa'i sdom pa zhes kyang bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:122b-2: rtsa ba las kyi lam zhes kyang bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:122b-3: skad cig ma gnyis pa nas ma btang ba'i bar gang yin pa de ni so sor thar pa zhes kyang mi bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:122b-4: so sor thar pa'i sdom pa zhes kyang mi bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:122b-5: las kyi lam zhes kyang mi bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:122b-6: phyis 'byung ba zhes bya'o zhes 'byung ste /
T05TD4016.3E:122b-7: zhib tu de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no //
T05TD4016.3E:122b-8: bstan bcos gzhung rab tu bstan pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:122b-9: yang dag pa'i rig pa dang rjes su mthun pa las kyang /
T05TD4016.3E:122b-10: phal cher mdzod kyi bstan bcos las bshad pa dang mthun par ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:122b-11: de la bye brag yod pa ni don rnam pa gsum gyi phyir so sor thar pa zhes bya'o zhes bshad do //
T05TD4016.3E:122b-12: dang po ni mdzod kyi bstan bcos las bstan pa dang mthun no //
T05TD4016.3E:122b-13: bar ma ni yang na dang por bsgom par bya ba yin pa'i phyir so sor thar pa zhes bya'o zhes bshad do //
T05TD4016.3E:122b-14: tha ma ni yang de dang por 'byung ba ni nyam nga ba'i ngan 'gro las yang dang por 'da' bar 'gyur ba'i phyir so sor thar pa zhes bya'o zhes bshad do //
T05TD4016.3E:122b-15: bshad pa'i rnam pa gzhan du na yan lag bdun gyi 'byung ba chen po rgyur byas pa tha dad pa la so sor thar pas na so sor thar pa zhes bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:122b-16: las dang ting nge 'dzin gyi yan lag bdun gyi rgyu thun mong du yod pa dang mi mtshungs pa'i phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:122b-17: 'byung ba chen po gcig gis byas pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:122b-19: 'dod pa'i khams na yod pa'i rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'i rgyu mthun pa ni zag pa dang bcas pa dang 'byung ba chen po skye bas tha dad de /
T05TD4016.3E:122b-20: de la 'byung ba chen po skye ba zhes bya ba'i tshig ni lus dang ngag gi yan lag bdun po dag re re 'byung ba chen po dag gis tha dad par byas pa ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:122b-21: ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'i bye brag kyang rnam pa gnyis yod de /
T05TD4016.3E:122b-24: zag pa med pa'i sdom pa gang yin pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:122b-25: rnam pa gnyis ka'ang ting nge 'dzin la brten nas 'phel ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:123a-1: pa'i 'byung ba chen po zhes bya ba'i tshig gis ni rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'i yan lag bdun po dag 'byung ba chen po bzhi po dag gis rgyu byas pa mtshungs pa nyid du bstan te /
T05TD4016.3E:123a-4: gnas su gyur pa'i 'byung ba chen po rnams sems bzhin du gcig pa nyid du gyur cing /
T05TD4016.3E:123a-5: bye brag tu gyur pa med pa'i phyir ro zhes bshad do //
T05TD4016.3E:123a-6: bstan bcos yang dag pa'i rigs pa dang rjes su mthun pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:123a-7: gzhung rab tu bstan pa las kyang /
T05TD4016.3E:123a-8: mdzod kyi bstan bcos las bshad pa dang mthun par 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:123a-9: gzhan yang bstan bcos yang dag par rigs pa dang rjes su mthun pa las /
T05TD4016.3E:123a-11: ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i sdom pa gang yin pa de ni sems kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i sdom pa yin la /
T05TD4016.3E:123a-12: so sor thar pa'i sdom pa ni sems kyi rjes su 'brang ba ma yin pa'i phyir /
T05TD4016.3E:123a-13: gzhan yang bstan bcos rnam par g-yeng bas byas pa'i dge ba ni lus dang ngag dang sems tha dad par spyod cing thun mong du yod pa'i rgyu mthun yin pa'i phyir yang so sor zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:123a-14: gzhan yang tshul khrims ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i rgyu dang po yin pa'i phyir /
T05TD4016.3E:123a-15: de'i phyir bstan pa gzhan bstan pa'i mdo las /
T05TD4016.3E:123a-16: tshul khrims ni rnam par grol ba dang rjes su mthun pa'i yang dag pa yin pa'i phyir so sor thar pa zhes bya'o zhes gsungs so //
T05TD4016.3E:123a-17: yang na so sor zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:123a-19: thar pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'bras bu'o //
T05TD4016.3E:123a-20: lam dang ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i sdom pa gnyis ni yang dag par grol ba thob par 'gyur ba yin la /
T05TD4016.3E:123a-21: so sor thar pa'i sdom pa ni lus dang gang dag ni dge ba rnam par g-yeng bas byas pa yin yang /
T05TD4016.3E:123a-22: mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'bras bu mthar thug pa'i phyogs yin pas so sor thar pa zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:123a-23: yang na lam dang ting nge 'dzin las byung ba'i sdom pa gnyis ni sems dang lhan cig 'grogs pa yin pas mtshungs par 'bras bu mthar thug pa la gzhol ba yin la /
T05TD4016.3E:123a-24: so sor thar pa'i sdom pa ni 'di ni sems dang so sor tha dad cing 'gog pa'i 'bras bu la gzhol ba ring bas so sor thar pa zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:123b-0: gzhan yang @123b so so thar pa'i sdom pa ni da ltar gyi kho na dgag pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:123b-2: rtsa ba dgag par rtogs pa yin la /
T05TD4016.3E:123b-3: lam dang ting nge 'dzin las byung ba'i sdom pa gnyis kyis ni dus gsum dgag par yang rtogs shing rtsa ba kho na dgag pa yin pa'i phyir so sor thar pa zhes bya'o zhes bshad do //
T05TD4016.3E:123b-4: 'dir theg pa chen po bstan pa las ni /
T05TD4016.3E:123b-5: rigs bdun po dag yang dag par blangs pa'i sdom pa dag gis so so nas nyes pa srung bas lam dang ting nge 'dzin las byung ba'i sdom pa gnyis dang 'dra bar rigs bdun po dag yang dag par blangs pa'i sdom pas nye bar bsrungs pa'i tha dad pa ma yin pa'i phyir so sor thar pa zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:123b-6: thar pa zhes bya ba ni nyes pa bdun las thar cing mya ngan las 'das pa rnam par grol ba'i 'bras bu thob pa'i phyir thar pa zhes bya'o zhes bshad do //
T05TD4016.3E:123b-7: gang du yang tha dad pa'i 'byung ba chen po so sor thar pa zhes bstan pa ni med do //
T05TD4016.3E:123b-8: de la so sor thar pa dang ldan pa'i chos yongs su bstan pa zhes bya ba ni 'di la bshad pa gnyis yod de /
T05TD4016.3E:123b-9: kha cig na re yang dag pa'i tshul khrims kyi rgyu dang /
T05TD4016.3E:123b-11: rjes su mthun pa gang yin pa de ni ldan pa'i chos zhes bya'o zhes so //
T05TD4016.3E:123b-12: kha cig na re lus la sogs pa'i las gsum po dag las ni tshul khrims kyi rang bzhin yin la /
T05TD4016.3E:123b-13: sems dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sems las byung ba'i chos rnams ni ldan pa'i chos zhes bya'o zhes pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:123b-14: chos kyi gsung rab de la ni 'dul ba zhes bstan to //
T05TD4016.3E:123b-15: bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni so sor thar pa rnam pa du ma dag gis bsdus pa lags zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis ba zhus pa dang lan dag gis rnam par dbye ba zhes bya ba ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:123b-17: zhu ba gsol ba dang lan du gsungs pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:123b-19: gtso bo'i dbang du mdzad nas zhu ba gsol ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kho nas smos so //
T05TD4016.3E:123b-20: rigs kyi bu rnam pa bdun du rig par bya ste zhes bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:124a-0: rnam par phye nas bstan pa nyid @124a * //
T05TD4016.3E:124a-2: / yang dag par blang ba'i cho ga'i dngos po bsdus pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa mtshan nyid rnam pa bdun rnam par phye ste bshad pa ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:124a-3: 'di yang mtshan nyid rnam pa bdun bstan pa nyid las rnam pa bdun du dbye ste //
T05TD4016.3E:124a-4: 'di ni dang po'i yang dag par blang ba'i cho ga'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:124a-5: 'di ni tshul khrims yang dag par blang ba'i cho ga bstan pa yin pas /
T05TD4016.3E:124a-6: de'i phyir yang dag par blang ba'i cho ga'i dngos po zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:124a-7: mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni /
T05TD4016.3E:124a-8: yang dag par blang ba'i spyod lam bstan pa zhes 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:124a-9: dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni yang dag par blang ba'i chos bstan pa zhes 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:124a-10: sdom pa yang dag par blang ba'i chos 'di rgya cher bshad pa ni /
T05TD4016.3E:124a-11: bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa'i sa'i nang nas bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:124a-12: yang na sdom pa yang dag par blang ba'i cho ga zhes bya ba ni /
T05TD4016.3E:124a-13: bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las ji skad du /
T05TD4016.3E:124a-14: ji ltar na cho ga phun sum tshogs pa yin zhe na /
T05TD4016.3E:124a-18: dge ba'i phyogs kyi sbyor ba la brten nas 'jig rten pa dang rjes su mthun zhing 'jig rten pa dang mi 'gal ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:124a-19: 'dul ba dang rjes su mthun zhing 'dul ba dang mi 'gal bas na de'i phyir cho ga phun sum tshogs pa zhes bya'o zhes 'byung ba lta bu ste /
T05TD4016.3E:124a-20: rgya cher de nyid las bshad pa bzhin no //
T05TD4016.3E:124a-21: bstan bcos rnam par bshad pa las kyang de skad du ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:124a-22: pham pa'i gnas lta bu'i dngos po bstan pa'i phyir na zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa pham pa'i gnas lta bu'i dngos po'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:124a-23: 'di ltar lci ba bzhi po dag gi nyes pa 'byung bar 'gyur na gdon mi za bar pas pham pa'i nyon mongs pa'i dbang du 'gyur zhing /
T05TD4016.3E:124a-24: byang chub sems dpa' las rgyal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:124a-25: phas pham pa de yang rnam pa bzhi yod do //
T05TD4016.3E:124a-26: bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las ji skad du /
T05TD4016.3E:124a-27: rnyed pa dang bkur sti la lhag par zhen cing /
T05TD4016.3E:124a-28: bdag la stod cing gzhan la smod pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:124b-0: ser snas zang zing dang chos sems can la mi ster @124b ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:124b-1: khro ba'i sems kyis sems can la rdeg cing tshig rtsub po smras pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:124b-2: byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod la skur pa 'debs shing log pa'i chos ston pa gang yin pa de ni phas pham pa bzhi'o zhes bshad pa lta bu ste /
T05TD4016.3E:124b-3: zhib tu de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no //
T05TD4016.3E:124b-4: yang na phas pham pa ni bcu ste /
T05TD4016.3E:124b-5: snga ma bzhi'i steng du yang srog gcod pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:124b-6: ma byin par len pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:124b-10: gzhan gyi skyon nas smra ba bsnan te /
T05TD4016.3E:124b-11: tshangs pa'i dra ba'i mdo dang /
T05TD4016.3E:124b-12: phreng ba'i mdo las ji skad bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:124b-13: lhung ba'i gnas lta bu'i dngos po bstan pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni gsum pa lhung ba'i dngos po'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:124b-14: 'di ni de las gzhan pa'i nyes pa yang ba rnams te /
T05TD4016.3E:124b-15: 'phags pa tshangs pa'i dra ba'i mdo las /
T05TD4016.3E:124b-16: dri ma dang bcas pa bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad gsungs pa dang ;
T05TD4016.3E:124b-17: bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las /
T05TD4016.3E:124b-18: nyes pa yang ba rnams bstan pa lta bu ste /
T05TD4016.3E:124b-19: zhib tu de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no //
T05TD4016.3E:124b-20: ltung ba dang bcas pa'i ngo bo nyid bstan pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni bzhi pa ltung ba dang bcas pa'i ngo bo nyid bstan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:124b-21: gzhan yang ltung ba dang bcas pa'i ngo bo nyid ces bya ba ni bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las /
T05TD4016.3E:124b-22: 'gal bas 'gyur ba'i nyes pa bstan pa rnams te /
T05TD4016.3E:124b-23: bstan bcos de nyid las ji skad du /
T05TD4016.3E:124b-24: byang chub sems dpa' gang byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa yongs su dag pa la gnas pa nyin gcig bzhin du dkon mchog gsum po dag la mchod pa'i bya ba chung ngu 'am /
T05TD4016.3E:124b-26: tha na lus kyis phyag gcig tsam btsal ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:124b-27: tha na dkon mchog gsum las brtsams te /
T05TD4016.3E:124b-28: tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam du tshig tu brjod pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:124b-29: tha na dkon mchog gsum gyi yon tan rjes su dran pa sngon du 'gro ba'i dang ba gcig tsam yang ma byas par nyin mtshan 'da' bar byed na nyes pa dang bcas shing 'gal ba dang bcas par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba nas /
T05TD4016.3E:125a-0: rgya cher bshad pa'i bar du bstan pa lta bu ltung ba med pa'i ngo bo nyid @125a * //
T05TD4016.3E:125a-1: bstan pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni lnga pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid bstan pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:125a-2: bcas pa'i kha na ma tho ba med pa nyid do //
T05TD4016.3E:125a-3: yang na bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las /
T05TD4016.3E:125a-4: thams cad du nyes pa med pa ni sems 'khrugs pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:125a-5: sdug bsngal gyi tshor bas nyen pa dang ;
T05TD4016.3E:125a-6: sdom pa ma mnos pa la ni thams cad du nyes pa med par rig par bya'o zhes bstan pa nyid do //
T05TD4016.3E:125a-7: gzhan yang rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las /
T05TD4016.3E:125a-8: nyes pa med pa rnam pa bzhi ste /
T05TD4016.3E:125a-9: gsum ni sngar bshad pa dang mthun te /
T05TD4016.3E:125a-10: yang las dang po las bstan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:125a-11: ltung ba las 'byung ba bstan pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni drug pa ltung ba las 'byin pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa ni sdig pa bshags shing nyes pa las 'byin pa'i chos yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:125a-12: de'i phyir bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las /
T05TD4016.3E:125a-13: gal te kun nas dkris pa chen pos byang chub sems dpa' la pham pa'i gnas lta bu'i chos 'byung bar 'gyur na slar yang nod par bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:125a-14: gal te kun nas dkris pa 'bring gi nyes par byung na ni de gang zag gsum mam /
T05TD4016.3E:125a-15: de yan chad la nyes byas bshags par bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:125a-16: kun nas dkris pa chung dus pham pa'i gnas lta bu'i nyes pa byung ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:125a-17: de las gzhan pa'i nyes pa rnams ni gcig gi mdun du bshags par bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:125a-18: gang gi mdun du bshags par bya ba'i gang zag chos mthun pa med na byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa thag pa nas phyin chad mi byed par sems bskyed par bya zhing /
T05TD4016.3E:125a-19: phyin chad kyang bsdam par bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:125a-20: de ltar byas na de nyes pa de las 'byung ba zhes bya'o zhes bstan pa yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:125a-21: zhib tu de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no //
T05TD4016.3E:125a-22: sdom pa gtong ba bstan pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni bdun pa sdom pa gtong ba'i mtshan nyid bstan pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:125a-23: bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa byang chub sems dpa'i sa las /
T05TD4016.3E:125a-24: byang chub sems dpa' gal te kun nas dkris pa chung ngu dang 'bring gi nyes pa pham pa lta bu'i nyes pa byung na tshul khrims kyi sdom pa yang dag par blangs pa de gtong bar mi 'gyur ro //
T05TD4016.3E:125a-25: kun nas dkris pa chen pos ni gtong bar 'gyur te /
T05TD4016.3E:125b-0: gang gi @125b phyir byang chub sems dpas pham pa'i gnas lta bu'i chos 'di dag rgyun ma chad par kun spyod pa ngo tsha shes pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:125b-1: khrel yod pa chung du tsam yang mi bskyed pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:125b-2: des ma gu bar byed cing /
T05TD4016.3E:125b-4: de nyid la phan yon du lta ba can du gyur pa 'di ni kun nas dkris pa chen po yin par rig par bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:125b-5: pham pa'i chos rnams byas pas dge slong gis so sor thar pa'i sdom pa gtong bar 'gyur ba bzhin du /
T05TD4016.3E:125b-6: byang chub sems dpas ni pham pa'i gnas lta bu'i chos gnas gcig tsam kun tu spyod pas ni byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi sdom pa yang dag par blangs pa gtong bar mi 'gyur ro //
T05TD4016.3E:125b-7: byang chub sems dpas ni yang dag par blangs pa yongs su btang du zin kyang tshe 'di la byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims yang dag pa'i sdom pa yang dag par blangs pa nod pa'i skal pa yod de /
T05TD4016.3E:125b-9: dge slong so sor thar pa'i sdom pa la gnas pa pham pa byung ba bzhin du /
T05TD4016.3E:125b-10: skal ba med pa kho nar 'gyur ba ni ma yin no //
T05TD4016.3E:125b-11: mdor bsdu na rgyu rnam pa gnyis kho nas byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi sdom pa yang dag par blangs pa gtong bar 'gyur te /
T05TD4016.3E:125b-12: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon pa yongs su btang ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:125b-13: pham pa'i gnas lta bu'i chos kyi kun nas dkris pa chen po kun tu spyod pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:125b-14: byang chub sems dpa' gang gis smon lam yang ma btang la /
T05TD4016.3E:125b-15: pham pa'i gnas lta bu'i chos rnams kyi kun nas dkris pa chen po 'ang kun tu ma spyad na /
T05TD4016.3E:125b-17: 'og dang steng dang thad ka thams cad du skyes pa na byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi sdom pa yang dag par blangs pa yongs su gtong bar mi 'gyur ro //
T05TD4016.3E:125b-18: byang chub sems dpa' tshe brjes te brjed na'ang dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsten pa la brten nas dran pa gso ba'i phyir yang dang yang gso bar byed par zad kyi /
T05TD4016.3E:125b-19: gsar du yang dag par len pa ni ma yin no zhes 'byung ba lta bu'o //
T05TD4016.3E:125b-20: gzhan yang bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las /
T05TD4016.3E:125b-21: rkyen rnam pa bzhis sdom pa gtong bar 'gyur ro zhes bshad de /
T05TD4016.3E:126a-2: gzhan yang sdom pa de ma btang ba ni tshe rabs gzhan du yang rjes su 'jug par rig par bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:126a-3: gal te btang na ni ma yin no //
T05TD4016.3E:126a-4: de gtong ba ni mdor bsdu na rgyu bzhis 'gyur te /
T05TD4016.3E:126a-5: yang dag par len pa'i sems kyis mi 'dra ba'i sems skyed par byed pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:126a-6: mi brda phrad pa'i drung du dbul ba dang ldan pa'i tshig rjod par byed pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:126a-7: phas pham pa'i gnas lta bu'i chos bzhi po dag la thams cad dam /
T05TD4016.3E:126a-8: re re'i nyes pa 'byin pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:126a-9: pham pa'i gnas lta bu'i chos bzhi po dag thams cad dam /
T05TD4016.3E:126a-10: de re re la kun nas dkris pa chen pos nyes pa 'byin par byed na /
T05TD4016.3E:126a-11: byang chub sems dpas sdom pa btang bar rig par bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:126a-12: gal te phyis blang ba'i sems yongs su dag par thob par 'gyur na yang phyis blang bar bya'o zhes 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:126a-13: nyan thos kyi tshul khrims btang ba'i rkyen mang nyung ni bstan pa rnams las so so nas bshad pa mi mthun pas thams cad yod par smra ba'i gzhung gis ni rgyu rnam pa lngas gtong bar 'gyur ro zhes bshad de /
T05TD4016.3E:126a-14: de'i phyir mdzod kyi bstan bcos kyi nang nas so sor thar pa'i sdom pa ji ltar gtong bar 'gyur zhe na /
T05TD4016.3E:126a-16: so sor thar pa'i 'dul ba gtong //
T05TD4016.3E:126a-17: bslab pa phul dang shi 'phos dang //
T05TD4016.3E:126a-18: mtshan gnyis dag ni byung ba dang //
T05TD4016.3E:126a-19: rtsa ba chad dang mtshan 'das las //
T05TD4016.3E:126a-22: de la 'dul ba zhes bya ba ni so sor thar pa'i sdom pa yin par dgongs te /
T05TD4016.3E:126a-23: des dbang po rnams 'dul bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:126a-24: bsnyen gnas pa'i sdom pa ma gtogs pa gzhan so sor thar pa'i sdom pa rnam pa bdun po dag ni rgyu rnam pa bzhis gtong bar 'gyur te /
T05TD4016.3E:126a-25: brda phrad pa'i drung du bslab pa'i gzhi bsam pa thag pa nas slar phul ba'i phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:126a-26: rigs mthun pa btang ba'i phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:126a-27: mtshan nyid cig car byung ba'i phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:126a-28: rgyu des dge ba'i rtsa ba bcad pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:126a-29: bsnyen gnas pa'i sdom pa ni snga ma'i rgyu bzhi dang /
T05TD4016.3E:126a-30: mtshan mo zad pa las te /
T05TD4016.3E:126a-31: de'i phyir de dag ni bsdu na gtong ba'i rgyu lngar 'gyur ro //
T05TD4016.3E:126a-32: ci'i phyir rgyu de dag gis gtong bar 'gyur zhe na /
T05TD4016.3E:126b-0: yang dag par blangs pa dang 'gal ba'i @126b rnam par rig byed skyed pa'i phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:126b-1: lus bor bar bya ba'i phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:126b-4: tshad kyi dus las 'das pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ste /
T05TD4016.3E:126b-5: bstan bcos yang dag par rigs pa dang rjes su mthun pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:126b-6: gzhung rab tu bstan pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:126b-7: bye brag tu bshad pa chen po las bslab pa dbul ba'i rgyu rnam pa lnga 'byung ba la yang mdzod kyi bstan pa dang mthun no //
T05TD4016.3E:126b-8: bstan bcos sems sna tshogs bstan pa las /
T05TD4016.3E:126b-9: sdom pa'i tshul khrims la gnas pas dang po'i ltung ba rnams byung na de ni nyes pa yin gyi btang ba ma yin pas gang zag de ni tshul khrims la gnas pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:126b-10: tshul khrims zhig pa yin par rig par bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:126b-11: gal te 'gyod par gyur na tshul khrims zhig pa spangs nas tshul khrims dang ldan pa la gnas par 'gyur te /
T05TD4016.3E:126b-12: dper na mi phyug po bu lon chags pa yod na phyug po zhes kyang bya bu lon chags pa zhes kyang bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:126b-14: phyug po kho na zhes brjod pa bzhin no zhes 'byung ste /
T05TD4016.3E:126b-16: bye brag tu bshad pa chen po las kyang de skad du ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:126b-17: chos gsang ba'i sde pa dag las ni /
T05TD4016.3E:126b-18: rgyu rnam pa drug gis gtong bar 'gyur ro zhes bshad de /
T05TD4016.3E:126b-19: lnga ni mdzod kyi bstan bcos las 'byung ba dang mthun no //
T05TD4016.3E:126b-21: de'i phyir mdzod kyi bstan bcos las sde pa gzhan kha cig na re yang dag pa'i chos nub pas kyang so sor thar pa'i sdom pa gtong bar 'gyur te /
T05TD4016.3E:126b-22: 'di ltar chos nub pa'i tshe bslab pa'i gnas dang /
T05TD4016.3E:126b-23: mtshams gcod pa'i las la sogs pa thams cad kyang nub par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:126b-24: mdo sde pa dag gi gzhung gis /
T05TD4016.3E:126b-25: rgyu rnam pa lngas sdom pa gtong bar 'gyur bar bshad pa'ang mdzod kyi bstan pa dag dang mthun te /
T05TD4016.3E:126b-26: mtshan mo zad pa zhes par mi 'byung bar yang de nyes pa lci bar 'byung bas bstan te /
T05TD4016.3E:126b-27: de'i phyir bstan bcos de kho na nyid grub pa las /
T05TD4016.3E:126b-28: sde pa gzhan kha cig na re nyes pa lci ba bzhi po ltung bar 'gyur ba'i nyes pa dag las gang yang rung ba'i nyes pa gcig byung na /
T05TD4016.3E:126b-30: dge slong gi sdom pa gtong bar 'gyur ro zhe na /
T05TD4016.3E:127a-1: theg pa chen po bstan pa dang sbyar na /
T05TD4016.3E:127a-2: nyan thos kyi sdom pa ni rgyu rnam pa lngas spong bar 'gyur ro zhes mdo sde pa ngag gis bstan pa dang mthun par bshad de /
T05TD4016.3E:127a-3: de'i bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las /
T05TD4016.3E:127a-5: dge slong gi sdom pa blangs pa gtong bar 'gyur zhe na /
T05TD4016.3E:127a-6: mdor bsdu na rgyu rnam pa lnga ste /
T05TD4016.3E:127a-7: bslab pa'i gzhi rnams phul ba'i phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:127a-8: ltung ba'i rtsa ba lhag par spyod pa'i phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:127a-9: mtshan nub cing mtshan gnyis skye ba'i phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:127a-10: dge ba'i rtsa ba chad pa'i phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:127a-11: rigs mthun pa spangs ba'i phyir dge slong gi sdom ba blangs pa gtong bar 'gyur ro //
T05TD4016.3E:127a-12: dam pa'i chos rab tu rnam par zhig cing dam pa'i chos nub na ni dge slong gi sdom pa ma blangs pa ni blang du med la /
T05TD4016.3E:127a-13: sdar blangs pa ni yongs su mi gtong bar rig par bya'o zhes 'byung ste /
T05TD4016.3E:127a-14: rgya cher ni de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no ;
T05TD4016.3E:127a-15: /'jam dpal gang ngas mtshan nyid rnam pa bcu gcig gi chos rnams bshad pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:127a-17: bstan pa gang yin pa de ni ma mo zhes bya'o zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gsum pa ma mo'i mtshan nyid rnam par phye ste bshad pa ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:127a-23: de la mtshan nyid rnam pa bcu gcig gang zhe na zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa zhus pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:127a-24: lan dag gis rnam par phye ste bshad pa ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:127a-26: lan du gsungs pa ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:127a-27: 'di ni zhu ba gsol ba nyid do //
T05TD4016.3E:127a-28: kun rdzob kyi mtshan nyid dang /
T05TD4016.3E:127a-29: don dam pa'i mtshan nyid dang /
T05TD4016.3E:127a-30: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid dang /
T05TD4016.3E:127a-32: ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang /
T05TD4016.3E:127a-34: de myong ba rnam par bstan pa'i mtshan nyid dang /
T05TD4016.3E:127a-35: de'i bar du chod pa'i chos kyi mtshan nyid dang /
T05TD4016.3E:127a-36: de dang rjes su mthun pa'i chos kyi mtshan nyid dang /
T05TD4016.3E:127a-37: de'i nyes dmigs kyi mtshan nyid dang /
T05TD4016.3E:127b-0: de'i phan yon gyi mtshan nyid do zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa bcom ldan 'das kyis @127b yang dag par lan du gsungs pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:127b-1: 'di yang rnam pa gnyis po grangs bzhin du ming bkod pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:127b-2: go rims bzhin du rnam par phye ste bshad pas bstan te /
T05TD4016.3E:127b-3: 'di ni dang po grangs bzhin du ming bkod pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:127b-4: mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang /
T05TD4016.3E:127b-5: dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni ming cung zad 'di dang mi mthun no //
T05TD4016.3E:127b-6: bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las /
T05TD4016.3E:127b-7: rnam par bshad pa las ni mdo 'di las gsungs pa dang mthun par 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:127b-8: de la kun rdzob kyi mtshan nyid ni rnam pa gsum du rig par bya ste zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa go rims bzhin du mtshan nyid rnam pa bcu gcig rnam par phye ste bshad pa ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:127b-9: 'di yang mtshan nyid rnam pa bcu gcig bstan pa nyid kyis rnam pa bcu gcig tu dbye ste /
T05TD4016.3E:127b-10: 'di ni dang po kun rdzob kyi mtshan nyid bstan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:127b-11: 'di yang rnam pa gnyis po grangs smos pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:127b-12: go rims bzhin du rnam par phye ste bshad pa bstan te /
T05TD4016.3E:127b-14: gang zag bstan pa'i phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:127b-15: kun brtags pa'i ngo bo nyid bstan pa'i phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:127b-16: chos rnams kyi byed pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:127b-18: las byed pa bstan pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa go rims bzhin du rnam par phye ste bshad pa ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:127b-19: 'di ni mtshan nyid rnam pa gsum las brtsams nas kun rdzob bstan pa yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:127b-20: de'i phyir bstan bcos rnam par bshad pa las /
T05TD4016.3E:127b-21: dang po bdag dang chos byed bstan //
T05TD4016.3E:127b-22: gzhan gyi rjes mthun phyir ni bshad //
T05TD4016.3E:127b-25: dang po kun rdzob kyi bden pa ni bdag bstan pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:127b-28: de la bdag bstan pa ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:127b-30: srog dang skye ba po dang /
T05TD4016.3E:127b-36: chos kyi srung ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa bstan pa gang yin pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:127b-37: chos bstan pa ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:127b-38: gzugs dang tshor ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa bstan pa gang yin pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:127b-39: gal te kun rdzob kyi bden pa don dam par yod pa ma yin na /
T05TD4016.3E:127b-40: don gang gi phyir bstan zhe na /
T05TD4016.3E:127b-42: gzhan gyi rjes mthun pa'i phyir ni bshad ces bya ba smos te /
T05TD4016.3E:128a-0: 'di ltar don dam pa'i bden pa dang rjes @128a * //
T05TD4016.3E:128a-1: su mthun par bya ba'i phyir kun rdzob kyi bden pa bstan pa yin no zhes bshad do //
T05TD4016.3E:128a-2: gzhan yang bstan bcos ngo bo nyid med pa gsum bstan pa las /
T05TD4016.3E:128a-3: kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i mtshan nyid gang zhe na /
T05TD4016.3E:128a-5: mtshan nyid rnam pa gsum yod de /
T05TD4016.3E:128a-10: de la bdag bstan pa ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:128a-17: bud med ces bya ba la sogs pa gang yin pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:128a-18: chos bstan pa ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:128a-23: rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang yin pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:128a-24: dngos po bstan pa ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:128a-28: 'gag pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa gang yin pa 'di ni kun rdzob kyi bden pa zhes 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:128a-29: de la don dam pa'i mtshan nyid ni de bzhin nyid rnam pa bdun bstan pa yin par rig par bya'o zhes bya ba 'di ni gnyis pa don dam pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:128a-30: bstan bcos rnam par bshad pa'i tshig le'ur byas pa las ji skad du /
T05TD4016.3E:128a-31: don dam pa'i bden pa'i mtshan nyid ni de bzhin nyid ni bdun dag go zhes 'byung ste /
T05TD4016.3E:128a-33: don dam pa'i bden pa ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:128a-34: de bzhin nyid rnam pa bdun po dag go zhes 'byung ste /
T05TD4016.3E:128a-35: gang du sngar bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:128a-36: rgyu dang rkyen gang gi phyir de bzhin nyid rnam pa bdun la /
T05TD4016.3E:128a-37: don dam pa'i bden pa zhes bya zhe na /
T05TD4016.3E:128a-39: ye shes mchog gnyis kyi spyod yul du gyur pa'i phyir te /
T05TD4016.3E:128a-41: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes dang /
T05TD4016.3E:128a-42: rjes las thob pa'i 'jig rten pa'i ye shes te /
T05TD4016.3E:128a-43: don dam pa 'di la spros pa med pa'i phyir ro zhes pa gzhan gyi spyod yul ma yin no //
T05TD4016.3E:128a-44: gzhan yang bstan bcos ngo bo nyid med pa gsum bstan pa las kyang /
T05TD4016.3E:128a-45: de bzhin nyid rnam pa bdun la don dam pa'i bden pa zhes bshad de /
T05TD4016.3E:128a-46: zhib tu de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no //
T05TD4016.3E:128b-0: byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos kyi mtshan nyid ni shes bya'i dngos po rnam pa thams cad bstan pa yin par rig par bya'o zhes bya ba ni gsum pa byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos kyi dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid bstan @128b pa'o ;
T05TD4016.3E:128b-2: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la sogs pa byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyis dmigs par bya ba'i yul gang yin pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:128b-3: sngar bstan pa ji lta ba bzhin du yod pa nyid la sogs pa nyid do /
T05TD4016.3E:128b-6: rnam pa'i mtshan nyid ni brtag pa rnam pa brgyad bstan pa yin par rig par bya'o zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bzhi pa rnam pa brgyad kyi mtshan nyid bstan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:128b-10: go rims bzhin du rnam par phye ste bstan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:128b-12: de la rnam pa zhes bya ba ni shes pa'i rnam pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:128b-13: mtshan nyid ni ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid de /
T05TD4016.3E:128b-14: lam gyi phyogs yang dag par bshad pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:128b-15: dmigs pa'i rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir rnam pa'i mtshan nyid ces bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:128b-16: gal te de ltar ci'i phyir de bzhin nyid la sogs pa la rnam pa'i mtshan nyid ces bstan zhe na /
T05TD4016.3E:128b-18: 'di ltar yul rnam pa brgyad smos nas rnal 'byor gyi brtag pa bstan pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:128b-19: bstan pa rnam pa brgyad gang zhe na /
T05TD4016.3E:128b-20: bden pa kho na'i phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:128b-28: rgyas pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa grangs bzhin du ming bkod pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:128b-29: 'og nas re re nas ston pas de'i phyir 'dir ma bstan to //
T05TD4016.3E:128b-30: bstan bcos rnam par bshad pa las ni /
T05TD4016.3E:128b-40: re re'i mgor ni so sor brtags pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:128b-41: mjug tu ni spyod pa zhes 'byung yang /
T05TD4016.3E:128b-42: don ni mdo 'di las gsungs pa dang mthun no //
T05TD4016.3E:128b-43: de la bden pa ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:128b-44: chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid gang yang pa'o zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gsum pa go rims bzhin du rnam par phye ste bshad pa ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:128b-45: 'di yang rnam par brtag pa rnam pa brgyad kyi mtshan nyid bstan pa las rnam pa brgyad du dbye ste /
T05TD4016.3E:128b-46: 'di ni dang po'i bden pa kho na'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:129a-0: 'di ltar rtsa ba'i ye shes kyis de @129a * //
T05TD4016.3E:129a-1: bzhin nyid mngon sum du gyur cing /
T05TD4016.3E:129a-2: rang bzhin mi 'dor ba gang yin pa de ni bden pa zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:129a-3: brdzun pa ma yin pa'i phyir ni kho na zhes bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:129a-4: de'i phyir bden pa kho na zhes gsungs so //
T05TD4016.3E:129a-6: gang zag gi rnam par gzhag pa'am /
T05TD4016.3E:129a-7: chos rnams kyi kun brtags pa'i mtshan nyid rnam par gzhag pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa gnas pa'i mtshan nyid ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:129a-8: 'di yang rnam pa gsum du dbye ste /
T05TD4016.3E:129a-9: bdag dang chos su 'dzin pa gnyis rnam par gzhag pa bstan pa'ang /
T05TD4016.3E:129a-10: lung bstan pa rnam pa bzhi rnam par gzhag pa'am /
T05TD4016.3E:129a-11: chos dang rnam par dbye ba ste /
T05TD4016.3E:129a-12: rnam par gzhag pa bstan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:129a-14: chos su 'dzin pa rnam par gzhag pa bstan pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:129a-15: 'di ltar kun brtags pas bdag dang chos yang dag pa nyid du 'dzin pa dag ni yang dag pa ma yin pa'i sems kyis yod cing /
T05TD4016.3E:129a-16: don dam par med pa yin yang /
T05TD4016.3E:129a-17: yang dag pa ma yin pa'i sems kyi rjes su yod par 'dzin pa'i phyir rnam par gzhag pa zhes bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:129a-18: de'i phyir bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du 'grub pa las /
T05TD4016.3E:129a-19: kun tu brtags pa'i bdag yang dag pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:129a-20: chos yang dag pa ni yod pa ma yin yang /
T05TD4016.3E:129a-21: yang dag pa ma yin pa'i sems kyi rjes su rnam par gzhag pa'i phyir ro zhes bstan pa yin no //
T05TD4016.3E:129a-24: dris nas lan gdab pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:129a-25: gzhag pas lung bstan pa rnam par gzhag pa zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa lung bstan pa rnam pa bzhi rnam par gzhag pa bstan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:129a-26: rgol ba'i lan gdab pa'i chos las brtsams nas lung bstan pa bzhi'i smra ba rnam par gzhag pas de'i phyir rnam par gzhag pa zhes bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:129a-27: 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi sa'i 'grel pa las /
T05TD4016.3E:129a-29: lung bstan pa'i smra ba rnam pa bzhi ni mgo gcig tu lung bstan pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:129a-30: rnam par phye nas lung bstan pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:129a-31: dris nas lung bstan pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:129a-32: cang mi smra bar gzhag pas lung bstan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:129a-33: de la mgo gcig tu lung bstan pa ni kha cig 'di skad du /
T05TD4016.3E:129a-34: skye bas thams cad gdon mi za bar 'gag par 'gyur ba yin nam /
T05TD4016.3E:129b-0: sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun dkon mchog bsod nams kyi zhing @129b gshin pa yin nam zhes dris pa la sogs pa la /
T05TD4016.3E:129b-1: lan du don 'di nyid ni de ltar nges pa yin no zhes lung bstan pa lta bu'o //
T05TD4016.3E:129b-2: rnam par phye nas lung bstan pa ni ji ltar kha cig 'di skad du /
T05TD4016.3E:129b-3: ci 'gags pa thams cad skye bar 'gyur ram /
T05TD4016.3E:129b-4: sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun dkon mchog gcig kho nar zad dam zhes dris pa la sogs pa la don 'di ni de ltar ma nges so zhes rnam par phye nas lung bstan pa lta bu'o //
T05TD4016.3E:129b-5: dris nas lung bstan pa ni ji ltar kha cig 'di skad du /
T05TD4016.3E:129b-6: byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu mchog yin nam /
T05TD4016.3E:129b-8: sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun dkon mchog khyad par du 'phags pa yin nam /
T05TD4016.3E:129b-9: 'on te khyad par du 'phags pa ma yin zhes dris pa la sogs pa la khyod gang la ltos te 'dri zhes dris nas lung bstan pa lta bu'o //
T05TD4016.3E:129b-10: cang mi smra bar bzhag pas lung bstan pa ni ji skad du /
T05TD4016.3E:129b-11: kha cig 'di skad du bdag ces bya ba'i dngos po nyid yang dag par yod pa yin na /
T05TD4016.3E:129b-12: ci dge ba zhig gam 'on te mi dge ba zhig ces 'dri ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:129b-13: mo gsham gyi bu mo mdog dkar ba zhig gam 'on te gnag pa zhig ces 'dri ba la sogs pa la cang mi smra bar bzhag pas lung bstan pa lta bu ste /
T05TD4016.3E:129b-14: lung bstan par bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:129b-15: spros pa bskyed pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ba lta bu ste /
T05TD4016.3E:129b-16: rgya cher rnam par dbye ba ni bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:129b-17: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:129b-19: mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mdo dang /
T05TD4016.3E:129b-21: yang dag pa'i rigs pa dang rjes su mthun pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:129b-22: bye brag tu bshad pa chen po las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:129b-23: gsang ba dang rnam par dbye bas lung bstan pa'i bye brag rnam par bzhag pas gang yin pa'o zhes bya bas ni gsum pa gsang ba dang rnam par dbye ba rnam par gzhag pa bstan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:129b-24: 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni dbang gi rjes su phan gdags pa'i phyir ched 'ga' ni gsang ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:129b-25: ched 'ga' ni rnam par dbye ba'i rnam par bzhag pas chos ston pas so //
T05TD4016.3E:129b-26: bstan bcos rnam par bshad pa las gsang ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:129b-27: rnam par dbye ba smra ba zhes 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:130a-1: gnyis kyang so so nas bshad pa mi mthun pas kha cig na re tshig 'di nye la /
T05TD4016.3E:130a-2: don ring ba gang yin pa de ni gsang ba zhes bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:130a-3: 'phags pa dam pa'i chos padma dkar po'i mdo las ji skad du /
T05TD4016.3E:130a-4: sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal ba gcig gang brjod pa de dag thams cad sangs rgyas su 'grub par 'gyur zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o //
T05TD4016.3E:130a-5: tshig dang don gnyis ka ring ba ni rnam par dbye ba zhes bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:130a-6: 'phags pa legs ba'i tshul khrims bstan pa'i mdo la sogs pa las /
T05TD4016.3E:130a-7: bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis gdod sangs rgyas 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o zhe'o //
T05TD4016.3E:130a-8: kha cig na re 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mdo las /
T05TD4016.3E:130a-9: chos thams cad stong zhing dben pa nyid du gsungs pa gang yin pa de ni gsang ba zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:130a-10: 'phags pa dgongs pa zab mo nges par 'grel pa'i mdo las /
T05TD4016.3E:130a-11: ngo bo nyid rnam pa gsum tshang bar gsungs shing /
T05TD4016.3E:130a-12: stong pa nyid dang ldan pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:130a-13: mi stong ba dang ldan pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par dbye ba zhes bya'o zhe'o //
T05TD4016.3E:130a-14: kha cig na re theg pa chung ngu'i bstan pa rnams ni gsang ba zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:130a-15: theg pa chen po'i bstan pa rnams ni rnam par dbye ba zhes bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:130a-16: de'i phyir bstan bcos rnam par bshad pa las /
T05TD4016.3E:130a-17: gsang ba'i bstan pa ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:130a-18: phal cher nyan thos kyi sde snod kyi bstan pa rnams so //
T05TD4016.3E:130a-19: rnam par dbye ba'i bstan pa ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:130a-20: phal cher theg pa chen po'i sde snod kyi bstan pa rnams so zhes bstan pa yin no //
T05TD4016.3E:130a-21: kha cig na re dgongs pa tha dad pa'i gsang ba zhes bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:130a-22: de'i phyir bstan bcos chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las /
T05TD4016.3E:130a-23: ldem por dgongs pa ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:130a-26: ye ge'i tshogs rnams kyis tshigs bcad du brjod pa don gzhan du yongs su bsgyur ba ste /
T05TD4016.3E:130a-28: pha dang ma ni bsad byas shing //
T05TD4016.3E:130a-29: rgyal po gtsang sbra can gnyis dang //
T05TD4016.3E:130a-30: yul 'khor dang bcas rab bcom nas //
T05TD4016.3E:130a-31: mi de dag par 'gyur zhes bya //
T05TD4016.3E:130a-32: zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten na shin tu kha na ma tho bar grags pa ni pha dang /
T05TD4016.3E:130a-34: mang du thos pa'i 'bram ze rnam gnyis dang /
T05TD4016.3E:130b-0: phyugs bsad pa'i las ngan pa gang @130b yin pa de ni yongs su ma dag pa zhes bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:130b-1: 'dir dag par 'gyur zhes gsungs pa gang yin pa de ni dgongs pa don gzhan ston te /
T05TD4016.3E:130b-5: nye bar len pa dang bcas pa'i rnam par shes pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:130b-8: brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa rnam gnyis dang /
T05TD4016.3E:130b-9: dmigs pa la sogs pa'i skye mched drug spyod yul dang bcas pa'i dbang du byas nas go rims bzhin du pha ma la sogs par blta bar bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:130b-10: de dag dang chos 'dra ba'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ste /
T05TD4016.3E:130b-11: rgya cher de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no //
T05TD4016.3E:130b-12: tshig dang don mthun pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par dbye ba zhes bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:130b-13: 'di ltar pha la sogs pa gsad pa gang yin pa de ni shin tu kha na ma tho ba'i las yin pas yongs su ma dag pa zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:130b-14: pha ma la sogs pa la bsnyen bkur byed pa gang yin pa de ni yongs su dag pa zhes bya'o zhes bstan pa lta bu'o //
T05TD4016.3E:130b-16: ngas kun nas nyon mongs pa'i chos rnams la nyes dmigs kyi rnam grangs dpag tu med pa'i bye brag yod par bstan pa gang yin pa dag go zhes bya ba ni gsum pa nyes dmigs kyi mtshan nyid bstan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:130b-20: kun du sbyor ba'i rgyu dang ;
T05TD4016.3E:130b-21: kun nas dkris pa bcu la sogs pa'i rnam grangs sna tshogs kyis nyon mongs pa'i nyes dmigs bstan pa gang yin pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:130b-23: ngas rnam par byang ba'i chos rnams la phan yon gyi rnam grangs dpag tu med pa'i bye brag yod pas bstan pa gang yin pa dag go zhes bya ba ni bzhi pa'i yon tan gyi mtshan nyid bstan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:130b-29: mi 'jigs pa la sogs pa rnams pa sna tshogs kyi yon tan gyi khyad par bstan pa gang yin pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:130b-30: tshul ni rnam pa drug tu rig par bya'o zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni lnga pa tshul khrims kyi sgo zhes bya bston to //
T05TD4016.3E:130b-33: grangs bzhin du ming bkod pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:130b-34: de kho na'i don gyi tshul dang /
T05TD4016.3E:130b-37: mtha' gnyis rnam par spangs pa'i tshul dang /
T05TD4016.3E:131a-1: gyis mi khyab pa'i tshul dang /
T05TD4016.3E:131a-2: dgongs pa'i tshul lo zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa grangs bzhin du ming bkod pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:131a-3: mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni /
T05TD4016.3E:131a-4: de kho na'i don rtogs pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:131a-5: thob pa'i rtogs pa bshad pa'i gos pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:131a-6: mtha' gnyis par bral ba'i rtogs pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:131a-7: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rtogs pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:131a-8: dgongs pa'i rtogs pa zhes 'byung ngo /
T05TD4016.3E:131a-9: dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni /
T05TD4016.3E:131a-11: phal cher mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mod las gsungs pa dang mthun no //
T05TD4016.3E:131a-13: bstan bcos rnam par bshad pa las /
T05TD4016.3E:131a-14: bsdus pa dang rgyas pa'i sgo rnam pa gnyis rnam par dbye ste /
T05TD4016.3E:131a-15: de la bsdus pa zhes bya ba ni bstan bcos 'di nyid las tshul las brtsams pa ni mdor bsdu na rnam pa drug po 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:131a-16: de kho na'i don gyi tshul dang /
T05TD4016.3E:131a-17: dngos po'i tshul lo zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
T05TD4016.3E:131a-18: de la tshul snga ma gsum ni tshul phyi ma gsum gyis bshad de /
T05TD4016.3E:131a-19: 'di ltar mtha' gnyis rnam par spangs pa'i tshul gyis ni de kho na'i don gyi tshul bshad pa yin pas so //
T05TD4016.3E:131a-21: skur pa 'debs pa'i mtha' gnyis dang /
T05TD4016.3E:131a-22: rtag pa dang chad pa'i mtha' gnyis dang /
T05TD4016.3E:131a-23: bde ba dang sdug bsngal gnyis spangs nas /
T05TD4016.3E:131a-24: dbu ma'i lam dang mthun par 'gyur ba ni de kho na'i don zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:131a-25: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i tshul gyis ni thob pa'i tshul bshad pa yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:131a-27: sems can nas sangs rgyas rnams dang /
T05TD4016.3E:131a-28: spyod yul gyi bar du bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro ;
T05TD4016.3E:131a-29: / rgyu bsgrubs nas 'bras bu thob pa ni thob pa bstan to //
T05TD4016.3E:131a-30: dgongs pa'i tshul gyis ni bshad pa'i tshul bshad pa yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:131a-32: dus la sogs pa'i dgongs pa la brten nas bstan pa 'byung ba'i dgongs pa ston pas so //
T05TD4016.3E:131a-33: don gzhan la sogs pa'i dgongs pa de dag ni bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel ba slob dpon dbyeg gnyin [*dnyig gnyen] dang /
T05TD4016.3E:131a-34: ngo bo nyid med kyis mdzad pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:131a-35: lang gi tshe bsgyur ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:131a-37: chos mngon pa kun las btus pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:131a-38: chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:131b-0: rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa @131b la sogs pa las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:131b-1: de kho na'i don gang yin pa de ni de nyid kyi tshul yin pa'i phyir de kho na'i don gyi tshul zhes bya la /
T05TD4016.3E:131b-2: de bzhin du dgongs ba nyid don gyi tshul yin pa'i phyir dgongs pa'i tshul zhes bya'o zhes bya ba'o bar du ste /
T05TD4016.3E:131b-3: de dang de dag tu phyin ci log med pa'i ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de ni tshul gyi don yin pas so zhes 'byung ste /
T05TD4016.3E:131b-4: de dang de dag tu phyin ci log med pa'i phyir /
T05TD4016.3E:131b-5: ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de ni tshul gyi don yin pas zhes bya ba ni 'di ltar so so nas bdag nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyi gnas gang du phyin ci log med pa'i ngo bo nyid gang yin pa ni tshul gyi don yin pas so ;
T05TD4016.3E:131b-6: / de la rgyas par bstan pa ni bstan bcos de las de kho na'i tshul ni mdor bsdu na rnam pa drug ste /
T05TD4016.3E:131b-7: 'jig rten pa'i don kho nas rnam par gzhag pa ma yin pa'i de kho na'i bar du'o //
T05TD4016.3E:131b-8: de la 'jig rten pa'i de kho na ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:131b-9: brda dang kun rdzob las 'dris pa'i rjes su 'gro bas zhugs pa'i blos dngos po gang la 'jig rten pa'i lta ba thams cad kyi lta ba mtshungs par 'gyur ba 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:131b-10: sa la 'di ni sa kho na yin gyi /
T05TD4016.3E:131b-11: me la sogs pa ma yin no zhes bya ba lta bu ste /
T05TD4016.3E:131b-15: gzhan ni ma yin no zhes dngos po gang 'jig rten ba'i sems can thams cad kyis nge spar mos pa'i spyod yul gcig nas gcig tu 'ongs pa'i ming gis rang gi rnam par rtog pa las grags pa /
T05TD4016.3E:131b-16: ma bsams ma dpyad ma brtags par gzung ba gang yin pa de ni 'ji rten pa'i de kho na zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:131b-17: rigs pa'i de kho na 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:131b-18: mkhas pa rnams kyis mngon sum dang /
T05TD4016.3E:131b-20: lung gi tshad ma gsum po dag la brten nas shin tu rnam par phye ba nges pa'i shes pa'i spyod yul shes bya'i dngos po dag 'thad pa sgrub pa'i rigs pas rab tu bsgrubs shing /
T05TD4016.3E:131b-21: rnam par gzhag pa gang yin ba de ni rigs pa'i de kho na zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:131b-22: nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa rnam par dag pa'i spyi yul gyi de kho na ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:131b-23: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zag pa med pa'i thabs kyi shes pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:131b-24: zab pa med pa'i yang dag pa'i shes pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:132a-0: zag pa med pa'i rjes las thob pa'i 'jig @132a * //
T05TD4016.3E:132a-1: rten pa'i shes pas spyod yul du bya ba'i yul de ni nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa rnam par dag pa'i shes pa'i spyod yul gyi de kho na zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:132a-2: shes bya'i sgrib pa rnam par dag pa'i shes pas spyod yul gyi de kho na ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:132a-3: shes bya shes pa'i gegs byed pa'i phyir shes bya'i sgrib pa zhes bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:132a-4: shes bya'i sgrib pa de las rnam par grol ba'i shes pa'i spyod yul gang yin pa de ni shes bya'i sgrib pa rnam par dag pa'i shes pa'i yul gyi de kho na zhes 'byung ste /
T05TD4016.3E:132a-5: rgya cher de nyid las bstan pa bzhin te /
T05TD4016.3E:132a-6: bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las kyang de skad du 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:132a-8: rnam par gzhag pa'i de kho na ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:132a-9: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po dag go //
T05TD4016.3E:132a-10: sdug bsngal ni sdug bsngal bar bden pa'i phyir sdug bsngal nyid du rnam par gzhan pa nas lam yang lam du bden pa'i phyir lam nyid du rnam par gzhag pa'i bar du'o //
T05TD4016.3E:132a-11: rgyu dang rkyen gang gi phyir rnam par gzhag pa zhes bya zhe na /
T05TD4016.3E:132a-13: kun rdzob rnam pa gsum gyis rnam par gzhag pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:132a-14: dang po 'jig rten pa'i kun rdzob ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:132a-15: zhing dang khar khyim dang bum pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:132a-17: nags tshal dang grangs la sogs pa nas bdag dang sems can zhes bya ba'i bar la sogs pa'i bar du rnam par gzhag pa gang yin pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:132a-18: gnyis pa rigs pa'i kun rdzob ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:132a-19: phung po dang khams dang skye mched la sogs pa rnam par gzhag pa gang yin pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:132a-20: gsum pa thob pa'i kun rdzob ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:132a-21: rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la sogs pa dang ;
T05TD4016.3E:132a-22: de dag gnas pa'i chos rnam par gzhag pa gang yin pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:132a-23: gzhan yang rnam par gzhag pa rnam pa bzhi yod de /
T05TD4016.3E:132a-26: don dam pa rnam par gzhag pa gang yin pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:132a-27: don dam pa'i bden pa nyid rnam par gzhag par bya ba ma yin yang /
T05TD4016.3E:132a-28: nang gi so so rang gis rig par bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:132a-30: rjes su mthun par bya ba'i phyir kun rdzob kyi dbang du byas nas rnam par gzhag pa yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:132a-31: de la rnam par gzhag pa ma yin pa'i de kho na ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:132a-32: chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid dang /
T05TD4016.3E:132b-0: yang dag pa'i ngo bo nyid gang yin pa'o zhes @132b 'byung ste ;
T05TD4016.3E:132b-1: bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las kyang /
T05TD4016.3E:132b-2: rnam par gzhag pa ma yin pa'i de kho na ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:132b-3: chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang /
T05TD4016.3E:132b-4: yongs su grub pa'i ngo bo nyid 'phags pa'i ye shes kyis bgrod par bya ba'i 'phags pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul 'phags pa'i ye shes kyi dmigs pa gang yin pa'o zhes 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:132b-5: de la thob pa'i tshul zhes 'byung ba ni mdor bsdu na rnam pa bzhi ste /
T05TD4016.3E:132b-6: sems can thams cad kyi las kyi rnam par smin pas thob pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:132b-7: nyan thos kyi theg pas thob pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:132b-8: rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pas thob pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:132b-9: theg pa chen pos thob pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:132b-10: de la sems can thams cad kyi las kyi rnam par smin pas thob pa ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:132b-11: sems can thams cad las las yongs su dag pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:132b-12: yongs su ma dag ba byas shing rang gi las gnas pa'i phyir 'gro ba lnga po dag tu 'khor zhing rnam par smin pa sna tshogs mngon par 'grub pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:132b-13: rnam par smin pa sna tshogs myong ba gang yin pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:132b-14: de la 'bras bu len pa gang yin pa de ni mngon par grub pa zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:132b-15: 'bras bu 'byin pa gang yin pa de ni myong ba zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:132b-16: gzhan yang rgyu byed pa'i don mngon par grub nas 'bras bu myong ba gang yin pa de ni mngon par grub pa zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:132b-17: 'bras bu byung nas kun du spyod pa'i sems kyis bsdus pa gang yin pa de ni myong ba zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:132b-18: de la nyan thos kyi theg pa thob pa ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:132b-19: dang po gsum las skyabs su 'gro ba yang yang dag par blangs nas yang dag par thos pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:132b-20: dge sbyong gi bar rgyan gyi bar la brten nas rnam pa lnga thob pa gang yin pa'o ;
T05TD4016.3E:132b-21: / de la thos pa dang rgyan thob pa ni yang dag pa'i chos thos pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:132b-22: bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las ni /
T05TD4016.3E:132b-23: dge sbyong gi rgyan zhes 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:132b-24: de la thob pa lnga ni mngon du byas pa thob pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:132b-25: shes pa mngon du byas pa thob pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:132b-26: dad pa mngon du byas pa thob pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:132b-27: 'bras bu mngon du byas pa thob pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:132b-28: yon tan mngon du byas pa thob pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:132b-29: de las mngon du byas pa'i thob pa ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:132b-30: sa gsum po mthong ba'i sa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:132b-32: mthar thug pa'i sa gang yin pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:132b-33: shes pa mngon du byas pa thob pa ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:133a-0: sa dgu pa'i shes pa thob @133a * //
T05TD4016.3E:133a-3: rjes su rtogs pa shes pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:133a-8: de dag gi rjes las thob pa kun rdzob shes pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:133a-9: mi skye ba shes pa rnams so //
T05TD4016.3E:133a-10: dad pa mngon du byas pa ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:133a-11: sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun tshul khrims rnam pa bzhi po dag la mngon par yid ches pa gang yin pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:133a-12: rgya cher bstan bcos rnam par bshad pa las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:133a-13: 'bras bu mngon du byas pa'i thob pa ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:133a-14: dge sbyong gi 'bras bu bzhi po dag thob pa gang yin pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:133a-15: yon tan mngon du byas pa thob pa ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:133a-18: zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched dang /
T05TD4016.3E:133a-19: zad par gyi skye mched dang /
T05TD4016.3E:133a-20: nyon mongs pa med pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:133a-22: so so yang dag par rig pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:133a-23: mngon par shes pa la sogs pa'i yon tan rnams so //
T05TD4016.3E:133a-24: de la rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa thob pa ni mdor bsdu na rnam par gsum ste /
T05TD4016.3E:133a-25: dang po ni sngar nges par 'byed pa'i cha dad rjes su mthun pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thob pa'i phyir te /
T05TD4016.3E:133a-26: 'di ltar snga ma'i lus kyi sngar nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang /
T05TD4016.3E:133a-27: rjes su mthun pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thob pas phyi ma lus kyis stan gcig kho na la rang sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba'o //
T05TD4016.3E:133a-28: gnyis pa ni zag ba med pa'i de kho na thob pa'i phyir te /
T05TD4016.3E:133a-29: 'di ltar sngar 'phags pa'i lus thob nas /
T05TD4016.3E:133a-30: gdod rang sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba ste /
T05TD4016.3E:133a-31: bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las kyang /
T05TD4016.3E:133a-32: gnyis pa ni snga rol nyid nas thob pa zhes bshad do //
T05TD4016.3E:133a-33: gsum pa ni rim gyis thob pa'i phyir te /
T05TD4016.3E:133a-35: stan gcig gis thob par 'gyur ba ma yin gyi /
T05TD4016.3E:133a-36: dang po nges par 'byed pa'i cha ba zhi'i dge ba bskyed nas mthar zad pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:133a-37: mi skye ba shes pa'i bar du rim gyis thob pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:133a-38: de'i phyir bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las /
T05TD4016.3E:133a-39: gsum pa ni snga rol nyid nas ma thob pa zhes bstan pa yin no //
T05TD4016.3E:133a-40: de la thob pa dang po gnyis kyis mngon du byas pa de ni rang rgyal rnams su 'gyur ba yin no //
T05TD4016.3E:133b-0: thob pa thams cad mngon du byas pa gang yin pa de ni bse ru lta bu'i rang sangs @133b rgyas zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:133b-1: de la theg pa chen pos thob pa 'di lta ste snying rje chen pos thob pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:133b-2: sems bskyed pas thob pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:133b-3: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i mthus thob pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:133b-4: pha rol tu phyin pas thob pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:133b-5: bsdu ba'i dngos pos thob pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:133b-6: sa rnams kyis thob pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:133b-7: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pas thob pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:133b-8: 'di dag thams cad ni sngar bstan pa bzhin du rnam par dbye bar bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:133b-9: snying rje chen po'i bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las ji skad bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:133b-10: sems bskyed pa ni bstan bcos sems rnam par bshad pa las /
T05TD4016.3E:133b-11: sems bskyed pa rnam pa gnyis bstan pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:133b-13: mtshan nyid rnam pa lngas sems bskyed pa las 'byung ba bzhin du rig par bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:133b-14: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i mthu ni mngon par shes pa drug gi mthu yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:133b-15: rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa'i nang nas mthu'i le'u las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:133b-16: gzhan ni brda phrad par zad do //
T05TD4016.3E:133b-17: de la bshad pa'i tshul zhes bya ba ni /
T05TD4016.3E:133b-18: mdor bsdu na rnam pa bcu gnyis yod de /
T05TD4016.3E:133b-19: dngos po bshad pa ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:133b-20: so so tha dad pa'i gzugs la sogs pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:133b-21: mig la sogs pa'i chos bstan pa ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:133b-24: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba gnas dang /
T05TD4016.3E:133b-28: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:133b-33: thogs pa dang bcas pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:133b-34: thogs pa med pa la sogs pa'i 'du shes tha dad du gyur pa dpag tu med pa ston pa'i bstan pa rnams so //
T05TD4016.3E:133b-35: rang gi gzhung lugs la brtag pa'i bshad pa ni /
T05TD4016.3E:133b-38: dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa'i sde dang /
T05TD4016.3E:133b-39: lung du bstan pa'i sde la sogs pa'i bstan pa rnams so //
T05TD4016.3E:133b-40: gzhan gyi gzhung lugs la brtag pa'i bshad pa ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:133b-41: gtan tshigs kyi rigs pa'i gnas bdun la brten nas gzhan dag gis smra ba cher gcod cing rang gi gzhung 'dzugs pa'i bshad pa rnams te /
T05TD4016.3E:133b-42: gtan tshigs kyi rigs pa bdun ni bstan bcos rnam par bshad pa las /
T05TD4016.3E:133b-43: rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:134a-0: @134a * // drang ba'i don bstan pa ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:134a-1: mdo dang dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:134a-2: lung du bstan pa'i sde la sogs pa las /
T05TD4016.3E:134a-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis don mdor smos nas rgya cher rnam par ma phye ba rnams yang rnam par phye nas ston pa'i bstan pa rnams so //
T05TD4016.3E:134a-4: nges pa'i don bshad pa ni 'di lta ste ;
T05TD4016.3E:134a-5: snga ma las bzlog pa las rig par bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:134a-6: kun rdzob kyi bden pa bshad pa la 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:134a-7: tshig gi lam gyis brjod pa gang ci yang rung ste /
T05TD4016.3E:134a-8: de thams cad ni kun rdzob ces bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:134a-9: gzhan yang mi dang 'du shes dang /
T05TD4016.3E:134a-10: brjod pa'i dbang du bya ba 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:134a-11: mtshan dang ming dang rnam par rtog pa gang yin pa de yang kun rdzob yin no //
T05TD4016.3E:134a-12: don dam pa'i bden pa bshad pa ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:134a-13: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po bshad pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:134a-17: chos nyid ces ston pa'i bstan pa rnams so //
T05TD4016.3E:134a-18: gsang bshad pa ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:134a-19: phal cher nyan thos kyi ston pa'i bstan pa gang yin pa dag go //
T05TD4016.3E:134a-20: rnam par phye ba bshad pa las 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:134a-21: phal cher theg pa chen po'i sde snod kyi bstan pa gang yin pa dag go //
T05TD4016.3E:134a-22: lan gdab pa'i dngos po bshad pa ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:134a-23: chos kyi mdo bzhi po dag bshad pa gang yin pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:134a-24: 'du byed thams cad mi rtag pa'o zhes bya ba nas /
T05TD4016.3E:134a-25: mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi ba'o zhes bya ba'i bar du bstan pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:134a-26: de lta bu la sogs pa ni bshad pa rnams so //
T05TD4016.3E:134a-27: lan mi gdab pa'i dngos po bshad pa 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:134a-28: kha cig 'jig rten rtag pa zhig yin nam /
T05TD4016.3E:134a-29: 'on te mi rtag pa zhig yin zhes 'dri ba nas /
T05TD4016.3E:134a-30: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa shi phan chad yod dam med ces bya ba'i bar du 'dri ba la /
T05TD4016.3E:134a-31: de bzhin gshegs pas de'i tshe /
T05TD4016.3E:134a-32: cang mi gsung zhing lung ma bstan par de dag la 'di skad du dngos po 'di dag lung bstan du mi rung ba'o zhes bka' stsal pa lta bu'o //
T05TD4016.3E:134a-33: rgyu rnam pa bzhi'i phyir lan mi gdab par rig par bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:134a-34: dang po bdag nyid med pa'i phyir te /
T05TD4016.3E:134a-35: ji ltar kha cig bdag dang phung po rnams tha dad pa zhig yin nam /
T05TD4016.3E:134a-36: 'on te tha mi dad pa zhig yin zhes 'dri ba la sogs pa lta bu'o //
T05TD4016.3E:134a-37: gnyis pa ni don dang mi ldan par rab tu 'dren pa'i phyir shing sha pa'i dpe'i lo ma'i mdo las ji skad du /
T05TD4016.3E:134b-0: chos dpag tu med pa zhes ngas @134b yang dag par rtogs kyang rab tu ma bstan to //
T05TD4016.3E:134b-2: chos de dag ni don dang ldan pa ma yin pa 'dren pa'i phyir ro zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o //
T05TD4016.3E:134b-3: gsum pa ni zab pa'i phyir te /
T05TD4016.3E:134b-5: bdag ces bya ba yod pa yin nam /
T05TD4016.3E:134b-6: med pa yin zhes 'dri ba la sogs pa de dag ni lan gdab tu mi rung ba'o //
T05TD4016.3E:134b-7: gal te bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag yod par lung bstan par gyur na /
T05TD4016.3E:134b-8: gang zag de yang na phung po la bdag yod pa nyid du 'dzin pa'am /
T05TD4016.3E:134b-9: yang na phung po las logs shig na bdag yod pa nyid du 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
T05TD4016.3E:134b-10: gal te bdag med do zhes lung bstan par gyur na ni gang zag de 'jig rten pa'i kun rdzob kyi tha snyad kyang bdag bzhin du med do zhes brjod par gyur pas so //
T05TD4016.3E:134b-11: bzhi pa ni chos nyid kyi phyir te /
T05TD4016.3E:134b-12: 'di ltar chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid chos rnams dang /
T05TD4016.3E:134b-14: tha dad do zhes lung bstan du mi rung ste /
T05TD4016.3E:134b-15: de bzhin nyid mtshan nyid de chos nyid kyis gcig pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:134b-16: tha dad pa'i ngo bo nyid du rnam par gzhag tu mi rung bas so //
T05TD4016.3E:134b-17: gzhan yang rkyen rnam pa bzhis lung bstan du mi rung ste /
T05TD4016.3E:134b-18: dngos po 'di phyi rol pa dag gis brjod pa'i phyir tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:134b-19: don dang mi ldan pa'i phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:134b-20: rtsod pa smra ba'i kun nas dkris pa bskyed pa'i phyir ro ;
T05TD4016.3E:134b-21: / de la mtha' gnyis rnam par spangs pa'i tshul zhes bya ba ni mdor bsdu na rnam pa drug yod de /
T05TD4016.3E:134b-22: yang dag par yod pa ma yin pa la sgro 'dogs pa'i mtha' rnam par spangs pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:134b-23: yang dag pa la skur ba 'debs pa'i mtha' rnam par spangs nas rtag pa nyid du 'dzin pa'i mtha' rnam par spangs pa dang ;
T05TD4016.3E:134b-24: chad pa nyid du 'dzin pa'i mtha' rnam par spangs pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:134b-25: 'dod pa'i bsod nyams kyi bde ba la longs spyod pa'i mtha' rnam par spangs pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:134b-26: bdag nyid ngal bar spyor ba'i mtha' rnam par spangs pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:134b-27: de la kun du brtags pa'i ngo bo nyid yod par 'dzin pa ni sgro 'dogs pa'i mtha' zhes bya'o ;
T05TD4016.3E:134b-28: / gzhan gyi dbang dang yongs su grub pas yang med par 'dzin pa ni skur ba 'debs pa'i mtha' zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:134b-29: gzhan yang nges par bdag yod pa nyid du 'dzin pa ni sems can du sgro 'dogs pa'i mtha'o //
T05TD4016.3E:135a-0: nges par bdag med pa nyid du 'dzin pa ni sems can la skur ba 'debs pa'i @135a * //
T05TD4016.3E:135a-2: des brtags pa'i sems can yang med par skur ba btab pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:135a-3: sems yang dag par yod par 'dzin pa ni chos su sgro 'dogs pa'i mtha'o //
T05TD4016.3E:135a-4: sems yang dag par med pa nyid du 'dzin pa ni chos la skur ba 'debs pa'i mtha' ste /
T05TD4016.3E:135a-5: 'di yang bstan bcos dbus dang mtha' rnam par 'byed pa las ji skad bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:135a-6: gzugs la sogs par rtag par gnas pa nyid du 'dzin pa gang yin pa de ni mu stegs can gyi mtha'o //
T05TD4016.3E:135a-7: mi rtag pa nyid du 'dzin pa gang yin pa de ni nyan thos kyi mtha' ste /
T05TD4016.3E:135a-8: 'di yang dbus dang mtha' rnam par 'byed pa las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:135a-9: gzhan yang 'du byed rnams mi rtag pa nyid du mthong ba ni chad pa'i mtha'o //
T05TD4016.3E:135a-10: mya ngan las 'das pa rtag ba nyid du mthong ba ni rtag pa'i mtha' ste /
T05TD4016.3E:135a-11: 'di yang 'phags pa phreng ldan ma'i mdo las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:135a-12: 'dod pa lnga'i bde ba la spyod pa gang yin pa de ni bde ba'i mtha'o //
T05TD4016.3E:135a-13: bdag nyid ltogs bzhin du dka' ba spyod pa gang yin pa de ni sdug bsngal la spyod pa'i mtha' ste /
T05TD4016.3E:135a-14: 'di yang bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:135a-15: gong du bstan pa lta bu'i phan tshun ltos pa rnam pa gsum gyi mtha' gnyis spangs nas dbu ma'i lam la spyod pa gang yin pa de ni don spangs pa'i tshul zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:135a-16: de la bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i tshul zhes bya ba ni mdor bsdu na bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ngos po rnam par drug yod de /
T05TD4016.3E:135a-17: bdag bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:135a-18: sems can bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:135a-19: 'jig rten bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:135a-20: sems can gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:135a-21: bsam gtan rnams kyi bsam gtan gyi spyod yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:135a-22: sangs rgyas rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:135a-23: 'di dag yang bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las bstan pa bzhin du go rims bzhin du bshad par bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:135a-24: bstan bcos de las de la bdag la sems pa ni 'di ltar 'di ni la la 'jig tshogs la lta ba brten nas 'di snyam du sems te /
T05TD4016.3E:135a-25: ci bdag 'das pa'i dus na byung bar gyur tam /
T05TD4016.3E:135a-26: 'on te byung bar ma gyur zhes bya ba la sogs pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:135b-0: ma 'ongs pa'i @135b dus gnyis la yang de bzhin no //
T05TD4016.3E:135b-1: de la sems can sems pa ni 'di ltar 'di na la la 'jig tshogs la lta ba kho na la brten nas 'di snyam du sems can de dag ga las byung /
T05TD4016.3E:135b-2: sems can gyi byed ba bo su yin /
T05TD4016.3E:135b-3: sems can gang gi bar du 'gro //
T05TD4016.3E:135b-4: sems can gang gi bar du 'gag par 'gyur snyam du sems pa'o ;
T05TD4016.3E:135b-5: / de la 'jig rten la sems pa ni 'di ltar 'di na la la 'jig rten la lta ba brten nas 'di snyam du sems te /
T05TD4016.3E:135b-6: 'jig rten rtag go zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgya cher bshad pa'i bar du chos nyid las brtsams nas kyang 'di snyam du sems te /
T05TD4016.3E:135b-8: sems can gyi chos nyid dang /
T05TD4016.3E:135b-9: 'jig rten gyi chos nyid 'di ci las de ltar 'byung snyam du sems shing /
T05TD4016.3E:135b-10: chos nyid kyi rigs pa kho nas mi 'jug pa yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:135b-11: de'i phyir de yang bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gnas la sems ba zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:135b-12: sems can rnams kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa la sems pa ni rnam par bzhis bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin te ;
T05TD4016.3E:135b-13: gnas kyi bye brag gi phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:135b-14: dngos po'i bye brag gi phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:135b-15: rgyu'i bye brag gi phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:135b-16: rnam par smin pa'i bye brag gi phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:135b-17: de la bsam gtan pa rnams kyi bsam gtan pa'i yul ni rnam pa gsum gyis bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:135b-18: de bzhin nyid zab pa'i don gyi phyir /
T05TD4016.3E:135b-19: dbang bsgyur ba nyid kyi phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:135b-20: zag pa med pa'i dbyings yang dag ba thob pa'i phyir ro //
