T05TD4016.3E:135b-21: de la sangs rgyas kyis rnam par bshad pa las ni /
T05TD4016.3E:135b-22: bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnam pa dgu zhes ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:135b-23: 'di ltar snga ma drug gi steng du yang rnam pa gsum po bstan par mi bya ba'i dngos po bcu bzhi dang /
T05TD4016.3E:135b-24: yang dag pa'i chos ma yin pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:135b-25: nyon mongs bas mngon par bsgrubs pas bsnan pas so //
T05TD4016.3E:135b-26: de'i phyir bstan bcos de nyid las /
T05TD4016.3E:135b-27: rgyu dang rkyen gang gi phyir dngos po dgu po de dag la bsam par mi bya zhe na /
T05TD4016.3E:135b-29: rgyu rkyen rnam par lnga'i phyir te /
T05TD4016.3E:135b-30: bdag dang sems can la rang gi mtshan nyid med pa'i phyir bsam par mi bya ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:135b-31: 'jig rten dang ltar mngon par grub pa'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir bsam par mi bya ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:135b-32: las kyi rnam par smin pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:135b-33: spyod yul rnam pa gnyis zab pa'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir bsam par mi bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:136a-0: lung ma bstan pa'i dngos po gcig tu nges pa'i mtshan nyid ma @136a * //
T05TD4016.3E:136a-1: yin pa'i phyir bsam par mi bya ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:136a-2: yang dag pa'i chos ma yin pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:136a-3: nyon mongs pas mngon par bsgrubs pa ni don dang mi ldan pa'i mtshan nyid rab tu 'dren pa'i phyir bsam par mi bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:136a-4: gal te dngos po de dag la sems par byed na nyes pa rnam pa gsum skyed par rig par bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:136a-5: sems 'khrugs pa'i nyes pa skyed pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:136a-6: bsod nams ma yin pa skyed pa'i nyes pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:136a-7: legs par mi thob pa'i nyes pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:136a-8: gal te sems par mi byed na /
T05TD4016.3E:136a-9: yon tan rnam pa gsum 'dren par byed do //
T05TD4016.3E:136a-10: gong ma las bzlog pa las rig par bya'o zhes 'byung ste /
T05TD4016.3E:136a-11: rgya cher de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no //
T05TD4016.3E:136a-12: de la dgongs pa'i tshul ni mdor bsdu na rnam pa bcu drug ste /
T05TD4016.3E:136a-13: yang dag par ston pa'i dgongs pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:136a-14: 'dun pa bzlog pa'i dgongs pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:136a-15: yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa'i dgongs pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:136a-16: yang dag par gzengs bstod pa'i dgongs pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:136a-17: yang dag par rab tu dga' bar mdzad pa'i dgongs pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:136a-19: the tshom bcad pa'i dgongs pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:136a-20: yongs su smin par bya ba'i dgongs pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:136a-21: ting nge 'dzin du bya ba'i dgongs pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:136a-22: rnam par grol bar bya ba'i dgongs pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:136a-23: don gzhan dang 'brel ba'i dgongs pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:136a-24: rtogs par byed pa rnams la kha na ma tho ba med pa'i dgongs pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:136a-25: mchog tu dga' ba'i dgongs pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:136a-26: smra ba po rnams la nyan pa rnams rim gro cher bskyed par bya ba'i dgongs pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:136a-27: chos kyi tshul 'jug par bya ba'i dgongs pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:136a-28: dge ba 'phel bar byang chub nges pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:136a-29: mtshan ma thams cad kyis zil gyis gnon pa'i dgongs pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:136a-30: bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las tshul rnam pa drug gi mtshan nyid rnam par bshad pa yang phal cher bstan bcos rnam par bshad pa las 'byung ba dang mthun par ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:136a-31: gzhan yang bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las /
T05TD4016.3E:136a-32: ji ltar mtha' gnyis rnam par spangs pa'i tshul gyis don gyi tshul khong du chud par bya zhe na /
T05TD4016.3E:136a-33: 'di ltar gzhan gyi dbang gi ngo bo nyid dang /
T05TD4016.3E:136a-34: yongs su grub pa'i ngo bo nyid la kun brtags pa'i ngo bo nyid du mngon par zhe na pa gang yin pa de ni sgro 'dogs pa'i mtha' yin par rig par bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:136a-35: gzhan gyi dbang gi ngo bo nyid dang /
T05TD4016.3E:136b-0: yongs @136b su grub pa'i ngo bo nyid la med do zhes pa ni rang gi mtshan nyid la skur pa 'debs pa'i mtha' yin par rig par bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:136b-1: de ltar mtha' gnyis rnam par spangs pa'i tshul gyis de kho na'i don gyi tshul khong du chud par bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:136b-2: gzhan yang thob pa'i tshul dang /
T05TD4016.3E:136b-3: bshad pa'i tshul gnyis ka ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i tshul dang /
T05TD4016.3E:136b-4: dgongs pa'i tshul gyis ci rigs par khong du chud par bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:136b-5: gzhan yang de la mtha' gnyis rnam par spangs pa'i tshul gyis khong du chud par 'gyur te /
T05TD4016.3E:136b-6: de yang ci rigs par ro zhes 'byung ste zhib tu de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no //
T05TD4016.3E:136b-7: bstan bcos chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las /
T05TD4016.3E:136b-8: tshul rnam pa drug gi bshad pa 'byung ba ni /
T05TD4016.3E:136b-9: bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las rnam par bshad pa las bstan pa dang cung zad tha dad de /
T05TD4016.3E:136b-10: de'i phyir de nyid las tshul gyi snod ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:136b-11: gang du tshul drug gang zhe na /
T05TD4016.3E:136b-12: de kho na'i don gyi tshul dang /
T05TD4016.3E:136b-15: mtha' gnyis rnam par spangs pa'i tshul dang /
T05TD4016.3E:136b-16: bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i tshul dang /
T05TD4016.3E:136b-18: tshul drug po 'di dag las gong ma gsum ni tshul 'og ma gsum gyi go rims bzhin du rig par bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:136b-19: ro myang ba'i mdo las ji skad du /
T05TD4016.3E:136b-20: bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong rnams la bka' stsal ba /
T05TD4016.3E:136b-21: dge slong dag gzugs la ro myang ba yod do zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni skur ba 'debs pa'i mtha' dang /
T05TD4016.3E:136b-22: sgro 'dogs pa'i mtha' spangs nas de kho na'i don gyi tshul ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:136b-23: ro myang ba dang nyes dmigs dang /
T05TD4016.3E:136b-24: nges par 'byung ba yod do zhes bya ba 'di ni skur ba 'debs pa'i mtha' spangs so //
T05TD4016.3E:136b-25: gzugs nas rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba'i bar 'dis ni sgro 'dogs pa'i mtha' spangs te /
T05TD4016.3E:136b-26: phung po tsam las kun nas nyon mongs pa'am rnam par byang bar zad kyi /
T05TD4016.3E:136b-27: bdag ni med do zhes rab tu bstan to //
T05TD4016.3E:136b-28: dge slong dag ci tsam du ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bar du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes bya ba'i nang du shes so zhes bya ba 'dis ni /
T05TD4016.3E:136b-29: thob pa'i tshul bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bstan te /
T05TD4016.3E:136b-30: so so rang gis rig par bya ba thob par ston pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:136b-31: mdo 'di dag thams cad ni bshad pa'i tshul lo //
T05TD4016.3E:137a-1: pa'i tshul gyis khong du chud par bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:137a-2: yongs su shes par bya ba'i dngos po dang /
T05TD4016.3E:137a-3: yongs su shes par bya ba'i don dang /
T05TD4016.3E:137a-5: yongs su shes pa'i 'bras bu dang /
T05TD4016.3E:137a-6: de rab tu shes pa la dgongs nas mdo 'di dag bshad do //
T05TD4016.3E:137a-7: de yongs su shes par bya ba'i dngos po ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:137a-9: yongs su shes par bya ba'i don ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:137a-10: ro myang ba la sogs pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:137a-11: rnam pa des gzugs la sogs pa'i dngos po de yongs su shes pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:137a-12: yongs su shes pa ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:137a-13: nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po de dag de ltar gsum du bsgyur bas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa'i shes pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:137a-14: yongs su shes pa'i 'bras bu ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:137a-15: lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'di las zhes bya ba nas lha dang mi dang bcas pa'i bar las grol ba nas rnam par thar par rab tu grol ba zhes bya ba'i bar du'o //
T05TD4016.3E:137a-16: der rab tu shes pa ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:137a-17: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par nang du shes so zhes bya ba'i bar du 'byung ba yin no /
T05TD4016.3E:137a-19: // / bam po bdun cu gcig pa /
T05TD4016.3E:137a-22: 'dus ma byas kyi mtshan nyid dang /
T05TD4016.3E:137a-23: rkyen bzhi po dag go zhes bya ba ni drug pa 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid do //
T05TD4016.3E:137a-24: 'di ltar 'dus byas kyi chos rnams dus gsum po dag tu skye ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:137a-26: 'jig pa'i dbang gis 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid gsum dang /
T05TD4016.3E:137a-27: rkyen bzhi po dag yod par gyur pa'i phyir 'jig rten du 'khor bar gyur pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:137a-28: bstan bcos rnam par bshad pa las /
T05TD4016.3E:137a-29: snga phyi rgyun gcig nas gcig tu mi 'chad cing /
T05TD4016.3E:137a-30: mngon sum du gyur pa gsal zhing dmigs su rung ba /
T05TD4016.3E:137a-31: rgyu dang bcas shing mi gnas pa rnam pa gzhan du 'gyur ba'o zhes bya ba ni 'jug pa'o zhes bya'o zhes bshad de /
T05TD4016.3E:137a-33: dus gsum gyi don ni mtshan nyid gsum dang /
T05TD4016.3E:137a-34: las 'byung ba bzhin du rig par bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:137a-35: mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las /
T05TD4016.3E:137a-36: skye ba ni bsam gtan gsum dang /
T05TD4016.3E:137a-37: 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid gsum dang /
T05TD4016.3E:137a-38: rkyen bzhi po dag go zhes 'byung ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:137a-39: dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las /
T05TD4016.3E:137b-0: @137b 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid gsum dang /
T05TD4016.3E:137b-1: rgyu dang rkyen bzhi po dag go zhes 'byung ba ni lo ts'a ba dag gis nor to //
T05TD4016.3E:137b-2: rigs pa ni rnam pa bzhir rig par bya ste zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bdun pa rigs pa bzhi ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:137b-3: 'di yang rnam pa gsum du dbye ste /
T05TD4016.3E:137b-5: grangs smos pa bzhin du ming bkod pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:137b-6: go rims bzhin du phye ste bshad pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:137b-9: bya ba byed pa'i rigs pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:137b-10: 'thad pa sgrub pa'i rigs pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:137b-11: chos nyid kyi rigs pa'o zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa grangs smos pa bzhin du ming bkod pa'o /
T05TD4016.3E:137b-12: mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las /
T05TD4016.3E:137b-14: yod par gyur pa'i grub pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:137b-15: bya ba'i dngos po grub pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:137b-16: grogs byas te grub pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:137b-17: chos kyis grub pa'o zhes 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:137b-18: dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las /
T05TD4016.3E:137b-19: mthun par gyur pa'i mtshan nyid ni rnam pa bzhir rig par bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:137b-20: phan tshun ltos pa'i mthun pa dang ;
T05TD4016.3E:137b-21: bya ba byed pa'i mthun pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:137b-22: bya ba byed pa dang mthun pa skye ba'i mtshan nyid dang /
T05TD4016.3E:137b-23: chos kyi ngo bo nyid kyi mthun pa zhes 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:137b-24: de la ltos pa'i rigs pa ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:137b-25: rgyu gang dag dang rkyen gang dag gis 'du byed rnams skye ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:137b-26: rjes su tha snyad 'dogs pa 'byung ba gang yin pa de ni ltos pa'i rigs pa zhes bya'o zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gsum pa'i go rims bzhin du rnam par phye ste bshad pa ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:137b-27: 'di yang rigs pa rnam pa bzhis rnam par phye ste /
T05TD4016.3E:137b-28: bshad pa nyid las rnam pa bzhir dbye ste /
T05TD4016.3E:137b-29: 'di ni dang po ltos pa'i rigs pa rnam par bshad pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:137b-30: 'di yang rnam par bshad pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:137b-32: rigs pa phyi ma gsum po dag la yang de bzhin du rig par bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:137b-33: 'di ltar 'du byed kyi chos rnams ni rgyu dang rkyen rnams la ltos pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:137b-34: ming dang tshig dang yi ge'i tshogs la yang ltos nas /
T05TD4016.3E:137b-35: gdod gsal bar 'gyur bas de'i phyir ming la sogs pa ni ltos pa zhes bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:137b-36: de'i phyir bstan bcas rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa'i nang nas nyan thos kyi sa las 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:137b-37: mdor bsdu na ltos pa ni rnam pa gnyis te /
T05TD4016.3E:137b-40: de la skye ba'i ltos pa ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:138a-0: rgyu gang dag dang rkyen gang dag gis phung po rnams skye bar 'gyur ba'i phung po skye ba de ni rgyu de dag dang rkyen de @138a * //
T05TD4016.3E:138a-1: dag la ltos pa yin no //
T05TD4016.3E:138a-2: gdags pa'i ltos pa ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:138a-3: ming gi tshogs dang tshig gi tshogs dang /
T05TD4016.3E:138a-4: yi ge'i tshogs gang dag gis phung po rnams gdags par 'gyur ba'i phung po'i gdags pa de ni ming gi tshogs dang /
T05TD4016.3E:138a-6: yi ge'i tshogs de dag la ltos pa yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:138a-7: de ni phung po rnams kyi skye ba'i ltos pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:138a-8: gdags pa'i ltos pa'o zhes bya'o zhes 'byung ste /
T05TD4016.3E:138a-9: ltos pa'i chos gang yin pa de nyid ni phung por gdags pa'i rigs pa yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:138a-10: zhib tu de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no //
T05TD4016.3E:138a-11: mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang /
T05TD4016.3E:138a-12: dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang /
T05TD4016.3E:138a-13: bstan bcos rnam par bshad pa las kyang /
T05TD4016.3E:138a-14: phal cher mdo nyid las gsungs pa dang mthun par 'byung ba'i phyir bshad pa mang po ma byas so //
T05TD4016.3E:138a-15: bya ba byed pa'i rigs pa ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:138a-16: rgyu gang dang rkyen gang dag gis chos rnams thob pa'am /
T05TD4016.3E:138a-18: skyes pa rnams las byed par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni bya ba byed pa'i rigs pa zhes bya'o zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa bya ba byed pa'i rigs pa rnam par bshad pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:138a-19: mdo'i tshig 'di yang so sor bshad pa mi mthun pas /
T05TD4016.3E:138a-20: kha cig na re dbang po drug gis yul drug mthong bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni thob pa zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:138a-21: 'byung ba chen po bzhi po dag rgyur byas pa'i gzugs su 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni 'grub pa zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:138a-22: chos rnams skyes na ni so so'i bya ba byed de /
T05TD4016.3E:138a-23: dper na mig gis gzugs la blta na yid kyis chos 'dzin pa'i bar lta bu'o zhe'o //
T05TD4016.3E:138a-24: kha cig na re dge ba spyad pas mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:138a-25: yon tan yongs su rdzogs pa grub pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:138a-26: mthong ba dang thos pa la sogs pa ni bya ba byed pa zhes bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:138a-27: de'i phyir nyan thos kyi sa las /
T05TD4016.3E:138a-28: phung po rnams rang gi rgyu dang /
T05TD4016.3E:138a-29: rang gi rkyen gyis bskyed pa gang yin pa rnams ni rang gi byed pa de dang de dag la sbyor bar byed pa yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:138a-32: mig gis gzugs rnams la lta bar byed pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:138a-33: rna bas sgra rnams nyan par byed pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:138a-34: yid kyis chos rnams la shes par byed pa'i bar lta bu dang /
T05TD4016.3E:138a-35: gzugs kyis mig gi spyod yul du gnas par byed pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:138a-36: sgras rna ba'i spyod yul du gnas par byed pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:138a-37: de bzhin du chos rnams kyis yid kyi yul du gnas par byed pa'i bar lta bu dang /
T05TD4016.3E:138b-0: gzhan yang de lta bu dang mthun pa'i chos rnams @138b de dang de dag gis gcig la gcig bya ba byed pa'i rigs pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:138b-1: sbyor ba dang thabs su gyur pa gang yin pa de ni bya ba byed pa'i rigs pa zhes bya'o zhes 'byung ba yin no //
T05TD4016.3E:138b-2: 'thad pa sgrub pa'i rigs pa ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:138b-3: rgyu gang dag dang rkyen gang dag gis dam bcas pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:138b-5: smos pa'i don sgrub pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:138b-6: yang dag par khong du chud par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni 'thad pa sgrub pa'i rigs pa zhes bya'o zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gsum pa 'thad pa sgrub pa'i rigs pa rnam par bshad pa ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:138b-7: 'di yang rnam grangs gnyis kyis bstan to //
T05TD4016.3E:138b-8: 'di ni dang po'i mdo'i tshig 'di la yang bshad pa rnam pa gnyis yod de /
T05TD4016.3E:138b-9: kha cig na re de la rgyu gang dag dang rkyen gang dag gis zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:138b-10: dam bcas pa'i tshe gtan tshigs dang /
T05TD4016.3E:138b-11: dpe la ltos pa gang yin pa de ni rgyu dang rkyen zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:138b-12: dam bcas pa zhes bya ba ni /
T05TD4016.3E:138b-13: dam bcas pa'i gzhung gi don rnam par gzhag pa gang yin pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:138b-14: bshad pa zhes bya ba ni sgrub pa'i don gyi khungs smos pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:138b-15: don bsgrub pa zhes bya ba ni gong ma'i dam bcas pa de rnam par bshad pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:138b-16: yang dag par khong du chud par byed pa zhes bya ba ni gong ma'i bshad pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:138b-17: smos pa'i don rnam par bshad nas /
T05TD4016.3E:138b-18: yang dag par khong du chud par byed pa'o zhe'o //
T05TD4016.3E:138b-19: kha cig na re rgyu gang dag dang /
T05TD4016.3E:138b-20: rkyen gang dag ces bya ba ni tshad ma rnam pa gsum mo //
T05TD4016.3E:138b-23: smos pa'i don zhes bya ba ni don gcig go //
T05TD4016.3E:138b-24: de la bye brag yod pa yang tshad ma gsum rnam par gzhag par nus pa la ltos pa gang yin pa de ni dam bcas pa zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:138b-25: ston par byed pa'i bstan pa la ltos pa gang yin pa de ni bshad pa zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:138b-26: rgya cher bshad pa la ltos pa gang yin pa de ni smos pa zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:138b-27: rgyu dang rkyen de dam bcas pa'i don gang yin pa bsgrubs nas /
T05TD4016.3E:138b-28: gzhan dag gi mi rtag pa nyid du dam bcas pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:138b-29: yang dag par khong du chud par byed pa'o zhe'o ;
T05TD4016.3E:138b-30: / nyan thos kyi sa las ni /
T05TD4016.3E:138b-31: 'thad pa sgrub pa'i rigs pa ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:138b-32: phung po rnams mi rtag pa'am /
T05TD4016.3E:138b-36: bdag med pa'am zhes tshad ma gsum po 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:139a-0: mngon sum dang rjes su dpag @139a * //
T05TD4016.3E:139a-1: pa dag gis rtogs par byed cing /
T05TD4016.3E:139a-2: 'thad pa sgrub pa'i rigs pa ni dam pa rnams kyi snying po 'phrog par byed pa'i tshad ma gsum po de dag gis 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:139a-3: phung po rnams ni mi rtag pa nyid dam /
T05TD4016.3E:139a-4: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba nyid dam /
T05TD4016.3E:139a-7: bdag med pa nyid du rnam par 'jog par byed cing /
T05TD4016.3E:139a-8: sgrub par byed pa yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:139a-9: de ni 'thad pa sgrub pa'i rigs pa zhes bya'o zhes 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:139a-10: gzhan yang rigs pa 'di ni mdor bsdu na rnam pa gnyis te zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni rnam grangs gnyis pa 'thad pa'i rigs pa ni ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:139a-13: grangs bzhin du ming bkod pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:139a-14: mtshan nyid mdor bshad pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:139a-15: brtag pa dang lan dag gis rgya cher rnam par bshad pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:139a-18: yongs su ma dag pa'o zhes bya ba 'di ni gnyis pa grangs smos pa bzhin du ming bkod pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:139a-19: 'di ltar gtan tshigs kyis don sgrub pa la skyon med pa'i phyir yongs su dag pa zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:139a-20: skyon dang bcas pa'i phyir yongs su ma dag pa zhes bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:139a-22: mtshan nyid rnam pa lngas ni yongs su dag pa zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:139a-23: mtshan nyid rnam pa bdun gyis ni yongs su ma dag pa zhes bya'o zhes bya ba 'di gsum pa mtshan nyid mdor bshad pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:139a-24: mtshan nyid rnam pa lnga dang /
T05TD4016.3E:139a-25: bdun gyi dbang gis yongs su dag pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:139a-26: yongs su ma dag pa'o zhes bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T05TD4016.3E:139a-27: yang na mdo'i tshig 'di man chad rnam grangs gnyis pa la rnam pa gnyis su dbye ste /
T05TD4016.3E:139a-29: brtag pa dang lan dag gis rgya cher bshad pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:139a-30: dang po la yang rnam pa gsum ste /
T05TD4016.3E:139a-32: grangs smos pa bzhin du ming bkod pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:139a-34: mtshan nyid rnam pa lngas yongs su dag par 'gyur ba gang zhen zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa brtag pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:139a-35: lan dag gis rgya cher rnam par bshad pa ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:139a-37: yongs su dag pa rnam par bshad pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:139a-38: yongs su ma dag pa rnam par bshad pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:139a-39: yongs su dag pa la yang /
T05TD4016.3E:139b-0: @139b lan du gsungs par bstan te /
T05TD4016.3E:139b-2: mngon sum dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid dang /
T05TD4016.3E:139b-3: rang gi rigs kyi dpe nye bar sgrub pa'i mtshan nyid dang /
T05TD4016.3E:139b-4: yongs su grags pa'i mtshan nyid dang /
T05TD4016.3E:139b-5: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i lung gi mtshan nyid do zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:139b-7: mtshan nyid rnam pa lnga bshad pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:139b-8: mtshan nyid lnga bshad pa'i mjug bsdu ba'o //
T05TD4016.3E:139b-9: dang po la yang rnam pa gnyis te /
T05TD4016.3E:139b-10: mtshan nyid lnga yang dag par bshad pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:139b-11: rgol ba dag gi rjes su bzlas te bshad pa'o//
T05TD4016.3E:139b-12: mtshan nyid lnga yang dag par bshad pa yang rnam pa gsum ste /
T05TD4016.3E:139b-13: mtshan nyid lnga mdor bkod pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:139b-14: go rims bzhin du rnam par phye ste bshad pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:139b-17: de la mngon sum dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid ni zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni go rims bzhin du rnam par phye ste bshad pa ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:139b-18: 'di yang mtshan nyid rnam pa lngas bstan pa nyid las rnam pa lngar rnam par dbye ste /
T05TD4016.3E:139b-19: 'di ni dang po mngon sum du dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:139b-24: 'di ni dang po mdor bstan pa nyid do //
T05TD4016.3E:139b-26: 'du byed thams cad mi rtag pa nyid dang /
T05TD4016.3E:139b-27: 'du byed thams cad sdug bsngal ba nyid dang /
T05TD4016.3E:139b-28: chos thams cad bdag med pa nyid 'di ni 'jig rten na mngon sum gyi mtshan mas dmigs pa yin te zhes bya ba 'di ni gnyis pa rnam par bshad pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:139b-29: mdo'i tshig 'di yang rnam pa gnyis su dbye ste /
T05TD4016.3E:139b-31: 'du byed thams cad ni mi rtag pa nyid ces bya ba la sogs pas ni dngos po bstan nas yang dag par bshad pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:139b-32: 'di ni 'jig rten na mngon sum gyi tshad mas dmigs pa yin te zhes bya ba ni tshad ma'i tshad rnam par dbye ba'o //
T05TD4016.3E:139b-34: 'jig rten na btags pa tsam du mngon sum gyi tshad ma ma yin pa mngon sum gyi tshad ma yin par zad de /
T05TD4016.3E:139b-35: mngon sum gyi tshad ma yin pa'i phyir mngon sum gyi tshad ma zhes bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:140a-0: 'di ltar mi rtag pa rags pa 'di la brten nas mi rtag pa phra mo la sogs pa rjes su dpag pa'i phyir mngon sum gyi tshad ma la gnas nas @140a * //
T05TD4016.3E:140a-1: dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid ces bya ba'o zhes bstan par 'gyur ro //
T05TD4016.3E:140a-2: dngos po de yang ji lta bu zhe na /
T05TD4016.3E:140a-3: de la re zhig tshe gcig gi mi rtag pa'i don rags pa la brten nas mi rtag pa nyid du mngon sum mthong ba ni mi rtag pa'i mngon sum gyi tshad ma zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:140a-4: rang gi lus kyi gnod pa sna tshogs myong ba mthong ba'i phyir sdug bsngal mngon sum du 'gyur ba'i tshad ma la bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:140a-5: smod cing tshol ba rnams la rang dbang med pa'i phyir bdag med par shes pa gang yin pa de dag ni bdag med pa'i mngon sum gyi tshad ma zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:140a-6: 'di dag ni thos pa dang bsams pa'i shes rab rnam par g-yeng ba'i sems kyis rnam par rtog pa yin pa'i phyir mngon sum gyi tshad ma ma yin no //
T05TD4016.3E:140a-7: 'di nyid la ni 'jig rten gyi mngon sum zhes bshad do //
T05TD4016.3E:140a-8: bshad pa'i rnam pa gzhan du na //
T05TD4016.3E:140a-9: de la 'du byed thams cad mi rtag ces bya ba ni 'dus byas rnams spyir bsdus pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:140a-10: 'du byed thams cad sdug bsngal ba nyid ces bya ba ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i 'du byed dag go //
T05TD4016.3E:140a-11: chos thams cad bdag med ces bya ba ni chos thams cad bsdu ba'o //
T05TD4016.3E:140a-12: 'di dag ni chos gsum zhes bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:140a-13: de'i phyir bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las nges pa'i don ni 'du byed thams cad mi rtag pa nyid do //
T05TD4016.3E:140a-14: zag pa dang bcas pa thams cad ni sdug bsngal ba nyid do //
T05TD4016.3E:140a-15: chos thams cad kyi stong pa nyid dang /
T05TD4016.3E:140a-16: bdag med pa nyid do zhes 'byung ba yin no //
T05TD4016.3E:140a-17: mi rtag pa la sogs pa 'di dag gi rigs pa yang don rnam pa gnyis dang ldan te /
T05TD4016.3E:140a-18: dang po ni rang gi mtshan nyid kyi mi rtag pa la sogs pa'i rigs pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:140a-19: mngon sum gyi mtshan mas dmigs pa so so dag mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:140a-20: gnyis pa ni spyi'i mtshan nyid de dper na skud pas me tog brgyus pa dang 'dra bar 'di ltar mi rtag pa gcig gis phung po la sogs pa la khyab par gyur te /
T05TD4016.3E:140a-22: bdag med pa yang de bzhin no //
T05TD4016.3E:140a-23: 'dir mngon sum gyi tshad ma zhes bya ba ni spyi'i mtshan nyid phyi ma la brten pa yin pas de'i phyir btags pa tsam du 'jig rten pa'i mngon sum zhes bya ba yang /
T05TD4016.3E:140a-24: yang dag pa'i mngon sum gyi tshad ma ni ma yin no //
T05TD4016.3E:140b-0: bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las ni yang dag pa'i mngon sum gyi tshad ma la brten nas 'jig rten gyi @140b mngon sum gyi tshad ma zhes bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:140b-1: de'i phyir bstan bcos de nyid las /
T05TD4016.3E:140b-2: mngon sum de su'i mngon sum du brjod par bya zhe na /
T05TD4016.3E:140b-5: dbang po gzugs can gyi mngon sum dang /
T05TD4016.3E:140b-6: yid kyis myong ba'i mngon sum dang /
T05TD4016.3E:140b-9: dbang po'i gzugs can gyi mngon sum ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:140b-10: ji skad bstan pa'i mngon sum gyi mtshan nyid kyis dbang po gzugs can lnga po rnams kyi spyod yul gang yin pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:140b-11: yid kyis myong ba'i mngon sum ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:140b-12: yid kyi spyod yul gang yin pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:140b-13: 'jig rten gyi mngon sum ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:140b-14: de gnyi ga gcig tu bsdus pa ni 'jig rten gyi mngon sum zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:140b-15: yang dag pa'i mngon sum ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:140b-16: 'jig rten gyi mngon sum gang yin pa de ni dag pa'i mngon sum yang de yin no /
T05TD4016.3E:140b-17: dag pa'i mngon sum yin la 'jig rten gyi mngon sum ma yin pa yang yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:140b-18: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i spyod yul gang yin pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:140b-19: yod pa la yang yod par /
T05TD4016.3E:140b-20: med pa la yang med par /
T05TD4016.3E:140b-21: bla na yod pa la yang bla na yod par /
T05TD4016.3E:140b-22: bla na med pa la yang bla na med par shes shing 'jig rten pa rnams dang thun mong ma yin pa 'di ni dag pa'i mngon sum gyi tshad ma zhes bya'o zhes 'byung ba yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:140b-23: bstan bcos rnam par bshad pa las kyang de skad du bstan to //
T05TD4016.3E:140b-24: bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las bstan pa dang sbyar na /
T05TD4016.3E:140b-25: zag pa med pa ma yin pa'i phyir yang 'jig rten gyi zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:140b-26: mngon sum ma yin pa'i phyir yang 'jig rten gyi zhes bstan to //
T05TD4016.3E:140b-27: gal te de ltar na mngon sum gang gis ngo bo nyid byed ce na /
T05TD4016.3E:140b-28: slob dpon hyan tsang gis rnam par shes pa drug pa thams cad kyang mngon sum ma yin la /
T05TD4016.3E:140b-29: rnam par g-yeng ba'i gnas skabs kyi rnam par shes pa lnga po dag dang /
T05TD4016.3E:140b-30: dus gcig pa'i yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang mngon sum ma yin no //
T05TD4016.3E:140b-31: mnyam par gzhag pa'i sems thams cad kyang mngon sum gyis bsdus pa yin no zhes bshad do //
T05TD4016.3E:140b-32: slob dpon dzi nas bstan bcos tshad ma bsdus pa mdzad pa las kyang /
T05TD4016.3E:140b-33: mnyam par gzhag pa'i sems thams cad ni mngon sum gyi tshad ma yin no zhes bshad pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:140b-34: de ltar bu dang mthun pa gang yin pa de ni mngon sum du dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid zhes bya'o zhes bya ba de ni gsum pa mjug bsdu ba ste /
T05TD4016.3E:141a-0: @141a * // gnas mngon sum du dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid ni zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa gnas mngon sum du dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid rnam par bshad pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:141a-5: 'di ni dang po mdor bstan pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:141a-6: 'di ltar mi rtag pa rags pa la brten nas /
T05TD4016.3E:141a-7: skad cig ma shin tu phra ba'i mi rtag pa la sogs pa rab tu bstan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:141a-9: 'du byed thams cad skad cig ma nyid dang /
T05TD4016.3E:141a-10: 'jig rten pha rol yod pa nyid du las yongs su dag pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:141a-11: yongs su ma dag pa chud mi zab nyid de zhes bya pa la sogs pas ni gnyis pa rnam par bshad pa ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:141a-13: gnas mngon sum du dmigs pa'i ngo bo nyid gsum bstan pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:141a-14: de la zhes bya ba man chad kyis dmigs su yod par gyur pa'i gtan tshigs bstan pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:141a-15: rgyu dang rkyen des zhes bya ba man chad kyis nges par grub pa nyid du bstan pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:141a-17: 'di ltar gnas mngon sum du dmigs pa ni rnam pa gsum yod pas 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:141a-18: 'du byed thams cad skad cig pa nyid dang /
T05TD4016.3E:141a-19: 'jig rten pha rol yod pa nyid dang /
T05TD4016.3E:141a-20: las yongs su dag pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:141a-21: yongs su ma dag pa chud mi za ba nyid do //
T05TD4016.3E:141a-23: mi rtag par rags pa la sogs pa'i dbang gis ngo bo nyid rnam pa 'di gsum rjes su dpag tu yod par gyur to zhes bstan par 'gyur ro //
T05TD4016.3E:141a-24: de gnas pa'i mi rtag pa'i rigs pa nyid mngon sum du dmigs pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa dmigs su yod par gyur pa'i gtan tshigs bstan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:141a-25: 'di yang gtan tshigs rnam pa gsum bstan pa nyid kyis rnam pa gsum du dbye ste /
T05TD4016.3E:141a-27: 'di ltar des gnas pa'i mi rtag pa rags pa nyid mngon sum du dmigs pa'i phyir gdon mi za bar skad cig ma'i skye 'gag dang bcas pa mi rtag pa phra mo'i don yod par rjes su dpag pa ste ;
T05TD4016.3E:141a-28: 'di ni mngon sum gyi tshad ma dang /
T05TD4016.3E:141a-29: rjes su dpag pa'i tshad ma la brten nas skyes par gyur pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:141a-30: sems can gyi bye brag sna tshogs dang /
T05TD4016.3E:141a-31: las sna tshogs dngos su dmigs pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa sdug bsngal rags pa la brten nas dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:141b-0: 'di ltar da @141b ltar gyi dus su sdug bsngal sna tshogs yod pa gang yin pa de ni snga ma'i las sna tshogs la brten nas /
T05TD4016.3E:141b-1: mngon sum du dmigs pa'i phyir des gdon mi za bar ma 'ongs pa na yang sdug bsngal ba'i 'bras bu yod par rjes su dpag pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:141b-3: sdug bsngal gyi las yongs su dag pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:141b-4: yongs su ma dag pa la gnas pa na mngon sum du dmigs pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni gsum pa bdag med pa rags pa la brten nas /
T05TD4016.3E:141b-5: bdag med par phra ba rab tu bstan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:141b-6: 'di ltar sems can rnams da ltar bde ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:141b-7: sdug bsngal gang ci myong ba dag ni las dge ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:141b-8: mi dge ba la gnas pa nyid du mthong bas las yongs su dag pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:141b-9: yongs su ma dag pa dag gis ni gdon mi za bar 'bras bu rab tu 'dren cing chud mi za bar rab tu shes pas bdag bde ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:141b-10: sdug bsngal myong ba ci yang med pa kho na rab tu shes pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:141b-12: mngon sum du ma gyur pa la rjes su dpag par byed pa la zhes bya ba ni gsum pa rigs pa'i sgo nas phra ba nyid du rjes su dpag par bstan te /
T05TD4016.3E:141b-13: 'di ltar gong du bstan pa'i rgyu dang /
T05TD4016.3E:141b-14: rkyen rnam pa gsum po des mi rtag pa rags pa de dag gis shin tu phra zhing mthong bar dka' ba'i dngos po rjes su dpag par byed pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:141b-15: de lta bu dang mthun pa gang yin pa de ni gnas mngon sum du dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid ces bya'o zhes bya ba ni gsum pa spyi'i mjug bsdu ba yin par rig par bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:141b-16: rang gi rigs kyi dpes nye bar bsgrub pa'i mtshan nyid ni zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gsum pa rang gi rigs kyi dpe'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:141b-17: 'di yang rnam pa gsum du dbye ste /
T05TD4016.3E:141b-21: 'di ni dang po chos mtshungs pa'i dpe mdor bstan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:141b-22: nang dang phyi rol gyi 'du byed rnams kyi tshogs la 'jig rten pa rnams kyis thun mong du shes pa'i skye ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:141b-23: 'chi 'pho ba dag gi dpes nye bar bsgrub pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa la ni gnyis pa yang dag par rnam par bshad pa ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:141b-24: 'di yang rnam pa bzhir dbye ste /
T05TD4016.3E:141b-25: mi rtag pa'i dpe bstan pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:141b-30: 'di ni dang po mi rtag pa'i dpe bstan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:142a-0: de la nang dang phyi rol ces bya ba @142a * //
T05TD4016.3E:142a-2: sems can ma yin pa las brtsams nas phyi nang gi dpe bstan pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:142a-3: nang dang phyi rol gyi tshogs rnam pa gnyis la 'jig rten pa dag gi thun mong du skye ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:142a-4: 'chi 'pho la sogs pa'i dngos po nyid du shes pa mi rtag pa phra mo la sogs pa de dag gi dpe bstan pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:142a-6: phra ba mi dbye bar sbyi'i dper bstan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:142a-7: bstan bcos rnam par bshad pa las ni /
T05TD4016.3E:142a-8: skye ba dang 'jig bdag gis zhes 'byung gi 'chi 'pho zhes mi 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:142a-9: 'jig rten pa rnams kyis thun mong du shes pa skye ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal gyi mtshan nyid dper nye bar bsgrub pa zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa sdug bsngal dper bstan pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:142a-10: 'di ltar 'jig rten na yod pa la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal brgyad po dag bdag nyid kyi sdug bsngal ba'i dper nye bar sbyar ba'o //
T05TD4016.3E:142a-11: 'jig rten pa rnams kyis thun mong du shes pa rang dbang med pa'i mtshan nyid dmigs ba dag gi dpes nye bar bsgrub pa zhes bya ba ni gsum pa bdag med pa'i dpe bstan pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:142a-13: gzhan yang phyi rol dag la 'jig rten pa rnams kyis thun mong du shes pa'i 'byor pa rgud pa dmigs pa dag gi dper nye bar bsgrub pa zhes bya ba ni bzhi pa 'byor pa dang rgud pa'i dpes bstan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:142a-14: de lta bu dang mthun pa gang yin pa de ni rang gi rigs kyi dpe nye bar bsgrub pa'i mtshan nyid ces bya'o zhes bya ba ni gsum pa mjug bsdu ba ste /
T05TD4016.3E:142a-16: yongs su gregs pa'i mtshan nyid ni zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bzhi pa yongs su gregs pa'i mtshan nyid ston to ;
T05TD4016.3E:142a-17: /'di yang rnam pa gsum po mdor bstan pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:142a-22: 'di ltar mngon sum du dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid gang yin pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:142a-23: gnas mngon sum du dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid gang yin pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:142a-24: rang gi rigs kyi dpe nye bar bsgrub pa dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid gang yin pa de ni grub par bya ba la gcig tu nges par grub par byed pa zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa yongs su gregs pa'i mtshan nyid yang dag par bshad pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:142a-25: 'di ltar mngon sum du dmigs pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:142b-0: dpe de dag gis dam bcas pa'i don @142b nges par grub par byed pa'i phyir yongs su gregs pa zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:142b-1: bstan bcos rnam par bshad pa las ni yongs su grub pa nyid ces 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:142b-2: yongs su gregs pa'i mtshan nyid yin par rig par bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
T05TD4016.3E:142b-3: gsum pa mjug bsdu ba ste /
T05TD4016.3E:142b-5: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i lung gi mtshan nyid ni zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni lnga pa shin tu rnam par dag pa'i lung gi mtshan nyid ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:142b-6: 'di yang rnam pa gsum ste mdor bstan pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:142b-11: thams cad mkhyen pas gsungs pa ji skad du mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi ba'o zhes bya ba la zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa rnam par bshad pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:142b-12: de lta bu dang mthun pa gang yin pa de ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'i lung gi mtshan nyid yin par rig par bya'o zhes bya ba ni gsum pa mjug bsdu pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:142b-13: rigs kyi bu de lta bas na mtshan nyid lnga po de dag gi phyir shin tu so sor brtags pa yongs su dag pa'i rigs pa zhes bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:142b-14: yongs su dag pa yin pa'i phyir bsten par bya'o zhes bya ba ni gsum pa spyi'i mjug bsdu ba'o /
T05TD4016.3E:142b-16: // / bam po bdun cu gnyis pa /
T05TD4016.3E:142b-17: byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
T05TD4016.3E:142b-18: bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pa'i mtshan nyid rnam pa du mchis par rig par bgyi lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa rgol ba dag gi rjes su bzlas te rnam par bshad pa zhes bya ba ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:142b-19: 'di ltar gong ma lnga pa shin tu rnam par dag pa'i lung gi mtshan nyid bstan pa'i skabs nas thams cad mkhyen pas gsungs pa zhes bya ba'i tshig gsungs pas thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya ba mtshan nyid rnam pa du dang ldan pa khong du ma chud pas de'i phyir 'dir yang bzlas te bstan pa yin no //
T05TD4016.3E:142b-23: 'di ni dang po thams cad mkhyen pa'i mtshan nyid zhus pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:142b-24: 'dir thams cad mkhyen pa zhes zhus pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:142b-25: gzhan nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa zhes gsungs pa la bye brag ci yod ce na /
T05TD4016.3E:143a-0: yul 'di'i slob dpon rnams kyis brgyud de bshad pa las de bzhin yid la dmigs pa'i ye shes gang yin pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen @143a * //
T05TD4016.3E:143a-2: kun rdzob la gnas pa'i ye shes gang yin pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya'o zhes bshad do //
T05TD4016.3E:143a-3: slob dpon yang dag bden pas 'phags pa gser 'od dam pa'i brjed byang byas pa las ni /
T05TD4016.3E:143a-4: theg pa chen po'i gzhung dang sbyar na stong pa nyid la dmigs pa'i ye shes gang yin pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:143a-5: shes pa dang bcas pa la dmigs pa gang yin pa de ni /
T05TD4016.3E:143a-6: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:143a-7: theg pa chung ngu bas 'dod pa'i don ni mtshan nyid gong ma las bzlog pa las rig par bya'o zhes 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:143a-8: gzhan yang 'phags pa gsar 'od dam pa'i mdo las /
T05TD4016.3E:143a-9: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ni //
T05TD4016.3E:143a-10: rtsa ba dag tu gyur pas na //
T05TD4016.3E:143a-11: yon tan dpag tu med pa dag / rab tu brgyan par gyur pa yin //
T05TD4016.3E:143a-13: slob dpon yang dag bden pa'i brjed byang las //
T05TD4016.3E:143a-14: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ni //
T05TD4016.3E:143a-15: rtsa bdag tu gyur pas na //
T05TD4016.3E:143a-16: zhes bya ba ni sngar ye shes skye ba bstan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:143a-17: yon tan dpag tu med pa dag / rab tu brgyan par gyur pa yin //
T05TD4016.3E:143a-18: zhes bya ba ni yon tan skye bar bstan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:143a-19: de la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya ba ni stong pa nyid kyi shes rab yin la /
T05TD4016.3E:143a-20: stong pa nyid kyi shes rab kyis ni mkhyen pa bskyed pa'i phyir rnam pa zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:143a-21: thams cad ces bya ba ni mkhyen pa dang ldan pa yin la /
T05TD4016.3E:143a-22: mkhyen pa'i bye brag kyang mi mtshungs pa'i phyir thams cad ces gsungs so //
T05TD4016.3E:143a-23: theg pa chung ngu'i gzhung gis thams cad stong pa nyid du mkhyen pa zhes bshad de /
T05TD4016.3E:143a-24: de la stong pa ni thams cad ces bya ba'i rtsa ba yin la /
T05TD4016.3E:143a-25: thams cad ces bya ba ni stong pa'i yan lag yin te ;
T05TD4016.3E:143a-26: rtsa ba las mi thob pa yin pas stong pa la rnam pa thams cad ces bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:143a-27: mkhyen pa'i shes pa dang ldan pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:143a-28: shes pa dang ldan pa'i nang na rnam pa sna tshogs mi mtshungs pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:143a-29: 'dir mkhyen pa rnam pa gnyis bshad pa yang bstan pa rnams las so so nas bshad pa mi mthun pas be'u'i sde pa rnams ni gang zag gi chos thams cad shes par nus pa la /
T05TD4016.3E:143a-30: thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya'o zhes bshad de /
T05TD4016.3E:143a-31: de'i phyir mdzod kyi bstan bcos kyi nang nas /
T05TD4016.3E:143b-0: gal te logs shig tu gang zag gi bdag nyid yang dag par yod par rnam par ma @143b bzhag ; bcom ldan 'das ni thams cad mkhyen pa ma yin pa nyid du 'gyur te /
T05TD4016.3E:143b-1: sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos thams cad mkhyen pa yin no //
T05TD4016.3E:143b-2: skad cig gcig la tha dad par skye zhing 'jig pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:143b-3: thams cad yod par smra ba'i gzhung gis ni rgyun la brten nas thams cad mkhyen pa zhes 'dod kyi /
T05TD4016.3E:143b-4: bdag ni ma yin no zhes zer te /
T05TD4016.3E:143b-5: de'i phyir mdzod kyi bstan bcos las /
T05TD4016.3E:143b-6: nged kyi bcom ldan 'das thams cad gcig par mkhyen pa'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa zhes mi zer te zhes 'byung ba yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:143b-8: be'u'i sde bdag ni nged thams cad mkhyen pa zhes zer bar zad kyi /
T05TD4016.3E:143b-9: bdag gi shes so zhes mi smra ste /
T05TD4016.3E:143b-10: 'di ltar rgyud kyi dbang du byas nas spyod pa dang ldan pa'i phyir sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i mtshan brnyes pa yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:143b-11: phung po rnams kyi rgyud la nus pa khyad par du 'phags pa de lta bu yongs su grub pas thugs la dgongs pa tsam gyis mkhyen par mdzad pa'i dgongs pa'i yul dag la phyin ci log mi mnga' bar mkhyen pa skye ba'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya'i /
T05TD4016.3E:143b-12: skad cig ma gcig la cig car mkhyen pa ni ma yin pa'i phyir te /
T05TD4016.3E:143b-13: tshigs su bcad pa las ji skad du /
T05TD4016.3E:143b-14: dper na rgyun gyis nus pa'i phyir //
T05TD4016.3E:143b-15: me yis thams cad sreg 'dod ltar //
T05TD4016.3E:143b-16: de bzhin thams cad mkhyen 'dod kyi //
T05TD4016.3E:143b-17: gcig par thams cad mkhyen phyir min //
T05TD4016.3E:143b-19: de ltar rgyun gyi dbang du byas nas thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya'i /
T05TD4016.3E:143b-20: bdag gis kun shes pa ni ma yin par shes na 'di dang de dag gis brtags pa dang sbyar na bdag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la yang rung /
T05TD4016.3E:143b-21: dus gsum mnga' bar gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:143b-23: tshigs su bcad pa las ji skad du /
T05TD4016.3E:143b-24: 'das pa'i sangs rgyas gang yin dang //
T05TD4016.3E:143b-25: ma byon sangs rgyas gang yin dang //
T05TD4016.3E:143b-26: da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas gang //
T05TD4016.3E:143b-27: de dag sems can mya ngan sel ;
T05TD4016.3E:143b-29: khyod kyi gzhung gis ni phung po kho na la dus gsum yod par 'dod kyi /
T05TD4016.3E:143b-30: gang zag las ni ma yin pa'i phyir gdon mi za bar de ltar nges shes 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:144a-0: thams cad yod par smra ba de'i gzhung gis thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya ba de yang dag pa dang kun rdzob kyi ye @144a * //
T05TD4016.3E:144a-1: shes las ye shes gang gi dbang du byas nas bstan zhe na smras pa /
T05TD4016.3E:144a-2: yang dag pa dang kun rdzob la dmigs pa gnyi ga la brjod pa yin pa'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:144a-3: de lta ma yin na ni theg pa gnyis kyang thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:144a-5: gzhan yang mdzod kyi bstan bcos las //
T05TD4016.3E:144a-6: ye shes ni rnam pa bzhi ste /
T05TD4016.3E:144a-7: slob dpon med pa'i ye shes dang /
T05TD4016.3E:144a-9: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:144a-10: rtsol ba med pa'i ye shes so zhes 'byung ste /
T05TD4016.3E:144a-11: rnam par phye ste bshad pa med na 'di dag la bye brag ci yod ce na /
T05TD4016.3E:144a-12: kha cig na re thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya ba ni don dam pa la dmigs pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:144a-13: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya ba ni dngos po la dmigs pa'i mkhyen pa'o zhes zer ro //
T05TD4016.3E:144a-14: dge 'dun phal chen pa'i sde pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:144a-15: lan cig brjod pa'i sde pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:144a-16: bya ma la pa'i sde pa dag ni 'di skad du /
T05TD4016.3E:144a-17: skad cig ma'i sems gcig gis thams cad khong du chud par 'gyur ro //
T05TD4016.3E:144a-18: skad cig ma gcig gis sems dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i shes rab kyis chos thams cad shes so //
T05TD4016.3E:144a-19: zad pa dang mi skye ba'i ye shes rtag par rgyun du 'jug go zhes bshad de /
T05TD4016.3E:144a-20: sde pa tha dad pa'i gzhung lugs kyi bstan bcos las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:144a-21: 'dir theg pa chen po'i bstan pa dang sbyar na /
T05TD4016.3E:144a-22: yang so so nas bshad pa mi mthun pas bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis byas pa las /
T05TD4016.3E:144a-23: theg pa gnyis kyis thams cad mkhyen pa thob par lta bas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ma yin no zhes bshad de /
T05TD4016.3E:144a-24: de'i phyir 'grel pa de nyid las /
T05TD4016.3E:144a-25: lung gi tshul legs par mi rtog pa'i phyir te /
T05TD4016.3E:144a-26: tshigs su bcad pa las ji skad du /
T05TD4016.3E:144a-27: rgyun dag gis ni nus pa'i phyir //
T05TD4016.3E:144a-28: de ni thams cad zad par 'dod //
T05TD4016.3E:144a-29: cig car thams cad rig min pas //
T05TD4016.3E:144a-30: thams cad mkhyen pa de ltar 'dod //
T05TD4016.3E:144a-32: de lta bas na kun gzhi rnam par shes pa ma shes pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'thob par dka' ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:144a-33: sla bar 'gyur ro zhes de'i gzhung gis de ltar 'dod par shes so //
T05TD4016.3E:144a-34: chos thams cad bdag med pa'o zhes thugs su chud pa thams cad mkhyen pa ma yin nam zhe na /
T05TD4016.3E:144b-0: thams cad mkhyen @144b pa yin mod kyi /
T05TD4016.3E:144b-1: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ni ma yin no zhes 'byung ste /
T05TD4016.3E:144b-2: rgya cher de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no //
T05TD4016.3E:144b-3: bshad pa 'di dang sbyar na thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya ba ni mtshan nyid tha dad pa nyid du chos thams cad thugs su chud cing rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes kyang bsdus pa yin no zhes bshad kyang 'gal ba med do ;
T05TD4016.3E:144b-4: / gzhan yang bshad pa 'di dag dang sbyar na /
T05TD4016.3E:144b-5: de bzhin gshegs pas skad cig ma gcig la rang gi ngo bo nyid dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i chos la sogs pa thugs su chud par 'dod pa yang /
T05TD4016.3E:144b-6: phal cher dge 'dun phal chen pa'i sde pa dag dang mthun no //
T05TD4016.3E:144b-7: de la bye brag yod pa de'i gzhung gis cha bzhi'i don rnam par mi 'jog pas 'dir bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa las /
T05TD4016.3E:144b-8: lta ba'i rnam pa ma gtogs pa ni rgyu mtshan la dmigs pa ma yin no zhes bya ba la sogs pa bstan pa rnams kyang brjod par bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:144b-9: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las ni slob dpon gnyis kyis bshad pa 'byung ste /
T05TD4016.3E:144b-10: kha cig na re ye shes gnyis la bye brag med do zhes zer /
T05TD4016.3E:144b-11: kha cig na re bye brag yod do zhes zer /
T05TD4016.3E:144b-12: kha cig na re bye brag yod do zhes zer te /
T05TD4016.3E:144b-13: de'i phyir 'grel pa de nyid las thams cad mkhyen pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:144b-14: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa la bye brag ci yod ce na /
T05TD4016.3E:144b-16: kha cig na re bye brag med pas ;
T05TD4016.3E:144b-17: res 'ga' ni thams cad mkhyen pa zhes gsungs so //
T05TD4016.3E:144b-18: res 'ga' ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa zhes gsungs so zhe'o //
T05TD4016.3E:144b-19: kha cig na re spyi'i mtshan nyid du ni thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:144b-20: bye brag gi mtshan nyid du ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:144b-21: rgyu gang yin pa de ni thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:144b-22: 'bras bu gang yin pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:144b-23: mdor bstan pa gang yin pa de ni thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:144b-24: rgya cher ston pa gang yin pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:144b-25: de la thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya bas ni chos thams cad la kun du rmongs pa'i ma rig pa 'jig par byed do //
T05TD4016.3E:144b-26: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya bas ni chos rnam pa sna tshogs la so sor rtog pa'i ma rig pa 'jig par byed do zhes bya ba nas rgya cher bshad pa'i bar du'o //
T05TD4016.3E:144b-27: gzhan yang le'u phyi ma las /
T05TD4016.3E:145a-0: bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis thams cad @145a * //
T05TD4016.3E:145a-1: shes pa zhes bya ba ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi dngos po'o //
T05TD4016.3E:145a-2: lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid ni byang chub sems dpa'i dngos bo'o //
T05TD4016.3E:145a-3: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa ni sangs rgyas kyi dngos po'o //
T05TD4016.3E:145a-4: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas la ni thams cad mkhyen pa kho na yod kyi /
T05TD4016.3E:145a-5: rnam pa thams cad shes pa nyid ni med do //
T05TD4016.3E:145a-6: gzhan yang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas ni bye brag gi mtshan nyid la rnam par rtog pa'i spyod pa dang ldan yang /
T05TD4016.3E:145a-7: zad par shes par mi nus pas spyi'i mtshan nyid kyi ming thob pa yin no //
T05TD4016.3E:145a-8: sangs rgyas kyi thams cad mkhyen pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:145a-9: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni yang dag pa nyid yin la /
T05TD4016.3E:145a-10: theg pa gnyis kyis ni gdags pa'i ming can no //
T05TD4016.3E:145a-11: thams cad mkhyen pas mkhyen par mdzad pa'i chos gang yin zhe na /
T05TD4016.3E:145a-13: skye mched bcu gnyis so zhes 'byung ste /
T05TD4016.3E:145a-14: rgya cher de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no //
T05TD4016.3E:145a-15: gzhan yang de nyid las bcom ldan 'das kyis lam brnyes pa na /
T05TD4016.3E:145a-16: lam gyi mkhyen pas thams cad mkhyen pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:145a-17: rnam pa thams cad brnyes pa yin na /
T05TD4016.3E:145a-18: 'dir ci'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa dang ldan par bstan par bstan zhe na /
T05TD4016.3E:145a-20: bcom ldan 'das kyis lam brnyes pa na /
T05TD4016.3E:145a-21: 'di nas lam gyi mkhyen pas thams cad mkhyen pa dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid phun sum tshogs par brnyes pa yin yang /
T05TD4016.3E:145a-22: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni spyod par mi mdzad de /
T05TD4016.3E:145a-23: dper na rgyal po chen por dbang bskur ba thob na /
T05TD4016.3E:145a-24: rin po che'i bang mdzod la sogs pa la dbang thob pa yin yang /
T05TD4016.3E:145a-25: da dung ma phye ma spyad pa dang 'dra bar 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis nyon mongs pa'i bag chags spangs nas /
T05TD4016.3E:145a-26: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgrub pa nyid du bstan par bzhed pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:145a-27: sems gcig gis thams cad mkhyen pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:145a-28: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid brnyes nas nyon mongs pa'i bag chags spangs pa yin na /
T05TD4016.3E:145a-29: 'dir ci'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid brnyes nas nyon mongs pa'i bag chags spong bar bstan zhe na /
T05TD4016.3E:145a-30: dus gcig tu brnyes pa yin mod kyi 'dir gzhan dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mngon par yid shes par mdzad pa'i phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:145b-0: rim @145b gyis bye brag gi rnam pas bstan nas /
T05TD4016.3E:145b-1: sems can rnams yongs su dag pa'i sems 'thob par 'gyur ba'i phyir de skad du bstan to //
T05TD4016.3E:145b-2: gzhan yang sems gcig gis brnyes pa yin yang /
T05TD4016.3E:145b-5: tha ma'i go rims kyang yod pas /
T05TD4016.3E:145b-6: dper na sems gcig la mtshan nyid gnyis pa rgyu dang rkyen la gnas pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:145b-7: rgyu dang rkyen 'gag pa la gnas pa skye ba lta bu'o zhes 'byung ste /
T05TD4016.3E:145b-8: bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa las /
T05TD4016.3E:145b-9: bstan pa las phan tshun bzlog pa yin par rig par bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:145b-10: 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi sa'i 'grel pa las ni /
T05TD4016.3E:145b-11: me long lta bu'i ye shes kho na las brtsams nas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du ston te /
T05TD4016.3E:145b-12: dus thams cad du rtag par chos thams cad thugs su chud pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ste /
T05TD4016.3E:145b-13: zhib tu de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no //
T05TD4016.3E:145b-14: bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las ni /
T05TD4016.3E:145b-15: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bshad de /
T05TD4016.3E:145b-16: de'i phyir de nyid las khams thams cad dang /
T05TD4016.3E:145b-19: dus thams cad du mkhyen pa thogs pa med par 'jug pa gnag yin pa de ni thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:145b-20: de la khams ni gnyis te /
T05TD4016.3E:145b-21: 'jig rten gyi khams dang sems can gyi khams so //
T05TD4016.3E:145b-22: dngos po rnam pa gnyis te /
T05TD4016.3E:145b-25: 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas pa'i dngos po de nyid la yang /
T05TD4016.3E:145b-26: rang gi mtshan nyid kyi phyi ma phyi ma'i rnam pa rab tu dbye ba'i phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:145b-27: spyi'i mtshan nyid kyi rab tu dbye ba'i phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:145b-28: rgyu dang 'bras bu'i rab tu dbye ba'i phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:145b-32: lung du ma bstan pa la sogs pa'i rab tu dbye ba'i phyir rnam pa'i rab tu dbye ba tshad med do //
T05TD4016.3E:145b-33: de la dus ni rnam pa gsum ste /
T05TD4016.3E:145b-37: de ltar khams thams cad dang /
T05TD4016.3E:145b-40: dus thams cad mkhyen pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa'o zhes 'byung ste /
T05TD4016.3E:145b-41: 'phags pa legs pa'i tshul khrims bstan pa'i mdo dang /
T05TD4016.3E:145b-42: bstan bcos sa yongs su 'dzin pa las kyang de skad du bstan to //
T05TD4016.3E:145b-43: 'dir 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:146a-2: lung sna tshogs las ba glang skyong ba'i chos rnam pa bcu gcig gis thams cad mkhyen pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:146a-3: gzhan yang 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel ba las /
T05TD4016.3E:146a-4: phug ron shin tu yun ring po'i dus su sangs rgyas su 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes bstan pa la sogs pa'i bstan pa dag kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'grub pa yin pas khungs su brjod par bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:146a-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la bka' stsal pa /
T05TD4016.3E:146a-6: rigs kyi bu mdor bsdu na rnam pa lnga ste zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:146a-10: 'di ni dang po grangs mdor smos nas lan mdor gsungs pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:146a-11: gang su yang rung ba zhig byung na /
T05TD4016.3E:146a-12: 'jig rten du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sgra rnam par grags pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa go rims bzhin du rnam par bshad pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:146a-13: 'di yang mtshan nyid rnam pa lnga rnam par phye ste /
T05TD4016.3E:146a-14: bshad pa 'di nyid kyis rnam pa lngar dbye ste /
T05TD4016.3E:146a-15: 'di ni dang po kun du grags pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:146a-16: de'i phyir bstan bcos rnam par bshad pa las /
T05TD4016.3E:146a-17: sangs rgyas 'jig rten du byung nas thams cad mkhyen pa'i sgra yang dag pa nyid 'jig rten kun du khyab par gyur pa zhes bstan to //
T05TD4016.3E:146a-18: skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa skyes bu chen po gya nom pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:146a-19: bstan bcos bye brag tu bshad pa chen po las ji skad du /
T05TD4016.3E:146a-20: mtshan zhes bya ba'i don ci yin zhe na /
T05TD4016.3E:146a-22: rtags bstan pa'i don gang yin pa de ni mtshan gyi don to //
T05TD4016.3E:146a-23: khyad par du 'phags pa'i don gang yin pa de ni mtshan gyi don to //
T05TD4016.3E:146a-24: bkra shis kyi rtags kyi don gang yin pa de ni mtshan gyi don to //
T05TD4016.3E:146a-25: ci'i phyir skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kho na yin la /
T05TD4016.3E:146a-26: mi mang mi nyung zhe na /
T05TD4016.3E:146a-28: gal te mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis sangs rgyas kyi sku brgyan par gyur na ni 'jig rten na dpe zla med par 'gyur la /
T05TD4016.3E:146a-29: gal te de las nyung na ni ma tshang bar nyid du gyur pas so //
T05TD4016.3E:146b-0: de las mang na ni 'dres shing 'khrugs @146b pas khyad par du 'phags pa ma yin pa nyid du gyur pa'i phyir de ltar nges pa yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:146b-1: ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa la /
T05TD4016.3E:146b-2: lhag pa dang nyung ba med pa ltar sangs rgyas kyi mtshan yang de bzhin te /
T05TD4016.3E:146b-3: ma tshang ba ci yang med pas bskyed du med la /
T05TD4016.3E:146b-4: lhag pa ci yang med pas dbrir med pa'i phyir ro ;
T05TD4016.3E:146b-5: / byang chub sems dpas 'thob pa'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis gang yin pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:146b-6: 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal pos 'thob pa'i mtshan la bye brag tu gyur pa ci yod ce na /
T05TD4016.3E:146b-8: byang chub sems dpa' ni dngos po rnam pa bzhis khyad par 'phags pa yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:146b-13: gzhan yang dngos po rnam pa lngas khyad par du 'phags te /
T05TD4016.3E:146b-16: ri mo shin tu zab pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:146b-17: ye shes dam pa'i rjes su 'brang ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:146b-18: kun nas nyon mongs pa'i rjes su mi 'brang ba'o //
T05TD4016.3E:146b-19: ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpas mtshan gyis lus brgyan par byed ce na /
T05TD4016.3E:146b-20: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi gnas dang snod du bya ba'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:146b-22: yon tan khyad par du 'phags pa dag ni nges par lus khyad du 'phags pa la gnas pas de la ma 'ongs pa na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i don gyis byang chub sems dpa' la khyod kyis bdag lus la gnas par 'dod na sngar khyod kyi lus yongs su dag cing khyad par du 'phags pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:146b-23: mtshan dang dpe byad rnams kyis brgyan par bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:146b-24: gal te de lta ma yin na ni bdag ni khyed kyi lus la skye bar mi nus so zhes zer bas /
T05TD4016.3E:146b-25: dper na la la zhig bud med rin po che chung mar blangs nas khyim du bsdu bar 'dod pa la des gsang thabs su pho nya btang nas 'di skad du /
T05TD4016.3E:146b-26: khyod kyis bdag khyim du 'ongs par 'dod na sngar chag chag thob /
T05TD4016.3E:146b-28: mi gtsang ba dag bsal nas dar gyi lda ldi bres shing /
T05TD4016.3E:146b-29: spos kyis bdugs la me tog gtor cig / bkod pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis brgyan par gyis shig dang /
T05TD4016.3E:146b-31: de lta ma yin na ni bdag khyod kyi khyim du 'ong mi nus so zhes zer ba dang 'dra bas na /
T05TD4016.3E:147a-0: de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' lus brgyan par @147a * //
T05TD4016.3E:147a-2: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las kyang phal cher bye brag tu bshad pa chen po las 'byung ba dang mthun par bshad do //
T05TD4016.3E:147a-3: gzhan yang 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las /
T05TD4016.3E:147a-4: mtshan gyi dgongs pa ston te /
T05TD4016.3E:147a-5: de'i phyir 'grel pa de nyid las phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams dang /
T05TD4016.3E:147a-6: dus gsum gyi chos ni mtshan ma yod pa ma yin na /
T05TD4016.3E:147a-7: 'di ci'i phyir mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis bstan /
T05TD4016.3E:147a-8: mtshan gcig kyang yang dag par yod pa ma yin na /
T05TD4016.3E:147a-9: sum cu rtsa gnyis lta smos kyang ci dgos she na /
T05TD4016.3E:147a-11: sangs rgyas kyi chos la bden pa gnyis yod do //
T05TD4016.3E:147a-12: kun rdzob kyi bden pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:147a-14: kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i phyir ni mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis bstan to //
T05TD4016.3E:147a-15: don dam pa'i bden pa'i phyir ni mtshan med par bstan to //
T05TD4016.3E:147a-17: sems can bsod nams spel ba'i lam dang ;
T05TD4016.3E:147a-18: sems can shes rab sgom par byed pa'i lam mo //
T05TD4016.3E:147a-19: bsod nams kyi lam gyi phyir ni mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis bstan to //
T05TD4016.3E:147a-20: shes rab kyi lam gyi phyir ni mtshan med par bstan to //
T05TD4016.3E:147a-21: skye ba'i lus kyi phyir ni mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis bstan to //
T05TD4016.3E:147a-22: chos kyi sku'i phyir ni mtshan med par bstan te /
T05TD4016.3E:147a-23: 'di ltar skye ba'i lus gang yin pa de ni mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /
T05TD4016.3E:147a-24: dpe byad bzang pos bdag nyid brgyan pa yin la /
T05TD4016.3E:147a-25: chos kyi sku ni stobs bcu dang /
T05TD4016.3E:147a-27: so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /
T05TD4016.3E:147a-28: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la sogs pas bdag nyid brgyan pas so //
T05TD4016.3E:147a-29: sems can rnams la rgyu dang rkyen rnam pa gnyis yod de /
T05TD4016.3E:147a-30: bsod nams kyi rgyu dang rkyen dang /
T05TD4016.3E:147a-31: shes rab kyi rgyu dang rkyen no //
T05TD4016.3E:147a-32: bsod nams kyi rgyu dang rkyen can gyi sems can rab tu 'dren par bzhed pa'i phyir ni mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa'i sku spyod par mdzad do //
T05TD4016.3E:147a-33: shes rab kyi rgyu dang rkyen can gyi sems can rab tu 'dren pa'i phyir /
T05TD4016.3E:147a-34: chos kyi sku spyod par mdzad do //
T05TD4016.3E:147a-35: sems can ni rnam pa gnyis te /
T05TD4016.3E:147a-36: chos rnams la btags pa tsam gyi ming can dang /
T05TD4016.3E:147a-37: ming la mngon par zhen pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:147a-38: ming la mngon par zhen pa'i sems can gyi phyir ni mtshan med par bstan to //
T05TD4016.3E:147b-0: chos rnams la btags pa tsam du shes pa'i @147b sems can gyi phyir mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis bstan to //
T05TD4016.3E:147b-1: gzhan yang sems can thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa yin par rab tu bstan pa'i phyir mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis bstan nas /
T05TD4016.3E:147b-2: mtshan med pa'i chos 'jig par mi mdzad do zhes 'byung ste /
T05TD4016.3E:147b-3: mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis rgya cher rnam par bshad pa ni /
T05TD4016.3E:147b-4: mtshan nyid bstan pa dag las 'byung ba bzhin du rig par bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:147b-5: stobs bcu dang ldan pa sems can thams cad kyi the tshom thams cad gcod pa zhes bya ba ni gsum pa stobs bcu dang ldan pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:147b-6: mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang ldan zhing chos yang dag par ston pa phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis brgal du med cing /
T05TD4016.3E:147b-7: log par smra ba thams cad tshar gcod pa zhes bya ba ni gzhi'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:147b-8: mdo 'di nyid las mdor bsdus nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rnam pa bzhi bcu rtsa drug bstan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:147b-9: bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las ni ;
T05TD4016.3E:147b-10: de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan brgya bzhi bcu ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:147b-11: bla na med pa'i gnas pa'i mdo las ni yon tan rnam pa brgya brgyad cu ston te /
T05TD4016.3E:147b-12: zhib tu mtshan nyid bstan pa dag las 'byung ba bzhin du rig par bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:147b-13: legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad dang ;
T05TD4016.3E:147b-14: dge sbyong bzhi snang ba yin te zhes bya ba ni lnga pa lam dang 'bras bu snang ba'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:147b-15: 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten du byung nas chos legs par gsungs pa'i phyir 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad dang /
T05TD4016.3E:147b-16: des mngon du byas pa'i dge sbyong gi 'bras bu bzhi dang /
T05TD4016.3E:147b-17: 'phags ba nyi shu rtsa bdun la sogs pa 'bras bu sna tshogs snang bar 'gyur ba yin la /
T05TD4016.3E:147b-18: gal te sangs rgyas byung bar ma gyur na /
T05TD4016.3E:147b-19: thams cad mi snang bas de'i phyir 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las mi ni bsod nams dang shes rab dang ldan mod kyi /
T05TD4016.3E:147b-20: gal te sangs rgyas 'jig rten du ma byung na rnam par smin pa myong ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:147b-21: lam 'thob par mi 'gyur la gal te sangs rgyas 'jig rten du byung bar gyur na ni /
T05TD4016.3E:147b-23: dper na mi'i mig dang ldan yang /
T05TD4016.3E:147b-24: nyi ma ma shar na ci yang mthong bar mi 'gyur gyi /
T05TD4016.3E:148a-0: nyi ma shar nas gdod mthong bar 'gyur bas bdag la @148a * //
T05TD4016.3E:148a-1: mig yod pas nyi ma ci dgos zhes bya bar mi rung ba bzhin no //
T05TD4016.3E:148a-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad du /
T05TD4016.3E:148a-3: phyi nang gi rgyu dang rkyen gyis yang dag pa'i lta ba skyed de /
T05TD4016.3E:148a-4: gzhan las chos thos pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:148a-5: bdag nyid nang du tshul bzhin yid la byed pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:148a-6: bsod nams kyi dngos po bskyed pa'i phyir dang ;
T05TD4016.3E:148a-7: dge ba'i sems kyi dngos po dang /
T05TD4016.3E:148a-8: shes rab bskyed pa'i phyir tshul bzhin yid la byed pas /
T05TD4016.3E:148a-9: de'i phyir sangs rgyas las thos pa yin no zhes 'byung ste /
T05TD4016.3E:148a-10: zhib tu de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no //
T05TD4016.3E:148a-11: dge sbyong gi 'bras bu bzhi ni mtshan nyid bstan pa dag las 'byung ba bzhin no //
T05TD4016.3E:148a-12: de ltar skye ba'i phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:148a-13: mtshan dang ldan pa'i phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:148a-14: the tshom gyi dra ba gcod pa'i phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:148a-15: gzhan dag gis brgal du med cing gzhan dag zil gyis gnon pa'i phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:148a-17: dge sbyong dmigs pa'i phyir dang zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gsum pa mtshan nyid lnga bshad pa'i mjug bsdu ba'o //
T05TD4016.3E:148a-19: mtshan nyid rnam pa lnga rnam par phye nas bstan pas mjug bsdu ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:148a-20: mtshan nyid lnga po spyi'i mjug bsdu ba'o //
T05TD4016.3E:148a-22: go rims bzhin du mtshan nyid lnga po dag dang sbyar bar bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:148a-23: de ltar skye ba zhes bya ba ni gang su yang rung ba zhig byung na 'jig rten du zhes gsungs pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:148a-24: bstan bcos rnam par bshad pa las ni de ltar 'byung ba'i phyir zhes 'byung ste /
T05TD4016.3E:148a-25: gzhan ni mdo 'di las gsungs pa dang mthun no //
T05TD4016.3E:148a-26: de ltar rnam pa lnga po dag gis thams cad mkhyen pa'i mtshan nyid rig par bya'o zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa mtshan nyid lnga bshad pa'i spyi'i mjug bsdu ba'o //
T05TD4016.3E:148a-27: rigs kyi bu de lta na 'thad pas sgrub pa'i rigs pa ni mngon sum gyi tshad ma'i phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:148a-28: rjes su dpag pa'i tshad ma'i phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:148a-29: 'phags pa'i lung gi tshad ma'i phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:148a-30: mtshan nyid lnga po dag gis yongs su dag pa yin no zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa tshad ma gsum las brtsams nas mtshan nyid snga ma lnga po dag yongs su dag pa'i mtshan nyid du bstan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:148a-31: 'di ltar bstan pa'i 'thad pas sgrub pa'i rigs pa las mtshan nyid lngar bstan pa de yang tshad ma gsum gyis bsdus pa yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:148a-32: mtshan nyid dang po gcig ni mngon sum gyi tshad mas bsdus so //
T05TD4016.3E:148b-0: mtshan nyid bar ma gsum ni rjes su dpag @148b pa'i tshad mas bsdus so //
T05TD4016.3E:148b-1: mtshan nyid phyi ma gcig ni 'phags pa'i lung gi tshad mas bsdus so zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T05TD4016.3E:148b-2: bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:148b-3: mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las kyang /
T05TD4016.3E:148b-4: mdo las gsungs pa dang mthun par 'byung ba'o //
T05TD4016.3E:148b-5: bstan bcos rnam par bshad pa las ni /
T05TD4016.3E:148b-6: mtshan nyid snga ma lnga po dag so sor sbyar bar bshad de /
T05TD4016.3E:148b-7: de'i phyir bstan bcos de nyid las /
T05TD4016.3E:148b-8: de ltar na 'thad pas sgrub pa'i rigs pa ni /
T05TD4016.3E:148b-9: mngon sum gyi tshad ma'i phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:148b-10: rjes su dpag pa'i tshad ma'i phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:148b-12: yongs su grags pa'i phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:148b-13: lung gi tshad ma'i phyir mtshan nyid lnga po dag yongs su dag pa'o zhes 'byung ste /
T05TD4016.3E:148b-14: dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las kyang de skad du ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:148b-15: de la mtshan nyid rnam pa bdun gyis yongs su dag par mi 'gyur ba gang zhe na zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa mtshan nyid yongs su ma dag pa bdun rnam par phye ste bshad pa bstan to //
T05TD4016.3E:148b-16: 'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:148b-17: lan du gsungs pas bstan te /
T05TD4016.3E:148b-18: 'di ni zhu ba gsol ba nyid do //
T05TD4016.3E:148b-19: de las gzhan pa mthun par dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid dang /
T05TD4016.3E:148b-20: de las gzhan pa dang mi mthun par dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid dang /
T05TD4016.3E:148b-21: thams cad mthun par dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid dang /
T05TD4016.3E:148b-22: thams cad mi mthun par dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid dang /
T05TD4016.3E:148b-23: gzhan gyi rigs kyi dpe nye bar bsgrub pa'i mtshan nyid dang /
T05TD4016.3E:148b-24: yongs su grags pa ma yin pa'i mtshan nyid dang /
T05TD4016.3E:148b-25: shin tu rnam par dag pa ma yin pa'i lung gi mtshan nyid do zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:148b-27: rnam par bshad pas bstan te /
T05TD4016.3E:148b-29: mtshan nyid bdun po 'di dag skyon dang bcas pa'i phyir yongs su ma dag pa zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:148b-30: bstan bcos yang dag pa'i rigs pa la 'jug pa las /
T05TD4016.3E:148b-31: skyon dang bcas pa'i rgyu rnams ni mdor bsdu na rnam pa bcu bzhi yod pas rgyu 'dra ba zhes bshad de /
T05TD4016.3E:148b-33: yongs su ma grags pa ni rnam pa gnyis yod pas 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:148b-34: gang yang rung ba cig yongs su grags pa la sogs pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:148b-35: ma nges pa ni rnam pa drug yod de /
T05TD4016.3E:149a-1: thun mong dang thun mong ma yin pa la sogs pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:149a-2: phan tshun 'gal ba ni rnam pa bzhi yod do //
T05TD4016.3E:149a-4: chos rnams kyi rang gi mtshan nyid phan tshun 'gal ba'i rgyu la sogs pa'o zhes 'byung ste /
T05TD4016.3E:149a-5: zhib tu de nyid las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:149a-6: 'dir bstan pa'i mtshan nyid bdun las /
T05TD4016.3E:149a-7: mtshan nyid snga ma bzhi ni bstan bcos gtan tshigs kyi rigs pa las bstan pa'i ma nges pa drug las /
T05TD4016.3E:149a-8: snga ma lnga po dag yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:149a-9: drug pa phan tshun 'gal bar nges pa nyid ces bya ba ma rtogs pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:149a-10: 'di ni sngar bstan bcos yang dag pa'i rigs pa la 'jug pa las bstan pa'i ma nges pa'i mtshan nyid drug bkod nas /
T05TD4016.3E:149a-11: de'i 'og tu bstan bcos de dang /
T05TD4016.3E:149a-12: mdo'i tshig 'di dang sbyar bar bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:149a-13: bstan bcos yang dag pa'i rigs pa la 'jug pa las /
T05TD4016.3E:149a-14: ma nges pa ni drug ste /
T05TD4016.3E:149a-16: thun mong ma yin pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:149a-17: phyogs mtshungs pa cha gcig 'jug la /
T05TD4016.3E:149a-18: phyogs tha dad pa kun 'jug pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:149a-19: phyogs tha dad pa cha gcig 'jug la /
T05TD4016.3E:149a-20: phyogs mtshungs pa kun 'jug pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:149a-21: gnyi ga'i phyogs kyi cha gcig tu 'jug pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:149a-23: de la thun mong ba ni dper na sgra ni rtag pa yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:149a-24: gzhal bar bya ba'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ba lta bu ni rtag pa dang mi rtag pa'i phyogs kun kyang gtan tshigs 'di thun mong du gyur pas de'i phyir ma nges pa yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:149a-25: bum pa la sogs pa ltar gzhal bar bya ba'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir sgra ni mi rtag pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:149a-26: dper na nam mkha' la sogs pa lta bur gzhal bar bya ba'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir sgra ni rtag pa yin no ;
T05TD4016.3E:149a-27: / de la thun mong ma yin pa ni dper na sgra ni rtag pa yin te thos par bya ba'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ba lta bu ni rtag pa dang mi rtag pa'i phyogs kyi gtan tshigs 'di spangs nas rtag pa dang mi rtag pa las gud na yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir som nyi'i rgyu yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:149a-28: thos par bya ba'i ngo bo nyid ci 'dra ba zhig ces bya ba la sogs pa lta bu'o //
T05TD4016.3E:149a-29: de la phyogs mtshungs pa cha gcig 'jug la /
T05TD4016.3E:149a-30: phyogs tha dad pa kun 'jug pa ni dper na sgra ni rtsol ba ma yin pa'o zhes zer ba lta bu ste /
T05TD4016.3E:149a-31: bar chad med pas bskyed pa'i mi rtag pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:149b-0: bar chad med pas bskyed pa ma yin par dam @149b bca' ba ni 'di ltar glog dang /
T05TD4016.3E:149b-1: nam mkha' la sogs pa ni phyogs mtshungs pa yin pas mi rtag pa nyid de glog la sogs pa la ni yod la /
T05TD4016.3E:149b-2: nam mkha' la sogs pa la med pa lta bu'o //
T05TD4016.3E:149b-3: rtsol ba ma yin pa bar chad med pas bskyed par dam bca' ba ni /
T05TD4016.3E:149b-4: 'di ltar bum pa la sogs pa gang yin pa de ni phyogs tha dad pa yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:149b-5: de la gtan tshigs 'di tshang bar yod pas glog dang bum pa ni chos mtshungs pa yin pa'i phyir ma nges pa'ang yin no //
T05TD4016.3E:149b-6: bum pa la sogs pa ltar mi rtag pa nyid yin pa'i phyir de rtsol ba dang bar chad med pas bskyed pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:149b-7: glog la sogs pa lta bur mi rtag pa nyid yin pa'i phyir de rtsol ba ma yin pa bar chad med pas bskyed pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:149b-8: de la phyogs tha dad pa'i cha gcig la 'jug la /
T05TD4016.3E:149b-9: phyogs mtshungs pa kun 'jug pa ni /
T05TD4016.3E:149b-10: dper na sgra ni rtsol ba dang bcas pa bar chad med pas skyed pa'o zhes dam bca' ba lta bu ste /
T05TD4016.3E:149b-11: mi rtag pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:149b-12: rtsol ba dang bcas pa bar chad med pas bskyed par dam bca' ba ni 'di ltar bum pa la sogs pa ni phyogs mtshungs pa yin pas mi rtag pa nyid de 'di dag la tshang bar yod pas so //
T05TD4016.3E:149b-13: glog dang nam mkha' la sogs pa ni phyogs tha dad ma yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:149b-14: de'i phyogs gcig glog ni yod pa yin la /
T05TD4016.3E:149b-15: nam mkha' la sogs pa ni med pas de'i phyir snga ma bzhin du ma nges pa yin no //
T05TD4016.3E:149b-16: de la gnyis ka'i phyogs kyi cha gcig 'jug pa ni sgra rtag ces zer ba lta bu ste /
T05TD4016.3E:149b-17: gzugs dang thogs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:149b-18: de la rtag par dam bca' ba ni nam mkha' lta bu'o //
T05TD4016.3E:149b-19: rdul phra mo la sogs pa ni phyogs mtshungs pa yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:149b-20: thogs pa med pa'i phyir nam mkha' la sogs pa la ni yod la /
T05TD4016.3E:149b-21: rdul phra mo la sogs pa ni med pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:149b-22: bum pa dang bde ba la sogs pa ni phyogs tha dad pa yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:149b-23: bde ba la sogs pa ni yod la /
T05TD4016.3E:149b-24: bum pa la sogs pa ni med pas de'i phyir gtan tshigs 'di ni bde ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:149b-25: nam mkha' chos mtshungs pa mad pa'i phyir ma nges pa zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:149b-26: de la phan tshun 'gal bar nges pa ni dper na sgra ni mi rtag pa'o zhes dam bca' ba lta bu ste /
T05TD4016.3E:149b-27: byas pa'i rang bzhin gyi phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:149b-28: dper na bum pa la sogs pa la rtag pa'i sgrar rnam par gzhag pa lta bu ste /
T05TD4016.3E:149b-29: thos par bya ba'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:150a-0: dper na sgra'i ngo bo nyid lta bu ste 'di gnyi ga yang yid @150a * //
T05TD4016.3E:150a-1: gnyis za ba'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir gnyi ga ma nges pa zhes bya'o zhes 'byung ste /
T05TD4016.3E:150a-2: de yan chad du bstan bcos yang dag pa'i rigs pa las 'jug pa las 'byung ba'i don bshad de /
T05TD4016.3E:150a-3: gzhan ni mangs pas 'dir ma brjod do //
T05TD4016.3E:150a-4: de la bstan bcos de las byung ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:150a-5: mdo 'di'i tshig sbyar bar bya ba yang 'di la bshad pa gnyis yod de /
T05TD4016.3E:150a-6: kha cig na re 'di las gsungs pa'i gnyis kyis ni bstan bcos las 'byung ba gsum po dag bsdus te /
T05TD4016.3E:150a-7: 'di ltar de las gzhan pa dang mthun par dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid kyis ni bstan bcos las 'byung ba'i gsum pa phyogs mtshungs pa cha gcig 'jug la /
T05TD4016.3E:150a-8: phyogs tha dad pa la kun 'jug pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:150a-9: lnga pa gnyi ga'i phyogs kyi cha gcig gis 'jug pa las phyogs mtshungs pa cha gcig 'jug pa bsdus so //
T05TD4016.3E:150a-10: de las gzhan pa dang mi mthun par dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid kyis ni bstan bcos las 'byung ba'i bzhi pa tha dad pa cha gcig 'jug la /
T05TD4016.3E:150a-11: phyogs mtshungs pa kun 'jug pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:150a-12: lnga pa gnyi ga'i phyogs kyi cha gcig 'jug pa las phyogs tha dad pa cha gcig 'jug pa gsungs so //
T05TD4016.3E:150a-13: thams cad mthun par dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid kyis /
T05TD4016.3E:150a-14: bstan bcos las byung ba dang po thun mong gi ma nges pa gsungs so //
T05TD4016.3E:150a-15: thams cad mi mthun par dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid kyis ni bstan bcos las 'byung ba'i gnyis pa thun mong ma yin pa'i ma nges pa bsdus so zhe'o //
T05TD4016.3E:150a-16: bshad pa 'di dang sbyar na gzhan gyi rigs kyi dpes nye bar bsgrub pa dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid la bshad pa rnam pa gnyis yod de ;
T05TD4016.3E:150a-17: kha cig na re mi mtshungs pa'i dpe kho na yod par zad kyi /
T05TD4016.3E:150a-18: mtshungs pa'i dpe ni med kyi /
T05TD4016.3E:150a-19: dper na sgra ni rtag pa nyid du bsgrubs na byas pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ba lta bu'o zhe'o //
T05TD4016.3E:150a-20: kha cig na re 'di ni dpe la skyon rnam pa bcu yod pa nyid do zhe'o //
T05TD4016.3E:150a-21: yongs su grags pa ma yin pa'i mtshan nyid gong du skyon rnam par gzhag pa nyid kyis dam bca' ba'i don yongs su ma grub pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:150a-22: shin tu rnam par dag pa ma yin pa'i lung gi mtshan nyid ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:150a-23: 'phags pa ma yin pa'i lung gis mngon par bsgrubs pa gang yin pa'o zhe'o //
T05TD4016.3E:150b-0: kha cig na re mdo las gsungs pa'i mtshan nyid rnam pa lnga @150b las ;
T05TD4016.3E:150b-1: dang po ni bstan bcos las 'byung ba'i gsum pa phyogs mtshungs pa gcig 'jug la phyogs tha dad pa kun 'jug pa bsdus so //
T05TD4016.3E:150b-2: mdo las gsungs pa'i mtshan nyid gnyis pas ni bstan bcos las 'byung ba'i bzhi pa phyogs tha dad pa cha gcig 'jug la /
T05TD4016.3E:150b-3: phyogs mtshungs pa kun 'jug pa bsdus pas so //
T05TD4016.3E:150b-4: mdo las gsungs pa'i mtshan nyid gsum pas ni bstan bcos las 'byung ba'i dang po thun mong ba'i nges pa bsdus so //
T05TD4016.3E:150b-5: mdo las gsungs pa'i mtshan nyid bzhi pas ni bstan bcos las 'byung ba gnyis pa thun mong ma yin pa'i ma nges pas gsungs so //
T05TD4016.3E:150b-6: mdo las gsungs pa'i mtshan nyid lnga pas ni /
T05TD4016.3E:150b-7: bstan bcos las 'byung ba'i lnga pa gnyi ga'i phyogs kyi cha gcig 'jug pa bsdus so zhes zer te /
T05TD4016.3E:150b-8: slob dpon 'di'i bshad pa ni 'di ltar gzhan gyi rigs kyi dpe'i chos la rgyu'i chos kyi cha cung zad cig dmigs pas tshang bar bya na /
T05TD4016.3E:150b-9: 'di skad du mtshungs pa dang tha dad pa'i dpe'i chos la so so nas /
T05TD4016.3E:150b-10: rgyu'i chos cha gcig dmigs so zhes brjod pa'i rigs pa las /
T05TD4016.3E:150b-11: mdo 'di las mdor bsdu bar dgongs pa'i phyir gzhan gyi rigs kyi dpes nye bar bsgrub pa dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid 'ba' zhig bstan to//
T05TD4016.3E:150b-12: mtshan nyid gzhan gnyis ni sngar bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:150b-13: de las gzhan pa dang mthun par dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid ces bya ba la /
T05TD4016.3E:150b-14: de zhes bya ba ni gzhung de'o //
T05TD4016.3E:150b-15: gzhan pa zhes bya ba ni rigs mtshungs pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:150b-16: 'di ltar gzhung de dang rigs mtshungs pa'i chos las gtan tshigs kyi chos kyi cha cung zad dmigs pas tshig tshang bar bstan na /
T05TD4016.3E:150b-17: 'di skad du phyogs mtshungs pa cha gcig 'jug pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:150b-18: phyogs tha dad pa kun 'jug pa zhes brjod pa'i rigs pa las /
T05TD4016.3E:150b-19: mdo las mdor bsdu bar dgos pa'i phyir phyogs mtshungs pa cha gcig 'jug pa 'ba' zhig bstan to //
T05TD4016.3E:150b-20: de las gzhan pa dang mi mthun par dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid ces bya ba la de zhes bya ba de ni gzhung de'o //
T05TD4016.3E:150b-21: gzhan zhes bya ba ni rigs mtshungs pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:150b-22: 'di ltar gzhung de dang rigs mtshungs pa'i chos las gtan tshigs kyi chos kyi cha cung zad cig dmigs pas tshig tshang bar bstan na 'di skad du /
T05TD4016.3E:151a-1: tha dad pa cha gcig 'jug pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:151a-2: phyogs mtshungs pa kun 'jug pa zhes brjod pa'i rigs pa las /
T05TD4016.3E:151a-4: phyogs tha dad pa'i cha gcig 'jug pa zhes bya ba 'ba' zhig bstan to //
T05TD4016.3E:151a-5: mtshan nyid ni snga ma bzhin du rig par bya'o /
T05TD4016.3E:151a-8: // / bam po bdun cu gsum pa /
T05TD4016.3E:151a-9: de la chos thams cad yid kyi rnam par shes pas shes par bya ba nyid gang yin pa de ni thams cad mthun par dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid ces bya'o zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa mtshan nyid gong ma bdun po dag rnam par bshad de /
T05TD4016.3E:151a-10: 'di yang bshad pa so so nas mi mthun pa ;
T05TD4016.3E:151a-11: kha cig na re 'di yang rnam pa bzhi ste /
T05TD4016.3E:151a-12: gsum pa thams cad mthun par dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:151a-13: chos thams cad rtag ces bya ba man chad kyis bzhi pa thams cad mi mthun par dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:151a-14: rigs kyi bu zhes bya ba man chad kyis mtshan nyid dang po dang gnyis pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:151a-15: drug pa yongs su 'dres pa ma yin pa'i mtshan nyid spyir bstan pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:151a-16: yang de las gzhan pa zhes bya ba man chad kyis lnga pa gzhan gyi rigs kyi dper nye bar bsgrub pa'i mtshan nyid dang /
T05TD4016.3E:151a-17: bdun pa shin tu rnam par dag pa ma yin pa'i lung gi mtshan nyid bstan pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:151a-18: 'di ni dang po thams cad mthun par dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:151a-19: de la chos thams cad ces bya ba ni dam bcas pa'i chos las gzhan pa dpe chos thams cad do //
T05TD4016.3E:151a-20: tshad ma'i don ni 'di skad du re zhig dper na sgra ni rtag pa yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:151a-21: yid kyi rnam par shes pas shes par bya ba nyid yin pa'i phyir nam mkha' la sogs pa bzhin no zhes dam bca' ba lta bu ste /
T05TD4016.3E:151a-22: rtag pa dang mi rtag pa'i phyogs gnyi ga yang rgyu 'di thun mong du gyur pas de'i phyir ma nges pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:151a-23: bum pa la sogs pa bzhin du shes par bya ba'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir sgra ni mi rtag pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:151a-24: nam mkha' la sogs pa bzhin du shes par bya ba'i ngo bo nyid yin pa'i phyir sgra ni rtag pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:151a-25: dam bcas pa'i tshogs las gzhan pa rnams ni rgyu'i phyogs mtshungs pa yin pa'i phyir de thams cad mthun par dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid ces bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:151a-26: 'di ni bstan bcos yang dag pa'i rigs pa la 'jug pa las /
T05TD4016.3E:151b-0: thun mong ba'i ma nges @151b pa zhes bstan pa nyid do //
T05TD4016.3E:151b-1: bstan bcos las gzhal bar bya ba zhes 'byung ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:151b-2: 'dir mdo las shes par bya zhes gsungs pa tshig mi mthun yang don ni gcig go //
