T05TD4016.3E:151b-3: chos thams cad rtags dang ngo bo nyid dang /
T05TD4016.3E:151b-4: las dang chos dang rgyu dang 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid mi mthun pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid mi mthun pa gang yang rung bas nges par phan tshun so so nas mtshan nyid mi mthun pa gang yin pa de ni thams cad mi mthun par dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid ces bya'o zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa mtshan nyid bzhi pa thams cad mi mthun par dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid rnam par phye ste bshad pa ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:151b-5: mdo'i tshig 'di yang khong du chud par dka' bas sngar rtags dang ngo bo nyid la sogs par rnam par phye nas /
T05TD4016.3E:151b-6: de'i 'og tu don nyid bstan par bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:151b-7: mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni /
T05TD4016.3E:151b-13: 'bras bur rnam par smin pa zhes 'byung ngo//
T05TD4016.3E:151b-14: dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni /
T05TD4016.3E:151b-20: rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid ces bya ba nas rgya cher bshad pa'i bar du 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:151b-21: bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las kyang /
T05TD4016.3E:151b-22: mtshan nyid rnam pa lngar bsdus nas bstan to //
T05TD4016.3E:151b-23: de'i phyir de nyid las rjes su dpag pa ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:151b-24: mngon par brtags pa dang bcas pas mngon par brtags pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:151b-25: mngon par brtag par bya ba'i yul lo //
T05TD4016.3E:151b-26: de yang rnam pa lngar blta bar bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:151b-33: rtags las rjes su dpag pa ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:151b-35: sngar mthong ba'i mngon mtshan dang /
T05TD4016.3E:151b-36: mtshan ma 'ga' zhig gis 'grel pa las yul mngon par brtags pa gang yin pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:151b-37: dper na ru mtshon las shing rta rjes su dpag pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:151b-40: khyim thab las bud med dang /
T05TD4016.3E:151b-41: nog dang rva las zhes bya ba nas rgya cher bshad pa'i bar du'o //
T05TD4016.3E:151b-42: ngo bo nyid las rjes su dpag pa ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:151b-43: mngon sum gyi ngo bo nyid kyi lkog na 'dug pa'i ngo bo nyid brtag pa'am /
T05TD4016.3E:152a-1: gcig las phyogs gcig brtag pa gang yin pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:152a-2: dper na da lta las 'das pa rjes su dpag pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:152a-4: da ltar byung ba nye ba las thag ring ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:152a-5: da ltar byung ba las ma 'ongs pa rjes su dpag pa zhes bya ba nas rgya cher bshad pa'i bar du'o //
T05TD4016.3E:152a-6: las rjes su dpag pa ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:152a-7: byed pas las kyi rten brtag pa gang yin pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:152a-9: bya tshang gnas pa la sogs pa las /
T05TD4016.3E:152a-10: sdong dum du rjes su dpag pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:152a-12: yan lag bskyod pa la sogs pa las mi rjes su dpag pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:152a-13: rkang lag gi rjes las glang po che dang /
T05TD4016.3E:152a-14: lus kyis 'gro ba'i rjes las sprul dang /
T05TD4016.3E:152a-15: skad tse re re zer ba las rta dang /
T05TD4016.3E:152a-16: nga ro sgrogs pa las seng ge dang /
T05TD4016.3E:152a-17: 'bu'u zhes zer ba las khyu ba zhes bya ba nas rgya cher bshad pa'i bar du'o //
T05TD4016.3E:152a-18: chos las rjes su dpag pa 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:152a-20: 'brel ba las de dang 'brel ba'i chos nyid rtag pa gang yin pa de /
T05TD4016.3E:152a-21: dper na mi rtag pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:152a-22: 'brel pa las sdug bsngal rjes su dpag pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:152a-23: sdug bsngal dang 'brel pa las stong pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:152a-26: 'brel pa las dga' ba'i chos nyid ces bya ba nas rgya cher bshad pa'i bar du'o //
T05TD4016.3E:152a-27: rgyu dang 'bras bu las rjes su dpag pa ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:152a-29: 'bras bu las rgyu rjes su dpag pa gang yin pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:152a-30: dper na 'gro ba las yul gzhan du phyin pa rjes su dpag pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:152a-31: yul gzhan du phyin pa las 'gro ba rjes su dpag pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:152a-32: rgyal po mnyes par byas pa las bya dga' chen po thob pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:152a-33: bya dga' chen po thob pa las rgyal po mnyes par bya ba rjes su dpag pa nas /
T05TD4016.3E:152a-34: lam las dge sbyong gi 'bras bu dang /
T05TD4016.3E:152a-35: dge sbyong gi 'bras bu las lam rjes su dpag pa'i bar du ste /
T05TD4016.3E:152a-36: rgya cher de nyid las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:152a-37: bstan bcos rnam par bshad pa las kyang de skad du ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:152a-38: de las de'i 'og tu don nyid bstan pa yang chos thams cad brtags pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:152a-40: las la sogs pa gcig la gcig ltos nas phan tshun mi 'dra bas thams cad mi mthun pa zhes bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:152b-0: de la re zhig dper na sgra la yod pa'i @152b thos pa'i ngo bo nyid la sogs pa gang yin pa de ni sgra kho na la yod kyi /
T05TD4016.3E:152b-1: chos la yod pa ma yin pas de'i phyir 'di la rgyu zhes byar mi rung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:152b-2: thos par bya ba'i sgra de ni dam bcas pa'i chos kho na la yod kyi dper mtshungs pa ni med do //
T05TD4016.3E:152b-3: rgyu'i rnam pa tha dad pa yod kyi /
T05TD4016.3E:152b-4: thos par rjes su bya ba'i mtshan nyid kyi ma yin pas de'i phyir thams cad mi mthun par dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid ces bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:152b-5: 'di ni bstan bcos yang dag pa'i rigs pa la 'jug pa las thun mong ma yin pa'i nges pa zhes bstan pa nyid de /
T05TD4016.3E:152b-6: de'i phyir yang dag pa'i rigs pa la 'jug pa las thun mong ma yin pa zhes bya ba ni dper na sgra ni rtag pa yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:152b-7: thos par bya ba'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir ro zhes zer ba lta bu'o //
T05TD4016.3E:152b-8: rtag pa dang mi rtag pa'i phyogs ni rgyu 'di dang bral ba yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:152b-9: rtag pa dang mi rtag pa las gud na gzhan yong pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:152b-10: rigs kyi bu de la de las gzhan pa dang mthun pas dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid dpe dang bcas pa la thams cad mi mthun par dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid yod pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni gsum pa mtshan nyid dang gnyis pa dang drug pa yongs su gregs pa ma yin pa'i mtshan nyid du bsdus te rnam par bshad pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:152b-11: bstan bcos las gnyis ka'i phyogs kyi cha gcig dang /
T05TD4016.3E:152b-12: 'jug pa zhes bstan pa bsdu ba ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:152b-14: mtshan nyid rnam pa gsum gcig tu bsdus te bstan pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:152b-15: yongs su ma gregs pa'i phyir zhes bya ba man chad kyis bsten par mi bya bar bskul ba'o //
T05TD4016.3E:152b-16: dang po yang rnam pa gnyis te /
T05TD4016.3E:152b-18: yongs su gregs pa ma yin pa'i mtshan nyid rnam par bshad pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:152b-20: yongs su gregs pa ma yin pa'i mtshan nyid rnam par bshad pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:152b-21: dang po yang rnam pa gnyis te /
T05TD4016.3E:152b-22: mtshan nyid dang po rnam par bshad pa dang yongs su gregs pa ma yin pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:152b-23: 'di ni mtshan nyid dang po las gzhan pa dang mthun par dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid rnam par bshad pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:152b-24: de las gzhan pa dang mthun par dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid 'di yang tshig tshang bar bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:153a-2: phyogs tha dad pa'i phyir 'dir de las gzhan pa dang mthun par dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid ces bya ba ni phyogs mtshungs pa'i cha gcig 'jug pa'i don to //
T05TD4016.3E:153a-3: de la dpe dang bcas pa las thams cad mi mthun par dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid yod pa zhes bya ba ni phyogs tha dad pa kun 'jug pa'i don to zhes brjod par bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:153a-4: don de'i phyir mdo'i tshig 'dis bstan bcos yang dag pa'i rigs pa la 'jug pa las phyogs mtshungs pa'i cha gcig 'jug pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:153a-5: phyogs tha dad pa kun 'jug pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:153a-6: gnyi ga'i phyogs kyi cha gcig 'jug pa las phyogs mtshungs pa'i cha gcig 'jug pa'i don bsdus pa yin no //
T05TD4016.3E:153a-7: de bzhin du 'og ma de las gzhan pa dang mi mthun par dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid rnam par bshad pa yang gong ma las bzlog pa las rig par bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:153a-8: rgyu dang rkyen des na de grub par bya ba la gcig tu nges pa ma yin pa'i phyir de'i yongs su gregs pa ma yin pa'i mtshan nyid ces bya'o zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa yongs su gregs pa ma yin pa'i mtshan nyid rnam par bshad pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:153a-9: 'di ltar de las gzhan pa dang mthun par dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid kyi gang yin pa de nyid yongs su gregs pa ma yin pa'i mtshan nyid de /
T05TD4016.3E:153a-10: nges par dam bcas pa'i don bsgrub par mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:153a-11: yang de las gzhan pa dang mi mthun par dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid dpe dang bcas pa las yang thams cad mthun par dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid yod pas zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa mtshan nyid de las gzhan pa dang ni mthun par dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid dang /
T05TD4016.3E:153a-12: yongs su gregs pa ma yin pa'i mtshan nyid rnam par bshad pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:153a-13: 'di ni de las gzhan pa dang mi mthun par dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid rnam par bshad pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:153a-14: 'di yang tshig tshang bar byas te brjod nas 'di skad du phyogs tha dad pa cha gcig 'jug pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:153a-15: phyogs mtshungs pa kun 'jug pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:153a-16: gnyi ga'i phyogs kyi cha gcig 'jug pa'i don bsdus pa yin no zhes brjod par bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:153a-17: gong ma bzhin du rig par bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:153b-0: rgyu dang rkyen des na de grub par bya ba la gcig tu @153b ma nges pa'i phyir yongs su gregs pa'i mtshan nyid ces bya'o zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa yongs su gregs pa'i mtshan nyid rnam par bshad pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:153b-1: gong ma bzhin du rig par bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:153b-2: yongs su ma gregs pa'i phyir legs par so sor brtags pa'i rigs pa ma yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:153b-3: yongs su ma dag pa'i phyir brten par mi bya'o zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa mi brten par bskul ba'o //
T05TD4016.3E:153b-4: gong du bstan pa'i rigs pa dang sbyar na thams cad mthun par dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid dang /
T05TD4016.3E:153b-5: thams cad mi mthun par dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid kyang yongs su gregs pa ma yin na ci'i phyir mdo las de skad du ma gsungs she na /
T05TD4016.3E:153b-7: nges pa'i rigs pa las ma bstan pa ni mdor bsdus pa'i phyir ma gsungs so //
T05TD4016.3E:153b-8: gzhan yang mdo'i tshig 'dis snga ma lnga po dag tshang bar bsdus nas yongs su gregs pa yin pa nyid du rab tu bsten te /
T05TD4016.3E:153b-9: de las gzhan pa dang mthun par dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid bzhi pa bstan to //
T05TD4016.3E:153b-10: dpe dang bcas pas zhes bya ba mtshan nyid lnga pa bstan to //
T05TD4016.3E:153b-11: thams cad mi mthun par dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid yod pa zhes bya bas ni mtshan nyid bzhi pa bstan to //
T05TD4016.3E:153b-12: yang de las gzhan pa dang mi mthun par dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid ces bya bas ni mtshan nyid gnyis pa bstan to //
T05TD4016.3E:153b-13: dpe dang bcas pa zhes bya bas ni mtshan nyid lnga pa yang bzlas te bstan to //
T05TD4016.3E:153b-14: thams cad mthun par dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid yod pa zhes bya bas ni mtshan nyid gsum pa bstan te /
T05TD4016.3E:153b-15: rigs pa des na snga ma lnga po dag las brtsams nas yongs su gregs pa ma yin pa nyid du rab tu bstan pa yin no //
T05TD4016.3E:153b-16: de ltar bshad na ni sngar yongs su dag pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'i skabs nas mngon sum du dmigs pa la sogs pa gsum po dag gis yongs su gregs pa nyid du bstan pa dag dang yang rjes su mthun par 'gyur ro //
T05TD4016.3E:153b-17: gzhan gyi rigs kyi dpes nye bar bsgrub pa gang yin pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:153b-18: shin tu rnam par dag pa ma yin pa'i lung gi mtshan nyid de ni rang bzhin nyid kyis yongs su dag pa ma yin par rig par bya'o zhes bya ba 'di ni bzhi pa mtshan nyid lnga pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:153b-19: bdun pa gcig tu bsdus te rnam par bshad pa ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:154a-0: de la gzhan gyi rigs kyi dpes nye bar @154a * //
T05TD4016.3E:154a-1: bsgrub pa'i mtshan nyid ces bya ba ni mi mthun pa'i rgyu yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:154a-2: dper na sgra ni rtag pa yin te zhes dam bcas pa dag gis byas pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ba lta bu ste /
T05TD4016.3E:154a-3: de la nam mkha' la sogs pa ni cha mtshungs pa yin la /
T05TD4016.3E:154a-4: bum pa la sogs pa ni cha mi mtshungs pa yin pas gtan tshigs 'di ni cha mi mtshungs pa kho na la yod pas de'i phyir gzhan gyi rigs kyi dpes nye bar bsgrub pa'i mtshan nyid ces bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:154a-5: yang dpe'i skyon rnam pa bcu dang ldan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:154a-6: de la shin tu rnam par dag pa ma yin pa'i lung gi mtshan nyid ces bya ba ni phyi rol ba'i log par bstan pa rnams so //
T05TD4016.3E:154a-7: yang na dam bcas pa dang gtan tshigs dang /
T05TD4016.3E:154a-8: dpe skyon dang bcas pa rnams so //
T05TD4016.3E:154a-9: kha cig na re bzhi po 'di dag ni phal cher sngar bshad pa dag dang mthun te /
T05TD4016.3E:154a-10: de la bye brag yod pa yang /
T05TD4016.3E:154a-11: mtshan nyid bzhi pas ni gnyi ga'i phyogs kyi cha gcig 'jug pa zhes bya ba ma bsdus so //
T05TD4016.3E:154a-12: mtshan nyid bzhi pa las gzhan gyi rigs kyi dpes nye bar bsgrub pa'i mtshan nyid ces bya ba nyid ni gnyi ga'i phyogs kyi cha gcig 'jug pa zhes bya ba yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:154a-13: gzhan ni sngar bstan pa bzhin no zhe'o //
T05TD4016.3E:154a-14: kha cig na re bzhi po 'di dag ni snga ma'i bshad pa dang 'dra ste /
T05TD4016.3E:154a-15: de la bye brag yod pa gzhan gyi rigs kyis nye bar bsgrub pa'i mtshan nyid ni gsum pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:154a-16: bzhi par rtogs pa yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:154a-17: gzhan ni snga ma bzhin no zhe'o //
T05TD4016.3E:154a-18: de ltar rnam pa gsum du bshad pa yod kyang /
T05TD4016.3E:154a-19: bstan bcos rnam par bshad pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:154a-20: mdo'i dpe rnam pa gnyis las bstan pa dag dang sbyar na gzhan gyi rigs kyi dpes nye bar bsgrub pa'i mtshan nyid ni gsum pa dang bzhi pa las gzhan gyi rigs kyis dpe zhes bya ba'i tshig spyir med do //
T05TD4016.3E:154a-21: bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:154a-22: rnam par bshad pa las ming bkod pa ni mthun la ;
T05TD4016.3E:154a-23: bshad pa ni cung zad tha dad de /
T05TD4016.3E:154a-24: de'i phyir bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las /
T05TD4016.3E:154a-30: 'bras bu la sogs pa'i mthun pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:154b-0: mi mthun pa'i mtshan nyid gang yang rung ba'i cha gcig phan tshun @154b mthun pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:154b-1: mi mthun pa'i mtshan nyid gang yin pa de ni de las gzhan pa dang mthun pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:154b-2: mi mthun par dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid ces bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:154b-3: nges par phan tshun so so tha dad pa'i mtshan nyid gang yin pa de ni thams cad mi mthun par dmigs pa'i mtshan nyid ces bya'o zhes bshad de ;
T05TD4016.3E:154b-4: bstan bcos rnam par bshad pa las kyang de skad du ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:154b-5: de las gzhan pa'i mtshan nyid rnams ni mdo 'di las gsungs pa dang mthun par 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:154b-6: bshad pa 'di dang sbyar na rtags dang ngo bo nyid la sogs pa lnga po dag ni mthun pa dang mi mthun pa'i mtshan nyid dang gcig tha dad pa'i mtshan nyid du yang rtogs so //
T05TD4016.3E:154b-7: de la chos nyid kyi rigs pa ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:154b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga 'jig rten du byung yang rung /
T05TD4016.3E:154b-9: 'jig rten du ma byung yang rung ste /
T05TD4016.3E:154b-10: chos nyid gnas pa dang chos kyi dbyings gnas pa gang yin pa de ni chos nyid kyi rigs pa zhes bya'o zhes bya ba ni bzhi pa chos nyid kyi rigs pa rnam par phye ste bshad pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:154b-11: bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i don las brtsams nas mdo'i tshig gsum po chos nyid gnas pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:154b-12: chos gnas pa dang chos kyi dbyings kyi don ston te /
T05TD4016.3E:154b-13: de'i phyir bstan bcos de nyid las bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad du /
T05TD4016.3E:154b-14: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba ni ngas byas pa'ang ma yin /
T05TD4016.3E:154b-15: gzhan dag gis byas pa yang ma yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:154b-16: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'jig rten du byung yang rung /
T05TD4016.3E:154b-17: 'jig rten du ma byung yang rung ste /
T05TD4016.3E:154b-20: chos kyi dbyings 'di ni gnas pa nyid do zhes gang gsungs pa la chos nyid ni gang /
T05TD4016.3E:154b-22: chos kyi dbyings ni gang zhe na /
T05TD4016.3E:154b-23: thog ma med pa'i dus nas grags pa gang yin pa de ni chos nyid ces bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:154b-24: ji ltar grags pa de rigs pa'i tshig dang /
T05TD4016.3E:154b-25: yi ge rnams kyi rnam par gzhag pa de ni chos gnas pa zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:154b-26: gnas pa de'i rgyu chos nyid de yin pas na de'i phyir dbyings zhes bya'o zhes 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:154b-27: gzhan yang bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa'i nang nas nyan thos kyi sa la sogs pa'i chos nyid kyi rigs pa ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:155a-1: rnams de lta bur gyur pa yin /
T05TD4016.3E:155a-2: 'jig rten gnas pa de lta bur gyur pa yin /
T05TD4016.3E:155a-3: ci'i phyir sa'i mtshan nyid sra ba yin /
T05TD4016.3E:155a-4: chu'i mtshan nyid gsher ba yin /
T05TD4016.3E:155a-5: me'i mtshan nyid tsha ba yin /
T05TD4016.3E:155a-6: rlung gi mtshan nyid g-yo ba yin /
T05TD4016.3E:155a-7: ci'i phyir phung po rnams mi rtag pa yin /
T05TD4016.3E:155a-8: ci'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa zhi ba yin /
T05TD4016.3E:155a-9: de bzhin du ci'i phyir gzugs kyi mtshan nyid gzugs su rung ba yin /
T05TD4016.3E:155a-10: tshor ba'i mtshan nyid myong ba yin /
T05TD4016.3E:155a-11: 'du shes kyi mtshan nyid kun du shes pa yin /
T05TD4016.3E:155a-12: 'du byed rnams kyi mtshan nyid mngon par 'du byed pa yin /
T05TD4016.3E:155a-13: rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid rnam par shes par byed pa yin zhe na /
T05TD4016.3E:155a-14: de ni chos nyid yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:155a-15: chos de dag gi rang bzhin de yin zhing /
T05TD4016.3E:155a-16: de dag gi ngo bo nyid lta bu yin pas chos nyid de gang kho na yin pa de nyid 'dir rigs pa zhes bya'o zhes 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:155a-17: gzhan yang bstan bcos chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las chos la brtson pa chos rnam par dpyad pa ni rigs pa du zhig gis rnam par dpyod ce na /
T05TD4016.3E:155a-19: rigs pa rnam pa bzhis dpyad de /
T05TD4016.3E:155a-22: bya ba byed pa'i rigs pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:155a-23: gtan tshigs sgrub pa'i rigs pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:155a-25: de la ltos pa'i rigs pa ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:155a-26: gang 'du 'du byed rnams skye ba rkyen la ltos pa gang yin pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:155a-27: dper na myu gu 'byung ba na sa bon dang /
T05TD4016.3E:155a-30: zhing rnams la ltos pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:155a-31: rnam par shes pa skye ba na dbang po dang don dang yid la byed pa zhes bya ba'i rkyen la sogs pa la ltos pa lta bu'o //
T05TD4016.3E:155a-32: bya ba byed pa'i rigs pa ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:155a-33: gang zag gi mtshan nyid tha dad pa'i chos rnams so so rang gi bya ba byed pa gang yin pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:155a-34: dper na mig gi dbang po la sogs pas ni mig gi rnam par shes pa la sogs pa'i gnas kyi dngos po'o //
T05TD4016.3E:155a-35: mig gi rnam par shes pa la sogs pa ni gzugs la sogs pa so so rnam par rig par byed pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:155a-36: gser mgar la sogs ba la bzo rnams ni gser la sogs pa'i las byed ces bya ba la sogs pa lta bu'o //
T05TD4016.3E:155a-37: gtan tshigs sgrub pa'i rigs pa ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:155b-0: gang bsgrub pa'i don tshad @155b dang mi 'gal bar ston pa gang yin pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:155b-1: gang bsgrub pa'i don ngo bo nyid dang /
T05TD4016.3E:155b-2: khyad par gyis bsdus pa mngon sum la sogs pa'i tshad ma dang mi 'gal bar dam bcas pa la sogs pa bstan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:155b-3: chos nyid kyi rigs pa ni 'di lta ste thog ma med pa'i dus na /
T05TD4016.3E:155b-4: rang dang spyi'i mtshan nyid gnas pa'i chos rnams la chos nyid du grags pa gang yin pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:155b-5: dper na mes ni tshig par byed do //
T05TD4016.3E:155b-6: chus ni 'gul bar byed ces bya ba la sogs par grags pa'i chos rnams kyi chos nyid de /
T05TD4016.3E:155b-8: mig ni yongs su dag pa yin yang /
T05TD4016.3E:155b-9: rtag pa med pa nas bdag med pa'i bar gyis stong ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:155b-11: 'di'i rang bzhin ni chos nyid kyis de yin pas so zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o zhes 'byung ste /
T05TD4016.3E:155b-12: rgya cher rnam par 'byed pa ni bstan bcos chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:155b-15: rnam par bshad pa las bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:155b-16: de la spyi dang bye brag lnga ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:155b-17: sngar mdor bstan nas tshig gis bstan pa'i chos phyi ma phyi ma'i tshig gi bye brag tu rnam par phye nas mthar thug par ston pa gang yin pa'o zhes bya bas ni brgyad pa spyi dang bye brag gi mtshan nyid ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:155b-18: bstan bcos rnam par bshad pa las ni bsdus pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:155b-20: de'i phyir bstan bcos de nyid las bsdus ba dang rgyas pa ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:155b-21: sngar chos tshig gcig bstan pa'i tshig phyi ma phyi ma'i dpag tu med pa dag gis phan tshun rnam par phye nas mthar thug pa gang yin pa'o zhes 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:155b-22: gzhan yang bstan bcos chos mngon pa sna tshogs kun las btus pa las spyi dang bye brag gi sgo ni sngar tshig gcig mdor bstan nas tshig phyi ma gzhan gyis rnam par phye ste bshad pa'o zhes 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:155b-23: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las /
T05TD4016.3E:155b-24: de la spyi'i mtshan nyid ni mi rtag ces bya ba la sogs pa lta bu'o //
T05TD4016.3E:155b-25: bye brag gi mtshan nyid ni chos rnams mi rtag pa yin yang so so'i bye brag gi mtshan nyid ni tha dad de /
T05TD4016.3E:155b-26: sa'i mtshan nyid ni sra ba'o //
T05TD4016.3E:155b-27: chu'i mtshan nyid ni gsher ba'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa lta bu'o //
T05TD4016.3E:156a-1: rang gi ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:156a-2: ngas rnam pa dang bcas pa dmigs pa dang bcas pa byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i chos len par byed pa 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:156a-3: dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la sogs pa bstan pa gang yin pa de ni de dag gi rang gi ngo bo'i mtshan nyid ces bya'o zhes bya ba ni ma mo bstan pa la mtshan nyid ni rnam pa bcu gcig tu phye ba las mtshan nyid bzhi pa'i sgo nas bstan nas /
T05TD4016.3E:156a-4: 'di ni mtshan nyid lnga pa rang gi ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid ces bya ba ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:156a-5: 'di ltar gong du bstan pa'i byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la sogs pa de dag gi bdag nyid ni 'dzin par byed pa yin pas /
T05TD4016.3E:156a-6: yul la dmigs pa'i rnam pa dang bcas pa dmigs pa'i bdag nyid dang bcas pa dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la sogs pa byang chub kyi phyogs sum cu rtsa bdun len par byed pa'i rang gi ngo bo nyid do //
T05TD4016.3E:156a-7: de la de'i 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:156a-8: 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams spong ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:156a-9: 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i 'bras bu dang /
T05TD4016.3E:156a-10: yon tan mngon par bsgrub pa gang yin pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:156a-11: de ni de'i 'bras bu thob pa'i mtshan nyid ces bya'o zhes bya ba ni drug pa de'i 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid rnam par bshad pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:156a-12: 'di ltar 'jig rten pa'i lam gyis nyon mongs pa rnams zil gyis gnon pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:156a-13: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam gyis nyon mongs pa rnams gtan du spangs pa thob pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:156a-14: de dag gis mngon par bsgrub pa 'dus byas kyi yon tan gang yin pa de ni 'bras bu'i mtshan nyid do zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T05TD4016.3E:156a-15: de myong ba rnam par bsnyad pa'i mtshan nyid ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:156a-16: de nyid las rnam par grol ba'i shes pas so sor yang dag par myong ba gzhan dag la rgya cher sgrogs pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:156a-18: yang dag par ston pa de ni myong ba rnam par bsnyad pa'i mtshan nyid ces bya'o zhes bya ba ni bdun pa de myong ba rnam par bsnyad pa'i mtshan nyid rnam par bshad pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:156b-0: 'di ltar byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i chos des nyon mongs pa spangs pa'i shes pas 'dus byas dang 'dus @156b ma byas kyi yon tan myong ba gang yin pa de dge ba gzhan dag ston par byed pas so //
T05TD4016.3E:156b-1: de'i bar du gcod pa'i chos kyi mtshan nyid ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:156b-2: byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i chos bsgom pa las bar chad byed pa kun nas nyon mongs pa'i chos gang yin pa de ni de'i bar du gcod pa'i chos kyi mtshan nyid ces bya'o zhes bya ba ni brgyad pa de'i bar du gcod pa'i chos kyi mtshan nyid rnam par bshad pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:156b-3: bdag dang chos su 'dzin pa nyid dang /
T05TD4016.3E:156b-4: sgrib pa gnyis po dag go //
T05TD4016.3E:156b-5: de dang rjes su mthun pa'i chos kyi mtshan nyid ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:156b-6: de dag nyid la gces spras byed pa'i chos gang dag yin pa de ni de dang rjes su mthun pa'i chos kyi mtshan nyid ces bya'o zhes bya ba ni dgu pa de dang rjes su mthun pa'i chos kyi mtshan nyid rnam par bshad pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:156b-7: rnam par grol ba'i phyogs kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba la sogs pas byang chub kyi phyogs sum cu rtsa bdun gyi bya ba byed pa gang yin pa de dag ni de dang rjes su mthun pa'i chos zhes bya'o zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T05TD4016.3E:156b-8: de'i nyes dmigs kyi mtshan nyid ni bar du gcod pa'i chos de dag nyid la yod pa'i skyon rnams gang yin pa de ni de'i nyes dmigs kyi mtshan nyid yin par rig par bya'o zhes bya ba ni bcu pa bar du gcod pa'i chos rnams kyi nyes dmigs kyi mtshan nyid rnam par bshad pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:156b-9: 'gro ba dang skye ba la sogs pa mngon par 'grub pa'i nyon mongs pa zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid la sgrib par byed pa gang yin pa dag go //
T05TD4016.3E:156b-10: de'i phan yon gyi mtshan nyid ni rjes su mthun pa'i chos de dag nyid la yod pa'i yon tan gang yin pa de ni de'i phan yon gyi mtshan nyid yin par rig par bya'o zhes bya ba ni bcu gcig pa phan yon gyi mtshan nyid rnam par bshad pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:156b-11: bstan bcos rnam par bshad pa las ni /
T05TD4016.3E:156b-12: bsngags pa brjod pa'i mtshan nyid ces 'byung ste /
T05TD4016.3E:156b-13: 'di ltar rjes su mthun pa'i chos la yon tan ji snyed yod pa gang yin pa de ni bsngags pa brjod pa'i mtshan nyid ces bya'o zhes bshad do //
T05TD4016.3E:156b-14: byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
T05TD4016.3E:157a-0: bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams la mdo sde dang 'dul ba dang ma mo dag 'di las slar phyi @157a * //
T05TD4016.3E:157a-1: rol pa rnams dang thun mong ma lags pa gzungs kyi don mdor bsdus te bshad du gsol zhes bya ba ni gong du bzhi pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:157a-2: snod gsum rgya cher rnam par bshad pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:157a-3: thun mong ma yin pa'i gzungs kyi don rnam par bshad pa'o zhes gnyis su phye ba las /
T05TD4016.3E:157a-4: de yan chod du sde snod gsum rgya cher rnam par bshad zin te /
T05TD4016.3E:157a-5: 'di man chad ni gnyis pa thun mong ma yin pa'i gzungs kyi don rnam par bshad pa ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:157a-6: 'di yang bshad par gsol ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:157a-7: yang dag par bshad pas bstan par bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:157a-8: bshad par gsol ba yang rnam pa gnyis te /
T05TD4016.3E:157a-9: yang dag par bshad par gsol ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:157a-10: bshad par gsol ba btab pa'i dgongs pa bstan pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:157a-11: 'di ni dang po yang dag par bshad par gsol ba btab pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:157a-12: de la gzungs zhes bya ba ni dran pa dang shes rab kyi ngo bo nyid do //
T05TD4016.3E:157a-13: de bshad par gsol ba'i gong du bcom ldan 'das kyis sde snod gsum rgya cher bshad pas 'dir de bzhin gshegs pas sde snod gsum mdor bsdus te bshad du gsol /
T05TD4016.3E:157a-14: des byang chub sems dpa' rnams zab mo ldem por dgongs te gsungs pa rnams brjed par mi 'gyur zhing /
T05TD4016.3E:157a-15: gnas ngan len gyi lus spangs nas 'dus ma byas 'thob par 'gyur bar dgongs pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:157a-16: mu stegs can log par bstan pa'i gzungs dang thun mong du ma gyur pa'i phyir thun mong ma yin pa'i gzungs kyi don ces bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:157a-17: bshad pa'i rnam pa gzhan du na gang zag dang chos gnyis kyis stong pa'i tshul gyis gang zag dang chos gnyis stong pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:157a-18: shes pa skye ba gang yin pa de ni thun mong ma yin pa'i gzungs kyi don yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:157a-19: de khong du chud pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i chos zab mo ldem por dgongs pa'i rjes su 'jug par 'gyur ba'o //
T05TD4016.3E:157a-20: bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las ni ;
T05TD4016.3E:157a-21: don rnam pa gsum gyi phyir 'di las phyi rol pa rnams dang thun mong ma yin pa'o zhes bshad de /
T05TD4016.3E:157a-22: de'i phyir de nyid las gzhan yang legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba ni mdor bsdus na ma 'dres pa'i yan lag gsum gyi phyir 'di las phyi rol pa rnams dang /
T05TD4016.3E:157b-0: thun @157b mong ma yin par bstan te /
T05TD4016.3E:157b-1: legs par gsungs pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su yang 'gro'o //
T05TD4016.3E:157b-2: de la yan lag gsum ni yongs su grub pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:157b-3: mthar thug pa las rnam par grol bar bstan pa'i phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:157b-4: de nyid kyi thabs bstan pa'i phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:157b-5: de nyid kyi nang gi so so rang gi rig pa bstan pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ste /
T05TD4016.3E:157b-6: rgya cher de nyid las bstan pa bzhin nos //
T05TD4016.3E:157b-7: thun mong ma lags pa'i gzungs kyi don des byang chub sems dpa' rnams de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i chos zab mo rnams kyi ldem por dgongs pa'i rjes su 'jug pa 'thob par 'gyur lags so zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa bshad par gsol ba'i dgongs pa bstan pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:157b-8: 'dir mdor gsungs pa'i dbang gis de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i chos zab mo byed pa med pa la sogs pa'i ldem por dgongs pa la 'jug par 'gyur ba'o //
T05TD4016.3E:157b-9: bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la bka' stsal pa /
T05TD4016.3E:157b-10: rigs kyi bu khyed legs par nyon cig dang /
T05TD4016.3E:157b-11: ngas khyod la thun mong ma yin pa'i gzungs kyi don mdor bsdus te /
T05TD4016.3E:157b-12: bshad pas zhes bya ba 'di man chad bshad /
T05TD4016.3E:157b-13: gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa'o//
T05TD4016.3E:157b-15: mnyan par bskul zhing bka' bshad par snang ba bstan pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:157b-16: rigs kyi bu zhes bya ba man chad zhus pa bzhin du yang dag par bshad pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:157b-17: dang po yang rnam pa gnyis te /
T05TD4016.3E:157b-18: bshad par gnang ba bstan pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:157b-19: bkas bshad pa'i phan yon bstan pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:157b-21: byang chub sems dpa' rnams ngas bshad pa'i ldem po dag la legs par 'jug par 'gyur ba'o zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa bkas bshad pa'i phan yon bstan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:157b-22: rigs kyi bu kun nas nyon mongs pa'i chos gang yin pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:157b-23: rnam par byang ba'i chos gang yin pa de dag ni ngas thams cad byed pa med pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:157b-24: gang zag ci yang med par bstan te /
T05TD4016.3E:157b-25: rnam pa thams cad du byed pa dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:157b-26: kun nas nyon mongs pa'i chos kyang kun nas nyon mongs pa can du 'gyur la /
T05TD4016.3E:157b-27: phyis rnam par byang bar 'gyur pa ma yin /
T05TD4016.3E:158a-0: rnam par byang ba'i chos kyang phyis rnam par byang @158a * //
T05TD4016.3E:158a-2: sngon kun nas nyon mongs pa can du 'gyur pa ma yin na zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa zhus pa bzhin du yang dag par bshad pa ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:158a-4: tshig rkyang pas bstan pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:158a-5: tshigs su bcad pas bzlas te bstan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:158a-6: dang po yang rnam pa gnyis te /
T05TD4016.3E:158a-7: rnam par bshad pa dang mjug bsdu ba'o //
T05TD4016.3E:158a-8: rnam par bshad pa yang rnam pa gsum ste /
T05TD4016.3E:158a-9: yang dag pa'i don nyid bstan pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:158a-10: byis pa so so'i skye bo zhes bya ba yan chad kyis kun tu rmongs pas 'dzin pa'i nyes dmigs bstan pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:158a-11: gang la la zhes bya ba man chad kyis khong du chud pa'i phan yon bstan te /
T05TD4016.3E:158a-12: 'di ni dang po yang dag pa'i don nyid bstan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:158a-13: mdo'i tshig 'di la yang bshad pa rnam pa gnyis te /
T05TD4016.3E:158a-14: kha cig na re kun nas nyon mongs pa'i chos gang yin pa zhes bya ba nas /
T05TD4016.3E:158a-15: gang zag ci yang med ces bya ba'i bar gyis ni sems can gyis stong pa'i don bstan te /
T05TD4016.3E:158a-16: 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis ngas ni kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:158a-17: rnam par byad ba'i chos thams cad la so so tha dad pa'i byed pa ci yang med par bstan te /
T05TD4016.3E:158a-18: ji ltar gzugs la sogs pa mthong ba bzhin du gang zag la ni bdag ci yang med do zhes gsungs pas so //
T05TD4016.3E:158a-19: yang na byed pa med pa zhes bya ba ni mchog tu smra ba zhes bya ba'i gzhung gis chos las gud na med pa dgag pa lta bu ste /
T05TD4016.3E:158a-20: de lta bu la sogs pa'i don gang yin pa de ni sems can gyi stong pa'i don to //
T05TD4016.3E:158a-21: de la rnam pa thams cad du byed pa dang bral ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni chos stong pa'i don bstan te ;
T05TD4016.3E:158a-22: 'di ltar chos thams cad ni gzung ba dang 'dzin pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:158a-23: spros pa sna tshogs kyi byed pa dang bral ba'i phyir kun nas nyon mongs pa'i chos kyang sngon kun nas nyon mongs pa can du gyur la /
T05TD4016.3E:158a-24: phyis rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba ma yin /
T05TD4016.3E:158a-25: rnam par byang ba'i chos kyang phyir rnam par byang la /
T05TD4016.3E:158a-26: sngon kun nas nyon mongs pa can du gyur pa ma yin no //
T05TD4016.3E:158a-28: kun nas brtags pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:158a-29: rnam par byang ba'i chos rnams ni sems kyi rjes su yod pa ni yin la /
T05TD4016.3E:158b-0: don dam par ni yod pa ma yin pas de'i phyir sngon kun nas nyon mongs pa can du gyur @158b la ;
T05TD4016.3E:158b-1: phyis rnam par byang bar 'gyur zhes bya ba la sogs pa yin no //
T05TD4016.3E:158b-2: mdo'i tshig 'di las ni brtags pa'i ngo bo nyid ces bya ba'i tshig bstan pa med na /
T05TD4016.3E:158b-3: ji ltar kun nas brtags pa'i ngo bo nyid kho na yin par shes she na /
T05TD4016.3E:158b-5: gong du spyi'i mtshan nyid stong pa nyid du bstan pa dang sbyar na /
T05TD4016.3E:158b-6: kun brtags pa kho na bstsal pa yin gyi /
T05TD4016.3E:158b-7: ngo bo nyid gnyis ni ma yin pas /
T05TD4016.3E:158b-8: de'i phyir mdo 'di las kun brtags pa'i ngo bo nyid bstsal bar shes so //
T05TD4016.3E:158b-9: yang na rnam pa thams cad du byed pa dang bral ba'i phyir gong du bstan pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:158b-10: rnam par byang ba'i chos rnams kyang bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pa la sogs pa'i spros pa'i byed pa dang bral ba'i phyir ro zhe'o //
T05TD4016.3E:158b-11: kha cig na re de kun nas nyon mongs pa'i chos gang yin pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:158b-12: rnam par byang ba'i chos gang yin pa zhes bya ba ni kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:158b-13: rnam par byang ba'i chos rnams spyir smos pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:158b-14: ngas thams cad byed par bstan te zhes bya ba ni chos bdag med par rab tu bstan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:158b-15: gang zag ci yang med par bstan zhes bya ba ni gang zag la bdag med par bstan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:158b-16: rnam pa thams cad du byed pa dang bral ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni bdag med pa gnyis cig car bstan te /
T05TD4016.3E:158b-17: 'di ltar kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:158b-18: rnam par byang ba'i chos rnams gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i byed pa dang bral ba'i phyir sngon kun nas nyon mongs pa can du gyur pa las phyis rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba med pa yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:158b-19: de'i phyir bstan bcos dbus dang mtha' rnam par 'byed pa las /
T05TD4016.3E:158b-20: sems can dang chos gnyi ga yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:158b-21: rnam par byang ba'i ngo bo nyid de gnyi ga yang yod pa ma yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:158b-22: 'di ltar kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:158b-23: rnam par byang ba'i don gnyi ga dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro zhes bshad do //
T05TD4016.3E:158b-24: de las kun nas nyon mongs pa ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:158b-25: sdug bsngal ba dang kun 'byung ba'o //
T05TD4016.3E:158b-26: rnam par byang ba ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:158b-28: yang na kun nas nyon mongs pa'i kun nas brtags pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:158b-29: kun nas nyon mongs pa'i phyogs kyi gzhan gyi dbang ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:159a-0: @159a * // rnam par byang ba'i phyogs kyi gzhan gyi dbang dang yongs su grub pa nyid do //
T05TD4016.3E:159a-1: yang na kun nas nyon mongs pa ni nyon mongs pa dang las dang skye ba'i kun nas nyon mongs pa rnam pa gsum mo rnam par byang ba ni 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rnam par byang ba rnam pa gnyis so //
T05TD4016.3E:159a-2: byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams gnas ngan len gyi lus la chos dang gang zag gi ngo bo nyid kyi bye brag la mngon par zhen pa'i bag la nyal yang dag pa ma yin pa'i lta bas dmigs par byas pa'i phyir bdag gam bdag gir 'dzin pas na yang dag pa ma yin pas bdag gis mthong ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:159a-6: bdag gis rnam par shes so //
T05TD4016.3E:159a-9: bdag kun nas nyon mongs so //
T05TD4016.3E:159a-10: bdag rnam par byang ngo zhes 'di lta bu la sogs pa log pa'i sbyor ba 'jug go zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa kun du rmongs pas 'dzin pa'i nyes dmigs bstan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:159a-11: de la byis pa so so'i skye bo zhes bya bas ni rmongs pas 'dzin pa'i gang zag bstan te /
T05TD4016.3E:159a-12: so so'i skye bo zhes bya bas ni lta ba tha dad pa 'dzin pa las skyes pa'i phyir so so'i skye bo zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:159a-13: gnas ngan len gyi lus zhes bya bas ni rmongs pa'i yul bstan te /
T05TD4016.3E:159a-14: zag pa dang bcas pa'i phung po lnga dag sgrib pa gnyis po dag gis mngon par bsgrubs shing /
T05TD4016.3E:159a-15: gnas ngan len rjes su 'brang bas na gnas ngan len gyi lus zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:159a-16: chos dang gang zag gi rang gi ngo bo nyid kyi bye brag la mngon par zhen pa zhes bya bas ni 'dzin pa gnyis bstan te /
T05TD4016.3E:159a-17: 'di ltar gnas ngan len gyi lus la chos kyi rang gi ngo bo nyid kyi bye brag gi mngon par zhen pa bskyed pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:159a-18: gang zag gi rang gi ngo bo nyid kyi bye brag gi mngon par zhen pa skyed pa gang yin pa de ni bdag dang chos su 'dzin pa gnyis zhes bya'o ;
T05TD4016.3E:159a-19: / bag la nyal yang dag pa ma yin pa'i lta bas dmigs pa byas pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la /
T05TD4016.3E:159a-20: bag la nyal ni sa bon gyi rnam grangs te /
T05TD4016.3E:159a-21: 'dzin pa gnyis kyi sa bon la bag la nyal zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:159a-22: de'i phyir bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa las /
T05TD4016.3E:159b-0: 'dzin pa @159b gnyis kyi bag chags de'i bag la nyal zhes bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:159b-1: sems can gyi rjes su 'brang zhing kun gzhi rnam par shes pa bag la nyal ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:159b-2: nyes pa rjes su 'phel ba'i phyir bag la nyal zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:159b-3: 'di ni shes bya dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa'i sa bon yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:159b-4: kun du 'byung ba de dag la ltos na bdag dang /
T05TD4016.3E:159b-5: chos su 'dzin pa gnyis yongs su bsgo bar byed pas so zhes bshad do //
T05TD4016.3E:159b-6: bdag gam bdag gir 'dzin pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni snga ma'i kun du 'byung ba'i sa bon gyi stobs kyis tshe 'di la bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin par byed la /
T05TD4016.3E:159b-7: bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pa'i phyir ni bdag gis mthong ngo zhes bya ba nas /
T05TD4016.3E:159b-8: bdag gis bdag rnam par byang ngo zhes de lta bu la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa skyed pa'i bar du byed par 'gyur ba'o /
T05TD4016.3E:159b-10: // / bam po bdun cu bzhi pa /
T05TD4016.3E:159b-11: gang la las de ltar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa de ni gnas ngan len gyi lus rab tu spang zhing nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi gnas ma yin pa shin tu rnam par dag pa spros pa rnams dang bral ba /
T05TD4016.3E:159b-12: 'dus ma byas gnas su gyur pa /
T05TD4016.3E:159b-13: rtsol ba med pa 'thob par 'gyur te zhes bya ba ni gsum pa khong du chud pa'i phan yon bstan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:159b-14: de la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa zhes bya ba ni gong du bstan pa de ltar sems can dang /
T05TD4016.3E:159b-15: chos stong pa nyid gnyis rab tu shes pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:159b-16: stong pa nyid gnyis kyi don yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du shes pa'i phyir phan yon thob par 'gyur ba'o //
T05TD4016.3E:159b-17: gnas ngan len gyi lus rab tu spong zhing nyon mongs pa thams cad ni gnas ma yin pa zhes bya ba ni go rims bzhin du sdug bsngal nye bar zhi ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:159b-18: nyon mongs pa nye bar hi bar sbyar te /
T05TD4016.3E:159b-19: de'i phyir bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las /
T05TD4016.3E:159b-20: mya ngan las 'das pa de'i ngo bo nyid ni rab tu zhi ba yin par rig par bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:159b-21: sdug bsngal mang po thams cad gtan du nye bar zhi ba'i phyir nyon mongs pa thams cad gtan du nye bar zhi ba'i phyir ro zhes bshad do //
T05TD4016.3E:159b-22: gzhan yang bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las /
T05TD4016.3E:159b-23: ma 'ongs pa yang srid phyi ma'i sdug bsngal sna tshogs yongs su spangs nas /
T05TD4016.3E:160a-0: ma 'ongs pa ni mi skye ba'i chos can thob pa'i @160a * //
T05TD4016.3E:160a-1: phyir sdug bsngal mang po zhi ba zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:160a-2: nyon mongs pa thams cad gtan du spangs nas mthar mi skye ba'i chos can thob pa'i phyir nyon mongs pa zhi ba zhes bya'o zhes bshad do //
T05TD4016.3E:160a-3: shin tu rnam par dag pa spros pa rnams dang bral ba zhes bya ba ni mya ngan las 'das pa gnas 'gyur ba'i mtshan nyid de //
T05TD4016.3E:160a-4: de'i phyir bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las /
T05TD4016.3E:160a-5: phung po lhag ma med pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i gnas gyur pa mtshan nyid ci lta bur brjod par bya zhe na /
T05TD4016.3E:160a-7: spros pa med pa'i mtshan nyid dang /
T05TD4016.3E:160a-8: shin tu rnam par dag pa'i mtshan nyid do zhes 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:160a-9: gzhan yang bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las /
T05TD4016.3E:160a-10: mya ngan las 'das pa'i mtshan nyid ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:160a-12: spros pa med pa'i mtshan nyid do /
T05TD4016.3E:160a-13: nang gi so sor rang gi rig pa'i mtshan nyid kho na yin par rig par bya'o zhes bshad do //
T05TD4016.3E:160a-14: 'dus ma byas gnas su gyur pa rtsol ba med pa thob par 'gyur te zhes bya ba ni 'dus ma byas pa'i chos kyi sku thob par 'gyur ba ste /
T05TD4016.3E:160a-15: de'i phyir bstan bcos rnam par bshad pa las /
T05TD4016.3E:160a-16: 'dus ma byas pa'i chos kyi sku la gnas pa las rtsol ba'i 'bad pa mi mnga' yang /
T05TD4016.3E:160a-17: sngon gyi smon lam gyi stobs kyis drangs pa'i phyir rang gi ngang gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mdzad de /
T05TD4016.3E:160a-18: dper na rnal 'byor pa dag 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las ldang ba bzhin no zhes bshad do //
T05TD4016.3E:160a-19: gzhan yang bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las gal te lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings la sgrib pa med de /
T05TD4016.3E:160a-20: ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la sgrib pa mi mnga' ba de kho na bzhin du /
T05TD4016.3E:160a-21: dgra bcom pa la yang sgrib pa med pa yin na /
T05TD4016.3E:160a-22: ci'i phyir dgra bcom pa yang /
T05TD4016.3E:160a-23: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa mi byed ce na /
T05TD4016.3E:160a-25: sngon smon lam bsgom pa med pa'i phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:160a-26: de lta bu'i rigs pa can ma yin pa'i phyir dgra bcom pa ni ldang ba'i bsam pa med pa kho na yongs su mya ngan las 'das pas na de'i phyir sangs rgyas rnams kyi mdzad pa mi byed do //
T05TD4016.3E:160b-0: gang gi tshe spros pa med pa'i dbyings de gang gi grangs su yang 'gro @160b pa yin na ci ltar mngon du byed ce na /
T05TD4016.3E:160b-2: sngon yang dag pa'i smon lam dang /
T05TD4016.3E:160b-3: lam de lta bu bsgoms pa'i stobs kyis 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:160b-4: dper na 'gog pa'i snyoms par zhugs pa snyoms par 'jug pa las ldang bar bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:160b-5: ldang ngo snyam du de ltar sems med kyang sngon mngon par 'du byas pa'i dbang gis langs nas yang sems dang bcas pa'i spyod pa la spyod par byed pa bzhin du /
T05TD4016.3E:160b-6: 'di la yang tshul de bzhin du blta bar bya'o zhes 'byung ste /
T05TD4016.3E:160b-7: 'phags pa gser 'od dam pa'i mdo las kyang don gyis mdo 'di las gsungs pa dang mthun par ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:160b-8: rigs kyi bu 'di ni thun mong ma yin pa'i gzungs kyi don mdor bstan pa zhes bya'o zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa spyi'i mjug bsdu ba ste brda phrad par zad do //
T05TD4016.3E:160b-9: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa tshigs su bcad pas bzlas te bshad pa zhes bya ba ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:160b-11: tshigs su bcad pa'i gleng bslang ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:160b-12: tshigs su bcad pa nyid kyis yang dag par bshad pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:160b-14: kun nas nyon mongs rnam par byang ba'i chos //
T05TD4016.3E:160b-15: thams cad byed pa med cing gang zag med //
T05TD4016.3E:160b-16: des ni nga yis byed dang bral bar bshad //
T05TD4016.3E:160b-17: de dag kun nas nyon mongs snga phyi min //
T05TD4016.3E:160b-18: zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa tshigs su bcad pa nyid kyis yang dag par bshad pa ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:160b-19: 'di yang tshigs su bcad pa gsum po yod pa nyid kyis rnam pa gsum du dbye ste /
T05TD4016.3E:160b-20: 'di la tshigs su bcad pa dang pos ni yang dag pa'i rigs pa rnams bzlas so //
T05TD4016.3E:160b-21: tshigs su bcad pa bar mas ni rmongs pas 'dzin pa'i nyes dmigs rnams zlos so //
T05TD4016.3E:160b-22: tshigs su bcad pa thams cad ni khong du chud pa'i yon tan zlos pa yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:160b-24: mdo'i tshig 'di yang rnam pa gnyis te /
T05TD4016.3E:160b-25: tshigs su bcad pa phyed dang pos ni /
T05TD4016.3E:160b-26: gang zag stong pa nyid kyi tshul ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:160b-27: tshigs su bcad pa phyed 'og mas ni chos stong pa nyid kyi tshul ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:160b-28: bshad pa'i rnam grangs gzhan du na mdo'i tshig 'di ni rnam pa gsum du dbye ste /
T05TD4016.3E:160b-29: tshig dang po gcig gis ni kun nas nyon mongs pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:161a-0: @161a * // rnam par byang ba'i chos spyir ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:161a-1: de'i 'og ma gcig gis ni stong pa nyid rnam pa gnyis rnam par phye ste bstan to //
T05TD4016.3E:161a-2: tshig phyi ma gnyis kyis ni stong pa nyid rnam pa gnyis cig car bstan te /
T05TD4016.3E:161a-3: tshig rkyang pa dang sbyar ba ni gong du bstan pa bzhin du ci rigs su bya'o ;
T05TD4016.3E:161a-4: / gnas ngan len lus bag la nyal ldang bas //
T05TD4016.3E:161a-5: dmigs pa byas pas bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin //
T05TD4016.3E:161a-6: des na brdzun du bdag gis mthong stsogs dang //
T05TD4016.3E:161a-7: bdag za'o byed dang nyon mongs rnam dag snyom //
T05TD4016.3E:161a-8: zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa rmongs pas 'dzin pa'i nyes dmigs bsten to //
T05TD4016.3E:161a-9: gang gis yang dag ci bzhin rab shes pa //
T05TD4016.3E:161a-10: gnas ngan len gyi lus ni spong byed cing //
T05TD4016.3E:161a-11: kun nas nyon mongs rnam dag spros med dang //
T05TD4016.3E:161a-12: 'dus ma byas rnams rtsol pa med pas 'thob //
T05TD4016.3E:161a-13: ces bya ba ni gsum pa khong du chud pa'i phan yon bstan pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:161a-14: tshig rkang pa dang po ni mdo 'di nyid kyis brda phrad par zad do ;
T05TD4016.3E:161a-15: / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gyis kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
T05TD4016.3E:161a-16: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sems 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid ji lta bur rig par bgyi lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i mtshan nyid bstan to //
T05TD4016.3E:161a-17: 'di yang rnam pa bdun du dbye ste /
T05TD4016.3E:161a-18: de bzhin gshegs pa'i yang dag par longs spyad pa'i sku'i sems 'byung ba'i mtshan yid bstan pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:161a-19: de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul gyi bye brag gi mtshan nyid bstan pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:161a-20: mngon par rdzogs pa'i byang chub pa la sogs pa rnam pa gsum gnyis su med pa'i mtshan nyid du bstan pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:161a-21: de bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams kyi dmigs pa mdzad pa'i bye brag bstan pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:161a-22: de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku dang /
T05TD4016.3E:161a-23: theg pa gnyis kyi rnam par grol ba'i lus kyi bye brag bstan pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:161a-24: de bzhin gshegs pa dang byang chub sems dpa'i byin gyis rlabs kyi mthus sems can gyi lus yongs su 'dzin par bstan pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:161a-25: zhing yongs su dag pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:161a-26: yongs su ma dag pa na dngos po gang dag rnyed dka' ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:161b-0: gang dag yod pa'i mtshan @161b nyid bstan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:161b-1: dang po yang rnam pa gnyis te /
T05TD4016.3E:161b-2: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i sems 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid yang dag par bstan pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:161b-3: sprul pa'i sku la sems mnga' ba'am mi mnga' ba bstan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:161b-4: dang po yang rnam pa bzhir dbye ste /
T05TD4016.3E:161b-9: 'di ni dang po longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i sems 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid zhus pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:161b-10: 'dis longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ston par ci mngon zhe na /
T05TD4016.3E:161b-12: de'i 'og tu sprul pa'i sems mnga' ba yang yin mi mnga' ba yang yin par ston pa'i phyir 'dir sems bstan pa ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ston pa yin par rig par bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:161b-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la bka' stsal pa /
T05TD4016.3E:161b-14: rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pas rab tu phye ba yin mod kyi /
T05TD4016.3E:161b-15: 'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni rtsol ba mi mnga' bar sems kyi chos 'byung ste /
T05TD4016.3E:161b-16: dngos po 'di ni sprul pa lta bur rig par bya'o zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:161b-17: mdo'i tshig 'di yang rnam pa gnyis te /
T05TD4016.3E:161b-18: de bzhin gshegs pa la sems dang yid dang ;
T05TD4016.3E:161b-19: rnam par shes pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i rtsol ba mi mnga' bar bstan pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:161b-20: de bzhin gshegs pa la rtsol ba mi mnga' bar yang sems kyi chos 'byung bar bstan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:161b-23: rnam par shes pa'i don de yang rnam pa gnyis te /
T05TD4016.3E:161b-24: zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa med pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:161b-25: zag pa dang bcas pa'i sems de yang rnam pa gnyis te /
T05TD4016.3E:161b-26: dang po ni bye brag gi ming du sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:161b-27: kun gzhi rnam par shes pa ni sems zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:161b-28: nyon mongs pa can gyi yid ni yid ces bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:161b-29: rnam par shes pa drug po dag ni rnam par shes pa zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:161b-30: gnyis pa ni spyi'i ming du rnam par shes pa brgyad po thams cad kyang sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa zhes bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:161b-31: de'i phyir bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa las /
T05TD4016.3E:162a-0: 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo de dang de dag tu sems dang yid @162a * //
T05TD4016.3E:162a-1: dang rnam par shes pa gsum po dag gi don tha dad pa gsungs te /
T05TD4016.3E:162a-2: bsags pa las byung bas na sems zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:162a-3: sems pas na yid ces bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:162a-4: rnam par rig pas na rnam par shes pa zhes bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:162a-5: don rnam pa gsum po de dag rnam par shes pa brgyad po kun la khyab pa yin yang gtso bo'i rjes su byas te /
T05TD4016.3E:162a-6: bstan nas kun gzhi rnam par shes pa ni sems zhes bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:162a-7: sa bon rnams bstsags nas chos rnams 'byung bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:162a-8: nyon mongs pa can gyi yid ni yid ces bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:162a-9: kun gzhi rnam par shes pa la sogs pa la dmigs shing rtag par nges par bdag la sogs par sems pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:162a-10: gzhan drug po dag ni rnam par shes pa zhes bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:162a-11: rigs pa g-yo ba bar chad dang bcas pa nyid rnam par rig pa 'jug pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ba yin no //
T05TD4016.3E:162a-12: gzhan yang 'phags pa lang kar gshegs pa'i mdo'i tshigs su bcad pa las ji skad du /
T05TD4016.3E:162a-13: kun gzhi la ni sems zhes bya //
T05TD4016.3E:162a-14: sems pa'i bdag nyid yid ces bya //
T05TD4016.3E:162a-15: yul gyi mtshan nyid rnam rig pa //
T05TD4016.3E:162a-16: de ni rnam par shes zhes bstan //
T05TD4016.3E:162a-18: gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan bkod pa'i mdo las /
T05TD4016.3E:162a-19: de bzhin gshegs pa'i dri ma med pa'i rnam par shes pa zhes gsungs so //
T05TD4016.3E:162a-20: ched 'ga' ni mdo las 'jig rten las 'das pa'i yid ces gsungs so //
T05TD4016.3E:162a-21: ched 'ga' ni sems zhes bya ba'i ming gnas skabs thams cad rtogs par gsungs pas de'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi sa'i gnas skabs kyang rnam par shes pa la sogs pa zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:162a-22: mdo 'di las ni zag pa dang bcas pa rnam par rtog pa'i sems dang yid dang rnam pa'i dbang du mdzad nas bstan pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:162a-23: de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pas rab tu phye ba ma yin zhes gsungs kyi /
T05TD4016.3E:162a-24: zag pa med pa'i sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa ni ma yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:162a-26: sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba ni rnam par rtog pa'i sems so zhes gsungs so //
T05TD4016.3E:162a-27: gzhan yang bstan bcos byang chub kyi tshogs bstan pa las /
T05TD4016.3E:162b-0: sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba @162b ni mtshan mar 'dzin pa rnam par rtog pa can zhes bya'o zhes 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:162b-1: de la 'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni rtsol ba mi mnga' bar sems kyi chos 'byung ste zhes bya ba 'dis ni de bzhin gshegs pa la rnam par rtog pa'i yid la byed par mi mnga' mod kyi /
T05TD4016.3E:162b-2: sngon gyi rgyu'i gnas skabs kyi shes rab kyi stobs kyis rtsol ba mi mnga' bar yang sems kyi chos 'byung ste /
T05TD4016.3E:162b-3: dper na sprul pa lta bu'o //
T05TD4016.3E:162b-4: ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs kyis phyir ni thugs la dgongs pa bzhin du mngon du 'gyur zhing yid la byed pa'i rnam par rtog pa'i dbang gis ni ma yin pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:162b-5: bshad pa'i rnam pa gzhan du na yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs pa na yid la byed pa mi mnga' mod kyi /
T05TD4016.3E:162b-6: mnyam par gzhag pa'i mdun rol na yid la byas pa'i stobs kyis sprul pa ston par mdzad do //
T05TD4016.3E:162b-7: 'di yang de bzhin te rgyu'i gnas skabs kyi shes rab kyi stobs kyis sems kyi chos 'byung ba'o //
T05TD4016.3E:162b-8: gzhan yang bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa lang gi tshe bsgyur ba las /
T05TD4016.3E:162b-9: bcom ldan 'das gzhan la phan 'dogs pa'i bya ba mdzad par gyur /
T05TD4016.3E:162b-13: mngon par 'du mdzad pa'i dgongs pa mi mnga' la /
T05TD4016.3E:162b-14: mngon par 'du mdzad pa mi mnga' yang phan 'dogs pa'i bya ba mngon par 'grub par 'gyur te /
T05TD4016.3E:162b-15: dper na yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang /
T05TD4016.3E:162b-16: lha'i rnga la yid la byed pa med kyang bya ba'i dngos po rnams mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ba bzhin no zhes bshad do //
T05TD4016.3E:162b-17: gzhan yang bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa slob dpon ngo bo nyid med kyis byas pa las /
T05TD4016.3E:162b-18: rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes bsgoms pa las mngon par 'grub pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu rnam par mi rtog pa yin par 'gyur na /
T05TD4016.3E:162b-19: ji ltar sems can la phan 'dogs pa'i bya ba mdzad ce na /
T05TD4016.3E:162b-20: yid bzhin nor bu dang ni lha yi rnga //
T05TD4016.3E:162b-21: bsam med rang gi bya ba 'grub pa ltar //
T05TD4016.3E:162b-22: sangs rgyas mdzad pa sna tshogs grub gyur kyang //
T05TD4016.3E:162b-23: rtag par dgongs pa mi mnga' de bzhin no //
T05TD4016.3E:162b-26: tshigs su bcad pa 'di las yid bzhin nor bu dang /
T05TD4016.3E:163a-0: lha'i rnga'i dpe rnam pa gnyis kyis ni rnam par mi rtog @163a * //
T05TD4016.3E:163a-1: pa'i ye shes brnyes pa la rnam par mi rtog pa'i rtsol ba mi mnga' yang mdzad pa rnam pa sna tshogs mngon par 'grub pa ni dper na yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang /
T05TD4016.3E:163a-4: bdag gis sgra dbyung ngo snyam pa'i bsam pa med kyang sems can de dag gi bsod nams kyi las kyi mos pa'i mthu ci lta ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:163a-5: brdung ba la mi ltos par yang 'od sna tshogs gtong zhing sgra sna tshogs 'byung ba ltar sangs rgyas rnams kyang de bzhin te /
T05TD4016.3E:163a-6: rnam par rtog pa'i rtsol ba dang bral ba yin yang gdul ba'i sems can de dag gi bsod nams kyi mos pa'i stobs ji lta ba bzhin du phan 'dogs pa'i dngos po rnam pa sna tshogs ston to zhes mngon par bsgrubs pa yin no zhes 'byung ste /
T05TD4016.3E:163a-7: slob dpon dbyig gnyen gyis mdzad pa'i 'grel ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:163a-8: lang gi tshe bsgyur ba'i 'grel ba las kyang de skad du ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:163a-9: byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
T05TD4016.3E:163a-10: bcom ldan 'das gal te de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi sku mngon par 'du bgyi ba thams cad dang bral te /
T05TD4016.3E:163a-11: rtsol ba ma mchis pa lags na /
T05TD4016.3E:163a-12: 'o na ci ltar sems can gyi chos 'byung bar 'gyur lags zhes bya ba ni gsum pa brtag pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:163a-13: chos kyi sku zhes bya ba 'di la yang bshad pa rnam pa gnyis yod de /
T05TD4016.3E:163a-14: kha cig na re longs spyod rdzogs pa ni chos kyi sku zhes bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:163a-15: 'dis ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i chos kyi sku la mngon par 'du mdzad pa'i dgongs pa mi mnga' yang /
T05TD4016.3E:163a-16: sems 'byung ba yin na ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la tha dad pa'i dgongs pa mi mnga' bar yang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skus bsdus pa'i sems bskyed pas de'i phyir zhu ba 'di zhus pa yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:163a-18: yid la byed pa med pa yang sems skye bar 'gyur zhes zhu ba yin no zhe'o //
T05TD4016.3E:163a-19: bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la bka' stsal ba /
T05TD4016.3E:163a-20: rigs kyi bu sngon thabs dang shes rab bsgom pa mngon par 'dus byas pa'i dbang gi phyir sems 'byung bar 'gyur te zhes bya ba la sogs pas bzhi pa rnam par bshad pa ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:163b-0: don nyid yang dag @163b par bstan pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:163b-1: dpes nye bar mtshon pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:163b-2: dpe dang don du sbyar ba'o //
T05TD4016.3E:163b-3: 'di ni don yang dag par bstan pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:163b-4: 'di ltar sa bcu po dag tu shes rab dang /
T05TD4016.3E:163b-5: mngon par 'dus byas pa'i dbang gis dgongs pa mi mnga' bar yang sems skye bar 'gyur bas so //
T05TD4016.3E:163b-6: de la mngon par 'dus byas pa zhes bya ba ni rgyu'i gnas skabs kyi sbyor ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:163b-7: yang dag pa'i shes pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:163b-8: rjes las thob pa gsum po dag spyir mngon par 'dus byas pa zhes bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:163b-9: 'bad pa'i rtsol ba dang bcas pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:163b-10: mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni /
T05TD4016.3E:163b-11: sngon shes rab bsgoms pa las byung ba'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:163b-12: dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni /
T05TD4016.3E:163b-13: sngon thabs dang shes rab bsgoms pas rang gi ngang gis 'byung bar 'gyur te zhes 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:163b-14: rigs kyi bu dper na gnyid log pa sems med pa las sad pa na mngon par 'du bya ba med kyang mngon par 'dus byas pa'i stobs kyis sad par 'gyur zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa dpe nye bar mtshon pa ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:163b-15: 'di yang dpe rnam pa gnyis kyis bstan pa las 'di ni dpe dang po ste /
T05TD4016.3E:163b-16: 'di ltar sems med pa'i gnyid kyi gnas skabs na phyis sad par bya'o zhes mngon par 'dus byas pa med kyang sems snga ma'i dbang gi phyir te /
T05TD4016.3E:163b-17: gnyid ma log pa'i mdun rol du bdag phyis ldang bar bya'o zhes mngon par 'dus byas pa'i dbang gis sad pa'i sems skye ba lta bu'o //
T05TD4016.3E:163b-18: 'gog pa la snyom par zhugs pa ldang bar mngon par 'du bya ba med kyang mngon par 'dus byas pa'i dbang gi stobs kyis ting nge 'dzin las ldang bar 'gyur te zhes bya ba ni dpe gnyis pa bstan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:163b-20: dper na 'gog pa'i snyoms par zhugs pa'i ting nge 'dzin las ldang ngo snyam pa'i mngon par 'du bya ba med kyang sems snga ma'i dbang gi phyir te /
T05TD4016.3E:163b-21: 'di ltar 'gog pa la ma zhugs pa'i sngon rol na bdag phyis ldang bar bya'o snyam du mngon par 'dus byas pa'i dbang gis ting nge 'dzin las ldang ba lta bu ste /
T05TD4016.3E:163b-22: bstan bcos bye brag tu bshad pa chen po las /
T05TD4016.3E:163b-24: 'gog pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa'i dus ji srid du gnas she na /
T05TD4016.3E:164a-0: 'dod pa'i khams kyi sems can gyi dbang @164a * //
T05TD4016.3E:164a-1: po rnams kyi 'byung ba chen po ni kham gyi zas kyi dbang gis gnas pas ting nge 'dzin la yun ring du gnas pa dag gi ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa'i tshe /
T05TD4016.3E:164a-2: lus la nyams pa med kyang ting nge 'dzin las langs pa na lus 'jig par 'gyur te /
T05TD4016.3E:164a-3: de'i phyir ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pa dus yun mi ring ba zhig tu gnas pa kho na yin pas de ltar yun ring na yang nyin zhag bdun las mi 'da' ste /
T05TD4016.3E:164a-4: kham gyi zas zad pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:164a-6: kun dga' ra ba zhig na dge slong cig 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob pas snga dro'i dus kyi chos gos bgos lhung bzed thogs nas dge 'dun gyi bkad sar song ba las /
T05TD4016.3E:164a-7: de'i nyin par gand'i brdung ba dang sbyar ba dag cung zad cig thogs pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:164a-8: dge slong de yang brtson 'grus can zhig pas 'di snyam du bdag gis ci ste dge ba mi spyod par dus zad par byed ces phyi ma'i mtha' la mi rtog par bdag gis nam gand'i brdung ba na gdod ldang bar bya'o zhes dam bcas nas 'gog pa la snyoms par zhugs so /
T05TD4016.3E:164a-9: de'i tshe dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba der bar chad kyi rkyen byung bas dge slong rnams so sor gyis nas gnas gzhan du dong ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:164a-10: zla ba gsum 'das te bar chad kyi rkyen zhi nas dge slong rnams slar kun dga' ra bar 'dus te gand'i brdungs ma thag tu dge slong de ting nge 'dzin las langs nas dus las 'das so zhes grag go //
T05TD4016.3E:164a-11: gzhan yang dge slong 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa thob pa rtag par bsod snyoms slong ba zhig snga dro'i dus kyi tshe /
T05TD4016.3E:164a-12: chos gos bgos lhung bzed thogs nas grong khyer du 'gro bar byas pa las char chen po bab pas gos kyi kha dog nyams par 'gyur bar dogs nas cung zad cig bsdad pa las /
T05TD4016.3E:164a-13: de 'di snyam du bdag gis dge ba mi spyod par ci'i phyir dus zad par byed ces phyi ma'i mtha' la mi rtog par char pa ma chad kyi bar du snyoms par zhugs lan ma char pa chad pa na gdod ldang bar bya'o zhes dam bcas nas 'gog pa la snyoms par zhugs so //
T05TD4016.3E:164a-14: kha cig na re zla ba phyed lon nas gdod char pa chad do zhes zer ro //
T05TD4016.3E:164a-15: kha cig na re zla ba gcig lon nas gdod char pa chad do zhes zer te /
T05TD4016.3E:164a-16: ting nge 'dzin las langs ma thag tu dus las 'das so zhes grag ste /
T05TD4016.3E:164b-0: de @164b nas 'dod pa'i khams su skyes pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa gang yin pa de ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa'i tshe /
T05TD4016.3E:164b-1: lus la nyams par 'gyur ba'i phyir ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pa de ni dus yun mi ring ba zhig tu gnas pas /
T05TD4016.3E:164b-2: de ltar yun ring na yang nyin zhag bdun las mi 'da' bar shes par bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:164b-3: gzugs kyi khams kyi sems can gyi dbang po rnams kyi 'byung ba chen po ni kham gyi zad kyi dbang gis gnas shing gzung ba ma yin pa'i phyir ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pa bskal pa phyed dam /
T05TD4016.3E:164b-5: yang na de las lhag par yang gnas so //
T05TD4016.3E:164b-6: gal te dge slong 'ga' zhig dam ma bcas par 'gog pa'i snyoms par zhugs pa de ci lta bur ldang bar 'gyur zhe na /
T05TD4016.3E:164b-8: chos nyid kyis ldang bar 'gyur te /
T05TD4016.3E:164b-9: sems yod pa'i ting nge 'dzin ji lta ba bzhin du dge slong de bza' ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:164b-11: bshang gci'i phyir 'gro bar 'dod pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:164b-12: 'di ltar ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa'i tshe /
T05TD4016.3E:164b-13: gnod pa med kyang langs pa gnod par 'gyur ba'i phyir rgyu dang rkyen des na gdon mi za bar ldang bar 'gyur ro zhes 'byung ba lta bu'o //
T05TD4016.3E:164b-14: gzhan yang 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las /
T05TD4016.3E:164b-15: gal te byang chub sems dpa' rnams ting nge 'dzin gya nom pa la zhugs par gyur pa na /
T05TD4016.3E:164b-16: su zhig slong bar nus she na /
T05TD4016.3E:164b-18: rnal 'byor pa dag dang por 'jug pa na bdag nyid kyis dus kyi tshad byas nas de'i 'og tu gdod ting nge 'dzin la 'jug pas dus la bab na de'i sems rang gi ngang gis ting nge 'dzin las ldang bar 'gyur te /
T05TD4016.3E:164b-20: dge slong zhig 'gog pa la snyoms par 'jug pa na bdag gis gand'i'i sgra thos pa'i tshe ldang bar bya'o zhes dam bcas nas 'gog pa'i snyoms par zhugs pa las dge 'dun gyi gnas khang du me shor bas dge slong rnams skrag nas gand'i ma brdungs par dong ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:164b-21: lo bcu gcig 'das nas yon bdag rnams kyis dge 'dun bsdus te /
T05TD4016.3E:164b-22: gtsug lag khang brtsig pa'i phyir gand'i brdungs pa las des gand'i'i sgra thos te /
T05TD4016.3E:164b-23: langs ma thag tu lus zhig nas dus las 'das so zhes bshad pa lta bu'o zhes 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:165a-0: 'gog pa la snyoms par zhugs pa'i sems @165a * //
T05TD4016.3E:165a-1: 'byung ba ci lta ba de bzhin du /
T05TD4016.3E:165a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa yang sngon thabs dang shes rab bsgom pa mngon par 'dus byas pa'i dbang gis yang sems kyi chos 'byung bar rig par bya'o zhes bya ba ni gsum pa dpe dang don du sbyar ba ste /
T05TD4016.3E:165a-3: ci ltar sems med pa'i gnyis sngon mngon par 'du byas pa'i dbang gis phyis sems 'byung ba bzhin du /
T05TD4016.3E:165a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa la yang mngon par 'du mdzad pa mi mnga' mod kyi /
T05TD4016.3E:165a-5: sngon rgyu'i gnas skabs su mngon par 'du mdzad pa'i dbang gis sems 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ste /
T05TD4016.3E:165a-6: de'i phyir 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi sa'i 'grel ba las gzhan yang ye shes dang sprul pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:165a-7: sems can gyi don bya ba bsgrub pa thams cad kyi go 'byed pas kyang zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:165a-8: chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa la longs spyod rdzogs pa dang sprul pa'i sku gnyis kyis sems can gyi bya ba bsgrub pa'i rgyu mtshan thams cad kyi go 'byed ces bya ba ste zhes bya ba nas ;
T05TD4016.3E:165a-9: gzhan yang de las de'i tshe /
T05TD4016.3E:165a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la 'di ni mdzad do //
T05TD4016.3E:165a-11: 'di ni mi mdzad do snyam pa la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa mi mnga' mod kyi /
T05TD4016.3E:165a-12: 'on kyang sngon gyi smon lam gyi dbang gis bya ba thams cad smon lam bzhin du 'gyur te /
T05TD4016.3E:165a-13: dper na gnyid log pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:165a-14: 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa las ldang ba yid la byed mod kyi /
T05TD4016.3E:165a-15: ci ltar dam bcas pa bzhin du sang cing /
T05TD4016.3E:165a-16: ting nge 'dzin las ldang bar 'gyur te /
T05TD4016.3E:165a-17: 'phags pa blo gros rgya mtshos zhus pa'i mdo las ji skad du /
T05TD4016.3E:165a-18: dper na dge slong gand'i brdungs pa la bab kyi bar du byin gyis brlabs te 'gog pa la snyoms par zhugs pa de'i rna lam du gand'i'i sgra mi grag la rnam par rtog pa med mod kyi /
T05TD4016.3E:165a-19: 'on kyang dam bcas pa'i dbang gis ldang bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa lta bu ste /
T05TD4016.3E:165a-20: 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi sa'i 'grel pa las /
T05TD4016.3E:165a-21: 'phags pa blo gros rgya mtshos zhus pa'i mdo khungs su bstan pa ni 'phags pa 'dus pa chen po'i mdo las /
T05TD4016.3E:165a-22: byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rgya mtsho'i le'u zhes bya ba nyid yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:165a-23: de'i phyir mdo de nyid las /
T05TD4016.3E:165b-0: rigs kyi bu dper na dge slong 'gog pa la snyoms par 'jug par 'dod pas sngar bdag gis gand'i brdungs pa'i sgra thos na gdod ldang bar bya'o @165b zhes dam bcas nas snyoms par zhugs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa'i tshe /
T05TD4016.3E:165b-1: gand'i'i sgra med mod kyi 'on kyang sngon gyi smon lam gyi dbang gis gand'i brdungs pas ting nge 'dzin las ldang bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pa yin no //
T05TD4016.3E:165b-2: byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
T05TD4016.3E:165b-3: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'i sku la sems mchis zhes bgyi'am /
T05TD4016.3E:165b-4: sems ma mchis zhes bgyi lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'i sku la sems mnga' ba ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:165b-8: brtags pa dang rnam par bshad pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:165b-9: 'di ni zhu ba gsol ba nyid do //
T05TD4016.3E:165b-10: de la sprul pa'i sku zhes bya ba ni gzhan longs spyod pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:165b-11: sprul pa'i sku bsdu ba ste /
T05TD4016.3E:165b-12: sprul pa dang mtshungs pa'i phyir re //
T05TD4016.3E:165b-13: sku gnyis po 'di dag sems mnga' ba zhes bgyi'am /
T05TD4016.3E:165b-14: 'on te sems mi mnga' ba zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T05TD4016.3E:165b-15: bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la bka' stsal pa /
T05TD4016.3E:165b-16: rigs kyi bu sems yod pa yang ma yin /
T05TD4016.3E:165b-17: sems med pa yang ma yin no zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas lan mdor gsungs pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:165b-18: yod ces byar yang mi rung la /
T05TD4016.3E:165b-19: med ces byang yang mi rung ngo zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T05TD4016.3E:165b-20: de ci'i phyir zhe na zhes bya ba ni gsum pa gtan tshigs brtag pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:165b-21: yod pa dang med pa zhes gsungs kyang gtan tshigs ma gsungs pa'i phyir 'dir brtag pa yin no //
T05TD4016.3E:165b-22: bdag nyid la brten pa'i sems med pa'i phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:165b-23: gzhan la brten pa'i sems yod pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni bzhi pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par bshad pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:165b-24: de la bdag nyid la brten pa'i sems zhes bya ba ni lta ba'i rnam pa'i sems te /
T05TD4016.3E:165b-25: bdag nyid kyis dmigs pa'i byed pa lta ba'i rnam pa'i sa bon la brten nas skye ba'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:165b-26: gzhan la brten pa'i sems zhes bya ba ni rgyu'i mtshan gyi rnam pa'i sems te /
T05TD4016.3E:165b-27: lta ba'i rnam pa'i sems la brten nas skye ba yin gyi /
T05TD4016.3E:165b-28: dmigs par ni mi byed pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:165b-29: 'dir lan du gsungs pa'i dgongs pa ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:166a-0: lta ba'i rnam pa yang dag pa'i sems med @166a * //
T05TD4016.3E:166a-1: pa'i phyir ni bdag nyid la brten pa'i sems med pa zhes bya ba gsungs so //
T05TD4016.3E:166a-2: gzhan du brten pa'i rgyu mtshan gyi rnam pa'i sems yod pa'i phyir ni med ces byar mi rung ngo zhes bstan pa yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:166a-3: de'i phyir bstan bcos rnam par rig pa tsam du grub pa las /
T05TD4016.3E:166a-4: sprul pa dang gzhan longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku de la yang dag pa'i sems dang /
T05TD4016.3E:166a-5: sems las byung ba mi mnga' yang /
T05TD4016.3E:166a-6: sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos lta bur snang ste /
T05TD4016.3E:166a-7: bla na med pa'i byang chub de'i rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu shin tu bsam par dka' ba'i phyir gzugs med pa'i chos sprul cing ston par byed do //
T05TD4016.3E:166a-8: gal te de ma yin na ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'dod chags dang zhe sdang la sogs pa ston par mdzad de snga nas gtan du spangs pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:166a-9: ji ltar nyan thos dang byol song la sogs pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i yang dag pa'i sems shes par nus te /
T05TD4016.3E:166a-10: mnyam pa nyid du byang chub sems dpas kyang shes par mi nus pa'i phyir /
T05TD4016.3E:166a-11: des na mdo dag las rigs dpag tu med pa dag sprul nas thams cad kyang sems yod pa lta bur ston to zhes gsungs pa yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:166a-12: 'phags pa mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mdo la sogs pa las ji skad bstan pa lta bu'o //
T05TD4016.3E:166a-13: gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i bya ba sgrub pa'i ye shes ni phrin las rnam pa gsum ston par mdzad do zhes gsungs te /
T05TD4016.3E:166a-14: 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi sa'i mdo la sogs pa las ji skad bstan pa lta bu'o //
T05TD4016.3E:166a-15: gzhan yang sprul pa gzhan la brten pa'i sems yod par gsungs te /
T05TD4016.3E:166a-16: gzhan gyi yang dag pa'i sems la brten nas rgyu mtshan gyi rnam par snang ba'i phyir te /
T05TD4016.3E:166a-17: mdo 'di nyid la sogs pa las ji skad bstan pa lta bu'o //
T05TD4016.3E:166a-18: sprul pa la dbang po dang /
T05TD4016.3E:166a-19: sems la sogs pa med par gsungs kyang /
T05TD4016.3E:166a-20: gzhan las dgongs nas bstan pa yin gyi /
T05TD4016.3E:166a-21: de bzhin gshegs pa las brtsams pa ni ma yin no //
T05TD4016.3E:166a-22: gzhan sprul pa'i dbang po gzugs can dang /
T05TD4016.3E:166a-23: sems dang sems las byung ba'i chos la dbang po la stsogs pa'i nus pa med pa'i phyir yod pa nyid du ma bstan to zhes 'byung ste /
T05TD4016.3E:166a-24: 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi sa'i 'grel ba las phal cher de skad du ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:166b-0: @166b mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni /
T05TD4016.3E:166b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'i sku sems mchis pa zhig lags sam /
T05TD4016.3E:166b-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal la bka' stsal pa /
T05TD4016.3E:166b-4: sems med de sems rang dbang med pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:166b-5: dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni /
T05TD4016.3E:166b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pas sprul pa'i sku de sems mchis pa zhes bgyi'am /
T05TD4016.3E:166b-7: sems ma mchis pa zhes bgyi lags /
T05TD4016.3E:166b-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T05TD4016.3E:166b-9: sems yod ces bya bar yang mi rung la /
T05TD4016.3E:166b-10: sems med ces bya bar yang mi rung ngo ;
T05TD4016.3E:166b-12: rang gi sems la dbang ma thob pa'i phyir sems med pa zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:166b-13: gzhan gyi stobs kyi phyir sems yod pa zhes bya'o zhes 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:166b-14: byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
T05TD4016.3E:166b-15: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul gang lags pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:166b-16: de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul gang lags pa de nyid la bye brag tu bgyi ba ni ci mchis lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul gyi bye brag gi mtshan nyid ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:166b-17: 'di yang rnam pa gnyis po zhu ba gsol pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:166b-18: lan du gsungs pa bstan te /
T05TD4016.3E:166b-19: 'di ni dang po zhu ba gsol ba nyid do //
T05TD4016.3E:166b-20: bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la bka' stsal pa /
T05TD4016.3E:166b-21: rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:166b-22: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rnam pa thams cad du thun mong ba /
T05TD4016.3E:166b-23: yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:166b-24: tshad med pa dag gis bkod pa /
T05TD4016.3E:166b-25: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa gang yin pa'o zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:166b-29: / rnam par bshad pa la yang rnam pa gnyis su dbye ste /
T05TD4016.3E:166b-30: spyod yul rnam par bshad pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:166b-32: 'di ni dang po spyod yul rnam par bshad pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:166b-33: 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thun mong du mnga' ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa /
T05TD4016.3E:167a-1: 'jigs pa la sogs pa'i yon tan dpag tu med pa dag gis brgyan pa /
T05TD4016.3E:167a-2: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul zhes bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:167a-3: 'di ni 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi sa'i mdo las /
T05TD4016.3E:167a-4: phun sum tshogs pa bco brgyad kyi bkod pa dang ldan par bstan pa nyid de /
T05TD4016.3E:167a-5: de'i phyir 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi sa'i mdo la sogs pa las /
T05TD4016.3E:167a-6: gzhal med khang chen po rin po che sna bdun du 'bar ba bkod pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa rgya cher gsungs pa yin no //
T05TD4016.3E:167a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:167a-8: rnam pa thams cad du khams lnga po dag bye brag tu gyur pa gang yin pa'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul rnam par bshad pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:167a-11: grangs mdor smos pa bzhin du rnam par phye ste bstan pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:167a-18: gdul ba'i thabs kyi khams te zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa grangs mdor smos pa bzhin du rnam par phye ste bstan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:167a-19: dpag tu med pa lnga po 'di dag ni bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las ji skad bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:167a-20: de'i phyir bstan bcos de nyid las /
T05TD4016.3E:167a-21: de la sems can gyi khams dpag tu med pa ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:167a-22: sems can gyi rigs drug cu rtsa bzhi po de dag yin pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:167a-23: sngar yid kyi sa las bstan pa bzhin no //
T05TD4016.3E:167a-24: 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med pa ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:167a-25: phyogs bcu dpag tu med cing ming yang dpag tu med de /
T05TD4016.3E:167a-26: dper na 'di ni 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed de /
T05TD4016.3E:167a-27: de'i ming las mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa zhes bya ba bzhin no //
T05TD4016.3E:167a-28: chos kyi khams dpag tu med pa ni 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:167a-32: chos rnams kyi rab tu dbye ba'i tshul gyis dpag tu med par rig par bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:167a-33: gdul ba'i khams dpag tu med pa 'di lta ste /
T05TD4016.3E:167a-34: sems can thams cad gdul bar bya ba yin pa'i phyir gdul ba ni gcig tu 'gyur ro //
T05TD4016.3E:167a-35: gdul ba'i khams rnam pa gnyis kyang yod de /
T05TD4016.3E:167b-0: 'ching ba mtha' @167b dag dang ldan pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:167b-1: 'ching ba mtha' dag dang mi ldan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:167b-2: de bzhin du rnam pa bdun yod pa nas /
T05TD4016.3E:167b-3: rnam pa'i rab tu dbye bas rnam pa lnga bcu rtsa lnga yod pa'i bar du'o //
T05TD4016.3E:167b-4: rgyud kyi rab tu dbye bas ni tshad med par rig par bya'o zhes 'byung ste /
T05TD4016.3E:167b-5: zhib tu de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no //
T05TD4016.3E:167b-7: de la sems kyi khams dang /
T05TD4016.3E:167b-8: gdul ba'i khams la tha dad du bya ba ci yod ce na /
T05TD4016.3E:167b-11: rigs la gnas pa ma yin pa'i sems can thams cad ni sems can gyi khams su bye brag med do //
T05TD4016.3E:167b-12: rigs la gnas pa gnas skabs de dang de dag la gnas pa gang yin pa de ni gdul ba'i khams zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:167b-13: de la gdul ba'i thabs kyi khams dpag tu med pa ni sngar ji skad du bstan pa bzhin du rig par bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:167b-14: de yang rnam pa'i dbye bas ni dpag tu med do //
T05TD4016.3E:167b-15: ci'i phyir dpag tu med pa lnga po 'di dag ni go rims de ltar bstan ce na /
T05TD4016.3E:167b-17: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams nan tan brtson 'grus kyis sems can gyi don la spyod pas de'i phyir dang por sems can gyi khams dpag tu med pa bstan to //
T05TD4016.3E:167b-18: sems can de dag gang la gnas pa yang dmigs pa las gdul bar 'gyur bas /
T05TD4016.3E:167b-19: de'i phyir gnyis pa 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med pa bstan to ;
T05TD4016.3E:167b-20: / sems can de dag 'jig rten gyi khams de dang de dag na chos gang dag gis kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba'i bye brag kyang dmigs pas /
T05TD4016.3E:167b-21: de'i phyir gsum pa chos kyi khams dpag tu med pa bstan to //
T05TD4016.3E:167b-22: sems can de dag gi nang nas sems can gang dag skal ba dang ldan zhing /
T05TD4016.3E:167b-23: gtan du sdug bsngal las rnam par thar bar byed pa yang mthong bas de'i phyir bzhi pa'i gdul ba'i khams dpag tu med pa ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:167b-24: thabs la mkhas pa de dag gis sems can rnams gtan du rnam par thar par byed par 'gyur bas de'i phyir lnga pa gdul ba'i thabs kyi khams dpag tu med pa ston to ;
T05TD4016.3E:167b-25: / de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dpag tu med pa lnga po de dag ni thams cad la mkhas pa byed par 'gyur ba'i zhes 'byung ste /
T05TD4016.3E:167b-26: bstan bcos rnam par bshad pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:167b-29: 'phags pa legs pa'i tshul khrims bstan pa'i mdo las kyang de skad du ston to//
T05TD4016.3E:168a-0: @168a * // de dag ni rnam pa gnyis kyi bye brag zhes bya'o zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa mjug bsdus pa'o /
T05TD4016.3E:168a-2: // / bam po bdun cu lnga pa /
T05TD4016.3E:168a-3: byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
T05TD4016.3E:168a-4: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par byang chub pa gang lags pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:168a-5: yang dag pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba gang lags pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:168a-6: yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po gang lags pa rnam pa gsum po de dag gi mtshan nyid ji lta bur rig par bgyi lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gsum pa mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa la sogs pa la gsum po dag gnyis su med pa'i mtshan nyid du bstan pa zhes bya ba ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:168a-9: lan du gsungs pa dang brtag pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:168a-11: 'di ni dang po rnam pa gsum po de dag so so nas mtshan nyid ji lta bu zhig dang ldan zhes zhu ba'o //
T05TD4016.3E:168a-12: bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la bka' stsal pa /
T05TD4016.3E:168a-13: rigs kyi bu gsum po de dag ni gnyis su med pa'i mtshan nyid yin par rig par bya ste zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni /
T05TD4016.3E:168a-14: gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:168a-17: lan rnam par phye ste bstan pa'o //
