T05TD4016.3E:168a-18: 'di ni dang po gsum po de dag gnyis su med pa'i mtshan nyid yin no zhes lan mdor gsungs so //
T05TD4016.3E:168a-19: 'di ltar mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa yang ma yin yang dag pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba yang ma yin /
T05TD4016.3E:168a-20: yang dag pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo mi bskor ba yang ma yin yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po yang ma yin /
T05TD4016.3E:168a-21: yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po med pa yang ma yin no zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa rnam par phye ste bstan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:168a-22: rnam pa gsum po dag ni gnyis su med pa'i mtshan nyid yin pas mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa yang ma yin //
T05TD4016.3E:168a-23: chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba yang ma yin /
T05TD4016.3E:168a-24: yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa yang ma yin no //
T05TD4016.3E:168a-25: rnam pa gsum med pa yang ma yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:168a-26: tshig tha dad kyang don gcig pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:168a-27: dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni /
T05TD4016.3E:168a-28: byang chub thob pa yang ma yin /
T05TD4016.3E:168b-0: byang chub mi thob pa yang ma yin zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'byung @168b ngo ;
T05TD4016.3E:168b-1: / dpe gzhan gnyis las kyang ma yin zhes bya ba'i tshig tu 'byung bas /
T05TD4016.3E:168b-2: de'i phyir ma yin zhes bya ba'i tha tshig gis ni gnyis su med pa'i mtshan nyid bstan to //
T05TD4016.3E:168b-3: de ci'i phyir zhe na zhes bya ba ni gsum pa gtan tshigs bstan pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:168b-4: gnyis su med pa zhes gsungs kyang /
T05TD4016.3E:168b-6: de'i phyir brtag pa yin no //
T05TD4016.3E:168b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku ni gtan du yongs su dag pa nyid kyi phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:168b-8: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'i sku ni rtag tu kun du stong pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes bya ba ni bzhi pa rnam par bshad pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:168b-9: 'di ltar de bzhin nyid kyi chos kyi sku ni shin tu rnam par dag pa nyid kyi phyir mtshan nyid gsum po de dag med la /
T05TD4016.3E:168b-10: sprul pa'i sku ni dbang po ji lta ba bzhin du kun du ston pa'i phyir mtshan nyid gsum po dag med pa yang ma yin no //
T05TD4016.3E:168b-11: mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las kyang /
T05TD4016.3E:168b-12: 'di las gsungs pa dang mthun par 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:168b-13: dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las /
T05TD4016.3E:168b-14: sprul pa'i sku kun du ston pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ba ni /
T05TD4016.3E:168b-15: sprul pa'i sku nyid la sprul pa zhes bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:168b-16: de'i phyir 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rdo rje gcod pa'i 'grel pa las /
T05TD4016.3E:168b-17: sprul pa yang dag sangs rgyas min //
T05TD4016.3E:168b-18: chos bstan pa yang de ma yin //
T05TD4016.3E:168b-20: bdag dang gzhan longs spyod pa'i sku mtshan nyid 'di gsum dang ldan nam zhe na /
T05TD4016.3E:168b-22: nyid kyi longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ni nges par mtshan nyid gcig dang ldan pas /
T05TD4016.3E:168b-24: mngon par byang chub pa nyid do //
T05TD4016.3E:168b-25: mtshan nyid gzhan gnyis la ni bshad pa rnam pa gnyis yod do /
T05TD4016.3E:168b-26: kha cig na re chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar mi mdzad /
T05TD4016.3E:168b-27: yongs su mya ngan las kyang mi 'da' ste /
T05TD4016.3E:168b-28: sa chen po la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dag gis mi mthong /
T05TD4016.3E:168b-30: sku 'gags nas lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa mngon du mdzad pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhe'o //
T05TD4016.3E:168b-31: kha cig na re mtshan nyid gnyis dang ldan te mthong ba'i chos dang bde ba'i ched du chos ston pa'i phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:168b-32: sku 'gags pa ma yin yang 'gog pa mngon du mdzad pa'i phyir ro zhe'o //
T05TD4016.3E:168b-33: gzhan yang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ni mtshan nyid gsum dang ldan par bshad kyang 'gal ba med de /
T05TD4016.3E:168b-35: sangs rgyas 'od dpag med mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:168b-36: yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:169a-1: spyan ras gzigs de'i rgyal tshab yin pa'i phyir ro zhes gsungs pa lta bu ste /
T05TD4016.3E:169a-2: rgya cher rnam par dbye ba ni mtshan nyid rnam pa brgyad kyis mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par bstan pa dag las 'byung ba bzhin du rig par bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:169a-3: byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
T05TD4016.3E:169a-4: bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams ni sprul pa'i sku la lta ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:169a-6: bsnyen bkur bgyis pa'i bsod nams skye bar 'gyur lags na /
T05TD4016.3E:169a-7: de bzhin gshegs pa dang de dag tu rgyu dang rkyen ci zhig mchis lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bzhi pa de bzhin gshegs pa sems can rnams kyi dmigs pa mdzad pa'i bye brag ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:169a-8: 'di yang zhu ba gsol pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:169a-9: lan du gsungs pa bstan te /
T05TD4016.3E:169a-10: 'di ni zhu ba gsol ba nyid do //
T05TD4016.3E:169a-11: zhu ba gsol ba'i dngos po yang so so nas bshad pa mi mthun pas /
T05TD4016.3E:169a-12: kha cig na re 'dir ni sprul pa'i sku'i de bzhin gshegs pas gdul bar bya ba'i sems can dag la rkyen rnam pa bzhi las rgyu dang rkyen gang zhig mdzad nas bsod nams skyed par mdzad pa lags zhes zhu ba yin no zhe'o //
T05TD4016.3E:169a-13: kha cig na re 'di ni chos kyi sku dang /
T05TD4016.3E:169a-14: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku rnam pa gnyis kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'i sku de dag gi rgyu dang rkyen gang zhig mdzad ces zhu ba yin no zhe'o //
T05TD4016.3E:169a-15: kha cig na re 'di ni chos kyi sku dang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku rnam pa gnyis kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdul bar bya ba'i sems can dag la rgyu dang rkyen gang zhig mdzad nas yon tan rnams skyed par bgyid ces zhu ba yin no zhes zer te /
T05TD4016.3E:169a-16: 'og nas lan du gsungs pa'i tshig dang sbyar na dgongs pa rnam pa 'di gsum yod do //
T05TD4016.3E:169a-17: bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la bka' stsal pa /
T05TD4016.3E:169a-18: rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa bzhi de dag gi lhag par bya ba'i dmigs pa yin pa'i phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:169a-19: sprul pa'i sku de yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs pa yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:169a-20: lan du gsungs pa 'di bshad pa yang gong du zhu ba gsol ba la rnam pa gsum du bshad pa dang sbyar na go rims bzhin du 'di la yang bshad pa rnam pa gsum yod de /
T05TD4016.3E:169b-0: kha cig na re sprul pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems can de @169b dag la rkyen rnam pa gnyis po bdag po'i rkyen dang /
T05TD4016.3E:169b-3: sems can rnams ni sprul pa'i sku bdag po'i rkyen dang /
T05TD4016.3E:169b-4: dmigs pa'i rkyen mdzad nas bsod nams skye bar 'gyur bas so /
T05TD4016.3E:169b-5: rgyu'i rkyen dang mtshungs pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen ni ma yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:169b-6: lus tha dad pa dag phan tshun ltos na rgyu'i rkyen ma yin pa'i phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:169b-7: skal pa mtshungs pa rnams kyi sems la sogs pa dus mtshungs par skye ba'i phyir mtshungs pa de ma thag pa yang ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:169b-8: sprul pa'i sku de yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs pa yin pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni sprul pa'i sku la sems can gyi bsod nams bskyed par bzlas te bshad pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:169b-9: des na sku rnam pa gnyis kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir bsod nams bskyed pa yin no zhe'o //
T05TD4016.3E:169b-10: kha cig na re lan du gsungs pa 'di'i dgongs pa ni chos kyi sku dang /
T05TD4016.3E:169b-11: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku sprul pa'i sku de la ltos na chos kyi sku'i dbang dang /
T05TD4016.3E:169b-12: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i rkyen gyi dbang gis yin gyi /
T05TD4016.3E:169b-13: rkyen gnyis po dag ma yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:169b-14: sprul pa ni sems can ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes zer te /
T05TD4016.3E:169b-16: mdo'i tshig 'di bshad de chos kyi sku dang /
T05TD4016.3E:169b-17: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku rnam pa gnyis kyi de bzhin gshegs pa ni de dag gi bdag po'i rkyen gyis bsdus pas sprul pa'i rgyu dang rkyen yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:169b-18: sku rnam pa gnyis po de dag gi dbang gis sprul pa'i sku 'byung ba'i phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:169b-19: gzhan yang sprul pa'i sku la don de bzhin gshegs pa de gnyis kyi byin gyi rlabs yin pa'i phyir sku rnam pa gnyis po de dag ni sprul pa'i sku de dag gis bskyed pa'i rgyu dang yongs su 'dzin pa'i rgyu'o //
T05TD4016.3E:169b-20: de la rgyu dang rkyen zhes bya ba ni nye bar bskyed pa'i phyir don gyi rgyu dang rkyen zhes gsungs kyi yang dag pa'i rgyu rkyen ni ma yin no //
T05TD4016.3E:169b-21: kha cig na re chos kyi sku dang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku rnam pa gnyis kyi de bzhin gshegs pa ni gdul bar bya ba'i sems can de dag ni dbang po dang ;
T05TD4016.3E:169b-22: dmigs pa'i rkyen rnam pa gnyis yin pa'i phyir bsod nams bskyed de /
T05TD4016.3E:169b-23: ring ba'i rkyen 'di'i dbang gis de bzhin gshegs pa rnam pa gnyis sems can rnams kyi bsod nams bskyed pa zhes bstan to //
T05TD4016.3E:170a-0: gzhan yang sprul pa'i sku de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa gnyis po dag gi mthus byin @170a * //
T05TD4016.3E:170a-1: gyis brlabs pa'i phyir ro zhes zer te /
T05TD4016.3E:170a-2: de ltar rnam pa gsum du bshad pa yod kyang gsum pa ni yang dag pa yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:170a-3: mdo'i tshig dang rjes su mthun pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:170a-4: byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
T05TD4016.3E:170a-5: bcom ldan 'das mngon par 'du bgyi bam mchis par 'dra lags na rgyu dang rkyen gang gi slad du de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi sku kho na las ni sems can rnams la ye shes kyi snang ba chen po 'byung zhing sprul pa'i gzugs brnyan dpag tu med pa dag kyang 'byung la /
T05TD4016.3E:170a-6: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi rnam par grol ba'i lus la ni dngos po 'di dag mi 'byung lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni lnga pa de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi sku dang /
T05TD4016.3E:170a-7: theg pa gnyis kyi rnam par grol ba'i lus kyi bye brag bstan to //
T05TD4016.3E:170a-8: 'di yang zhu ba gsol pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:170a-9: lan du gsungs pas bstan te /
T05TD4016.3E:170a-10: 'di ni zhu ba gsol ba nyid do //
T05TD4016.3E:170a-11: 'di ltar sangs rgyas la chos kyi sku dang /
T05TD4016.3E:170a-12: theg pa gnyis kyi rnam par grol ba'i lus mngon par 'du bgyi ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:170a-13: rnam par grol ba yid la bgyi ba ma mchis pa 'dra lags na /
T05TD4016.3E:170a-14: ci'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku las ni ye shes bzhi'i snang ba chen po dang /
T05TD4016.3E:170a-15: sprul pa'i gzugs brnyan dag 'byung la /
T05TD4016.3E:170a-16: theg pa gnyis kyi rnam par grol ba'i lus las ni dngos po 'di dag mi 'byung lags zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T05TD4016.3E:170a-17: bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la bka' stsal pa /
T05TD4016.3E:170a-18: rigs kyi bu dper na mngon par 'du byed pa med par 'dra yang nyi ma dang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi chu shel dang me shel rnam pa gnyis ni snang ba chen po 'byung la /
T05TD4016.3E:170a-19: de las gzhan pa'i chu shel dag las ni ma yin te zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni /
T05TD4016.3E:170a-20: gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:170a-22: dpes nye bar mtshon pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:170a-23: dpe dang don du sbyar ba'o //
T05TD4016.3E:170a-24: dpes nye bar mtshon pa yang dpe rnam pa gnyis kyis bstan pa nyid las rnam pa gnyis su dbye ste /
T05TD4016.3E:170a-25: 'di ni dpe dang po bstan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:170a-26: dang po yang rnam pa gnyis te /
T05TD4016.3E:170a-27: nyi ma dang zla ba las snang ba chen po 'byung bar bstan pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:170a-28: de gnyis kyi rgyu bstan pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:170a-30: nyi ma dang zla ba'i mtshan nyid bstan pa ni /
T05TD4016.3E:170a-31: mdzod kyi bstan bcos las ji skad du /
T05TD4016.3E:170a-32: nyi ma zla ba ri rab phyed //
T05TD4016.3E:170a-33: dpag tshad lnga bcu lnga bcu gcig / ces 'byung ste /
T05TD4016.3E:170b-0: nyi @170b ma dang zla ba la dpag tshad du yod ce na /
T05TD4016.3E:170b-1: nyi ma ni lnga bcu gcig go //
T05TD4016.3E:170b-3: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'og gi ngos ni rin po che me shel las mngon par grub pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:170b-4: tsha zhing gsal bar byed pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:170b-5: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'og gi ngos ni rin po che chu shel las mngon par grub pa ste bsil zhing gsal bar byed pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:170b-6: nyi ma la sogs pa'i gzhal med khang der sems can ji lta bu dag gnas she na /
T05TD4016.3E:170b-7: rgyal po chen po bzhi'i rigs su gtogs pa'i lha rnams so zhes 'byung ste /
T05TD4016.3E:170b-8: rgya cher de nyid las bstan pa bzhin du'o //
T05TD4016.3E:170b-9: bstan bcos yang dag pa'i rigs pa dang rjes su mthun pa las kyang mdzod kyi bstan bcos las bshad pa dang mthun par 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:170b-10: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las nyi ma dang zla ba ni dpag tshad lnga bcu lnga bcu zhes bshad do //
T05TD4016.3E:170b-12: rin po che chu shel la sogs pa la rnam par rtog pa med kyang /
T05TD4016.3E:170b-13: nyi ma dang zla ba las snang ba chen po 'byung ste //
T05TD4016.3E:170b-14: rin po che gzhan las ni ma yin no zhes bstan par 'gyur ro //
T05TD4016.3E:170b-15: 'di ltar sems can mthu chen po'i byin gyi rlabs kyi phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:170b-16: sems can gyi las kyi dbang gi phyir ro zhes bya ba ni /
T05TD4016.3E:170b-17: gnyis pa rnam pa gnyis kyi rgyu bstan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:170b-18: 'di ltar nyi ma dang zla ba'i rin po che las snang ba chen po 'byung ba ni rgyu rnam pa gnyis kyis te /
T05TD4016.3E:170b-19: mthu chen po dang ldan pa lha'i bu nyi ma dang zla bas phyin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:170b-20: sems can thams cad kyi thun mong gi las kyi dbang gis mngon par grub pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:170b-21: de bzhin du chos sku yang de bzhin gshegs pa mthu chen po dang ldan pas byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:170b-22: gzhan yang sems can sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur ba'i las thun mong las mngon par grub pa'i phyir ye shes kyi snang ba chen po 'byung zhing sprul pa'i gzugs brnyan 'byung gi rin po che gzhan dag ni mthu chen po dang ldan pa dag gis byin gyis brlabs pa ma yin pa'i phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:170b-23: sems can gyi thun mong gi las kyi dbang las mngon par grub pa ma yin pa'i phyir snang brgya chen po gtong bar mi nus so //
T05TD4016.3E:170b-24: de bzhin du theg pa gnyis kyi rnam par grol ba'i lus kyang de bzhin gshegs pa mthu chen po dang ldan pa dag gis byin gyis brlabs pa ma yin pa'i phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:170b-25: sems can gyi thun mong gi las kyi dbang gis grub pa ma yin pa'i phyir snang ba chen po 'byung zhing sku'i gzugs brnyan ston par mi nus so //
T05TD4016.3E:171a-1: nor bu rin po che las byi dor legs par byas pa de dag las ni rgyu'i gzugs brnyan 'byung la /
T05TD4016.3E:171a-2: de las gzhan pa'i byi dor ma byas pa dag las ni ma yin zhes bya ba ni dpe gnyis pa bstan te /
T05TD4016.3E:171a-3: 'di ltar bzo ba mkhas pas nor bu rin po che byi dor legs par byas pa las ni rgyan gyi gzugs brnyan 'byung gi /
T05TD4016.3E:171a-4: de las gzhan pa'i byi dor ma byas pa dag ni ma yin pa bzhin no //
T05TD4016.3E:171a-5: de bzhin du chos kyi dbyings dpag tu med pa la dmigs pa'i thabs dang shes rab bsgoms pas shin tu sbyang ba byas pa las yang dag par grub pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi sku las ye shes kyi snang ba chen po dang sprul pa'i gzugs brnyan dpag tu med pa dag 'byung gi / rnam par grol ba'i lus 'ba' zhig las ni dngos po de dag yod pa ma yin no zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa dpe dang don du sbyar ba'o //
T05TD4016.3E:171a-6: chos kyi dbyings dpag tu med pa dag la dmigs pa zhes bya ba ni de bzhin nyid kyi chos kyi sku ni chos dpag tu med pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir chos kyi dbyings zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:171a-7: thabs dang shes rab ces bya ba ni chos kyi dbyings la dmigs pa'i shes pas dge ba bsgoms te /
T05TD4016.3E:171a-8: nyon mongs pa rab tu bsal nas chos kyi sku gsal bar byed pa'i phyir thabs zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:171a-9: de ni 'di skad du de bzhin nyid la dmigs pa'i thabs dang /
T05TD4016.3E:171a-10: shes rab kyis shin tu legs par nyon mongs pa sbyangs te /
T05TD4016.3E:171a-11: pha rol tu phyin pa drug brtsams pa las ni chos kyi sku mngon par grub la /
T05TD4016.3E:171a-12: chos kyi sku las ni ye shes kyi snang ba 'byung zhing /
T05TD4016.3E:171a-13: sprul pa'i gzugs brnyan ston par 'gyur gyi /
T05TD4016.3E:171a-14: gang zag stong pa nyid du lta ba'i shes pa rnam par grol ba'i lus las ni snang ba chen po gtong ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:171a-15: sprul pa'i gzugs brnyan ston par 'gyur ba ma yin no zhes bstan par 'gyur ro //
T05TD4016.3E:171a-16: mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni rnam par grol ba'i lus las dngos po 'di lta bu yod pa ma yin no zhes 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:171a-17: dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ni /
T05TD4016.3E:171a-18: rnam par grol ba'i lus las dngos po 'di lta bu 'byung ba ma yin no zhes 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:171a-19: byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
T05TD4016.3E:171a-20: bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad du /
T05TD4016.3E:171a-22: byang chub sems dpa'i mthu'i byin gyi rlabs kyis sems can rnams 'dod pa'i khams kyi mi'i lus phun sum tshogs pa rgyal rigs dang bram ze'i rigs shing s'a la chen po lta bu rnams dang /
T05TD4016.3E:171b-1: gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams kyi lha'i lus phun sum tshogs pa thams cad snang ngo zhes gang gsungs pa de la /
T05TD4016.3E:171b-2: bcom ldan 'das dgongs pa lta bu zhig mchis dang /
T05TD4016.3E:171b-3: byang chub sems dpa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi mthus sems dang /
T05TD4016.3E:171b-4: byang chub sems dpa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi mthus sems can gyi lus yongs su 'dzin pa ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:171b-5: 'di yang zhu ba gsol ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:171b-6: lan du gsungs pa bstan te /
T05TD4016.3E:171b-7: 'di ni zhu ba gsol ba nyid do //
T05TD4016.3E:171b-8: zhu ba gsol ba'i dgongs pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pas dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang /
T05TD4016.3E:171b-9: theg pa gsum gyi bsgrub pa la sogs pa gsungs pas gang gis bstan pa bzhin du bsgrub pa dag ni lus dang longs spyod phun sum tshogs par 'gyur la /
T05TD4016.3E:171b-10: gang dag bstan pa dang 'gal bar byas pa dag ni lus yongs su nyams par 'gyur bar thob pa dang ldan yang nyams pa dang ldan no zhes bka' stsal ba'i rigs pa las lus phun sum tshogs pa thob pa dang ldan pa'i phyogs gcig kho na gsungs kyi /
T05TD4016.3E:171b-11: nyams par 'gyur ba ma gsungs pa la dgongs pa ci mchis zhes zhu ba yin no //
T05TD4016.3E:171b-12: bshad pa'i rnam pa gzhan du na ci tsam du sems dang bcas pa dag ni rang gi las kyi dbang gis lus phun sum tshogs pa thob par 'gyur ba yin na /
T05TD4016.3E:171b-13: mdo dag las ni de bzhin gshegs pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:171b-14: byang chub sems dpa' mthu'i byin gyi rlabs kyis sems can gyi lus phun sum tshogs par byed do zhes gsungs pas /
T05TD4016.3E:171b-15: des dgongs pa ji lta bu zhig ces khong du ma chud nas zhus pa yin no //
T05TD4016.3E:171b-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la bka' stsal pa /
T05TD4016.3E:171b-17: rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:171b-18: byang chub sems dpa'i mthus byin gyis brlabs nas lam gang dang bsgrub pa gang gis thams cad du sems can rnams lus phun sum tshogs pa thob par 'gyur ba dag ci rigs par de dag la lam de dang bsgrub pa de yang dag par bstan pa zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni /
T05TD4016.3E:171b-19: gnyis po de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:171b-23: rnam par bshad pa la yang rnam pa gnyis te /
T05TD4016.3E:171b-24: dgongs pa'i bstan pa smos pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:171b-25: gang dag ces bya ba man chad kyis bstan pa'i rjes su grub pa dang 'gal bar byed pas smos nas dgongs pa de yang dag par bstan pa ste 'di ni dang po'o //
T05TD4016.3E:172a-0: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thugs rje chen po'i byin gyi rlabs kyis dge ba bcu'i las kyi @172a * //
T05TD4016.3E:172a-2: theg pa gsum gyi spyod pa gsungs pas khams gsum gyi sems can rnams lus phun sum tshogs pa thob par 'gyur ba dag la lam de dang bsgrub pa de bstan par mdzad kyang bstan pa dang 'gal bar byed pa med pa ni ma yin pa'i phyir /
T05TD4016.3E:172a-3: ldem por dgongs te gsungs pa mngon par grub pa yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
T05TD4016.3E:172a-4: gang dag lam de dang bsgrub pa de yang dag par sgrub par byed pa dag ni thams cad du lus phun sum tshogs par 'gyur zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni /
T05TD4016.3E:172a-5: gnyis pa bstan pa'i rjes su bsgrub pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:172a-6: 'gal bar byed pa smos nas dgongs pa yang dag par bstan pa ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:172a-8: bstan pa'i rjes su bsgrub pa'i phan yon bstan pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:172a-9: bstan pa dang 'gal ba'i nyes dmigs bstan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:172a-11: mdo 'di nyid kyis brda phrad par zad do //
T05TD4016.3E:172a-12: sems can gang dag lam de dang bsgrub pa de'i phyir spong zhing mi snyan pa brjod pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:172a-13: nga la yang kun nas mnar sems kyi sems dang /
T05TD4016.3E:172a-14: khong khro ba'i sems bskyed nas 'chi ba'i dus byed pa dag ni thams cad du lus dman pa thob par 'gyur bas zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa bstan pa dang 'gal ba'i nyes dmigs bstan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:172a-15: sems can gang dag dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rgyab kyis phyogs shing theg pa gsum gyi bsgrub pa dag la mi snyan par brjod pa dang lhas byin bzhin du sangs rgyas la kun nas mnar sems kyi sems bskyed pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:172a-16: sor mo'i phreng ba ltar sangs rgyas la khong khro ba'i sems bskyed pa dag ni /
T05TD4016.3E:172a-17: skye ba thams cad du lus phun sum tshogs pa ma yin pa thob par 'gyur bas so //
T05TD4016.3E:172a-18: 'jam dpal rgyu dang rkyen des na de bzhin gshegs pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:172a-19: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mthus byin gyis brlabs nas lus phun sum tshogs pa 'ba' zhig tu byed pa ma yin gyi /
T05TD4016.3E:172a-21: byang chub sems dpa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi mthus ni sems can gyi lus dman par byed par yang rig par bya'o zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa mjug bsdu ba ste /
T05TD4016.3E:172a-22: 'di yang rjes su mthun par bsgrub pa'i phan yon dang 'gal ba'i nye dmigs bstan pa'i mjug bsdu ba yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:172a-23: mdo nyid kyis brda phrad par zad do //
T05TD4016.3E:172a-24: byang chub sems dpal 'jam dpal gyis yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
T05TD4016.3E:172a-25: bcom ldan 'das zhing yongs su dag pa na dngos po gang ni mdo pa lags /
T05TD4016.3E:172b-0: dngos po gang ni dka' ba lags zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni bdun pa zhing yongs su dag pa dang zhing yongs su ma dag pa dag na gang @172b dag rnyed par dka' ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:172b-1: gang dag mod pa'i mtshan nyid ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:172b-2: 'di yang zhu ba gsol pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:172b-3: lan du gsungs pa bstan te /
T05TD4016.3E:172b-4: 'di ni dang po zhing yongs su dag pa dang ma dag pa dag na dngos po gang dkon pa dang mod pa cig car zhus pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:172b-5: bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal la bka' stsal pa /
T05TD4016.3E:172b-6: rigs kyi bu zhing yongs su dag pa dag na dngos po brgyad ni mod la /
T05TD4016.3E:172b-7: dngos po gnyis ni dkon no zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:172b-9: zhing yongs su ma dag pa dag gi dngos po bstan pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:172b-10: zhing yongs su dag pa dag gi dngos po bstan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:172b-11: zhing yongs su ma dag pa dag gi dngos po bstan pa yang rnam pa gnyis te /
T05TD4016.3E:172b-12: grangs smos nas lan mdor bstan pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:172b-13: rnam par phye ste bshad pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:172b-15: dngos po mod pa brgyad gang zhe na zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni gnyis pa rnam par phye ste bshad pa ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:172b-17: dngos po brgyad rnyed sla bar bstan pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:172b-18: dngos po gnyis rnyed dka' bar bstan pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:172b-19: 'di ni dngos po brgyad sla bar bstan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:172b-20: 'di yang brtag pa dang lan du gsungs pas bstan te /
T05TD4016.3E:172b-22: mu stegs can rnams dang sems can sdug bsngal ba rnams dang rigs dang /
T05TD4016.3E:172b-23: rus dang cho rigs 'byor pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:172b-24: rgyud pa tha dad pa rnams dang /
T05TD4016.3E:172b-25: nyes pa spyad pa spyod pa rnams dang /
T05TD4016.3E:172b-26: tshul khrims ral ba rnams dang /
T05TD4016.3E:172b-28: theg pa dman pa rnams dang /
T05TD4016.3E:172b-29: bsam pa dang sbyor ba dman pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams so zhes bya ba ni gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas dngos po brgyad rnyed sla ba'i lan du gsungs pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:172b-31: sdom pa yang dag par ma blangs pa'i gang zag nyes byas pa gang yin pa de ni nyes par spyod pa zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:172b-32: sdom pa blangs pa gang yin pa des mtshams las 'das pa ni tshul khrims ral ba zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:172b-33: sa'i mdun rol pa dang po sems bskyed pa zhan pa gang yin pa de ni bsam pa dman pa zhes bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:172b-34: tshig gzhan ni brda phrad par zad do //
T05TD4016.3E:172b-35: dngos po dkon pa gnyis gang zhe na zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni /
T05TD4016.3E:172b-36: gnyis pa dngos po gnyis rnyed par dka' ba bstan pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:172b-37: 'di yang bstan pa dang lan du gsungs par ston te 'di brtag pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:172b-38: byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:172b-39: sbyor ba mchog dang ldan pa rnams kyi spyod pa dang rnam par rgyu zhing 'du ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:172b-40: de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten du 'byung ba'o zhes bya ba ni /
T05TD4016.3E:173a-0: gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas @173a * //
T05TD4016.3E:173a-1: yang dag par lan du gsungs pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:173a-3: sa dang po yan chad kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnam par rgyu zhing 'du ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:173a-4: de bzhin gshegs pa rtag par 'jig rten du 'byung ba shin tu dka' bas so //
T05TD4016.3E:173a-5: 'jam dpal zhing yongs su dag pa dag na ni gong ma las bzlog pa dngos po brgyad ni dkon la /
T05TD4016.3E:173a-6: dngos po gnyis ni mdo bar rig par bya'o zhes bya ba ni /
T05TD4016.3E:173a-7: gnyis pa zhing yongs su dag pa dag na dngos po brgyad ni dkon la /
T05TD4016.3E:173a-8: dngos po gnyis ni rnyed sla bar bstan pa yang gong ma las bzlog pa yin par bstan pa ste /
T05TD4016.3E:173a-9: mdo nyid kyis brda phrad par zad do //
T05TD4016.3E:173a-10: mtshams rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo dang /
T05TD4016.3E:173a-11: theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa las kyang mdo 'di las gsungs pa dang mthun par 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:173a-12: zhing yongs su dag pa rnams khams gsum gyis bsdus sam zhe na /
T05TD4016.3E:173a-14: khams gsum gyis bsdus pa ma yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:173a-15: de'i phyir mdo 'di nyid las 'jig rten las 'das pa de'i bla ma'i dge ba'i rtsa ba las byung ba zhes gsungs pa yin no //
T05TD4016.3E:173a-16: gzhan yang 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las ;
T05TD4016.3E:173a-17: sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag tu skyes pa rnams 'dod pa'i khams su gtogs pa zhig yin nam /
T05TD4016.3E:173a-18: 'on te 'dod pa'i khams sum gtogs pa zhig yin zhe na /
T05TD4016.3E:173a-20: sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan gang sna tshogs 'dres shing yongs su ma dag pa gang yin pa de ni 'dod pa'i khams zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:173a-21: yongs su dag pa gang yin pa de ni ngan song gsum dang ;
T05TD4016.3E:173a-23: theg pa gnyis kyi ming dang /
T05TD4016.3E:173a-24: skyes pa dang bud med ces bya ba yang med la /
T05TD4016.3E:173a-25: mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan zhing 'od dpag tu med pas 'jig rten gyis khams snang bar byed pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:173a-26: skad cig ma gcig la lus tshad med par sprul nas 'jig rten gyi khams gang g'a'i klung gi bye ma snyed du byin nas sems can grangs med pa snyed yongs su bzlas te slar rang gi gnas su phyin pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:173a-27: 'jig rten gyi khams de lta bu de ni sa la mi gnas pa'i phyir gzugs kyi khams zhes mi bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:173a-28: 'dod chags med pa'i phyir 'dod pa'i khams zhes mi bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:173a-29: gzugs dang ldan pa'i phyir gzugs med pa'i khams zhes mi bya'o zhes 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:173a-30: gzhan yang bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i las /
T05TD4016.3E:173a-31: sems can gyi khams dpag tu med pa la sogs pa dpag tu med pa lnga gsungs pa de la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad mtshungs shing mnyam pa yin nam /
T05TD4016.3E:173a-32: 'on te bye brag yod par brjod par bya zhe na /
T05TD4016.3E:173a-34: bye brag yod par brjod par bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:173a-35: de dag kyang rnam pa gnyis te /
T05TD4016.3E:173b-2: de la 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su dag pa dag na ni sems can dmyal ba dag kyang med /
T05TD4016.3E:173b-7: gzugs med pa'i khams kyang med /
T05TD4016.3E:173b-8: sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba med la de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun 'ba' zhig gnas pas na de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams de dag yongs su dag pa zhes bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:173b-9: de dag tu byang chub sems dpa' sa gsum bar chad pa rnams smon lam gyi dbang gis skye'i /
T05TD4016.3E:173b-10: de dag na so so'i skye bo'am /
T05TD4016.3E:173b-11: so so'i skye bo ma yin pa'i nyan thos rnams kyi skye ba rnams skye ba med do //
T05TD4016.3E:173b-12: gal te de dag na so so'i skye bo'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /
T05TD4016.3E:173b-13: so so'i skye bo ma yin pa'i nyan thos rnams kyi skye ba med na /
T05TD4016.3E:173b-14: byang chub sems dpa' rnams smra ba na /
T05TD4016.3E:173b-15: byang chub sems dpa' gang su dag de dag tu yid kyis smon par byed pa de dag thams cad ni de dag tu skye bar 'gyur ro zhes ci'i phyir smra zhe na /
T05TD4016.3E:173b-17: gdul ba'i le lo dang ldan pa'i rang bzhin can dge ba'i rtsa bam bsags pa rnams la bsams nas smras pa yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:173b-19: 'di dag ltar de dag spro bar gyur na le lo spangs te /
T05TD4016.3E:173b-20: dge ba'i chos rnams la brtson par byed cing der rim gyis de dag tu skye ba'i chos nyid 'thob pa'i skal ba can du 'gyur ba'i phyir te /
T05TD4016.3E:173b-21: de ltar na de la bsams pa ni de yin par rig par bya'o zhes 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:173b-22: zhing yongs su dag pa dag nang na song yang med na /
T05TD4016.3E:173b-23: ji ltar lha dang klu la sogs pa srid ce na /
T05TD4016.3E:173b-24: 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi sa'i 'grel pa las /
T05TD4016.3E:173b-27: de'i phyir de nyid las khams gsum pa las yang dag par 'das pa'i spyod yul yin na ni /
T05TD4016.3E:173b-28: lha la sogs pa mi srid de ;
T05TD4016.3E:173b-29: de dag ni khams gsum pa na spyod pa yin pa'i phyir ro zhe'o //
T05TD4016.3E:173b-30: de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par rig pa de lta bu'i rnam par snang ste /
T05TD4016.3E:173b-31: sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgyan pa'i phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:173b-32: sems can yongs su smin bar bya ba'i phyir dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams klu la sogs pa dag tu sprul nas mchod pa byed pa yin pa'i phyir dang /
T05TD4016.3E:173b-33: yang bdag nyid de lta bur sprul nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i zham ring byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro zhes 'byung ste /
T05TD4016.3E:173b-34: zhib tu de nyid las bstan pa bzhin no //
T05TD4016.3E:173b-35: bstan bcos theg pa chen po bsdus pa'i 'grel pa ngo bo nyid med kyis byas pa dang /
T05TD4016.3E:173b-36: lang gi che bsgyur ba las kyang de skad du ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:173b-37: gal te zhing yongs su dag pa dag na theg pa dman pa med na /
T05TD4016.3E:174a-1: rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las bstan pa ji ltar go zhing rnam par bshad par bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:174a-2: de las ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa khams gsum pa las yang dag par 'das pa yod de dgra bcom pa la sogs pa yang der skye bar 'gyur ro zhes 'byung ngo zhe na /
T05TD4016.3E:174a-4: 'di ni rigs ma nges pa'i nyan thos mi slob pa theg pa chen por sems bsgyur ba rnam par 'gyur ba'i lus len pa dbang 'byor ba'i gzhal med khang na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yang dag pa yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:174a-5: dang po'i gzhi nyid las dgongs nas dgra bcom pa la sogs pa'i zhing yongs su dag par skye zhes bstan pa yin gyi /
T05TD4016.3E:174a-6: yang dag par de na theg pa gnyis yod pa ni ma yin no //
T05TD4016.3E:174a-7: gal te de ltar na ci'i phyir 'od dpag tu med pa'i mdo las /
T05TD4016.3E:174a-8: nyan thos kyi slob ma tshad med pa /
T05TD4016.3E:174a-9: mtha' med pa thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa sha stag go zhes gsungs /
T05TD4016.3E:174a-10: gzhan yang bsgom pa bstan pa'i mdo las /
T05TD4016.3E:174a-11: gang zag 'bring rnam pa gsum ni zhing der gdod 'bras bu bzhi thob par 'gyur ro zhes gsungs she na /
T05TD4016.3E:174a-13: sangs rgyas 'od dpag med kyi zhing yongs su dag pa ni rnam pa gnyis te /
T05TD4016.3E:174a-16: de'i phyir 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las /
T05TD4016.3E:174a-17: sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa'i zhing khams na 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su dag pa yod de /
T05TD4016.3E:174a-18: sangs rgyas 'od dpag med kyi zhing yongs su dag pa lta bu'o //
T05TD4016.3E:174a-19: sangs rgyas 'od dpag med kyi zhing khams na yang 'jig rten gyi khams bkod pa yongs su dag pa yod de /
T05TD4016.3E:174a-20: sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa'i zhing yongs su dag pa lta bu'o zhes 'byung ste /
T05TD4016.3E:174a-21: mdo 'di las ni gzhan longs spyod pa'i zhing gi dbang du mdzad nas theg pa dman pa med ces gsungs pa yin no //
T05TD4016.3E:174a-22: gzhan yang mdo 'di las brtsams nas /
T05TD4016.3E:174a-23: bstan bcos sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par skye bar 'gyur ba bstan pa las /
T05TD4016.3E:174a-24: theg pa gnyis kyi rigs can dag mi skye zhes bstan la /
T05TD4016.3E:174a-25: 'od dpag med kyi mdo la sogs pa las ni sprul pa'i zhing la dgongs nas nyan thos yod par gsungs te /
T05TD4016.3E:174a-26: 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa de'i sngon gyi smon lam gyi dbang gi phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:174a-27: gzhan yang 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grel pa las /
T05TD4016.3E:174a-28: gal te de lta na sangs rgyas 'od dpag med dang /
T05TD4016.3E:174a-29: sangs rgyas mi g-yo ba la sogs pa snyigs ma lnga'i dus su 'byung ba ma yin na /
T05TD4016.3E:174a-30: ci'i phyir theg pa gsum yod par 'gyur zhe na /
T05TD4016.3E:174a-32: sangs rgyas dang po thugs bskyed pa'i tshe /
T05TD4016.3E:174a-33: sangs rgyas rnams theg pa gsum gyis /
T05TD4016.3E:174b-0: @174b sems can sgrol bar gzigs pas 'di skad du /
T05TD4016.3E:174b-1: bdag kyang theg pa gsum gyis sems can sgrol bar gyur cig ces smon lam btab pa'i lung dang /
T05TD4016.3E:174b-2: rigs pa des na sprul pa'i zhing yongs su dag pa dag na yang theg pa gsum yod par gyur pa yin no //
T05TD4016.3E:174b-3: de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
T05TD4016.3E:174b-4: bcom ldan 'das dgongs pa zab mo nges par 'grel ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa 'di'i ming ci lags /
T05TD4016.3E:174b-5: bdag gis ji ltar gzung bar bgyi zhes bya ba 'di man chad ni gnyis pa bka' bzhin du spyod pa'i phyogs zhes bya ba ston to /
T05TD4016.3E:174b-6: mdo'i tshig 'di la yang bshad pa rnam pa gnyis yod de /
T05TD4016.3E:174b-7: kha cig na re mdo 'di la phyogs rnam pa gnyis yod de /
T05TD4016.3E:174b-9: 'phags pa'i gsung rab yang dag par bstan pa'i phyogs te /
T05TD4016.3E:174b-10: gsum pa bka' bzhin du yang dag par bsgrub pa'i phyogs ni med do zhes zer te /
T05TD4016.3E:174b-11: bshad pa 'di dang sbyar na le'u brgyad pa 'di la phyogs rnam pa gnyis yod de /
T05TD4016.3E:174b-12: zhu ba dang lan dag gis yang dag par bshad pa'i phyogs dang /
T05TD4016.3E:174b-13: bka' bzhin du yang dag par bsgrub pa'i phyogs so //
T05TD4016.3E:174b-14: de yan chad du zhu ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:174b-15: lan dag gis yang dag par bshad pa'i phyogs bshad zin nas /
T05TD4016.3E:174b-16: 'di man chad gnyis pa bka' bzhin du bsgrub pa'i phyogs ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:174b-17: kha cig na re mdo 'di las phyogs rnam pa gsum yod de ;
T05TD4016.3E:174b-18: le'u dang po gcig ni bstan pa 'byung ba'i rgyu dang rkyen gyi phyogs zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:174b-19: le'u gzhan bdun po dag ni 'phags pa'i bstan pa yang dag par bshad pa'i phyogs zhes bya'o //
T05TD4016.3E:174b-20: gsum pa bka' bzhin du yang dag par bsgrub pa'i phyogs ni le'u bzhi po dag gi mjug tu bstan pa dag yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:174b-22: rang gi ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyi le'u dang /
T05TD4016.3E:174b-23: rnal 'byor rnam par 'byed pa'i le'u dang /
T05TD4016.3E:174b-24: sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u dang /
T05TD4016.3E:174b-25: de bzhin gshegs pa'i bya ba bsgrub pa'i le'u te /
T05TD4016.3E:174b-26: de yan chad du le'u snga ma gsum po dag las 'byung ba'i bka' bzhin du yang dag par bsgrub pa'i phyogs ni bstan nas /
T05TD4016.3E:174b-27: 'dir ni bzhi po de bzhin gshegs pa'i bya bsgrub pa'i bka' bzhin du yang dag par bsgrub pa'i phyogs bstan pa yin no zhe'o //
T05TD4016.3E:174b-28: kha cig na re phyogs dang po gnyis ni bshad pa snga ma gnyis dang mthun no //
T05TD4016.3E:174b-29: gsum pa bka' bzhin du yang dag par bsgrub pa'i phyogs ni logs na yod de /
T05TD4016.3E:175a-0: dgongs pa zab mo rnam par dgrol ba'i mdo las ji skad du byang chub sems dpa' @175a * //
T05TD4016.3E:175a-1: sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal chos kyi rgyal po dang /
T05TD4016.3E:175a-2: lha dang mi dang lha ma yin dang bcas pa'i 'khor thams cad rab tu dga'o zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o //
T05TD4016.3E:175a-3: mdo gzhan dag las tshig mi 'byung ba ni rgya gar gyi dpe nyid mi mthun pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:175a-4: yang na lo ts'a ba dag gi bsam pa tha dad pa'i phyir ro zhes zer te /
T05TD4016.3E:175a-5: de ltar rnam pa gsum du bshad pa yod kyang 'dir ni re zhig gnyis pa dang sbyar ro //
T05TD4016.3E:175a-6: phyogs 'di yang rnam pa gnyis su dbye ste /
T05TD4016.3E:175a-9: 'di ni dang po 'phags pa'i gsung rab kyi mtshan dang bka' bzhin bsgrub pa'i chos zhus pa'o //
T05TD4016.3E:175a-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal la bka' stsal pa /
T05TD4016.3E:175a-11: rigs kyi bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bya ba bsgrub pa nges pa'i don bstan pa zhes bya ste /
T05TD4016.3E:175a-12: khyod kyis yongs su gzung bar bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni /
T05TD4016.3E:175a-13: gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pas yang dag par lan du gsungs pa ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:175a-15: gsung rab kyi mtshan smos nas 'khor rnams de bzhin du bsgrub par bskul ba dang /
T05TD4016.3E:175a-16: bstan pa thos pa'i phan yon bstan pa ste 'di na dang po'o //
T05TD4016.3E:175a-17: de bzhin gshegs pa'i bya ba bsgrub pa'i nges pa'i don bstan pa 'di bshad pa na /
T05TD4016.3E:175a-18: 'khor 'dus pa de las byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdun khri lnga stong gis chos kyi sku yongs su rdzogs pa so so yang dag pa'i rig pa thob par gyur to zhes bya ba ni /
T05TD4016.3E:175a-19: gnyis pa bstan pa thob pa'i phan yon ston to //
T05TD4016.3E:175a-20: 'di ltar 'khor 'dus pa de las byang chub sems dpa' bdun khri lnga stong gis bstan pa thos pas sa bcu pa rgyu yongs su rdzogs pa'i chos kyi sku thob nas /
T05TD4016.3E:175a-21: da dung gya nom par mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas 'bras bu yongs su rdzogs pa'i chos kyi sku ma thob pa yin te /
T05TD4016.3E:175a-22: gzhan longs spyod pa'i zhing mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i gnas ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
T05TD4016.3E:175a-23: dpe gzhan gnyis las byang chub sems dpa' bdun khri lnga stong gis chos kyi sku yongs su rdzogs pa thob par gyur to zhes 'byung ngo //
T05TD4016.3E:175a-24: 'phags pa dgongs pa zab mo nges par 'grel ba'i mdo rgya cher 'grel pa rgya'i slob dpon wang tshig gis mdzad pa rdzogs sto /
T05TD4016.3E:175a-26: // / dpal lha btsan po'i bka' lung gis zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba dge slong 'gos chos grub kyis rgya'i dpe las bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o /
